story:
Light Energy Direct is a lighting solutions company located in Brooklyn, New York.

We like to help every client! Simplifying the process has been achieved, fill out the form and wait for someone to contact you! 

Email LightEnergyDirect@Gmail.com

Use LightEnergyDirect.com


The Funds generated on last Crowd Fund of 291$, Will be used to improve Light Energy Direct every dollar counts and is appreciated

story:
by

NIAMA-REISSER, LLC

Have you always dreamed of owning your own carbon fiber money clip, pen holder, frisbee, table bowl or Furniture, etc.? Now you got the chance to do just that! Money Clips starting as low as $ 50.00!

You don't have to plunder your bank account to do it. NIAMA-REISSER, LLC prides itself for having made Carbon Fiber Products affordable! You won't find similar products -quality, style and price- anywhere else on the Web, New York, Los Angeles, etc.

We are the the pioneers of "Main Stream Carbon Fiber". You can support our "New Industrial Revolution" by making a statement in your life and setting yourself apart from the crowd. Show that you are special and get a NRCarbon Design Masterpiece today.

No other Designer, Furniture House, Online Website -SHOP- offers as great a variety as we do. Not only in terms of variety, but also in regards to design. Our Living Room Product Line matches the aesthetic design of the Dining Room Set.

Our Bathroom is unmatched in terms of design and functionality!

Over the past 8 years we developed our own proprietary way of converting Mesh DATA into CAD DATA.


This type of software conversion enables ENGINEERS and DESIGNERS to quickly and effectively model complex 3-D geometries with organic shapes (flowing lines). After having invested in the development of this proprietary process: Converting Mesh DATA into CAD DATA; we saw the benefit of utilizing this type of process in other projects and industries.

Since then, we have been awarded three years in a row "Best in Show" by the ANSYS, INC. --FORTUNE 500- design competition gallery.

We are putting our manufacturing "Know-How" of the NR-1 body panels to use by designing carbon fiber test rigs to analyze the static load structures and weight baring abilities of different types of Carbon Fiber weaves and Furniture Geometries.

In addition, we successfully completed CAE (Computer Aided Engineering) tests on the structural integrity of each geometry.


All the components were structurally designed to a maximum weight rating of 400 lbs, per person. Depending upon the model of furniture, the weight rating increases by a factor of how many people can fit on it.

After R&D was completed, we started manufacturing the preliminary molds, to make the carbon fiber frames. To keep the cost overhead low, the molds were machined from a high density foam instead of aluminum. These molds were only intended to produce 10-15 parts a piece.

Now, due to the high retailers' and customers' appreciations of the design and material integration, we are wanting to further reduce production costs to make this technology and design available to everyone!

To meet our budgetary numbers, we want to manufacture STAPLE units like the Lounge Chair, Ottoman, Sofa and Coffee Table in large production runs of 100+. This entails the manufacturing of aluminum molds! The current molds can only do max. 10-15 units, each!


It is our 1# goal to insure that the manufacturing costs are further reduced. We have already done a great deal to reduce the overhead, so that the retailers can sell our products at reasonable prices.


By further reducing our manufacturing overhead, we plan on making our products available to everyone. This can only be done, if we are blessed enough to receive the $ 150,000.00, which we are planning on raising!

The production of aluminum molds would mean a phenomenal price reduction for consumers! All of this, in part, due to larger production runs: Min. 100 units.

Your funding can help us, NIAMA-REISSER, LLC, make "Space Age" material available to everyone. Our products are not only unique in terms of material, but they LOOK GREAT!

You will literally feel like a Formula-1 or NASCAR Driver!


Timeline:

Once we have received the funding, we will begin with the machining of the aluminum molds. The CAD data is all there, so we only need to machine the same molds out of aluminum instead of high density foam. This will only take us 3-4 weeks to complete once the funding is complete, since we have to purchase the aluminum blocks, which will weigh in access of 425 lbs a piece! A lot of money in the material alone!!

Once the molds are complete, we can start laminating. This step will only take 3 weeks dependent upon the first production run 100-200 units!

Painting is next: Around 1.5 weeks for that step!

Finally then the upholstery: Around 4 weeks!

The Lounge Chair and Ottoman should ship before the end of October without any problem.

Frisbee, etc.:

All the other rewards are going to be ready for shipping within 5-6 weeks after having been successfully funded.

Rewards:

As described in the PERKS section, we are going to SEND the following pieces to our backers depending on their respective contribution amounts :

Carbon Fiber Money Clips

Carbon Fiber Money Clip




Carbon Fiber Pen Holder

Carbon Fiber Frisbee

Carbon Fiber Bowl

Carbon Fiber Bowl

Carbon Fiber Ottoman

Carbon Fiber Ottoman

Carbon Fiber Lounge Chair + Ottoman



The above pictured PERKS are what you are going to get!

It's time to make "EXCLUSIVE" - "AFFORDABLE"!


FACTS:

Who designed the Furniture, Bathroom and Accessory Products?

1)NIAMA-REISSER,LLC's design team has designed all carbon fiber product lines by NR

What was the inspiration?

2)The design was inspired by magnificent italian architecture

Are the products tested in terms of weight ratings?

3)The designs are tested and tried

Are they ergonomically healthy?

4) Ergonomics play a big factor in our designs. We want you to sit or rest comfortably

Who makes the carbon fiber molds?

5) In most cases our own ISO 9001:2008 certified CNC machining Job Shop and Manufacturing Department 

Where does the carbon fiber get laminated?

6)The carbon fiber frames get laminated at an ISO certified OEM Auto supplier of Carbon Fiber Body Panels in Germany. Only the best of the best can pull our designs and price points off

Where do they get finished or assembled?

7) The upholstery, trim, etc. get made in the USA and the product gets assembled in Columbus / Coshocton, OHIO

Where do you ship from?

8) We ship from Columbus / Coshocton, OHIO

Where can we contact you with questions?

9) E-Mail us at info@niamareisser.com


Risks:

Well, the risks are really slim to null! Why? Well, we have our own manufacturing department, which can handle the mold machining. In addition, we already have all the geometry (CAD DATA) to make the molds.

The molds and the raw material are just extremely expensive! Think of the price of Aluminum! 1.5 pounds is almost $ 5.00. The molds have to be made from aluminum to insure repeated quality and good production volumes.

Our campaign's primary effort is to cover the large costs associated with production molds.

As long as we get the funding, we can manufacture the perks with an unmatched quality!

Help us make Exclusive-Affordable



Sincerely,

Your NIAMA-REISSER, LLC Team

story:
Buttons, Buttons, Who's Got The Buttons?

Last year, I was a Guardian for RTX, a gaming convention put on by Rooster Teeth in Austin, TX.  As a gift to my fellow Guardians, I created a set of 1.25" buttons, pressed several hundred of them, and gave them out over the weekend.

This year, I'd love to do the same, as well as expand my button-making capability to 2.25"-sized versions. Unfortunately, a button press isn't cheap, and neither are the materials for the buttons themselves.

What I Need & What You Get

Now for the important parts: What exactly I'm needing, and what you can get in exchange!

I need - 

  • Goal is met! Thanks, Blutonian! <3 Basic Buttons for RTX 2016 - In order to be able to create enough 1.25" buttons for all of the Guardians (estimating at 600), I'll need $100 for the button parts, printing the images, and mailing them all out to Austin.
  • Goal is met! Expanded Button Line for RTX 2016 - To be able to get the 2.25" button machine, all of the supplies, print the images and mail them out to Austin, I'll need $500.
  • Goal is met! Fee Overage - I've got that extra $50 set into the goal to cover whatever fees Indiegogo & the various payment methods will deduct from contributions.
  • Goal is met! Stretch Goal - $800 - Button Bundle - Outside of the Guardian exclusive buttons, I'd love to be able to design a set of 5 buttons, available for anybody.
  • Goal is met! Stretch Goal - $900 - Ghosts of RTX Past - Reaching this point will allow me to make a set of buttons themed with various memories from all the RTXs that have passed.
  • Goal is met! Stretch Goal - $1000 - New Color Printer - In the event that we raise more than the $650 needed to press both 1.25" and 2.25" buttons, including mailing costs, I'll be able to purchase a color printer that will allow me to have full control over all the designs, and will be able to create more buttons!
  • Stretch Goal - $1200 - Team Buttons - Should we get to here, I'll be able to create buttons specialized for each Guardian team.
You can get - 
  • Undying Gratitude - I'll tweet you, friend you, and never stop singing your praises. Really!
  • Guaranteed Buttons - I try to leave Guardian buttons at all of the rest spots, and hand them out on request, but there's no way for me to be able to be certain that every Guardian gets a button. Getting them via a perk will keep you from having the play the "Will she have them on her?" game.
  • Specialized Buttons - The more money I raise, the more button designs I can produce, including a very special "Thank you!" button, available only to contributors.
  • Custom Button Packages - A limited number of people can pick up a package of buttons in a design of their choosing!
  • Sweet, Sweet Candy - Don't ask what salted caramels have to do with buttons, just grab yourself a pound of these amazing treats, then laugh at those who weren't able to get some themselves.  Maybe you can share? 

Why Should You Help?

Because buttons are awesome!  By contributing, you'll be helping me bring button goodness to the Guardians at RTX 2016, and at future cons as well.  This is my way of cheering on the Guardians, and it can be your way, too.

Risks & Challenges

Of course, $650 is a lot of money, and I might not raise it all.  If I don't manage to raise at least $600, which is the bare minimum I need to get the 2.25" press, after fees, I'll still honor all of the perks, replacing 2.25" buttons with the equivalent in 1.25" buttons.  I won't be able to purchase the new press, but there will be buttons at RTX either way!

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't contribute with cash, you can still help out by:

  • Getting the word out! Tweet, share, and talk about this with your friends!  There's plenty of tools here on Indiegogo to get you going.
  • Art me some stuff! As you can see, things are a little blah around here. Send me logos, banners, interpretive dance routines, what have you, and I'll find a place for it on the page!
  • Visit me and cheer me on!  I'll be doing some streams for this, and even dropping me a friendly line will help.




DISCLAIMER

I am not employed by or affiliated with Rooster Teeth in any way, shape, or form, outside of being accepted as a volunteer for RTX.  My buttons will not feature any intellectual property belonging to Rooster Teeth, up to and including logos and catch phrases for RTX, Rooster Teeth, Achievement Hunter, Funhaus, RvB, RWBY, or any other production of theirs. Basically, if it's already on their merchandise, it's not going to be on my buttons.

In the event of receiving a custom button perk, you agree that the design you choose will be your own property, and not include any copyrighted imagery or information that you do not have permission to use.  I reserve the right to refuse to press a design if I feel it does not meet this requirement.

I also reserve the right to refuse any design for any reason, up to and including featuring inflammatory imagery, discriminatory or hate speech, etc.  Every effort will be made to provide you with a design that you are happy with, so if an initial design is rejected for any reason, adjusted designs will be recommended until a compromise is found.

Refunds will be handled on a case-by-case basis, and I reserve the right to refuse a refund for any reason.

story:
We are Reall, a Registered Charity in England and Wales (No. 1017255) raising funds on behalf of our partner in the Philippines, LinkBuild.

What’s the campaign all about?

We want to raise $5000 to buy a simple Block Making Machine, so that 114 families living in appalling conditions in the slums of Panabo City, Philippines, will be able to build their own homes.  

The Block Making Machine will make it possible for the families to mould their own blocks, technically called Interlocking Compressed Earth Blocks (ICEB).

This amazingly simple machine will enable the families to build their own homes, it will also significantly reduce the building cost for these families, provide a source of valuable employment and reduce the carbon footprint of the project. 

Why is it so important to provide homes for these families?  

Since the devastation of Typhoon Pablo, these families have been forced to live in shacks built on stilts above water, where they are at a constant and serious risk of flooding, disease, eviction and fire. Together, we can change that.  

What has the community done so far?

Despite the severe challenges and extreme poverty the families face, they have decided to take matters into their own hands.

They have: 

  • United together to form savings groups to ensure they are able pay for their own homes
  • Negotiated with the City Council to acquire two hectares of land in a safe and accessible area
  • Negotiated with the City Council to have road access and piped water connections to the site

The only obstacle preventing them from starting construction of their homes is the lack of funds available to purchase a $5000 Block Making Machine.  

What’s going to happen once the homes are built?

Once the families have built their homes the Block Making Machine will be passed on to other families, and then more, and so on so forth. So your contribution will help not only these 114 families, but hundreds more, so that they can build their own homes, and change their lives for the better.  

Where will your money be going?

Your contributions will provide the funding for one Block Making Machine, the pulveriser set, the transport costs and instruction manuals on how the machine is set up and works. The money will be sent to our partner organisation in the Philippines, LinkBuild, who will buy and deliver the block machine so that building can begin.  

When will the community get the block machine?

Within a month of reaching our target, the families will have the Block Making Machine set up and ready to start building their new homes.  

What will we show to prove we have delivered on the project?

There will be updates about this campaign on our website showing the homes being built.  

There are other ways in which you can help

Please help us reach our goal by contributing and sharing our campaign:

·  On social media

·  By email

·  Word of mouth  

Everyone can help to make a huge difference.  



Want to see the Block Making Machine in action again?

story:
CUBIT - Smart DIY Tool with Real Guidance to Context and Scale

Design in real world scale & context, then use laser guidance to take you to the corresponding spot in the real world. 

 

 

DIY and home improvement projects are difficult! Cubit makes them easy with a single device that brings your design to life.

Cubit precisely measures dimensional data of rooms or objects using (2) laser sensors and (1) rolling sensor, then attaches that data to the corresponding image within the app.

 

Cubit is the only device that then guides you to exact point of references in your space based on your designs and measurements. 

 

TUTORIAL DEMO VIDEO | HANG AN EQUALLY SPACED PICTURE

 

No matter if you're hanging a few photos, rearranging a room, moving apartments, or undertaking a full home renovation, Cubit makes it easy for the amateur DIYer or the Interior Design professional to:

  • LAY OUT ROOMS - Create, re-design, or rearrange the layout of any room by measuring the dimensions of rugs, TVs, sofas, tables, shelves, or plants to organize a new space with items you already own.
  • DECORATE WALLS - Cubit allows you to hang multiple photos, paintings, and shelves in a virtual world, perfectly spacing your objects on the wall and with each other before you break out the hammer.
  • HANG PHOTOS OR MOUNT TVS  - Easily lay out a photo display wall with frames of any shape or size. Cubit can even take the precise hanging points on the back of the frame into account to pinpoint the exact spot on your wall to place nails.

  • CREATE FLOOR PLANS - Measure your furniture and visualize what your room will feel like with precise dimensional data, eliminating the guesswork.

  • AND MUCH, MUCH MORE  - Cubit is only limited by your imagination! What will you create?

 

USING CUBIT IS AS EASY AS:

 

1. MEASURE

 

2. DESIGN


 

3. GUIDE

 CLICK HERE TO GET YOURS 

 

 

THE WORLD'S SMARTEST DIY MEASURING & GUIDANCE TOOL

Feature loaded engineering helps you virtually create using mixed reality objects within accurate real-world scale.

 

 

Cubit At A Glance:

 

 

 

See What The Experts Are Saying

Check out a few recent awards and media reviews of the laser-guided measure of the future. 

 

 

 

"Seeing Cubit was one of those moments at the show [CES] where I felt my heart swell. This is an extraordinary piece of technology that solves real problems for real people."  -- CARLY KNOBLOCH, CNN, TODAY SHOW & HGTV

 

"Cubit’s features include real-time, accurate dimensional data from its smart wheel and laser distance measurer that's used app in project planning and layout app"  -- DIGITAL TRENDS

 

"Plott is translating the freedom of the IoT to devices that simplify complicated tasks...[Cubit] help[s] you measure, plan and execute your design perfectly." -- BLUETOOTH SIG

 

"This one impressed me... I've never seen anything like Plott--and that's a good thing!" -- USA TODAY

 

"Cubit offers visualization, context, and guidance of dimensional data, displayed in a format the user can understand with minimal measurements and no calculations " -- VENTURE BEAT

CLICK HERE FOR OUR PRESS KIT

 

 

STEP 1: Measure Any Space or Object with Cubit's Accurate Software 

With a total of (3) three precision measurement sensors, Cubit removes the complexity of calculating the dimensional data of regular and irregular objects.

 

Accurately calculating the dimensions of any object has never been easier, regardless of shape.

With Cubit, you can easily measure anything and save it directly to your smartphone, even attach a photo for later use in the Cubit design studio app. That includes floor plans, rooms, walls, couches, tables, picture frames, TVs, bath tubs, beds, dressers and more.

 

LASER MEASUREMENT SENSORS

Simultaneously measure long distances or "regular objects" of square or rectangular shape in 2 directions with dual laser distance measuring sensors: one for horizontal and one for vertical.  

Cubit's laser measure accurately calculates the dimensions of "regular shaped objects" such as rooms, walls, floor-plans with non-moveable objects (cabinets, baths, sinks, etc.) and more.

Each laser has the ability to measure a distance up to 100 feet and is rigorously tested and redesigned to ensure accuracy of within 1/8 inch for every 30 feet measured. 

 

 

 CLICK HERE TO GET YOURS 

 

 

SMART WHEEL MEASUREMENT SENSOR

For irregular shapes, Cubit features a rolling rubber dimensioning wheel. To increase accuracy, it is  stabilized with a rubber rolling ball on the underside for smooth gliding on any surface.

The dimensioning wheel reduces the number of calculations required to accurately measure "irregular shaped objects"  such as couches, sculptures, shelves, tables, pictures, or chairs.

Cubit's Smart Wheel Measure is accurate to .02% in lab tests to ensure every project is precise.

 

 

WIRELESS DATA & IMAGE TRANSMISSIONS

Ditch the pencil and paper, instantly capture and store data to your smatphone. 

Cubit wirelessly transmits all measurement data in real time to your smartphone via low-energy Bluetooth. Add a photograph of the object or background you just measured for in-app design.

As an added redundancy, the  built-in leveling sensor ensures all initial measurements are accurate in order to later recreate the project you will design.

 

SMART PICTURE HANGING DATA

To reduce calculations down the line, Cubit goes one step further when you are measuring picture frames. 

Upon attaching overall measurements to your image of the picture frame, Cubit prompts you to photograph and select the hanging points on the reverse side. This allows Cubit to calculate your object's exact hang point so you know exactly where to hammer a nail.

 

 

 CLICK HERE TO GET YOURS 

 

 

STEP 2: Cubit's App Empowers You To Visualize And Design With Ease

After measuring your space and your objects, Cubit's accompanying smartphone app allows you to design your space.

Lay out your vision in our smartphone app in real scale with real images so every project is perfect before you start hammering nails.

 

VIRTUAL DESIGN CENTER

Cubit brings your vision to life so you can finally get those photos hung on the wall, commit to the new chair that fits in your apartment's floor plan, or hang new shelving in your kitchen.

The design process is a visual one and our app functions as your design center. Integrate photos of your actual space to get the feel for how the final project will look using real world background dimensions. Add features based on their true size, whether that is hanging pictures, cabinets, windows, or painted features. Now you have an accurately scaled visual design that is fully interactive and easily manipulated.

 

MULTIPLE OBJECT SPACING

Upload multiple objects and let Cubit evenly center them for you throughout the entire wall, over a piece of furniture, or in relation to other wall objects.

Do your art pieces look best aligned horizontally? Stacked? Centered over the couch? Or with shelves? With Cubit you can adjust with a few simple clicks to find the optimal design.

 

Cubit's virtual designer allows you to test layouts in the app. Simply upload multiple objects, and the app gives you the power to play around with the design. Because accurate measurements are uploaded into the app, you have the ability to center objects horizontally, vertically, and in relation to other objects, like your mounted TV, windows, or your furniture.

 

OPEN DESIGN COMMUNITY

Share your designs with other users, and download other designs from a network of preloaded content.

Cubit is your partner in design! Once you create your layout you can share with other users, collaborate with your roommate, or convince your significant other that the couch you looked at together really is the perfect fit.

The app also features downloadable designs that inspire and revive your space. Simply download the layout in the app and customize with your own photos and wall hangings.

 

 

 CLICK HERE TO GET YOURS 

 

 

STEP 3: Cubit's Guidance System Transforms Your Ideas Into A Reality

Cubit is the first measurement product to not only bring your dimensional data into your smart device, but also bring it back into the real world with guidance.

Remove the complexity of home improvement projects by allowing Cubit to apply your virtual design to the real world, indicating exactly where objects should be placed and nails should be hung.

 

GUIDANCE MODE

Once you've finalized your design, Cubit navigates you to the exact points in real life.

Switch into 'Guide mode' to bring your design from virtual to reality. Start in the corner of your measured space (wall or floor) and Cubit will indicate with a central arrow the direction you need to move. As you follow the arrow, you will see real time read outs of your point on the background on Cubit's display.

Once you've hit your target Cubit will display a bullseye. This will indicate exactly where to place your object, whether that is a nail for your picture or the corner of your couch.

 

LCD SCREEN READOUTS

Cubit displays real time information that adjusts to your movements.

On the central LCD screen, Cubit displays all the necessary information you'll need to create a project, start to finish. Distance is shown in either imperial or metric units,  user's choice. The built in level ensures accuracy. You can also see directional guidance and battery life of your device.

 

PREPARED FOR ANY JOB

Cubit's durability, accuracy, and longevity make it the perfect multi purpose tool.

 

Housed in ABS plastic, Cubit is designed to be durable, because we know your tools can take a beating on the job. A single charge lasts up to 3,000 readings, so you can complete the entire job. The long lasting battery is charged through a micro USB on the underside of the device.

The combination of two pinpoint lasers and rubber wheel make this the most versatile, all-in-one measurement tool that let's you ditch multiple other bulky tools for a single smart device.

 

 

 CLICK HERE TO GET YOURS 

 

 

Cubit Rewards

Which reward is right for you? 

 

 

 

Cubit Tech Specifications

We give you the calculations and opportunity; you make it happen! 

 

 

Cubit Timeline

Our team has been working to constantly refine Cubit, both functionality and design.

 

 

 

Meet The Plott Team

We are a collective of creatives, engineers, inventors, military veterans, designers and weekend warrior DIYers on a mission to create a way where a DIY project can be less complex, and more fun! 

 

THE TEAM

The Plott team created Cubit as a way to spend our time designing how we want our space to look, or to download inspiration from online content, and then to take that design to life -- without having to be bogged down with a lot of the calculations and measurements.  A way to fully unleash our creativity.

Together, we have won 4 awards @ CES, including the coveted “Best of Innovation” award for Smart Home.  We have also been awarded Best of What’s New from Popular Science, nominated for Best Connected Consumer Electronic from Mobile World Congress, won multiple best of innovation awards from ProTools Annual Review, as well as winning award for Best new product hosted by Amazon at the National Hardware Show.

story:
Welcome to the Christmas in Trenchtown Project….

                -Thankyou for taking the time to read this-

In just a few short weeks I am heading to the other side of the world to complete a project I have been working on for the past 6 months. It is almost time to deliver a magical christmas to the children of the trenchtown reading centre.

                            ~ We NEED Your Contribution ~

 

 I will be volunteering in one of jamaicas poorest and Unstable Communities (Trenchtown) and spending my time with a well established community reading centre. I have raised money this year in a number of ways, Selling t-shirts, hosting a 'christmas in July' party, morning teas etc for the centre. I have spent all of my own savings and tax return on the airfares, accomodation and educational supplies. ( It is very costly travelling from Australia to Jamaica).

The Centre addresses specific and identified needs within the community..... growing programs as the years progress

  • Library: Book Exchange / Storytelling / Langauge Arts / Read Aloud / Study support …
  • Literacy / Guided Reading
  • Spoken word & Drama /Creative Arts /
  • Community Spelling Bees / Youth performances
  • Visting Authors, Artists, Performers
  • Summer School
  • Seminars; Jobs, Health, Education, Parenting...
     
    (taken from official website www.trenchtownreadingcentre.com)

Leaving behind my wonderful family and friends (including my children) I am going to bring the centre an amazing break up christmas party and many educational gifts and supplies needed. Whilst there I will teach arts, crafts, latin dance lessons, teaching on diversity, and cultural studies including Australiana. I am documenting my travels and experiences on my website naomi-isabel.com If you wish to follow me.

In these last few weeks I believe we can really pull together to make a bigger difference and bless them..

A Christmas party needs:

  • caterers, music, lights, decorations, presents, video,
  • The centre needs new supplies, toilet paper, scissors, pencils etc..
  • Up to date learning materials.
  • Costs of living and power bills..

 

Other Ways You Can Help - Share this LINK!

If you cannot contribute financially to this cause then please email the link to all your friends and family. You never know who may be willing and generous.

Please see www.trenchtownreadingcentre.com or www.naomi-isabel.com for further info.

ONE COCO: ONE BASKET Together we can do this!!

              THANKYOU FOR EVERYONES SUPPORT, I AM SO GRATEFUL :D

story:
The Robot We've Always Dreamed of is Almost Here.

Technology is all around us, but what happened to the robots we dreamed of as kids? The ones who could be our friends and members of our family.

The robots who were as smart as our smart phone, but could walk and talk and learn and engage with us, in a way no smart phone ever could.

We think Alpha 2 could finally be that robot, and with your support, we can make Alpha 2 a reality.


Share Dreams, Share the Alpha 2 Campaign.


In a world filled with technology, we have all been looking for something more.
The robots we’ve dreamed of since we were kids could be our friends and members of our family.

At UBTECH, it’s our mission to make these dreams come true. That’s why we build humanoid robots, like Alpha 2. We have a proven track record of bringing innovative technologies to market and we also expect more and more developers to join us for robotic technology innovation.

“The Alpha 2 isn’t just nimble, it’s quite smart as well.” Andrew Tarantola, Engadget

“Unlike some other companion robots set to hit the market, such as Jibo and Buddy, Alpha 2 actually has legs to move around.” Steve Crowe, Robotics Trends

“This friendly little robot will read stories to your kids, and teach you yoga.” Andy Boxall, Digital Trends

“Meet Alpha 2, the humanoid robot that can pretty much do anything around the house.”  Molly Brown, GeekWire

“Alpha 2 has a similar design to many other hobby-class humanoids, but two things stand out: its potential for social interaction, and its extremely low cost.”  Evan Ackerman, IEEE Spectrum



What Can Alpha 2 Do? 

Alpha 2 makes a great work-out partner with the widest range of motion of any consumer robot.


Alpha 2 is smarter than your smart phone.

His conversation skills make Alpha 2 a great companion or tutor and even an interpreter.

Alpha 2 is like an in-home nurse reminding you when medications need to be taken.

Alpha 2 is great to have around the office. Not only can Alpha 2 make calls and check voice mails, he can also read and send texts and emails, and control Wi-Fi office equipment to print and fax.

With a general knowledge database and web search function, Alpha 2 makes a great helper whether you're making home repairs or cooking dinner.

Alpha 2 is your own personal DJ, dancer and singer. 


Alpha 2 has face and voice recognition so he can personally engage with the whole family.

Alpha 2 is your personal photographer and videographer.

Alpha 2 can post to your social media, all you have to do is ask.

Alpha 2's VAPP can be updated just by asking. The expandable platform, accessed through the Alpha Store, means you'll always have new functions to add to Alpha 2.

Alpha 2 is an active storyteller.

Alpha 2 can control smart appliances like lights and locks.

Alpha 2 can also set Wi-Fi enabled alarms and act as a remote security monitor.

How Does Alpha 2 Work?

What are the Stretch Goals?

Who is the Alpha 2 Team?

Is there Additional Information?
You bet!

GOOD NEWS! We started the entire process months ago so we could meet the delivery within four months time. We expect all of our manufactured parts to arrive at our Los Angeles location, ready for assembly and packaging by February 2016. Your campaign contributions will help us pay for all of the materials necessary to produce enough units to meet heavy demand. It's also been our dream to make it onto the shelves of retail stores. If you can help us blow away our campaign goal, we might just get noticed by big box retailers!


FAQ


Network

Do I need a WiFi network?

Yes. You must have Alpha 2 connected to a WiFi network in order to work. 

Which wireless networks will support Alpha 2?

Alpha 2 can connect via both Bluetooth and WiFi. 


Battery

How do I charge Alpha 2?

Alpha 2 comes with an AC charging cord that works with 100-240V.

How long does the battery last?

Like any device, battery life expectancy will depend on usage, but Alpha 2 can operate for more than 1 hour with typical usage.


Servo

What’s digital Servo?

Digital Servo is an automatic control system that composed by control board, gear set and motor, and the control master release the pulsing order to control angle and speed.  It is the joint of humanoid robot.  It can improve the flexibility and enhance the walk efficient. 

What are the servos (8kg and 20kg)?

8kg /20kg stands for 8kg.cm/20kg.cm. The "kg.cm" means the torque unit of the servo. The 8kg.cm servo is for head and hand of the robot. The 20kg.cm servo is for low limbs of the robot. The bigger the numerial value, the more load ability it has.

What is the purpose for 8kg Servo and 20kg Servo? How to use it?

To meet developer's needs and know more about the structure of the product.
It allows users to replace the parts if its functionality is getting less. If you are developer, we highly suggest you to choose our "Developer Edition" perk. 


Apps

Where will I be able to download Alpha 2 apps?

Alpha 2 apps are called VAPPs, which stands for Voice App. You will be able to purchase these from the Alpha Store, as they become available. Alpha 2 will also come with a number of core skills free of charge.

When does the Alpha Store open?

The Alpha store will be opening around the date of the first Alpha 2 deliveries. We excited about its launch. Developers will be able to submit skills or applications for certification in advance. All skills or applications must be certified by UBTech Robotics.

Does Alpha 2’s app work with iOS and Android mobile devices?

Yes. Alpha 2 will have it’s own mobile app and can be downloaded for free on any smartphone that is compatible with iOS and Android.

What apps will be available for Alpha 2?

All the functions shown in the video will be coming soon and we encourage developers from around the world to join us in developing more apps so Alpha 2's skills can continue to grow.

Can I control Alpha 2 with several smartphones or computer?

Several phones, tablets or computers can control the same Alpha 2. Your Alpha 2 will notify you if someone else is already actively using it, but there is only one device can control Alpha 2 at the same time.

What is flawless function?

It is the ultimate selfie camera app that will automatically enhance your beauty in an instant! 

Backup

Can I backup my Alpha 2?

There is no need to “back-up” Alpha 2. Since Alpha 2 is an always-connected device it automatically backs-up to the cloud. If your Alpha 2 ever needs to be replaced, once you connect your new Alpha 2 to your account, it will automatically have all the “knowledge” and skills that your old Alpha 2 had.

Does Alpha 2 come with local storage?

Yes, Alpha 2 has 16GB local storage.


Privacy & Security

How is my privacy protected?

We truly believe that customer’s privacy is sacred. We work hard to protect your information from unauthorized access and have designed policies and controls to safeguard the collection, use, and disclosure of your information.

How secure is this?

Alpha 2 uses MySQL encryption to secure personal data sent to and from the cloud.

How does Alpha store information?

All the private data recorded by Alpha 2 is stored into the robot memory. Users can activate the backup on Alpha 2’s interface to make a secure copy of the data online, on a secure cloud.

We do not store any personal data. On demand, we store your backup data on a secure cloud that only you can access. With your permission, we only collect anonymous technical data in order to enhance the Alpha 2 user experience.


Developers

How do I get information and support as a developer? 

When you pre-order Alpha 2, you will be automatically become a member of  the UBTech Developer Community. There will also be enrollment information posted on our official website. Dedicated members of our team will provide additional support to those who enroll in the UBTech Developer Community.

Developers will be able to submit skills or applications to the Alpha Store for certification in advance. All skills or applications must be certified by UBTech Robotics.

Is the software open source? 

By designing Alpha 2 with an open API and SDK for Android and support for VAPP application development, we hope to encourage ongoing innovation by the developer community.

What programming language do I need to know? 

The Alpha 2 SDK requires knowledge of Android development.


Equipment

What are the differences between the red and blue edition?

There are no function differences between red and blue.Our existing mould produce red edition only, the extra cost of new mould for blue edition makes the price a little bit higher than the red. 

Does Alpha 2 walk?

Yes, Alpha 2 is a humanoid robot and can walk like a person.

How tall is Alpha 2? How heavy?

Alpha 2 will be about 17" tall, 9" wide and weighs about 5 lbs.

What colors are available for Alpha 2?

Currently Alpha 2 is red and blue, but there are plans to introduce other colors in the future.

Does Alpha 2 communicate with other robots?

Alpha 2 can communicate with other Alpha 2 humanoid robots and all the Alpha 2s will have their own social network in the future. We plan to create an ecosystem for Alpha 2. It will be a social network for your Alpha 2s allowing them to interact and share with each other.

Can someone else control my Alpha 2?

To remotely control your Alpha 2, you must log in with a unique and secure username and password. You can share your Alpha 2 to others and they can control your Alpha 2 by accepting your authorization.

Can I give Alpha 2 a different name?

For now, you will have to call him by his name, Alpha, to interact with him. Name customization will be available in the future.

What languages does Alpha 2 support? When will he speak other languages?

Alpha 2 will understand U.S. English and Mandarin when he comes to your home in 2016. Over time, Alpha 2 will be able to communicate in other languages, like Spanish. We will keep the official website posted as we add languages.

When will accessories be available for Alpha 2?

You can purchase a number of accessories on the Alpha Store when it launches. This includes functional accessories as well as fun cosmetic items that allow you to customize the appearance and mobility of your Alpha 2. We will keep you posted on the store’s opening.


Others

What is the retail price?

The market price may be around $1499.

When Alpha 2 will be available for the market?

Q2 2016.


Shipping

When will my Alpha 2 ship?

Alpha 2 will begin shipping in February 2016, on a first-ordered, first-received basis. Our team will keep you notified of your Alpha 2 ship date.

Where does Alpha 2 ship?

We currently ship to the US, Russia, Canada, EU (all 28 countries), Australia, New Zealand, Japan, Singapore, Taiwan, Hong Kong, South Korea, South Africa, Brazil, Colombia and so on. 


Warranty

What is the warranty? 

We provide a 90 day warranty against manufacturer's defects. The warranty is excludes servos, batteries and cables. Free repairs and component replacements will be provided under warranty period for manufacturer's defects. If not in accordance with the instructions of use, human factors, product surface damage, bumps or scratches will not covered under this warranty. 


Contact

If I have questions, how can I reach your team?

Please read through the FAQ first to find your answer. We are receiving a lot of special requests, and are responding as fast as possible!

For questions related to the Indiegogo campaign, you can contact support@indiegogo.com.

For all other questions regarding Alpha 2, contact us at campaign@ubtrobot.com.


Hiring

Is UBTech Robotics Corp. hiring?

We are always on the lookout for talented people to join our team.
If you think your background and goals are aligned with ours, please send your resume to hr@ubtrobot.com. We will contact you soon after screening.


Indiegogo Campaign

I preordered an Alpha 2, but I didn’t get a confirmation email.
How can I check the status?

Please refer to this article on How to Check if Your Contribution is Successful.
For questions related to the Indiegogo campaign, you can contact support@indiegogo.com. 
For all other questions regarding Alpha 2, contact us at crowdfunding@ubtrobot.com.

There was an error with my contribution. What happened?

Please refer to this article on common contribution errors and steps to resolve: Common Contribution Errors.
story_txt:
The Robot We've Always Dreamed of is Almost Here.

Technology is all around us, but what happened to the robots we dreamed of as kids? The ones who could be our friends and members of our family.
The robots who were as smart as our smart phone, but could walk and talk and learn and engage with us, in a way no smart phone ever could.
We think Alpha 2 could finally be that robot, and with your support, we can make Alpha 2 a reality.



Share Dreams, Share the Alpha 2 Campaign.


In a world filled with technology, we have all been looking for something more.
The robots we’ve dreamed of since we were kids could be our friends and members of our family.

At UBTECH, it’s our mission to make these dreams
come true. That’s why we build humanoid robots, like Alpha 2. We have a proven
track record of bringing innovative technologies to market and we also expect
more and more developers to join us for robotic technology innovation.


“The Alpha 2 isn’t just nimble, it’s quite smart as well.” Andrew Tarantola, Engadget
“Unlike some other companion robots set to hit the market, such as Jibo and Buddy, Alpha 2 actually has legs to move around.” Steve Crowe, Robotics Trends
“This friendly little robot will read stories to your kids, and teach you yoga.” Andy Boxall, Digital Trends
“Meet Alpha 2, the humanoid robot that can pretty much do anything around the house.”  Molly Brown, GeekWire
“Alpha 2 has a similar design to many other hobby-class humanoids, but two things stand out: its potential for social interaction, and its extremely low cost.”  Evan Ackerman, IEEE Spectrum




What Can Alpha 2 Do? 












Alpha 2 makes a great work-out partner with the widest range of motion of any consumer robot.

Alpha 2 is smarter than your smart phone.


His conversation skills make Alpha 2 a great companion or tutor and even an interpreter.
Alpha 2 is like an in-home nurse reminding you when medications need to be taken.
Alpha 2 is great to have around the office. Not only can Alpha 2 make calls and check voice mails, he can also read and send texts and emails, and control Wi-Fi office equipment to print and fax.




With a general knowledge database and web search function, Alpha 2 makes a great helper whether you're making home repairs or cooking dinner.

Alpha 2 is your own personal DJ, dancer and singer. 


Alpha 2 has face and voice recognition so he can personally engage with the whole family.

Alpha 2 is your personal photographer and videographer.


Alpha 2 can post to your social media, all you have to do is ask.



Alpha 2's VAPP can be updated just by asking. The expandable platform, accessed through the Alpha Store, means you'll always have new functions to add to Alpha 2.
Alpha 2 is an active storyteller.
Alpha 2 can control smart appliances like lights and locks.
Alpha 2 can also set Wi-Fi enabled alarms and act as a remote security monitor.


How Does Alpha 2 Work?



What are the Stretch Goals?












Who is the Alpha 2 Team?





















Is there Additional Information?
You bet!




GOOD NEWS! We started the entire process months ago so we could meet the delivery within four months time. We expect all of our manufactured parts to arrive at our Los Angeles location, ready for assembly and packaging by February 2016. Your campaign contributions will help us pay for all of the materials necessary to produce enough units to meet heavy demand. It's also been our dream to make it onto the shelves of retail stores. If you can help us blow away our campaign goal, we might just get noticed by big box retailers!

FAQ






Network

Do I need a WiFi network?
Yes.
You must have Alpha 2 connected to a WiFi network in order to work. 
Which wireless networks will
support Alpha 2?
Alpha 2 can connect via both Bluetooth and WiFi. 
Battery
How do I charge Alpha 2?
Alpha
2 comes with an AC charging cord that works with 100-240V.
How long does the battery last?
Like
any device, battery life expectancy will depend on usage, but Alpha 2 can
operate for more than 1 hour with typical usage.
ServoWhat’s digital Servo?Digital Servo is an automatic control system that composed by control board, gear set and motor, and the control master release the pulsing order to control angle and speed.  It is the joint of humanoid robot.  It can improve the flexibility and enhance the walk efficient. What are the servos (8kg and 20kg)?8kg /20kg stands for 8kg.cm/20kg.cm. The "kg.cm" means the torque unit of the servo. The 8kg.cm servo is for head and hand of the robot. The 20kg.cm servo is for low limbs of the robot. The bigger the numerial value, the more load ability it has.What is the purpose for 8kg Servo and 20kg Servo? How to use it?To meet developer's needs and know more about the structure of the product.It allows users to replace the parts if its functionality is getting less. If you are developer, we highly suggest you to choose our "Developer Edition" perk. Apps
Where will I be able to download Alpha 2 apps?
Alpha
2 apps are called VAPPs, which stands for Voice App. You will be able to
purchase these from the Alpha Store, as they become available. Alpha 2 will
also come with a number of core skills free of charge.
When does the Alpha Store open?
The Alpha store will be opening around the date of the first Alpha 2 deliveries. We excited about its launch. Developers will be able to submit skills or applications for certification in advance. All skills or applications must be certified by UBTech Robotics.
Does Alpha 2’s app work with iOS
and Android mobile devices?
Yes.
Alpha 2 will have it’s own mobile app and can be downloaded for free on any
smartphone that is compatible with iOS and Android.
What apps will be available for
Alpha 2?

All the functions shown in the video will be coming soon and we encourage developers from around the world to join us in developing more
apps so Alpha 2's skills can continue to grow.
Can I control Alpha 2 with several
smartphones or computer?
Several
phones, tablets or computers can control the same Alpha 2. Your Alpha 2 will notify you if someone else is already actively using it, but there is only one device can control Alpha 2 at the same time.What is flawless function?It is the ultimate selfie camera app that will automatically enhance your beauty in an instant! Backup

collect anonymous technical data in order to enhance the Alpha 2 user
experience.

our official website. Dedicated members of our team will
provide additional support to those who enroll in the UBTech Developer
Community.

certification in advance. All skills or applications must be certified by
UBTech Robotics.

story:
Kansoka Designs

Aesthetic ideals have an ethical connotation and pervades much of the Japanese culture. Kansoka Designs seeks to bring you high-quality and exquisitely designed craftwork with Japanese aesthetic styles, and awaken your soul. 

With a unique "imperfect" design, Kansoka Vase delivers Japanese aesthetics of Wabi-sabi -- the beauty of things "imperfect, impermanent, and incomplete". Every part illuminates brilliance with each handmade piece.

Wabi-sabi 

Wabi-sabi (わび さび) is an art of imperfection and transience in traditional Japanese aesthetics. It reveals the Zen philosophy of the facts of existence: both life and art are beautiful not because they are perfect and eternal, but because they are imperfect and fleeting. It has been embraced as a pleasure – in authentic expression, natural materials, rough edges, and imperfect glazes.

Made of American black walnut wood, Kansoka Vase has beautiful grains and woodiness that exhales a fresh, subtle woody fragrance. 

Kansoka achieves the wabi-sabi beauty by accident. One day, when I was polishing the end of the vase, I carelessly polished it with too much force and created a break at the top.

I was totally fascinated by the elegant, beautiful and simple design! Each Kansoka Vase is unique because of its Japanese wabi-sabi style.

Each Kansoka Vase is handcrafted and polished carefully in order to achieve a perfect finish.

Put a beautiful flower or a single piece of green plant into the vase, immerse yourself in Zen philosophy, and awake your soul.

Vase size: 3.4cm in diameter, 17cm in height. Glass tube:  1.5cm in diameter, 10cm in height. A perfect size as a beautiful decor for your desk or table! 

Pledge today to help us make the Kansoka Black Walnut Vase a reality!

story:
Short Summary

At the age of 28, my husband was diagnosed with a stage 3 colon cancer. The chemotherapy left him with horrid neuropathy. During the course of treatment we found he had a blood clotting disorder which caused blood clots in his lungs. His health has continued to fall and he now has fibromyalgia which leaves him frequently unable to walk. He has been falling as he tries to transition from his bed to his wheelchair because our bed is very low to the ground. His doctor  says he needs an andjustable bed with massager to help with the muscle pain and clots. VA covers a lot of things but they do not cover hospital beds unless you are terminal.

What We Need & What You Get

 

  • We are in the process trying to purchase a $6,000 bed from Sealy that is adjustable and has a massage feature to help his legs.
  • With 4 kids, one being Autistic, we simply don't have this kind of money and need some help.

The Impact

If we were able to get the funding for this bed, my husband would be able to get a good nights sleep again. He would also drastically cut his risk of falling as he tries to transition.

My husband is a great dad but so fequently is so worn out that a bed like this would give him the rest he needs and he'd hopefully have the energy he used to, in order to interact with the kids.

Other Ways You Can Help

We would greatly apreciate anyone spreading a link to our campaign. Not everyone can contribute and that's ok. We gladly welcome any prayers.

story:
What People Think

Everywhere around you, whether at home or work, all energy consuming products utilize electricity. If something goes wrong, many of us know too little about electricity to fix the problem. This is why Vion was born, bringing to you the first smart multimeter that makes it easy to diagnose and fix electrical problems.

Most multimeters require you to have the extensive electrical knowledge to understand the number displayed on the LCD in order to determine the fault. However, Vion is linked to the smartphone and automatically measures the product without having to select a measurement item and diagnoses the result as ‘Good/Bad’ through voice guidance.  

Vion measures voltage and resistance has a pair of probes without a body and allows you to see the breakdown of electricity-powered products on your smartphone.  

  • Unlike traditional multimeters, Vion consists of a pair of probes without a bulky body, which eliminates hassle. Vion is lightweight and compact.
  • While existing multimeters require exact proper placement of the rotary switch, Vion's automatic mode measures with the probes, whether you put it on a rotary switch, on an AC switch, or on a resistance switch. 
  • For existing multimeters, if the placement of the probes is off by even a little, the multimeter’s internal circuit board (PCB) may be damaged. Vion, however, is easily manageable, as there is no body or internal circuit board.
  • The measured values are automatically stored in the app, so you don’t need to manually write them down anywhere. 

Multilingual Support/Real-Time Storage  

Vion comes with various language guidance options to accommodate your needs.  

Your measured values and results can be immediately saved on the smartphone in real-time.

Vion makes it easy to repair household electronics and to check for malfunctions in electric materials like your drones, batteries, electric bikes, washing machines, TVs, and light bulbs.

When Vion is placed on the measurement target, the automatic detection function immediately recognizes DC/AC/Resistance, so you don’t have to worry about the risks of damage due to wrong selections.

Bluetooth and smartphone connectivity provides you with various measurement functions so you can analyze, diagnose, and fix problems conveniently.  

The Bluetooth connectivity allows for automatic/manual mode, various displays, detailed product failure analysis, voice guidance, storage, store connection, and other functions. After connecting for the first time, the connection is secured without having to connect every time.

General Mode

  • Vion is made for everyone. So, if you are unfamiliar with electrical/technical knowledge, you can opt to use the automatic mode. 

Expert Mode

  • Vion not only measures resistance and voltage but also capacitor/inductor/diode.
  • When you find that there is a stripped wire, the existing multimeter measures the measurement item with AC voltage. If AC voltage cannot be detected, measure it again as DC voltage. If DC voltage does not appear, select it as resistance. Vion can detect the state of the wire by measuring just once.

Vion automatically detects the measurement target product by displaying the status of the product versus the measurement. This clearly outlines the voltage reference for each measurement target.

Even when your smartphone is in your pocket, measurement results are delivered through voice guidance. This removes the risk of any sudden movement when attempting to measure objects and allows you to see the results simultaneously, making it possible to complete tasks that require more than one hand.

 A pair of probed Vion meters is small enough to fit snugly in your pocket and perfectly in your toolbox. In addition, the protection case enhances user convenience and can easily be stored with measurement aids.

Vion automatically saves measured values by date/time and facilitates management of a large number of measurement objects, relieving the trouble of re-measuring items.

The voice guidance feature is supported by multiple languages: English, Spanish, French, Japanese (Chinese and Korean are currently in progress)

Manuals on measured products are presented by images to diagnose the fault, and this provides general users with a comprehensive guide on the measured products.

The Vion app can connect directly to the store for purchases of measured products, reducing other unnecessary purchases and costs.

             

              

Multimeters are fundamental instruments in the field of electricity and engineering. Overtime, with the increase use of electronics and electrical products, the multimeter has become widely utilized. The multimeter often requires expertise or knowledge for usability, which can cause general users to use them incorrectly, break them, and repeat the unnecessary cycle of purchasing more multimeters. We want to eliminate these problems.

Our team wanted to create a multimeter that caters to the general public by including the innovative features of Vion such as automatic measurement, storage, and TTS in a convenient design.

These features and designs have received much traction from the world's largest tradeshow exhibitions, CES and MWC, and have received active inquiries from buyers from all over the world.

Our team hopes that the Vion meter will lead the evolution of analogue to digital into a third generation of smart multimeters.

Thank you for the support!

So, if you are unfamiliar with electrical/technical knowledge, you can opt to use the automatic mode. Expert ModeVion not only measures resistance and voltage but also capacitor/inductor/diode.When you find that there is a stripped wire, the existing multimeter measures the measurement item with AC voltage. If AC voltage cannot be detected, measure it again as DC voltage. If DC voltage does not appear, select it as resistance. Vion can detect the state of the wire by measuring just once.Vion automatically detects the measurement target product by displaying the status of the product versus the measurement. This clearly outlines the voltage reference for each measurement target.Even when your smartphone is in your pocket, measurement results are delivered through voice guidance. This removes the risk of any sudden movement when attempting to measure objects and allows you to see the results simultaneously, making it possible to complete tasks that require more than one hand. A pair of probed Vion meters is small enough to fit snugly in your pocket and perfectly in your toolbox. In addition, the protection case enhances user convenience and can easily be stored with measurement aids.Vion automatically saves measured values by date/time and facilitates management of a large number of measurement objects, relieving the trouble of re-measuring items.The voice guidance feature is supported by multiple languages: English, Spanish, French, Japanese (Chinese and Korean are currently in progress)Manuals on measured products are presented by images to diagnose the fault, and this provides general users with a comprehensive guide on the measured products.The Vion app can connect directly to the store for purchases of measured products, reducing other unnecessary purchases and costs.                               Multimeters are fundamental instruments in the field of electricity and engineering. Overtime, with the increase use of electronics and electrical products, the multimeter has become widely utilized. The multimeter often requires expertise or knowledge for usability, which can cause general users to use them incorrectly, break them, and repeat the unnecessary cycle of purchasing more multimeters. We want to eliminate these problems.Our team wanted to create a multimeter that caters to the general public by including the innovative features of Vion such as automatic measurement, storage, and TTS in a convenient design.These features and designs have received much traction from the world's largest tradeshow exhibitions, CES and MWC, and have received active inquiries from buyers from all over the world.Our team hopes that the Vion meter will lead the evolution of analogue to digital into a third generation of smart multimeters.Thank you for the support!

story:
We all love the feeling of creating a delicious home cooked meal, but always dread the time it takes, the mess it leaves behind, and the never ending search for the right kitchen tool. These issues can quickly make cooking feel frustrating, overwhelming, and a lot like a chore.

There are plenty of kitchen accessories, but they all solve only a singular issue. There is no all-encompassing solution to help you prepare, measure, and store your food for minimal clean up and efficiency as you cook.

 

 

 

 

 

Prepdeck contains over forty-five high quality accessories into one sleek and organized system that allows you to stay tidy and organized as you prepare your meals, leaving you with less to clean up and less to stress about.

A cluttered kitchen can be overwhelming. With Prepdeck, every tool you need is right in front of you.

Effortlessly follow your favorite recipe or cooking show with the sleek table stand that sits elegantly behind the Prepdeck.

Drop your worry and focus on what matters: Preparing a beautiful meal and having fun doing it!

 

 

With a sleek, minimalist design, and a variety of colorways, Prepdeck is meant to not only keep you organized and stress-free, but to enhance the beauty of any kitchen, big or small.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

The Prepdeck enclosure doubles as a sizable cutting board, allowing for faster, more organized prep-time. It’s magnetic and is removable for easy cleaning.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Prepdeck is not just for cooking in the moment. Prepdeck containers can also be stored in the fridge for those who love to prepare their meals ahead of time.

 

 

We created Prepdeck because we were tired of feeling overwhelmed in the kitchen. We knew there had to be a better way than messy drawers, dirty counters, and never ending prep time. We believe that there is so much joy to be had when cooking meals for yourself, with family, and with friends.

Cooking should not have to feel like a chore, and with Prepdeck, it doesn’t.

Regardless of your kitchen size, cooking expertise, or the time you have to cook, Prepdeck is for you, helping you stay organized, efficient, and happy in your kitchen.

 

 

You can add on additional board choices via the add on menu. You will make your final board choice(s) once the campaign has ended.

 

 

 

 

If you're interested in purchasing 10-100 Prepdecks for business or wholesale, please contact us at hello@prepdeck.com and we’ll be glad to assist you.

 

To purchase add-ons, simply back them separately from your Prepdeck.

 

 

 

 

 

 

Some of life’s most special moments start in the kitchen… creating delicious meals for loved ones, sticking to a diet that helps you accomplish your goals, or sharing time with family and friends around the dinner table. But busy schedules, and endless demands, can quickly turn cooking into a daunting task that feels like a chore.

After experiencing this frustration first hand, Alexander Eburne took pen to paper, leaning on his 10+ years of experience developing and bringing products to market, to create Prepdeck.

With a year and a half of hard work, countless iterations, feedback, testing, prototyping and refining, now behind us, Prepdeck is ready to become a reality, and your pledge is a big part of making that happen. With your help, we can move from prototypes to production, and we’ll be well on our way to helping bring back the joy of cooking, with Prepdeck.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Q: Do you ship internationally? What are the fees?

A: Yes, Prepdeck is available to ship anywhere in the world. When you back our campaign, simply select your country and the corresponding shipping price will be listed. We've done our very best to keep shipping prices down, but Prepdeck is not a small item, so this is a big factor. Note purchasing any multipack option does lower the per unit shipping price.

Q: Is Prepdeck dishwasher safe?

A:  Yes! We don't recommend putting the Prepdeck body in the dishwasher (although it can), rather we recommend rinsing with warm water and mild soap in the sink or wiped down in place on the counter.

Q: Can I use the containers in the freezer or the Microwave?

A: Yes. Our containers are made from premium Tritan plastic and are rated for use in both the freezer and microwave.

Q: Does Prepdeck fit in the fridge?

A: Well, it depends on the size of your fridge! It certainly could! We designed Prepdeck to be flexible, so all the container are removable and since they include lids, and stack nicely, it's easy to store prepped ingredients or leftovers in the fridge with or without the entire system.

Q: Can I choose which accessories are included in Prepdeck?

A: Each Prepdeck systems comes fully loaded with over 35 features and accessories, standard. If you wish to add accessories or containers, you can do so via the add on menu.

Q: Are the containers spill proof?

A: Yes, when the lid is securely in place.

Q: Where do I select my colors?

A: Prepdeck ships standard in Glacier White which includes the white Prepdeck, cool grey accessories and a White Marble cutting board/enclosure. There is also a range of board options available which can be ordered via the add-on menu. All color options can be selected after the campaign ends.

Q: How does the add-on menu work?

A: Each item listed in the add-on menu is available to you, and there is no limit to the number of times you select an item. Indiegogo considers each perk a separate transaction, so depending on how you plan to purchase, you may need to process multiple transactions. 

Q: What is the warranty?

A: For your peace of mind, Prepdeck purchases made during our campaign are guaranteed against manufacturing defects for a period of 1 year from the date of purchase. If a manufacturing defect is found, we will be happy to repair or replace the defective part

Damages caused as a result of the following conditions are not classed as manufacturing defects, and will not be covered by our guarantee:

  • Accidental damage
  • Acceptable (normal) wear and tear
  • Damage caused by abuse or negligence
  • Staining caused by strongly colored foods/spices
  • Melting caused by overheating
  • Scoring of boards

We do not guarantee products which:

  • Have not been used or maintained in accordance with the Care Instructions
  • Any product which has been modified or repaired by anyone other than Prepdeck
  • Were purchased as pre-owned, refurbished or sold as seen
  • Were purchased via an unauthorized reseller

A manufacturing defect is defined as any fault in the product’s materials or workmanship, which is present at the time of receipt.

story:
WayCap capsules are compatible with Nespresso®  machines and solve the waste production problem present with disposable pods, because they can be reused as many times as you like. 

Moreover you can save up to 85% on disposable espresso pods, as they work with any coffee blend on the market.


 

 


With WayCap capsules, you can finally kiss goodbye to the millions of disposable espresso capsules that accumulate in landfills, to huge amounts of packaging, and to the tons of carbon dioxide generated for the production and distribution of the pods worldwide.

WayCap is Ecological

 

Thanks to WayCap compatible and reusable capsuless, a family of four can save more than 1,000 Euro per year, without sacrificing the taste of a fabulous cup of home-brewed espresso

 

 

WayCap works with any blend on the market, but also gives the ability to create your own personal blend. Taking advantage of the possibility of purchasing coffee from all sorts of different places, from the coffee merchant next door to the supermarket and from the organic foods shop to your favorite local café, you can save up to 85% compared to the average cost of traditional disposable capsules.

Finally, you can be in command of your own choices once again.

 

WayCap is also highly practical. Thanks to the dispenser provided, you’ll be able to refill your pods in less than 30 seconds.

Its unique shape has been perfected to allow for easy and quick refilling of the pod with powdered coffee without making a mess and with the ability to use a uniform pressure, thanks to the handy coffee press.

Take a look to the video below to understand how:

 

The dispenser allows you to bring your favorite pod with you and enjoy the taste of your coffee wherever you are. Take a look how:
 
 

 

 

The unique shape of the exit system “by slot” together with the arrangement of holes through which the water flows, allows you to obtain a perfect espresso with the vast majority of the blends on the market.

Patent Application Pending
 
After countless tests performed over a period of almost two years, we determined the correct number, shape, and distribution of the exit slots and the entrance holes that allow the water to flow inside the pod in the same way as in a traditional espresso.
 

 

3D Printing Prototyped

 

 

 

 * The Nespresso® trademark is not the property of WayCap srls. There is no affiliation between Nespresso®, Nestle Nespresso S.A.®, Societe des Produits Nestle S.A.® and their affiliates and WayCap srls

 

We Are Shipping (Since June 2016)

 

Risks and challenges

In the last two years, we have been working around the clock refining our designs: numerous prototypes have been developed and countless hours have been spent making sure the capsule will be as good as we intend them to be. After extensive research, we have also established a good relationship with a/some manufacturer/s that has many years of experiences in the field of stainless steel and is able to work to our exact specifications.   But as with ANY new product, timeline is always the biggest risk. We will make every effort to deliver on time, and could even deliver the product before expected. However, there could be unforeseen circumstances that may present themselves during early production. We ask for your patience, and promise to deliver a quality product to each and every backer as soon as possible. 

In any case, we will keep you informed of any changes. 
Thank you for helping make this product a reality!

story:
Thank you for viewing my project!

I developed this neat tool after experiencing the difficulty involved with installing drywall on ceilings and walls. Installing drywall yourself can be an almost impossible task. You either have to hire a helper or hope that your neighbor is available and willing to assist. That is why most homeowners hire someone to do this type of work and contractors hire helpers to simply hold the Sheetrock in place.


Contractors and homeowners alike can save lots of money simply by eliminating the need to hire a helper. My tool makes it so easy for anyone to save time and money on their next repair project by allowing one person to install a full sheet of Sheetrock in 90 seconds.

The Problem

Multiple people needed to hold the Sheetrock in place.


The Solution

Only one person needed to install Sheetrock


A Little Blurb About The Tool

CheatSheet™ DIY Sheetrock holder tool is a revolutionary NEW DIY Sheetrock tool. One person can quickly and easily install a full sheet of Sheetrock on walls or ceilings within 90 seconds . 

FEATURES AND BENEFITS 

A Second Set of Hands


CheatSheet™ DIY Sheetrock holder is lightweight and installs in a few easy steps. Don’t struggle with the difficult task of installing Sheetrock yourself. CheatSheet™ DIY Sheetrock holder makes the job quick and easy!

Save Time and Money

CheatSheet™ DIY Sheetrock holder is a must have for the builder, contractor or DIYer. No need to hire additional help or rent expensive equipment. The tool literally pays for itself after the first use…guaranteed!

Complete DIY Sheetrock Solution


The days of fiddling with a wooden “T-Bar” are over! CheatSheet™ DIY Sheetrock holder does not require any special tools or expensive equipment to operate. You only need a drill! The complete package includes three DIY Sheetrock holder support tools and a handy tool belt carrying case.

Quick and Easy to Install


Imagine a DIY Sheetrock tool so complete, it doesn't need any special tools or devices to install. That’s the power of the NEW CheatSheet™ DIY Sheetrock holder. It quickly and easily installs in seconds.  

Reusable

Nothing is more valuable to know that your investment will serve you well for life. The CheatSheet™ DIY Sheetrock holder is designed to provide years of great service.  

Made of Aluminum

Unlike plastic holders that can break, CheatSheet™ DIY Sheetrock holder is made of high grade aluminum. This makes it an indispensable and virtually indestructible tool in your arsenal.  

One piece is even strong enough to support the weight of a snow blower!


Multiple Applications

The CheatSheet™ DIY Sheetrock holder also works on exterior plywood sheathing and concrete boards. This versatility will make your next DIY home repair or remodeling project a snap!  

Lightweight and Durable  

Each DIY Sheetrock holder tool weighs approximately 1/2 ounce, but is specially designed to support in excess of 300LBS combined.

Installation Applications

Horizontal Installation

Installing Sheetrock on ceilings can be challenging. However, the CheatSheet™ DIY Sheetrock holder allows one person to install a full sheet of Sheetrock on ceilings with ease. It supports one end of the Sheetrock, allowing you to secure the Sheetrock to the ceiling quickly and safely.  

Vertical Installation

CheatSheet™ DIY Sheetrock holder allows you to install a full sheet of Sheetrock on walls.  

Diagonal Installation

Installing Sheetrock in attics or on slanted ceilings can be difficult for one person. However, the CheatSheet™ DIY Sheetrock holder makes this job easy. The tool is great for applications where space is limited and a typical Sheetrock jack is not practical.


Use of Funds
  • Packaging Redesign
  • Product Variations
  • Applicable Certification needed for mass production
  • Product Marketing and Promotions
Thank You!
Sidney
