story:
Help build a better oven!

We're rebuilding the community oven at the Old Stone House!

The outdoor wood-fired oven and hearth at the Old Stone House was built ten years ago by a local Boy Scout troop. The community uses it regularly for historical cooking classes and Brick Oven Brooklyn's increasingly popular Build Your Own Pizza and Community Open Baking days. We fire up the oven, and anyone and everyone is invited to gather round the fire, cook your own food, and partake!

We would love to expand these programs at the Old Stone House. With a larger oven and fireplace we can host:

  • Baking classes and field trips for local schools and the community
  • More and larger Community Open Baking and Build Your Own Pizza days
  • Historical cooking classes, demonstrations, and re-enactments
  • Weddings, birthday parties, and other events

With your help, we can rebuild the oven and hearth on the same site as the current oven.

Properly built, insulated, and roofed, the rebuilt oven will serve Park Slope/Gowanus and the whole New York City community for generations to come!

How can I help?

Please donate to the campaign! You can donate any amount of money you choose, and optionally donate a perk. See below for a description of some of the perks.
Just as important, you can volunteer your time to help build the oven!

Volunteer Community Oven Construction with mason Pat Manley

Please volunteer to help build the core of the new Old Stone House community oven, fireplace, and hearth from start to finish. In the process you'll learn about masonry and brick oven construction from professional oven mason Pat Manley.

This is now a FREE volunteer opportunity thanks to successful fund-raising! 

No prior masonry experience needed.

We're building the core of the oven from Wednesday, April 27, through Monday, May 2.

To sign up, please visit the Brick Oven Brooklyn Meetup page and RSVP for one or more days. Space is limited because only 8 people can work on the oven efficiently at once. So if you RSVP "yes" and then can't make it, please change your RSVP to "no" so someone else can get a spot. 

Please volunteer for as many (or as few) days as you can make it, on any combination of days. The more you help, the more you'll learn!

Every day you'll get to: 

  1. Participate in building the core of the oven and hearth
  2. Learn about materials, masonry techniques, and oven engineering
  3. Ask lots of questions and take photos of the process
  4. Learn from Pat's over twenty years of oven-building experience
  5. Hang out with Pat over beer in the evenings

Different stages of the process will occur on different days, including: groundwork, the base slab, framing the door and arch, laying the door and arch, oven insulation, and facing. We'll also be laying the fireplace and hearth. You'll get to work on different parts of the process depending on which days you attend.

You should plan to wear closed-toe shoes -- wear boots if possible -- and bring work gloves and a bottle of water. We'll provide snacks! This is an all-day event, so you should plan to bring lunch, or you can get lunch from one of the great local shops and restaurants around the park.

About the Mason

Pat has over twenty years of experience building brick ovens for restaurants, bakeries, vineyards, and backyards all over the country, and has taught dozens of oven-building workshops to beginners and professionals. And every year Pat leads Masons on a Mission to build masonry stoves in Guatemala. 

Whether you want to build your own backyard oven, or work in a bakery, or just want to learn a new skill, this is a great learning opportunity!

If you have questions about the project, write to Jace at BrickOvenBrooklyn@gmail.com. 

See you soon!


What's already done?

Much of the planning and design is already accomplished!

  • Professional mason J. Patrick Manley from Maine will lead the construction team. Pat has over 20 years experience building wood-fired brick ovens.
  • We have a finished design and blueprints for a rebuilt oven and fireplace. The design has been reviewed for engineering and suitability for the space and use cases, and is historically period-appropriate.
  • Labor for key parts of construction will be volunteers from local Boy Scout Troop 310, led by Eagle Scout candidate Andrew Sapini.

When will it be built?

The construction schedule is set: Pat arrives on April 26, 2016, and core oven construction will be from April 27 through May 3, when Pat leaves.

Our volunteer team and local volunteers will finish the oven's outer brick facing over several weekends in May.

That's pretty soon, so we're on a tight schedule to finish raising funds!

Where will the money go?

The bulk of the funds we raise will pay for construction materials and Pat's time and housing during the week he's on-site leading the oven construction. Construction materials needed include:

  • Over 2500 bricks for the external facing
  • Special firebrick for inside the oven and fireplace
  • Modern insulation to improve the oven's efficiency and usefulness
  • Concrete, mortar, rebar, and other construction materials
  • Handmade door and damper for the oven
  • Cast-iron fireplace cranes (used for suspending pots over a cooking fire)
  • Metal roof to make the oven and fireplace weather resistant, preserving them for generations to come.

Some funds will, of course, also cover the materials costs for campaign perks like t-shirts and bread.


Let's beat the goal!

We'd love to raise more than our goal! Extra money will help us establish free oven-centric educational programs for area children, local schools, and the community, and bring in noted historians and local chefs for cooking classes and demonstrations. Some possible topics include:

  • Colonial-era cooking
  • How to bake your own bread
  • The daily life of a Dutch farmer in Brooklyn

Extra money will go towards the firewood fund, and will support general educational programs at the Old Stone House.


Rewards

If you donate to the campaign, we'll engrave your name on a brass dedication plaque that will be mounted on the oven itself. Everyone who visits the oven will know that you helped support it!

Depending on donation level, you will be a Friend, Keeper, Steward, Builder, or Patron of the Oven.

In addition to that, we and the community are offering lots of cool perks for different donation levels. Here are a few of the coolest:

Historical Cooking Class with Sarah Lohman

Join one of Sarah Lohman's upcoming sold-out hearth cooking classes! For a $100 donation you can get a reserved seat in one of two classes (April 20 or 23). (Sold out!)

For a $500 donation, you can schedule a private historical cooking class with Sarah for up to six people!

In this hands-on class, you’re going to learn how to cook over an open fire. But what you’ll really learn are the primal cooking skills that will make you a better cook in your daily life.

You'll cover the four basic cooking techniques: baking, roasting, frying and boiling. While preparing a meal on an outdoor hearth, you’ll learn how to tell temperature without a thermometer, how to tell the doneness of food by using all of your senses, and how to build a bad-ass fire.

Local Brooklyn resident and historical gastronomist Sarah Lohman recreates historic recipes as a way to make a personal connection with the past. She chronicles her explorations in culinary history on her blog, Four Pounds Flour, and her work has been featured in The New York Times and The Wall Street Journal. Her upcoming book, Eight Flavors, is due out with Simon & Schuster on December 6, 2016.

The Brick Oven Brooklyn Cookbook

This cookbook will be an eclectic collection of Brick Oven Brooklyn members' favorite, famous, and infamous recipes!

From Jace's pizza dough to Yasmin's cardamom cookies, from Beth's seafood paella to Derm's three-hour herb-rubbed beer-braised pulled-pork tacos, and much more, we'll tell you how to cook these favorites both at home and in a wood-fired oven or fire. (Hint: it's always better in the oven.) With tips on firing a brick oven and how to split wood without splitting your toe.

We're assembling the book now, so please do write to us and submit your own recipe! The first edition will be self-published and distributed to campaign backers in Fall 2016.

Other Ways You Can Help

Can't spare money for a donation? No problem: there are lots of ways to help us make this campaign and the oven rebuilding project a success! You can help us get the word out, donate materials and work equipment, or volunteer your time and labor.

  • Tell your friends about this campaign and share it on Facebook and Twitter!
  • Know a local blogger or someone in the NYC media you think might be interested? Tell them to contact us at BrickOvenBrooklyn@gmail.com.
  • Have a favorite recipe? Join Brick Oven Brooklyn and contribute to the cookbook!
  • If you know a local business that might be willing to donate construction materials, please let us know at BrickOvenBrooklyn@gmail.com!
  • We'll need lots of volunteers to finish the oven construction over several weekends in May. You can learn to lay bricks! Come for a day or just a couple of hours. For the schedule and to RSVP, go to Brick Oven Brooklyn on Meetup or Facebook!


Risks and Challenges

For an outdoor construction project there's always the risk of bad weather. To mitigate this risk, the Old Stone House has portable tents that we can set up over the construction site, enabling us to keep working.

The biggest risk is that we won't raise enough money to fund the cost of rebuilding the oven.  If that happens, we'll have to push off the oven construction until the fall or next year, or cancel the project entirely.

If we have to cancel the project, the money donated to this campaign will go to the Old Stone House and pay for firewood for the existing oven, a possible oven reinforcement and structural improvement project, and other educational programs at the Old Stone House.


About Brick Oven Brooklyn

In 2012, Jace and Yasmin Harker (the co-founders of Brick Oven Brooklyn) learned about the long history of communal brick ovens while on vacation in the Brittany region of France. In centuries past, it was too expensive for individuals to each have their own oven, so a village would have one large communal wood-fired oven. Several times a week, the oven would be fired and everyone from the community would gather at the oven to bake their bread.

We were inspired by the vision of bringing people together around a shared hearth, so when we returned to Brooklyn, we looked for a brick oven that hosted public events. The Old Stone House had a small but beautiful outdoor oven and invited us to use it, and that was the beginning of our monthly Open Community Baking Day!

In 2014 we started the Brick Oven Brooklyn meetup group to help coordinate and plan the oven days, and it's been taking off ever since! Now we're at nearly 400 members and growing. We recently launched Build Your Own Pizza days. If you love the idea of building community through cooking, come join us!

To learn more about the group visit us on the web:

On Meetup: http://www.meetup.com/brickovenbrooklyn

On Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/brickovenbrooklyn


About the Old Stone House

The Old Stone House is the conservancy organization for Washington Park and J.J. Byrne Playground in Park Slope, Brooklyn, including the Old Stone House itself: a reconstructed 1699 Dutch farmhouse that's a Historic House Trust of New York City Site. The OSH was central to the Battle of Brooklyn during the American Revolutionary War.

More than 3,000 people visit the park and the House each and every day. Our staff is small, but our reach is large as we oversee the playground, sports areas, gardens, dog run, farmers market, museum, and ever expanding education programs and cultural events both indoors and out.

For more information about the Old Stone House, visit our website at http://theoldstonehouse.org, or write to us at info@theoldstonehouse.org.

The OSH is a 501(c)(3) non-profit organization.


FAQ

Q: Where does my donation go?
A: All donations for this campaign will go directly to the Old Stone House non-profit, and will be designated for the new oven project.
Q: Is my donation to this campaign tax-deductible?
A: Yes! The Old Stone House is a 501(c)(3) non-profit organization, and contributions to this IndieGoGo campaign are all tax-deductible charitable donations. If you need paperwork for tax purposes, please write to info@theoldstonehouse.org.
Q: Can you tell me more about the oven redesign, the construction project, or something else?
A: Sure! Below are a few more detailed diagrams of the rebuilt oven. Write to us with any detailed questions at BrickOvenBrooklyn@gmail.com, and we'll reply with answers (and maybe add them to the FAQ).
story_txt:
Help build a better oven!We're rebuilding the community oven at the Old Stone House!The outdoor wood-fired oven and hearth at the Old Stone House was built ten years ago by a local Boy Scout troop. The community uses it regularly for historical cooking classes and Brick Oven Brooklyn's increasingly popular Build Your Own Pizza and Community Open Baking days. We fire up the oven, and anyone and everyone is invited to gather round the fire, cook your own food, and partake!We would love to expand these programs at the Old Stone House. With a larger oven and fireplace we can host:

Baking classes and field trips for local schools and the community


More and larger Community Open Baking and Build Your Own Pizza days


Historical cooking classes, demonstrations, and re-enactments


Weddings, birthday parties, and other events

With your help, we can rebuild the oven and hearth on the same site as the current oven.Properly built, insulated, and roofed, the rebuilt oven will serve Park Slope/Gowanus and the whole New York City community for generations to come!How can I help?Please donate to the campaign! You can donate any amount of money you choose, and optionally donate a perk. See below for a description of some of the perks.Just as important, you can volunteer your time to help build the oven!
Volunteer Community Oven Construction with mason Pat Manley


Please volunteer to help build the core of the new Old Stone House community oven, fireplace, and hearth from start to finish. In the process you'll learn about masonry and brick oven construction from professional oven mason Pat Manley.
This is now a FREE volunteer opportunity thanks to successful fund-raising! 
No prior masonry experience needed.
We're building the core of the oven from Wednesday, April 27, through Monday, May 2.
To sign up, please visit the Brick Oven Brooklyn Meetup page and RSVP for one or more days. Space is limited because only 8 people can work on the oven efficiently at once. So if you RSVP "yes" and then can't make it, please change your RSVP to "no" so someone else can get a spot. 
Please volunteer for as many (or as few) days as you can make it, on any combination of days. The more you help, the more you'll learn!
Every day you'll get to: 



Participate in building the core of the oven and hearth


Learn about materials, masonry techniques, and oven engineering


Ask lots of questions and take photos of the process


Learn from Pat's over twenty years of oven-building experience


Hang out with Pat over beer in the evenings


Different stages of the process will occur on different days, including: groundwork, the base slab, framing the door and arch, laying the door and arch, oven insulation, and facing. We'll also be laying the fireplace and hearth. You'll get to work on different parts of the process depending on which days you attend.
You should plan to wear closed-toe shoes -- wear boots if possible -- and bring work gloves and a bottle of water. We'll provide snacks! This is an all-day event, so you should plan to bring lunch, or you can get lunch from one of the great local shops and restaurants around the park.

story:
AceSpade: Solid Titanium Lifetime Poker Opener

Only 1.5mm thin, but solid Grade 5 Titanium is strong enough to open any bottle. 

"Wow, is this really made of Titanium?!"

"This is the coolest opener I have ever seen!"

Made of solid Ti6Al4V Grade 5 aerospace Titanium, AceSpade takes your bottle opening game to the next level!

The Ace of Spades is the highest and most valued card in the deck of playing cards. Made of the world's strongest element: Titanium, The Ace of Spaces symbolizes power, mental toughness, fearlessness and good fortune! 

Smooth edges. Brushed finish. AceSpade is ultralight and super solid!

Unique brushed Titanium finish. 

Use the beveled Ace of Spades cutout as the bottle opener!

Why do I need a Solid Titanium AceSpade Opener?

  • You actually care about the quality of the things you own
  • You or someone you love is a card player
  • You think Titanium is just generally awesome and you've been frustrated for years that nobody made a cool Titanium poker opener
  • You want to have the coolest tool in the place
  • You are a beer or whisky lover and want bring your bottle opening game to the next level, creating a cool experience

Why titanium?

  • The most biocompatible and safe metal for the human body 
  • The only element that your body fully accepts - even bone will grow around it
  • Named after Titans of Greek mythology because of its immense strength 
  • The highest strength-to-density ratio of any metallic element 
  • Shockingly rigid and lightweight, less than half the density of steel 
  • Excellent resistance to corrosion, nearly equivalent to platinum 
  • Non-magnetic - won't attract metallic filings from other tools

Titanium is an amazing element! Widely used in cars, planes, hiking gear, medical implants and spaceships, because it's light as plastic, with the strength of Titans!

Pop the top on the first try with the strongest metal piece!

A fun novelty piece is small but powerful and durable enough to tackle any bottle cap easily!

AceSpade lasts a lifetime! With endless bottles to be opened - from beers to sodas - we guarantee one AceSpade opener is all you're ever going to need.

I used our AceSpade opener as a party favor where I had "Poker Night" as a theme. Everyone was crazy about them. It's great for parties, weddings, BBQs, traveling and as a gift!

The perfect addition to your next poker night! 

Credit card sized (3.34*2.12*0.05in). Easily fits in your wallet or pocket! Take it to your next poker gathering, guys night, or literally anywhere. Your friends will be jealous every time you pull it out :)

If you want the best of the best or the coolest opener, pledge today to make the Solid Titanium Lifetime Poker Opener a reality!

story:
Hi) by Fenotek is a wireless high-performance video doorbell. Connected to the internet, it allows the entire family to care for their home anywhere and anytime with just a tablet or smartphone.


As soon as it detects activity, Hi) sends a push notification. The monitoring function enables you to remotely access the camera and trigger the alarm of the device if you notice an unsavory character or something disturbing happening at your doorstep.

Most of the time, a burglar will simply ring your doorbell to know if you're here. Make sure they know they’re on camera by speaking with them thanks to our crystal clear microphone. Since most thieves enter the home through the front door, just trigger the alarm and watch those thieves run fast!


It offers two-way voice communication, as well as one-way video to let you see who’s at the door while talking to them. When a visitor presses your doorbell, it rings the app on the smartphones of each member of the family. You get a preview of who’s there and you can answer directly or let another member of the family take the call if you are busy.


With Hi) there's always someone home!With Hi) you need never worry about missing an important delivery or visit anymore. You will always be available, via smartphone, to welcome and give instructions to the delivery man.




We worked for two solid months to minimize the delay between the moment someone rings your doorbell and the call is received on your smartphone. We feel your visitors should never wait too long in front of a closed door.


Hi) identifies and recognizes family members when they approach the front door of the family home. From there it can talk to your other internet-connected appliances: unlocking the door, turning on the lights, playing your “coming home” playlist from Spotify…  You only need your fingerprint (where available) on your Android or iOS phone.  Have peace of mind and know your family have made it home safe while you’re away.


If Hi) is connected to an electric lock not only can you see and speak to your visitor but you can also open the door from your smartphone.  Hi) can even turn on the lights or open the blinds remotely, it’s up to you to decide when configuring the system as the device has two programmable functions..






"Keeping a watchful eye on your house, Hi) let you see who is on your doorstep and communicate with your visitors remotely" Today show, Jan 10th

"French Tech company Fenotek, is launching Hi), a digital butler that puts a friendly face (or interface) on the category which could persuade consumers to buy in to the smart home with slightly more gusto". WGSN Insider, Dec 22th

"Hi) is a video doorbell by Fenotek that can also be used to turn lights on in your home and monitor its safety". Huffington Post, Feb 2nd




You spend a tremendous amount of money enhancing your home and its design. Why would you put the ugliest object in the world at your front door?


Hi) is a sleek, eye-appealing device that will nicely enhance the décor of your doorway. The fluid design is inspired from the Streamline trend which was in vogue in the 1930s and is making a popular comeback thanks to the aerodynamic pure-line concept. At the time, Streamlining was associated with prosperity and an exciting future. We feel this is true now as it was back then.

Every project comes with risk. However thanks to our experienced team, Fenotek has initiated a careful approach to mitigate all risks; technical, financial and logistical to make sure we've done everything possible to deliver Hi) to all of our backers on time and within budget.


From a technical standpoint, Hi) is based on existing proven technologies (wifi, video, 3G, etc.). Therefore the development is focused on their integration into one single device, an easy-to-use user interface and appropriate backendinfrastructure. No less than 8 prototypes were designed and manufactured in a step by step approach to demonstrate capabilities and secure performances in the pursuit of the best possible final design.


This result is an outstanding product with unmatched performances and features with no direct competitors as demonstrated during the latest CES in Las Vegas in January 2016.



Meanwhile, industrialization of production remains a key factor of success; therefore sourcing solutions for pre-series and serial production are already identified and currently being evaluated. Glitches in component sourcing may lead to a delay of no more than a few weeks. At this moment, we have already secured our components and selected a partner to manufacture the first series of 2000 units, including the ones that will be ordered on Indiegogo!


Hi) connects to your home Wi-Fi network or to 3G+ mobile broadband and sends real-time notifications to your smartphone or tablet when someone is at your door. Using our free Hi) App (which is available for Android and iOS) you can see an HD video stream of the visitors and speak to them using two-way audio communication. Hi) can alert you when motion is detected in front of your door so that you can activate the camera from your smartphone. Hi) offers the capability of opening the door via the smartphone or activates any AC 110v-230c devices such as a lamp or electrical blinds. Hi) does not need to be charged as it operates on a wide choice of power supply, a solar panel option is also available if no power is available at the point of installation.

·  What size is Hi) ?

Hi) size is: 20 x 6 x 5 cm - 7.8 x 2.4 x 2 in

·  What do I need to install Hi) ?

Hi) will require power supply wires from your existing doorbell or new power supply (6-30 VDC, or 8-30 VAC)

·  Can I install Hi) by myself ?

Hi) is Plug & Play and very easy to configure through a user friendly interface. You just need to be able to drill 4 fixation holes, connect the 2 wires of your existing or new power supply, as well as a basic knowledge on how to operate a smartphone.

·  What is the Internet connexion requirement to install Hi) ?

Reachable wifi connection (B/G/N) at the point of installation or 3G+ mobile broadband connexion from any operator.

·  What doorbell transformers are compatible with Hi)?

Hi) is compatible with a wide range of power supplies, from the  DC intercom power supply to the traditional AC power supply (6-30 VDC or 8-30 VAC)

·  Where can I find the Hi) app ?

You can download our app on the Android Play or App Store free of charge.

·  Can I still use Hi) if my internet connection is down?

Hi) comes with a standalone RF chime that will ring in your home (100m range) even if your network is down or your phone is discharged. The mobility functions will not work is your internet connexion is down.

·  What can I do if my wifi signal is not reaching the front door?

A wireless repeater can be used to boost your wifi signal strength. But Hi) can also be used with a GSM SIM card available from your operator.

·  How do I create a family group? How many family members can connect at the same time?

Hi) works with one administrator that have the right to send invitations to other members of the family (up to 3 others members + 1 administrator). When a visitor rings all the family is notified on their devices (smartphone or tablet) the first one picking up the call can see and talk to the visitor even if nobody is home. You can set the do not disturb mode if you are not available.

·  Can I record and store the videos?

Taking live calls from visitor or starting the camera remotely is free with Hi). The premium offer (5$/month or $50/year) adds the ability to record and store the videos for one week in the Cloud. You can then download the video on your smartphone to save them longer. Videos can come from visitors, motion detectors or manually recorded footages.

·  Do I have to charge the battery?

No, we believe that nobody wants to recharge a doorbell every 2 months. Hi) do not operate on battery it can use different types of electrical power supplies even solar panel. The buffer battery can keep Hi) alive for up to 2 days in case of power shortage.

·  What happen if Hi) is stolen?

Hi) offers some great anti-theft features. If someone tampers with Hi), a sound and visual alarm will be triggered will continue ringing for as long as the buffer battery is charged. The device will be reported stolen in our system and will not be usable.

·  Why is there a motion sensor?

Hi) will send an optional mobile notification as soon as it detects activity in front of the doorway. The monitoring function enables you to remotely access the camera and see what is happening. If you notice a non-desirable presence, you can trigger the alarm of the device or turns the lights on. The motion detection range is software configurable from 0m to 5m to avoid false notifications.

·  Can I install my Hi) outdoor?

Hi) has been designed for outdoor usage. It will work in below zero temperatures and is resistant to rain water, dust and sun (IP64 rating). Operating temperatures are -22°F to +120°F (-30°C to +50°C).

·  What phones or tablets are compatible with Hi)?

Apple iPad (Pro, Air, Mini, 3rd & 4th gen), iPhone (6s/Plus, 6/Plus, 5s, 5c, 5 & 4s) iPod touch. A compatible Android, system 4 or above with bluetooth Smart Energy (most of phones and tablets released in the last 3 years are fine but check your model before)

·  Does Hi) uses Bluetooth technology?

Yes Hi) uses the latest Bluetooth technology to recognize family members arriving or leaving home. It enables endless scenarios such as opening the garage door when the your car approaches the house, disabling the alarm when a family member is getting near the front door or set the alarm and turning off the heat when the last person leaves the house.

·  Do I need a static IP or specific open ports?

Hi) does require a specific port to be open (ports 80 and 443 and TCP and UDP), in most of cases these ports are already opened in your box.

·  What is the video quality ?

The video quality is 720p HD hardware encoded in H.264

·  Do I need to configure a static IP?

No, it's not mandatory

·  Is there a warranty for Hi) ?

We offer a standard 1 year warranty

·  Is Hi) FCC and CEE approved?

Yes, Hi) is FCC, ETSI and CEE approved.

·  Does Hi) provide a live video feed?

Yes, Hi) offers on-demand remote camera access to monitor activity in front of the door way.

·  What kind of devices can I connect to the two programmable outputs ?

You can connect 110v-220vAC appliance up to 20W each

Dear backer,

I am very excited to introduce you to Hi) your connected butler. We have been working hard to develop such a robust and innovative device that will make your life easier because Hi) is:

Welcoming: With Hi) you are always home to greet your guests or give instruction to the delivery man.

Considerate: If Hi) is connected to an electric lock not only can you see and speak to your visitor but you can also open the door for turn the lights on from your smartphone.

Friendly: The ability to recognize family members (iBeacon) enables endless scenarii such as open garage door when the homeowner car is approaching the house or turn off the alarm when a family member is entering the house or set the alarm and turn off the heat when the last member of the family is leaving the house. Hi) can even send a notification when the kids are back home from school.

Reassuring: Hi) will send you a mobile notification as soon as it detects activity in front of your doorway with the ability to monitor the doorway (by remotely activating the camera) thus preventing burglary even before the door is forced (70% of burglars break in through the front door). You can even trigger the alarm of the device from your smartphone in case someone tries to break in the house to make him run away.

The value of technology is the new usage it provides to users. The first generation of video doorbells brought a bit of mobility to the old doorbell. At Fenotek we have designed Hi) with the busy lifestyle of modern families that are very often away from home in mind.

Mobility (ability to respond to your visitor via smartphone) is obviously the basic function of Hi). But we’ve added numerous features that leverage the strategic position of the doorbell: outside near the front door (the main access of the house).

Hi) reads QR codes that can be used as secured virtual keys. Imagine the convenience for temporary locations such as AirBnB no more waiting for your guest anymore, just provide your guest with a unique QR code valid for the length of the location.

Finally Hi) has been designed to "talk" to the other connected objects of the smarthome. Interoperability is key to the success of IoT within the smarthome. As an example Hi) could talk to a smoke detector so that when the detector switch on, it sends instruction to Hi) to open the front door in order to facilitate the exit of the occupants or the access for the firemen.

With over 2 million burglaries per year in the US and knowing that in 70% of the cases the burglars break in through the front door, it becomes important to monitor the activity in front of the house. With Hi) you can monitor your entrance door way in order to prevent burglary before it even happens.

Thank you for backing our project and making it becomes reality. I look forward to your feedback. And please share this campaign with your family and friends.

Bruno DAVOINE

For more info you can check our website : www.fenotek.com both in French & English. You can contact us : info@fenotek.com or you can skype with us : Hibyfenotek !


Vous pouvez consulter la version française de notre site web: www.fenotek.com pour avoir l'ensemble des renseignements en français. Vous pouvez nous contacter sur: info@fenotek.com ou sur Skype: Hibyfenotek.
story_txt: Hi) by Fenotek is a wireless high-performance video doorbell. Connected to the internet, it allows the entire family to care for their home anywhere and anytime with just a tablet or smartphone.As soon as it detects activity, Hi) sends a push notification. The monitoring function enables you to remotely access the camera and trigger the alarm of the device if you notice an unsavory character or something disturbing happening at your doorstep.Most of the time, a burglar will simply ring your doorbell to know if you're here. Make sure they know they’re on camera by speaking with them thanks to our crystal clear microphone. Since most thieves enter the home through the front door, just trigger the alarm and watch those thieves run fast! It offers two-way voice communication, as well as one-way video to let you see who’s at the door while talking to them. When a visitor presses your doorbell, it rings the app on the smartphones of each member of the family. You get a preview of who’s there and you can answer directly or let another member of the family take the call if you are busy.With Hi) there's always someone home!With Hi) you need never worry about missing an important delivery or visit anymore. You will always be available, via smartphone, to welcome and give instructions to the delivery man.We worked for two solid months to minimize the delay between the moment someone rings your doorbell and the call is received on your smartphone. We feel your visitors should never wait too long in front of a closed door.Hi) identifies and recognizes family members when they approach the front door of the family home. From there it can talk to your other internet-connected appliances: unlocking the door, turning on the lights, playing your “coming home” playlist from Spotify…  You only need your fingerprint (where available) on your Android or iOS phone.  Have peace of mind and know your family have made it home safe while you’re away. If Hi) is connected to an electric lock not only can you see and speak to your visitor but you can also open the door from your smartphone.  Hi) can even turn on the lights or open the blinds remotely, it’s up to you to decide when configuring the system as the device has two programmable functions.."Keeping a watchful eye on your house, Hi) let you see who is on your doorstep and communicate with your visitors remotely" Today show, Jan 10th"French Tech company Fenotek, is launching Hi), a digital butler that puts a friendly face (or interface) on the category which could persuade consumers to buy in to the smart home with slightly more gusto". WGSN Insider, Dec 22th"Hi) is a video doorbell by Fenotek that can also be used to turn lights on in your home and monitor its safety". Huffington Post, Feb 2nd You spend a tremendous amount of money enhancing your home and its design. Why would you put the ugliest object in the world at your front door?Hi) is a sleek, eye-appealing device that will nicely enhance the décor of your doorway. The fluid design is inspired from the Streamline trend which was in vogue in the 1930s and is making a popular comeback thanks to the aerodynamic pure-line concept. At the time, Streamlining was associated with prosperity and an exciting future. We feel this is true now as it was back then.Every project comes with risk. However thanks to our experienced team, Fenotek has initiated a careful approach to mitigate all risks; technical, financial and logistical to make sure we've done everything possible to deliver Hi) to all of our backers on time and within budget. From a technical standpoint, Hi) is based on existing proven technologies (wifi, video, 3G, etc.). Therefore the development is focused on their integration into one single device, an easy-to-use user interface and appropriate backendinfrastructure. No less than 8 prototypes were designed and manufactured in a step by step approach to demonstrate capabilities and secure performances in the pursuit of the best possible final design.This result is an outstanding product with unmatched performances and features with no direct competitors as demonstrated during the latest CES in Las Vegas in January 2016.Meanwhile, industrialization of production remains a key factor of success; therefore sourcing solutions for pre-series and serial production are already identified and currently being evaluated. Glitches in component sourcing may lead to a delay of no more than a few weeks. At this moment, we have already secured our components and selected a partner to manufacture the first series of 2000 units, including the ones that will be ordered on Indiegogo!Hi) connects to your home Wi-Fi network or to 3G+ mobile broadband and sends real-time notifications to your smartphone or tablet when someone is at your door. Using our free Hi) App (which is available for Android and iOS) you can see an HD video stream of the visitors and speak to them using two-way audio communication. Hi) can alert you when motion is detected in front of your door so that you can activate the camera from your smartphone. Hi) offers the capability of opening the door via the smartphone or activates any AC 110v-230c devices such as a lamp or electrical blinds. story:
MowRo is an easy-to-use, fully autonomous lawn mower that is designed to save you time and always provide a beautifully manicured lawn.

With MowRo, never waste a Saturday again. MowRo is schedulable, silent, incredibly efficient, and takes you mere minutes to set up!

MowRo runs on schedule every other day or night — finely cutting your grass to help fertilize the lawn naturally.MowRo runs on schedule every other day or night.

 

A low profile, no-trip perimeter wire is placed according to the needs of your lawn. The wire acts as a wall so MowRo knows when to turn and maneuver around the lawn. The perimeter wire also acts as a guide taking MowRo back to the docking station for charging. 

MowRo operates using an algorithm that helps maintain a consistent lawn. MowRo continuously mows day or night ensuring your lawn is pristinely kept and mows up to 6,500 sq ft per mow cycle. Program your yard size into MowRo, and the algorithm does the rest.

The docking station acts as a home base that MowRo charges at. When it begins to rain, when MowRo finishes mowing or if MowRo becomes low on battery, it will automatically return to this docking station. 

When it comes to design, safety is the first priority. Live stress and worry free when it comes to the safety of you and your family while MowRo is running.

The blades are housed inside a protective Mowing Blade Guard, this allows grass to pass through while protecting pets and children.

The MowRo has multiple safety sensors that will cause it to reverse or stop the blades if it comes into contact with objects or is lifted off the ground.

Traditional mowers act as an alarm clock for the entire neighborhood, everyone within a two block radius knows you’re mowing your lawn.

 

MowRo’s electric motor is nearly silent, so silent you may not even notice it grooming away at your lawn on a sunny Saturday morning. 

 

Normal lawnmowers roar at around 90db — that's loud enough to rupture your ear drums!! MowRo is 30x quieter and is as quiet as an electric toothbrush or a calm suburb.

You can even run MowRo at night, be undisturbed and have the day to enjoy the lawn. MowRo’s simple user interface makes it easy for fas, no-fuss mow schedule programming. No complicated buttons and functions, the interface saves you even more time and reduces the mental workload. Just set it and forget it!

Using the docking station and perimeter wire, MowRo is entirely autonomous. With the auto-return function MowRo will return to the docking station if it is low on battery, if it begins raining, or when it is done with the scheduled mow.

 

MowRo is completely electric and uses a high-quality Samsung™ 28V 2Ah lithium-ion rechargeable battery. It's nearly silent and does not emit exhaust, fumes, or harmful greenhouse gases. Best of all, MowRo eliminates fuel costs and spills.

The quality of MowRo is second to none. MowRo gives your lawn a “golf fair-way” or “carpet-like” look.

The key to MowRo’s efficiency is that it maintains your grass by taking off a little bit every other day. This ultimately improves the health of your lawn. It achieves this by only cutting a fraction of an inch off your grass each time it cuts. Those little clippings then biodegrade into a natural fertilizer!​

Sharp blades are necessary for a nice-looking lawn. Mowing with dull blades causes ragged cuts that turns the tips of grass blades brown. Cutting grass with sharp blades promotes growth and a healthy good looking lawn. Your MowRo comes with extra blades that are easily replaced with a simple screwdriver.

The height of MowRo’s blades adjust from 0.8”-2.4” giving you the ability to personalize the look to your lawn. MowRo won’t miss a spot with its 7” cutting width which reaches every section of a 6,500+ sq ft lawn.

MowRo uses an adjustable perimeter wire to determine the boundaries of your lawn.

Set the time you want MowRo to start mowing. MowRo will then mow your lawn every 48 hours to maintain a beautiful lawn all the time!


Spend your time on better things than mowing your lawn. Never waste a Saturday pushing a lawn mower in the sweltering heat.

MowRo saves you time and energy by automatically and autonomously keeping your lawn beautiful and you worry-free. MowRo allows you to set a custom schedule, runs automatically and is immaculately precise when mowing your lawn. Spend your time enjoying your lawn, not maintaining it. 

At the end of the campaign, we'll send you a survey to get your shipping information. Our prototyping, validation, and manufacturing is already complete, so we're ready to deliver!

 

Here at Redback, we set out on a mission to create a fully automatic mower at a price point people could afford all while being simple to install and user friendly.  In a world that is continually evolving, we were left asking ourselves, “Why hasn’t the design of a lawn mower changed in almost a century?”. 

After many hours spent mowing on hot summer days, we decided that there had to be an easier way to accomplish our weekly lawn mowing task. This is when we discovered the world of automatic mowing. The issue we found was that the cost of these autonomous mowers is too high for most consumers. 

We sought out to develop the most affordable, functional autonomous mower in the market,  that would allow you to never mow your lawn again. We believe that MowRo has achieved that and with it, you may never need to mow your lawn again. 

Welcome to the future of autonomous lawn care.

A global team of Certified Kickstarter & Indiegogo Experts. LaunchBoom is the top crowdfunding marketing agency with the proven formula for crowdfunding success.

story:
BUY 3-DAPTER HERE!

www.3-dapter.ch

 

Let’s be honest. Switzerland is a beautiful country and people fall in love with it on first sight, but the sockets are another story. They really spoil the otherwise wonderful experience that people talk about, secretly hiding their frustrations about using ‘that triple socket’. The sockets look great, but the usual, bulky adapter plugs aren’t really meant for them, as they take up too much space and block other sockets from being used.  

Things are about to change now. 

Based on user feedback and their experiences, Elcada has developed the perfect adapter plug for Switzerland which allows multiple use of the typical Swiss triple socket.

Der 3-Dapter ist das einzige Gerät, das dir dabei helfen wird, Kabelsalat und verhedderte Steckerleisten endgültig loszuwerden.

Seien wir ehrlich. Die Schweiz ist ein wunderschönes Land, in das sich Menschen auf den ersten Blick verlieben, aber die Steckdosen sind eine andere Geschichte. Sie können einem wirklich die ansonsten wunderbare Erfahrung trüben. Viele Menschen verdrängen ihren Frust über „diese Dreifachsteckdose“ einfach. Die Steckdosen sehen super aus, aber die gängigen sperrigen Adapterstecker sind nicht wirklich für diese Steckdosen geeignet, da sie zu viel Platz einnehmen und die anderen Steckdosen blockieren.

Aber das wird sich jetzt ändern. Auf der Grundlage von Benutzer-Feedback und eigener Erfahrungen hat Elcada den perfekten Adapterstecker für die Schweiz entwickelt, mit dem eine Mehrfachnutzung der typischen Schweizer Dreifachsteckdose möglich ist.

 

 

The 3-Dapter for Swiss triple sockets has used new and upgraded techniques and safer, durable materials. The design too is innovative and saves space. Immigrants who have brought their appliances and gadgets, such as microwaves, stereos, vacuum cleaners and electric devices, can run three of them at any time with this pioneering 3-Dapter.

Der 3-Dapter für Schweizer Dreifachsteckdosen setzt neue und verbesserte Techniken und sicherere, langlebige Materialien ein. Zudem ist das Design innovativ und platzsparend. Einwanderer, die ihre Geräte und Apparate mitgebracht haben, wie z.B. Mikrowellen, Stereoanlagen, Staubsauger und andere elektrische Geräte, können mit diesem zukunftsweisenden 3-Dapter jederzeit alle drei Steckdosen gleichzeitig verwenden.

 

As Seen On:

 

 

Kennst du dieses Problem? Wir haben die Lösung!

 

Dein Haus effizienter aufräumen! Benutze deinen Staubsauger und höre gleichzeitig Musik, ohne andauernd sperrige Stecker ein- und ausstecken zu müssen!

 

Kein Warten mehr, kein Ärger mehr! Benutze die Mikrowelle und deinen Mixer und lade deine Geräte, ganz ohne Zeitverlust!

 

 

 

Platzsparendes Design – ideal für die Schweizer Dreifachsteckdose​

 

Haben Sie US-amerikanische Stecker? Der 3-Dapter funktioniert auch mit diesen Steckern!​

 

Klein und handlich, perfekt für unterwegs​

 

Sicher durch austauschbare Sicherung​

 

 

Ästhetisch ansprechend

 

Imagine our 3-plug adapter as the Swiss army knife of adapters. It’s simple, smart and makes your life easier. That’s why we need your help to produce and launch this stunning gadget! Elcada is a totally independent project and we’ve decided to launch a crowdfunding campaign that will give us the chance to:

Stell dir unseren 3er-Steckdosen-Adapter als das Schweizer Taschenmesser unter den Adaptern vor. Er ist einfach, smart und kann dir das Leben erheblich erleichtern. Deshalb brauchen wir deine Hilfe, um dieses tolle Gerät produzieren und auf den Markt bringen zu können! Elcada ist ein vollkommen unabhängiges Projekt und wir haben beschlossen, eine Crowdfunding-Kampagne zu starten, die uns die Möglichkeit gibt:

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Dimensions:  3" (78.4 mm) x 2.36 (60 mm) x 1.82" (46.3 mm)

Weight:  2.1 oz (60 g)

Use restriction: max 1h/6h @10A/2300W 250 V~ (like the common travel adapter plugs for Switzerland)

 

 

April Update: We have already started shipping the rewards. All new backers after this update will receive their package within 2 weeks. 

 

February Update: Currently we are manufacturing 3-Dapter. Below you can see an image from finished 3-Dapters in the manufacturing facility:

 

We are a small team with professionals from all over ther world, who are experienced in various fields. Although we have different backgrounds in engineering, design, finance, and marketing, we all share one common goal: to make life in Switzerland easier.

Wir sind ein kleines Team, das aus Fachleuten aus aller Welt besteht, die Erfahrungen aus verschiedenen Bereichen mitbringen. Obwohl wir unterschiedliche Hintergründe in den Bereichen Maschinenbau, Design, Finanzen und Marketing haben, haben wir alle ein gemeinsames Ziel: Das Leben in der Schweiz etwas einfacher machen. 

These are the main contributors:​

Dies sind die wichtigsten Beteiligten:​

 

 

Our first and most important goal is to make your life easier. We are a small group of product designers who identified a common problem and have taken it upon ourselves to offer an easy solution. Given the chance, we aim at offering our 3-plug adapter to everyone living in or travelling to Switzerland at the most competitive price.

This isn’t about making millions, this is about making millions of people smile!  

By supporting this project, you’re not only helping people traveling or living in Switzerland make their lives easier, but you can also have the chance to be one of the first people to own this revolutionary 3-plug adapter! So, if you’re planning on visiting Switzerland’s amazing countryside or energizing cities, if you’re planning on immigrating to Switzerland in pursue of a better life, if you’re planning on using multiple devices (of course you are!) then supporting our project is a clear and simple choice for you!

You could also help us spread the word and let other people know about our efforts to make life in Switzerland easier!

Unser oberstes und wichtigstes Ziel ist es, dir dein Leben zu erleichtern. Wir sind eine kleine Gruppe von Produktdesignern, die ein weit verbreitetes Problem erkannt haben, und wir haben es uns zur Aufgabe gemacht, eine einfache Lösung für dieses Problem anzubieten. Wenn wir die Chance dazu bekommen, wollen wir unseren 3er-Steckdosen-Adapter allen anbieten, die in der Schweiz leben oder eine Reise in die Schweiz machen, und zwar zum bestmöglichen Preis.

Es geht nicht darum, Millionen zu verdienen, es geht darum, Millionen von Menschen zum Lächeln zu bringen!

Indem du dieses Projekt unterstützt, hilfst du nicht nur Menschen, die in die Schweiz reisen oder dort leben, ihr Leben zu vereinfachen, du hast auch die Chance, eine der ersten Personen zu sein, die diesen revolutionären 3er-Steckdosen-Adapter besitzen! Wenn du also vorhast, die beeindruckenden Naturlandschaften der Schweiz oder ihre dynamischen Städte zu besuchen, wenn du vorhast, auf der Suche nach einem besseren Leben in die Schweiz einzuwandern, wenn du vorhast, mehrere Geräte zu benutzen (natürlich tust du das!), dann ist die Unterstützung unseres Projekts eine klare und einfache Entscheidung für dich! Du kannst uns auch dabei helfen, unsere Botschaft zu verbreiten, und andere Menschen darüber informieren, dass wir uns bemühen, das Leben in der Schweiz etwas einfacher zu machen!

 

 

 

 

 

BUY 3-DAPTER HERE!

www.3-dapter.ch

story:
Time was running out for 100 World War II vets in San Diego, and then Breitling fans did something amazing… now it’s our turn. Honor Flight is a national non-profit that flies World War II veterans free of charge to see their Memorial in Washington, DC as a thank you for their service to our country. 1,000 WWII vets pass away each day and there is no time to wait to get involved in sending them on one last mission. With your help, this holiday season we can get 50 World War II vets off the waiting list and out to Washington DC.



WWII vets being welcomed home by their families after their Honor Flight.



WWII vets being saluted by service members at the beginning of their Honor Flight.



WWII vets celebrating at their memorial!


We started this campaign because we were so inspired after seeing what Breitling did for these WWII vets in the video that we decided it’s time for us to step up too. Thousands of WWII veterans are stuck on waiting lists, hoping they’ll have an opportunity to go on an Honor Flight before it’s too late. Together, we can raise enough funds to fly 50 WWII veterans from Dallas to DC to see their Memorial in 2014. From as little as buying a lunch ($10) to purchasing a WWII vet’s airfare ($500), donating whatever you can will go towards honoring these heroes and making their Honor Flight possible. 



Where does my money go?
There are 170 WWII veterans stuck on a waiting list in Dallas, TX. Many of these heroes have already waited years. While this amazing program is provided at no cost to the veteran, Honor Flight Dallas needs to raise $1,000 per veteran to make their Honor Flight trip possible.

Why a hat and t-shirt?
The hat and t-shirt are very important parts of the Honor Flight experience. Together, this “uniform” builds a sense of comradery among the veterans and allows them to be easily recognized and thanked by everyone they meet on their trip. The shirt and jacket is such a sentimental piece of their journey, that many WWII veterans request to be buried in their Honor Flight shirt.

Is my contribution tax deductible?
Yes! Honor Flight DFW is a 501(c)(3) non-profit organization that is verified by Indiegogo.

Will I receive any perks?
Each perk level is designed to fund a specific component of the WWII vet’s Honor Flight trip. All contributions will go directly to flying more veterans. Campaign contributors will receive updates about the veterans’ trip.

If you reach your goal, when will the vets fly?
The WWII vets will be able to take their Honor Flight trip in the Spring of 2014. If we reach our goal, we will send all campaign contributors information about the date of the flight and photos from their trip.

What is the plan if you raise more funds than the target goal of $50,000?
There are 170 WWII vets on Honor Flight DFW’s waiting list. $50,000 will cover the cost of flying 50 veterans on an overnight trip to see their Memorial in Washington, DC. Any additional money raised between $50,000 and $170,000 will go to support funding more vets on their waiting list.

What is the average cost the fly a WWII vet on an Honor Flight?
$1,000 sponsors the entire cost for one WWII veteran to go on a two-day Dallas Honor Flight Trip to see their Memorial in DC, paying for their airplane ticket, all meals, "WWII vet" cap, "Honor Flight" t-shirts and jacket, and the individual cost for their lodging and ground transportation.

Where can I buy the Breitling limited edition Honor Flight timepiece featured in the video?

A limited supply of Honor Flight timepieces are still available. All proceeds go to flying more vets. To purchase this special timepiece, please call 877-273-4854.

story:
Towels have two basic jobs: dry my naked body, and dry itself.

So why is it that most towels represent a compromise between softness, absorbency, and quickness to dry?

Not only did my towel have to be luscious and thirsty, it needed to feel fresh and dry before showertime every day. And, of course, continue to deliver over time.

Meet the Onsen Towel. 

Dry Towel = Clean Towel

The longer a towel stays wet the more vulnerable it becomes to that musty smell (which means bacteria).

The Onsen Towel is designed to maximize surface area exposure so that it dries faster to avoid the growth of bacteria.

 

Life Simplified

Early in my research I tested a diverse horde of towels. From the seemingly straightforward to the luxuriously pricey, all ended up disappointing.

Buying towels (online and in-store) is a frustrating experience with the overwhelming number of options and their lacking descriptions.

Sure having some options is great, but this was just ridiculous. So I decided to cut through the confusion to offer a single, simple choice.

The Weave

The waffle weave is what makes the Onsen Towel uniquely qualified to do its job well. Effortlessly absorbent and quick to dry, this is how a towel should be put together.

It's surprisingly lightweight without compromising that soft, luxurious feel. Don’t let all that lusciousness fool you, it’s just curvy in all the right places.

 

Ideal Balance

The Onsen Towel weaves the perfect balance of softness, absorbency, and quickness to dry — three of the most lust-after towel attributes.

Features

  • Lusciously Soft: Premium cotton is woven to feel like something you'd experience at a swanky hotel. 
  • Exfoliating Texture: It's plush with a satisfying texture, the best of both worlds in a single weave.
  • Airy Curves: Maximized surface area exposure so it can dry itself faster.
  • 100% Premium Cotton: High quality long staple cotton is not only softer, but also stronger.
  • Softens with Washing: Unlike most, our towel actually gets softer over time.
  • Certified by Oeko-Tex®: Because you deserve peace of mind.
  • Generously Sized: 40 x 70 (bath sheet), 31 x 57 inches (bath towel), 14 x 33 inches (hand towel), and 14 x 14 inches (face towel).
  • Colors (2): Cinder Grey and White

 

Why Onsen?

As creatures of habit our days are defined by the basics in life. So isn't it worth paying attention to the tools we rely on for our daily routines?

I started Onsen because better basics make for better living.

I obsess over quality materials and purposeful design so that you end up with something exceptionally useful. It's my mission to help you achieve your best life possible.

 

The Approach - You, Me, and Japan

Growing up I was greatly influenced by the Japanese culture (it's in my blood!). It wasn't until later while working in Tokyo when I noticed how much value was placed on product quality. Instinctively quick to criticize, both users and makers expect products to be crafted with care and get the job done.

This taught me two things about quality: Learn what people love/hate about a product, and then craft the solution with purpose.

With valuable feedback from friends and family in hand, I turned to the specialists in Japan for inspiration.

By the way, I'm Shane. My love for well-made products grew exponentially while working with Japanese distributors importing international brands. They were very picky about the brands they'd work with, but even more so with each product offered by the brand. Without compromise, it was all about getting the basics right. 

My eyes were opened to a whole new way of looking at products, and I've been obsessed ever since.

 

 

Rewards

The more towels you buy, the more you save. 

 

A Better Process

The mill we work with is known for their time-tested processes to deliver higher quality products. Although it takes a little longer and has a higher cost we think it's worth the wait and investment.

Dyeing the cotton fibers in multiple colors before spinning them into yarn is a custom process that takes over a month itself. This is something that isn't readily available, but doing this makes for a truly unique look and ensures the color is more permanent. The yarn is spun at a lower speed to ease the stress on the cotton, this adds to the softness and strength of the final product.

Woven with great attention to detail, the Onsen Towel makes showertime better every day.

 

Made Responsibly

The Onsen Towel is certified by Oeko-Tex®, an international association focused on textile safety and sustainable production. Oeko-Tex® tests for known harmful substances and chemicals as well as for acidity and color fastness. All components of the product must comply with stringent Oeko-Tex® standards to achieve certification.

 

Timing and Process 

I’m working with experienced supply chain professionals to ensure that we all get high quality product in a timely manner. We've built in buffers to account for any surprises, but rest assured that you’re in great hands.

May  1st Production begins

June  Materials arrive – yarn is dyed to our specs and ready for weaving

July  Production completed – product ships to US 

July/August  Quality Check and Packaging

August  IndieGoGo rewards ship!

It wasn't until later while working in Tokyo when I noticed how much value was placed on product quality. Instinctively quick to criticize, both users and makers expect products to be crafted with care and get the job done.This taught me two things about quality: Learn what people love/hate about a product, and then craft the solution with purpose.With valuable feedback from friends and family in hand, I turned to the specialists in Japan for inspiration. By the way, I'm Shane. My love for well-made products grew exponentially while working with Japanese distributors importing international brands. They were very picky about the brands they'd work with, but even more so with each product offered by the brand. Without compromise, it was all about getting the basics right. My eyes were opened to a whole new way of looking at products, and I've been obsessed ever since.  RewardsThe more towels you buy, the more you save.  

 
A Better Process
The mill we work with is known for their time-tested processes to deliver higher quality products. Although it takes a little longer and has a higher cost we think it's worth the wait and investment.
Dyeing the cotton fibers in multiple colors before spinning them into yarn is a custom process that takes over a month itself. This is something that isn't readily available, but doing this makes for a truly unique look and ensures the color is more permanent. The yarn is spun at a lower speed to ease the stress on the cotton, this adds to the softness and strength of the final product.
Woven with great attention to detail, the Onsen Towel makes showertime better every day.

 
Made Responsibly
The Onsen Towel is certified by Oeko-Tex®, an international association focused on textile safety and sustainable production. Oeko-Tex® tests for known harmful substances and chemicals as well as for acidity and color fastness. All components of the product must comply with stringent Oeko-Tex® standards to achieve certification.

 
Timing and Process 
I’m working with experienced supply chain professionals to ensure that we all get high quality product in a timely manner. We've built in buffers to account for any surprises, but rest assured that you’re in great hands.
May  1st Production begins
June  Materials arrive – yarn is dyed to our specs and ready for weaving
July  Production completed – product ships to US 
July/August  Quality Check and Packaging
August  IndieGoGo rewards ship!

story:
Exceptional Capability | Professional Craftsmanship | Outstanding performance.

 

No kitchen is complete without a reliable knife and with that in mind, our philosophy aims to excel in every area surrounding the production and capability of the humble kitchen knife. Our objective is to supply beautiful, high-quality products using the best materials available to produce something truly exceptional.

A combination of extended research, product design and attention to detail is what sets our kitchenware apart.

No gimmicks, just fine craftsmanship and a drive to produce exceptional culinary knives.

 

Featuring 2 Collections

The Ebony Standard Collection
&
The Madagascar Dalbergia Shaped Collection

 

 

_______________________________

 

_______________________________

 

Completely forged blade. 

 Premium VG-10 (V-Kin-10) steel. 

 Damascus steel cladding.

 

- A completely forged blade made from premium VG-10 steel at 60+-1 HRC encased within spectacular Damascus steel cladding to provide exceptional strength, durability and resistance.

VG-10 steel is a Japanese standard and establishes an excellent foundation for creating high-quality knives. It boasts superb strength and durability with incredible corrosion resistance making it ideal for use in the kitchen. This is one of the many features that separates the good from the great, which is why we've adopted this type of manufacturing when producing our knives.

This forged core is then sandwiched between multiple-layered steel (Damascus steel) on either side for extra resistance and durability whilst providing the beautiful exterior aesthetic, especially when paired with the unique wooden handles.

 

 -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

 

Superior wood handle. 

 Comfort and practicality.

 Full/through-tang design. 

 Stable and balanced construction. 

 

- A superior wood handle precisely shaped for both comfort and practicality. The full/through-tang design is perfect for anyone who desires more weight behind their knife, this promotes a more stable and balanced construction which gives the user more control when in use.

 

Our choice of wooden handles help to create the unique look and timeless design we want from these knives. We believe that a fantastic knife should feel comfortable to hold, should be balanced when in use and should be beautiful, yet practical enough for continued use everyday. These handles are made from dense, strong species of wood as they are required to survive the rigorous kitchen environment.

 

 -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

 

Exceptional Capability. 

 Professional Craftsmanship. 

 Outstanding Performance. 

 

- A knife is considered one of the most important tools in any kitchen, which is why we aim to provide the very best quality products possible. 

Each knife we offer is hand-made and quality assured before dispatch as we pride ourselves in taking time to produce this versatile and durable kitchenware.

 

 -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

From Inspiration To Creation
 

                                                 Designed with performance & beauty in mind.

                            Created with exceptional talent and meticulous attention to detail.

                                  With Inspiration From The Finest Japanese Culinary Knives.

 

 

Featuring an attractive elliptical Ebony wood handle, knives from this collection present a modern design and when paired with the stunning Damascus steel blades, create a truly unique piece of kitchenware.

_________________

 -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

 

 

Featuring an elegant shaped Madagascar Dalbergia wood handle, knives from this collection present a classic design and when paired with the stunning Damascus steel blades, create a truly distinctive piece of kitchenware.

_________________

Blade: Multiple Layered Damascus Steel With VG10 Grade Core.

Hardness: 60HRC

Handle Material: Madagascar Dalbergia (Rose) Wood

Net Weight: 230g

Blade Thickness: 2.4mm

 

Blade: Multiple Layered Damascus Steel With VG10 Grade Core.

Hardness: 60HRC

Handle Material: Madagascar Dalbergia (Rose) Wood

Net Weight: 202g

Blade Thickness: 2.4mm

Blade Thickness: 2.4mm

Blade: Multiple Layered Damascus Steel With VG10 Grade Core.

Hardness: 60HRC

Handle Material: Madagascar Dalbergia (Rose) Wood

Net Weight: 99g

Blade Edge Angle: 15 degrees

Blade Thickness: 2.2mm

 

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

 

Rewards/Perks For Backing

 

Save 30% from the original intended retail price on any of our knives currently on offer.

 

 Purchase either full set and receive a 40% discount with bundled Acacia 6 slot knife block and professional multi-function detachable stainless steel scissors for FREE.

 

Made from beautiful natural Acacia wood this 6 slot knife block offers a safe storing alternative without compromise. It has been designed to hold the most popular knife types and sizes whilst presenting a minimal, modern aesthetic.

Material: Natural Acacia Wood Treated For Durability And Moisture Prevention With Non-Slip Rubber Feet

Dimensions: Height: 24.5cm - Width: 24cm - Depth: 7.8cm

Net Weight: 1.78kg

Application: 5 x Variable Knife Slots & 1 x Scissors Slot

 

These multi-function scissors offer a wide variety of uses within the kitchen and may very well be the second most important tool surrounding food preparation. They have been made to provide the most capability when in use and present a comfortable, easy to clean, ergonomic design offering incredible functionality.

Material: Satin Finish Stainless Steel

Dimensions: Overall Length: 20.7cm - Overall Width: 7.4cm

Net Weight: 167g

Application: Detachable Design For Peeling And Cleaning

 

 -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

 

About Our Knives And Product Care Information

 

A knife is considered one of the most important tools in any kitchen, and like any tool, will require maintaining and care to secure its longevity and impact within the kitchen. This means cleaning, storing, sharpening and, most importantly, using the knife properly.

Any and all knives wear over time and is an inevitability as its edge wears down mostly due to abrasion. Our knives are sharpened to a 15 degree angle which when completed, creates a fantastically sharp blade, but with that comes an incredibly thin piece of steel withstanding all of the pressure and weight when in use. All knives, no matter the cost, will require proper maintenance to maximise their effectiveness in the kitchen and this should be expected when purchasing any kitchen knife.

Some things to consider:

Cleaning: Our knives are hand-made using two materials; steel and wood. Steel is far more capable when it comes to withstanding pressure, heat, water etc. Although the wood we use is durable, we ask that particular care be taken when cleaning each knife so as not to damage and degrade the handle as this naturally wears quicker and is more susceptible to the elements. To do this we recommend not using a dishwasher and to clean the knife by hand, after which promptly drying with a dishcloth. Please appreciate that wood is an organic product and should be cared for appropriately.

Storing: There are multiple reasons for properly storing your knives; to prevent unnecessary damage to the knife itself, to prevent the risk of injury, and to help create suitable access for when it is needed. We recommend these 3 options as suitable ways to store your knives.

Firstly, probably the most obvious one, a knife block. This allows for safe storing of your knives as the blades will be concealed whilst providing easy access to each handle, in addition to keeping them separate from other utensils within your kitchen.

Secondly, an alternative to the above would be a magnetic knife rack/holder. This provides both the benefit of keeping your knives away from other utensils with easy access to each handle. Each knife is never in contact with another and can be seen fully at all times.

Our third recommendation, should neither of the two above agree with you, would be to at the very least use a blade guard. These simply slide onto each blade and act as a barrier between the knife and other utensils. This option also helps prevent the risk of injury and would suit anyone not wishing to fully display their knives for reasons such as having young children around.

Sharpening: No matter how little or often you use your knife, there will come a time when the cutting edge will have noticeably worn and result in a less efficient tool in your kitchen. There are many diy solutions out there, and most offer very simple procedures to achieve a sharp blade. Should you wish to have a go yourself, we recommend using a sharpening blade-guide paired with a whetstone, as if done correctly, creates a far superior result. There are plenty of resources out there both showing how it's done and explaining the requirements and benefits. We may in the future offer an in-house sharpening solution although is not something currently on offer.

Using your knife: There are many factors which relate to the proper use surrounding the do's and don'ts of using a kitchen knife. We certainly can't name them all here however, to us, there are some that stand out amongst the crowd.
      Please do not attempt to cut bones, frozen foods (or similar) or proceed to apply great pressure on the knife to forcefully make a cut. A knife should be guided and held securely to allow the blade to successfully do its job. Should there at any stage be more resistance than expected when attempting to cut, slice etc, please check for signs of wear on the blade and re-evaluate the required action.

Please use proper etiquette when holding a knife and make sure to have a secure, firm grip to maximise control when in use. Pay attention to the task and make sure to place any object on a solid, stable surface (ideally a wooden chopping board), and to keep any object secure to help prevent the risk of the blade slipping when attempting to cut.


Should you have any further questions or queries surrounding this campaign, please do not hesitate to contact us and we shall do our very best to get back to you.

Thank you for your interest.

G. Grant @ Xintoku

story:
SaroCat brings a revolution in cat hygiene, scratching without litter.

Scratching on the grass mat instead of cat litter, means constant cleanliness for the cat. Together with the other components, the SaroCat ensures automatic maintenance so that it always remains clean and odourless.

 

Key benefits

  • Doesn’t require litter
  • Self-cleaning litter box
  • Perfect hygiene for cats and your home.
  • No more unpleasant odors and allergens at your home. 
  • You have no longer to absorb litter in your home.
  • Eco-friendly, because you do not need cat litter.
  • Great design. An eye-catcher in every home.
 

 

 

Perfect hygiene

SaroCat provides you and your loved house cat with the best hygiene. Get rid of most problems you face with litter boxes at once with the SaroCat! No more unpleasant odors and allergens at your home. And by using the SaroCat, the surroundings are not getting dirty anymore.

 

Twice the comfort

Modern technology in connection with your cat? Absolutely! The SaroCat grass mat simulates a soft surface to your cat and invites the cat to scratch on it, which means it always stays clean and with SaroCat you no longer have to clean up litter in your home.

 

Innovation

SaroCat allows you not only to pamper your fastidious cat. 15 years of research and development and the use of the most modern technologies not only carries the comfort to your home, but also the certainty that it works. It is easier to use than you might think.

The only cat litter box in the world that can be used with or without cat litter!

You do not have to use cat litter anymore! But you can. If you still want to use cat litter, especially if it’s your cat’s habit, you can-use it. We then recommend to use fine-grain silicate.

 

    Functionality of the SaroCat royal

    The soft surface of the grass mat on the inside of the SaroCat royal gives your house cat the feeling of short-cut natural grass. Since it always stays clean, the SaroCat provides the best requirements for your cat. When your cat steps into the SaroCat, he or she will be identified by the sensors.

    After the exit of the cat, the cleaning process will start automatically – the feces on top of the grass mat will be transported in the waste container with a rake. The container lid only opens shortly before and the sealing will shut immediately to avoid disruptive odour. Upon retracting, the grass mat will be cleaned by a nozzle which is integrated in the rake. The waste water will flow into an easy-to-empty tank.

    SaroCat is the only automatic cat toilet worldwide that also allows you to use the litter that your darling is used to. To do that, remove the grass mat and the SaroCat royal now operates without cleaning through the nozzles.

     

    Cats love it - You too!

     

    Timeline

    After 15 years of research and development, we are now ready to produce!

    The mould construction is already in progress. In the next few weeks, we will start with the production. 

    If no difficulties arise, we will be able to start deliver your SaroCat royal in January 2021!

     

    Production 

    SaroCat is a Swiss made innovation a development. It will produce in the EU. Our mold construction has already started!


    We are on the way to production - flying fast! :-)
