story: The Thalir Solar Energy Project is a service initiative in Coimbatore, India that is run by a motivated team of college engineering students. Our mission is to install a solar energy system consisting of solar panels and battery storage units into an all girls orphanage, allowing them full time access to electricity and power. We aim to improve the standard of living at this orphanage, fostering a comfortable home for the girls that reside there, as well as implement and promote the use of clean, renewable technology. We hope to continue making positive changes in the lives of others and the environment during the rest of our college experience and professional careers. If for any reason you wish to donate by check or would like to discuss any part of this project further; please do not hesitate to contact me.
story_txt: The Thalir Solar Energy Project is a service initiative in Coimbatore, India that is run by a motivated team of college engineering students. Our mission is to install a solar energy system consisting of solar panels and battery storage units into an all girls orphanage, allowing them full time access to electricity and power. We aim to improve the standard of living at this orphanage, fostering a comfortable home for the girls that reside there, as well as implement and promote the use of clean, renewable technology.  We hope to continue making positive changes in the lives of others and the environment during the rest of our college experience and professional careers. If for any reason you wish to donate by check or would like to discuss any part of this project further; please do not hesitate to contact me.

story:
Hello. My name is Ranee Hanlon However  I am best known as 'Lady A Broad' an internationally published and awarded Pinup model. At home I am a mother, Graphic designer, vintage lover of the 1940/1950 and cursed with a creative mind.

I recently organised a High Tea fun raising event for a close friends mother who has Motor Neuron disease. It got me thinking about the extravagance and amazing decor the 1950's era provided for a High Tea. I have been looking for place mats and coasters to adorn my lovely vintage dinning table for many years yet haven't found anything that would compliment it. Combine the 1950's design with modern functionality. I want to create a set of coasters, a serving tray, tea towel and recipe/tip cards that have a soft vintage design. For the older generation to remember and younger generation to learn about. When not in use, the coasters can be used as an educational tool or presented in the serving tray as a centre piece on your table, at the ready for when friends drop by. In time place mats and a tea box will extend this gorgeous set. 

I have had this idea amongst many others, Like a headache with pictures.  but this one will not go away. I know I need to make these home wares for it has been my passion for many years. I have been creating vintage inspired fridge magnets, broaches and earrings to try and earn some extra money to fund this project. I have been unable to achieve this utilising my current resources.

Every person that has seen my first set of  coasters  has loved my idea  and want to buy the prototypes for themselves and as gifts for family and friends. The only trouble is that they are incredibly labour intensive at the moment as everything is done by hand the long way with very tired hand tools and good old fashioned elbow grease. Now I am not afraid of hard work, however there is only a reasonable amount of time before theses wares become slave labour and very much running at a loss, as the price cannot match the time put in.

I am here to ask for your help for new equipment to replace the old and dangerous equipment that I have and to purchase other pieces that will remove several very long laborious tasks making the process faster and safer also giving me more diversity to create new kitchen wares to add to my range.

The Items I need to improve and help share my home wares are:

A laser cutter. An air compressor. spray gun. spray booth. laminator. colour laser printer. tea towel/ napkin printing and manufacturing. I will also need to look into printing costs for packaging.

My aim is to get my product out as soon as possible to capture a niche market in the Vintage/Rockabilly/retro industry. Having being part of these fantastic weekend events I see what is popular and sells. My advantage is that I have a graphic design background and think outside the square. I know that this will cause excitement among the vintage lovers and high end beautique shops alike.

The end product will be wood finished with a clear 2 pack varnish. A high quality product that will stand alone as an attractive centre pieces on your table. 

Your help in funding this project will bring my ideas to life. Any money received with go to my first priority, the laser cutter worth $3,000. It can help me expand my goals and keep creating unique home wares. There are a lot of companies that do kitchen wares,but what they lack is the home made touch. The personal, soft touch that my design style has. My funding friends, you will see what I mean when you receive some yourself.

Your help in donations or word of mouth about this project is greatly appreciated. Thank you so much for your support.

story:
ULTRA-LUXURIOUS HEALTHY bed sheets that STAY on your bed and ENHANCE your sleep!
 

ULTRA-LUXURIOUS:
DeBora Rachelle bed sheets help regulate your body temperature - keeping you cool when you need it and warm when you don't.  HOW? We use extra long staple cotton that is hand-picked and single-ply. Such fine cotton is also, softer, more luxurious and durable.

HEALTHY
SEVENTY percent of manufacturers use harmful chemicals in their bed sheets and the US government has no regulations on what manufacturers put into their sheets. DeBora Rachelle bed sheets are OEKO-Tex tested, cruelty-free, and hypoallergenic. DeBora Rachelle bed sheets contain no harmful chemicals that can harm your family or you!

STAY ON
DeBora Rachelle bed sheets have a new patented design that makes it easier to make your bed (no having to lift your mattress to try to get that last corner on) and they stay on!

1 - place long straps by the headboard (this way you know what side of the sheet is the headboard side). And put the fitted sheet and it's elastic around the bottom in place like a typical bed sheet.

2 - WITHOUT LIFTING your mattress, simply glide the slippery strap under the mattress to the opposite corner. 

3 - Feel for the loop with your hand and run the strap through the loop and fold back onto itself with the Velcro closure. 


4 - next put on the top sheet with the Velcro straps at the foot of the bed.

5 - without lifting the mattress, feel for the bottom sheet loop and run the top sheet strap through the loop and fold back onto itself with Velcro.

ENHANCE your sleep
* DeBora Rachelle bed sheets stay on so you will never be awakened during the night by your sheets coming off the corners of your bed.
* DeBora Rachelle sheets regulate your body temperature and absorb perspiration.
* DeBora Rachelle sheets do not contain any harmful chemicals, so your body can relax and not have to fight off any harmful chemicals as it sleeps.
* DeBora Rachelle sheets are ultra-luxurious, soft, yet cool and crisp like a summer breeze, the ultimate to help you stay asleep!

Here is a link on how to make your bed: 

 

SPECIFICS:

Have you ever woken up at night with the sweats? Managing your body temperature is an important part of getting a good night's sleep. DeBora Rachelle luxury bed sheets are made of EXTRA LONG SINGLE-PLY STAPLE cotton which allows air flow circulation and moisture absorption. Our natural fibers draw moisture away from your skin to help prohibit you from waking up drenched in sweat during the night.   

DEBORA RACHELLE LUXURY BED SHEETS ARE SINGLE-PLY  

The ply of cotton fabric is much more important than the thread count. Thread count cannot exceed approximately 413 threads without the threads being manipulated in some way by twisting the life out of them with other threads. Once you start to twist threads together, it suffocates the airflow movement making the fabric less breathable, less durable and prone to pilling. Lack of airflow movement causes your body to retain heat so you will not receive the proper sleep you deserve. Think about how air flows through a braid in your hair verses a free flowing ponytail. DeBora Rachelle luxury bed sheets use one of the highest thread counts (400 thread count) available in single-ply.



Our fabric is OEKO-TEX TESTED and CERTIFIED which means, unlike 70% of bed sheet manufacturers, DeBora Rachelle luxury linens contain no harmful chemicals that can hurt you or your family.   

If sheets say, 'wrinkle-free', 'shrink-free', or 'permanent press', your bed sheets have harsh chemicals such as formaldehyde added to them. Yes, formaldehyde is a cancer causing chemical that is also found in embalming fluid Morticians use on dead people. Wrinkle-free sheets may cut down your ironing time, but they will also diminish your sleep! Would you rather have wrinkles on your bed or wrinkles on your face?  
 

If you have ever opened up new bed sheets and noticed a smell to them, they are off-gassing toxins. Off-gassing is the release of airborne chemicals into our environment. Once these chemicals enter the air, humans breathe them in and they can also be absorbed directly into your skin. Your skin is a living, breathing organ. Feeding your skin properly, keeps it youthful, radiant and clear. We don't have to tell you what harsh chemicals do to your skin, just know that the majority of bed sheet manufacturers use toxic chemicals in their bed sheets and DeBora Rachelle Inc. does not use any toxic chemicals.

You spend 1/3 of your life in direct contact with your bed sheets. This is the time your skin should be recharging and resting, not fighting off toxic chemicals. Chemicals can have a nightmarish effect to human health and manufacturers spend thousands of dollars to make sure these chemicals cannot be washed out.

In the last 50 years, more than 80,000 chemicals have been introduced into the environment and many of these chemicals result in allergic reactions and other health problems. In the US alone, there has been a tremendous increase in allergies, asthma, coughing, leukemia, etc. with adverse affects on the immune system as well as impaired neurological reproductive and development systems as more and more people are exposed to harsh and toxic chemicals. DeBora Rachelle bed linens are OEKO-TEX tested and contain no harsh chemicals. By keeping our cotton fibers as close to their natural state as possible, our sheets will help you can get the rest you deserve.

Colors available:

     

Rest assured, you can feel healthy and safe in DeBora Rachelle bed sheets.

story:
The KeyWe smart lock has been designed and manufactured with safety as its No.1 priority.

Developed for safety, your home will become even safer when it meets the KeyWe smart lock. 

The KeyWe smart lock comes with an Ansi Grade 2 Deadbolt and the aluminium we use is so strong they use it to build airplanes and boats!

We use 128 bit AES encryption for the connection between the KeyWe App and door lock - that means that even the signals between the app and hardware are encrypted and are being constantly updated to ensure constant security.

Data access is very restricted and if there is any attempt to jailbreak or any rooting is detected, the app will block logins and delete all data.


A smart lock needs to be, well... smart. There are many smart locks out there but they may not offer everything you need.

Imagine - as you approach your front door, it unlocks automatically and after you enter, it will lock itself. KeyWe can do this for you. 

Sounds too easy?

Feeling unsure about the Smart Open? 

The KeyWe has been tested in high rise buildings with many Bluetooth connections around and we are confident it is still fully functional in under these conditions.

The amazing part is that this is just one of many options of the KeyWe, you can try the Magic Touch - one which you can activate the touchpad with your smartphone and the door will open.

The KeyWe has the ability to store up to 20 passcodes per door lock, enabling each user to have their own unique code. 

Expecting deliveries? 

Why not try the One-Time Passcode (OTP) options for the courier? It's only valid for 2 minutes and can't be reused.


However, some people prefer the traditional way and some prefer high tech but some of us are on the fence. 

This is why the KeyWe offers functionality through your smartphone's NFC function, a physical key and even a key card (it's included - we've got you sorted)


If you're an Airbnb host or have guests staying - there's also the Guest Key function which works just like a hotel key! (They don't even need to register to KeyWe!) 

There won't be any confusion as the KeyWe will send you real time push notifications and will save records for up to two months.


The UI (User Interface) is easy to understand and use yet powerful 

just to list a few: 

-All features of the door lock can be set and controlled through the app 
-The app will send an alarm when the battery is low
-Allow you to invite new users or guests
-Register multiple locks to one app 
-Change the lock's hardware setting with the app


We want to offer more connections where possible. 

Z-Wave integrated KeyWe is designed to sync with hubs already in the market e.g. Alexa, so we can help build your smart home without the hassle.  

This is still a work in progress and we aim to enable any connections to any smart hub out there, also providing WiFi Bridge App and hardware. 

 

From the beginning of the project our goal was to create a smart lock better than any on the market. This included the highest level of perfection for both hardware and software. Two years ago, a team of ten engineers developed KeyWe as a spin-off project within an established security company with over 30 years of industry experience. 

Now KeyWe is being sold and serviced in 6 countries. We are confident that we have created the best smart lock on the market based on all our experiences and thoughts around the product. Production and research is located in Korea, customer service in San Francisco. By the time you get the product, we will be able to provide a 24/7 hotline service. The most important thing for us is the customer. We will do our best to achieve the highest customer satisfaction.

story:
Great days start with good habits

Stress and fatigue are the most common causes of lost sleep, affecting as much as 72% of the population. Sleep is a one way ticket to good health. So why do we all sleep badly?

Kello has the answer: when it comes to sleep, it’s all about lifestyle.

   

How can Kello improve your sleep?

Choose a program and let Kello take care of the rest. By using simple, effective and scientifically proven techniques, Kello helps you renew your sleep pattern and kick-start your morning routine.

Fixing your sleep night after night means a healthier life day after day.

  

What's the secret sauce behind Kello's Sleep Programs?

We've worked hand-in-hand with sleep specialists and analyzed hundreds of studies on sleep behavior so you can learn better bedtime habits to improve your daily productivity and energy.

Here are some of the Sleep Programs that you'll find at launch, with more to be added all the time. 

  

 “Waking up, hitting the snooze button and drifting back to sleep is called fragmented sleep. Fragmented sleep has been proven to be not restorative.” (Journal of Sleep - The Effect of Sleep Fragmentation on Daytime Function)

Kello can limit how many times a week you’re allowed to snooze. By ringing louder, changing playlists and even switching on the lights when you have used up your snooze allowance, you will improve your morning routine in no time.

  

  

"You won’t be able to change your sleep schedule overnight. The most effective tactic is to make small changes slowly." (The National Sleep Foundation, 'How To Get On A Sleep Schedule').

Being in a rush is never a good way to start the day. We’ve all tried to set the alarm 45 minutes earlier only to snooze our way through it when the time comes.

Why is it so hard? Because we're creatures of habit and our bodies dislike change.

Slow and steady wins the race: Kello helps you get to your personal wake-up goal by knocking off a few minutes from your alarm every day.

      

   

"Getting the best sleep ever is as simple as breathing. It helps people quiet the mind and let go of preoccupying thoughts." (Medical Daily, May 2015).

We all know the feeling: wide awake, under a stuffy blanket, head buzzing with thoughts when we should be long gone into slumber land. That’s where the ‘Fall Asleep Fast’ feature comes in.

It gets you to focus on matching your breathing to a light pattern, slowing your mind and body as one.

Once your breaths reach the perfect-for-sleep 6 breaths per minute, the relaxing music or specially developed white noises fade away, sending you to sleep 2.5 times faster than before.

    

   

 `"Keeping a regular sleep schedule maintains the timing of the body's internal clock and can help you fall asleep and wake up more easily." (Harvard Medical School, Division Of Sleep Medicine, December 2008).

Restorative sleep is achieved through regular bedtimes. Kello notifies you when it’s time to get ready for bed for a healthier sleeping routine.

Kello displays a sky full of stars when it’s bedtime: all you have to do is tap Kello’s head to check in to sleep and log your bedtime.

  

  
The Sleep Platform

The ‘Sleep Platform’ is where all of our Sleep Programs live. You can access it and download Sleep Programs through Kello’s companion app.

Here are a few additional Sleep Programs you will find at launch:

Fight Jet Lag

Tackle oncoming jet lag before a trip. Enter your trip details and Kello will personalize your sleep schedule to adjust your body clock.

  
Power Naps

Boost your day with short power naps: Kello plays the right music for the right amount of sleep to get you through the rest of your day.

   
And More!

We will constantly update Kello and add new programs to Kello’s Sleep Platform.

    

  Starting a Sleep Program (Get To Sleep Fast)

Kello is also a connected audio device. Thanks to its Wi-Fi and Bluetooth connectivity, listen to all your favorite music anytime, any day.

 

Tune Into A Good Day

A great song can put you in a great mood. Kello helps kick-start your mornings with great tracks, day after day.

Spring into action or hit the sack with your favorite playlists on Spotify, Deezer, SoundCloud, Tidal and more. Or tune into one of the podcasts from the 100.000+ radios available on vTuner.  

Kello also comes with a collection of nature sounds.

     

Ban Your Phone From The Bedroom

When it comes to getting some good shuteye, our smartphones keep our brains roused and vigilant with endless distractions.

This is why Kello doesn’t need your phone. This is one baby you can put in the corner while you get a decent night’s sleep.

  

A Smart Alarm Clock Belongs In A Smart Home

Kello doesn’t just make you sleep better, it helps make life easier. Double tapping its head can trigger actions around the house.

It can even trigger an action when the alarm goes off, because who doesn’t like to wake up to the smell of coffee in the morning?

Kello can:   

 

 

Not Your Average Alarm Clock

An alarm clock is a personal device. It sits next to you day in, day out. That’s why we’ve listened to people’s feedback to create the best alarm clock ever.

   

Kello's Companion App

In order to set your alarms, start Sleep Programs, and manage Kello's settings, Kello comes with a companion app that connects to Kello via Wi-Fi.

The Kello app will be available both on the App Store for iOS users and on Google Play for Android users.

 Setting up a Spotify alarm with Kello's companion app

    

A Great Speaker For A Great Morning

Kello has a high quality integrated speaker to make sure the first thing you hear on a morning sounds crisp and clear.

Thanks to Bluetooth and Wi-Fi connectivity, Kello is the external speaker of all your connected devices.

    

  
Get Dazzled By Its Looks, Not The Screen

Kello progressively dims the screen so you can sleep like a baby. Or you can go out like a light simply by switching Kello’s screen off.

   

Never Go Hunting For Your Cables Again

Say goodbye to endless nights of looking for your charging cable under the bed. Kello integrates a fast charging USB port for all your devices. 

 

We spent months looking for the perfect Kello. Sixty iterations later we came up with this smooth little guy.


   
Materials

Kello’s shell is protected by a high quality silicone coating that prevents it from getting dusty or stained over time and gives it a soft touch feel.

The front surface is covered with an acoustic fabric to protect the speaker.

   

Colors

Color is important, so we reached out to our community to find out which shades would best suit Kello. Mint Green, Cerulean Blue and Pearl Grey came first.  

   

Tech Specs 

       

 

We founded Kello in April 2015 with one simple belief: we don’t like mornings because we live in a fast-paced world without enough sleep. We wanted to make life better by improving people’s sleep habits.

In August 2015 we were selected by the Brinc IoT Accelerator.

Brinc is a Hong Kong-based hardware accelerator that helps startups launch their projects. Their team is composed of world-class hardware design and manufacturing experts.

After 17 months of non-stop designing, coding, testing and debugging, we’re now at the final prototype stage, ready to set into motion the production process.

August 2015 vs August 2016

 

If you want to have more insights on our journey to make Kello a reality check our blog, Bedtime Stories.

After 2 years of development, iterations, prototypes, we're proud to announce that we are NOW SHIPPING!


Kello is IN STOCK! Order today at the special Indiegogo price and your order will be shipped right away.

We are a highly qualified team with previous experience in successful digital startups. We’ve worked on Kello non-stop for the past 17 months.

   
We also have strong partnerships all around the globe to make sure we bring you the best product.  

   

10,000 Sleepy Heads

Designing a smart device that will sit next to you eight hours a night is a serious affair. We couldn’t have done it without our pre-launch program members. 

They have supported us the whole way by giving us advice, feedback and opinions in our many polls and reach outs.

In three words: YOU GUYS ROCK (and not to sleep).

A dozen of them got the chance to try out Kello in their own bedroom!
story_txt:
August 2017 update: Kello is now in stock and ships immediately!
Treat yourself with better sleep and purchase your Kello today on our website.

 
       
 Great days start with good habitsStress and fatigue are the most common causes of lost sleep, affecting as much as 72% of the population. Sleep is a one way ticket to good health. So why do we all sleep badly?Kello has the answer: when it comes to sleep, it’s all about lifestyle.   How can Kello improve your sleep?Choose a program and let Kello take care of the rest. By using simple, effective and scientifically proven techniques, Kello helps you renew your sleep pattern and kick-start your morning routine.Fixing your sleep night after night means a healthier life day after day.  What's the secret sauce behind Kello's Sleep Programs?We've worked hand-in-hand with sleep specialists and analyzed hundreds of studies on sleep behavior so you can learn better bedtime habits to improve your daily productivity and energy.Here are some of the Sleep Programs that you'll find at launch, with more to be added all the time.    “Waking up, hitting the snooze button and drifting back to sleep is called fragmented sleep. Fragmented sleep has been proven to be not restorative.” (Journal of Sleep - The Effect of Sleep Fragmentation on Daytime Function)Kello can limit how many times a week you’re allowed to snooze. By ringing louder, changing playlists and even switching on the lights when you have used up your snooze allowance, you will improve your morning routine in no time.    "You won’t be able to change your sleep schedule overnight. The most effective tactic is to make small changes slowly." (The National Sleep Foundation, 'How To Get On A Sleep Schedule').Being in a rush is never a good way to start the day. We’ve all tried to set the alarm 45 minutes earlier only to snooze our way through it when the time comes.Why is it so hard? Because we're creatures of habit and our bodies dislike change.Slow and steady wins the race: Kello helps you get to your personal wake-up goal by knocking off a few minutes from your alarm every day.         "Getting the best sleep ever is as simple as breathing. It helps people quiet the mind and let go of preoccupying thoughts." (Medical Daily, May 2015).We all know the feeling: wide awake, under a stuffy blanket, head buzzing with thoughts when we should be long gone into slumber land. That’s where the ‘Fall Asleep Fast’ feature comes in.It gets you to focus on matching your breathing to a light pattern, slowing your mind and body as one.Once your breaths reach the perfect-for-sleep 6 breaths per minute, the relaxing music or specially developed white noises fade away, sending you to sleep 2.5 times faster than before.        `"Keeping a regular sleep schedule maintains the timing of the body's internal clock and can help you fall asleep and wake up more easily." (Harvard Medical School, Division Of Sleep Medicine, December 2008).Restorative sleep is achieved through regular bedtimes. Kello notifies you when it’s time to get ready for bed for a healthier sleeping routine.Kello displays a sky full of stars when it’s bedtime: all you have to do is tap Kello’s head to check in to sleep and log your bedtime.    The Sleep PlatformThe ‘Sleep Platform’ is where all of our Sleep Programs live. You can access it and download Sleep Programs through Kello’s companion app.Here are a few additional Sleep Programs you will find at launch:Fight Jet LagTackle oncoming jet lag before a trip. Enter your trip details and Kello will personalize your sleep schedule to adjust your body clock.  Power NapsBoost your day with short power naps: Kello plays the right music for the right amount of sleep to get you through the rest of your day.   And More!We will constantly update Kello and add new programs to Kello’s Sleep Platform.      Starting a Sleep Program (Get To Sleep Fast)Kello is also a connected audio device. Thanks to its Wi-Fi and Bluetooth connectivity, listen to all your favorite music anytime, any day. Tune Into A Good DayA great song can put you in a great mood. Kello helps kick-start your mornings with great tracks, day after day.Spring into action or hit the sack with your favorite playlists on Spotify, Deezer, SoundCloud, Tidal and more. Or tune into one of the podcasts from the 100.000+ radios available on vTuner.  Kello also comes with a collection of nature sounds.     Ban Your Phone From The BedroomWhen it comes to getting some good shuteye, our smartphones keep our brains roused and vigilant with endless distractions.This is why Kello doesn’t need your phone. This is one baby you can put in the corner while you get a decent night’s sleep.  A Smart Alarm Clock Belongs In A Smart HomeKello doesn’t just make you sleep better, it helps make life easier. Double tapping its head can trigger actions around the house.It can even trigger an action when the alarm goes off, because who doesn’t like to wake up to the smell of coffee in the morning?Kello can:     Not Your Average Alarm ClockAn alarm clock is a personal device. It sits next to you day in, day out. That’s why we’ve listened to people’s feedback to create the best alarm clock ever.   Kello's Companion AppIn order to set your alarms, start Sleep Programs, and manage Kello's settings, Kello comes with a companion app that connects to Kello via Wi-Fi.The Kello app will be available both on the App Store for iOS users and on Google Play for Android users. Setting up a Spotify alarm with Kello's companion app    A Great Speaker For A Great MorningKello has a high quality integrated speaker to make sure the first thing you hear on a morning sounds crisp and clear.Thanks to Bluetooth and Wi-Fi connectivity, Kello is the external speaker of all your connected devices.      Get Dazzled By Its Looks, Not The ScreenKello progressively dims the screen so you can sleep like a baby. Or you can go out like a light simply by switching Kello’s screen off.   Never Go Hunting For Your Cables AgainSay goodbye to endless nights of looking for your charging cable under the bed. Kello integrates a fast charging USB port for all your devices.  We spent months looking for the perfect Kello. Sixty iterations later we came up with this smooth little guy.
   MaterialsKello’s shell is protected by a high quality silicone coating that prevents it from getting dusty or stained over time and gives it a soft touch feel.The front surface is covered with an acoustic fabric to protect the speaker.   ColorsColor is important, so we reached out to our community to find out which shades would best suit Kello. Mint Green, Cerulean Blue and Pearl Grey came first.     Tech Specs         We founded Kello in April 2015 with one simple belief: we don’t like mornings because we live in a fast-paced world without enough sleep. We wanted to make life better by improving people’s sleep habits.
In August 2015 we were selected by the Brinc IoT Accelerator.
Brinc is a Hong Kong-based hardware accelerator that helps startups launch their projects. Their team is composed of world-class hardware design and manufacturing experts.
After 17 months of non-stop designing, coding, testing and debugging, we’re now at the final prototype stage, ready to set into motion the production process.
 
In September 2016, we ran a Kickstarter campaign where we raised more than $322,000. Today, we're accepting preorders through Indiegogo InDemand.

August 2015 vs August 2016
 
If you want to have more insights on our journey to make Kello a reality check our blog, Bedtime Stories.

After 2 years of development, iterations, prototypes, we're proud to announce that we are NOW SHIPPING!


Kello is IN STOCK! Order today at the special Indiegogo price and your order will be shipped right away.We are a highly qualified team with previous experience in successful digital startups. We’ve worked on Kello non-stop for the past 17 months.   We also have strong partnerships all around the globe to make sure we bring you the best product.     10,000 Sleepy HeadsDesigning a smart device that will sit next to you eight hours a night is a serious affair. We couldn’t have done it without our pre-launch program members. They have supported us the whole way by giving us advice, feedback and opinions in our many polls and reach outs.In three words: YOU GUYS ROCK (and not to sleep).A dozen of them got the chance to try out Kello in their own bedroom!Photos from our Prelaunch Program members' bedroom!

story:
Harley is gradually losing muscle and it's becoming increasingly difficult for him to move. He has a fantastic wheelchair which supports him and has just got arm rests which really help.

He needs to be turned several times during the night which is very strenuous as he is getting older. His dad has to turn him as his mums back is already bad because of having to lift Harley. Everybody's losing sleep. They desperately need a bed that will turn Harley automatically during the night.

Please help this lovely family cope with the struggles they face by donating anything you can afford and making Harleys and his family's night a little easier.

Please help this lovely family cope with the struggles they face by donating anything you can afford and making Harleys and his family's night a little easier.

story:
The Vortice

Hello IndieGoGo supporters, welcome to my page, I present to you the Vortice, a small bedside, floor, desk or ceiling lamp that incorporates 3 powerfull magnets that hold the shade in place, no need to unscrew your shade, just pull and voilá, easy to access the lightbulb, now just change it and place the shade back on.

Also, it´s easy to clean, since you can easily detach the shade (which is the part of the lamps that collect the most dust), you can dust off or vacuum clean with not much effort.

The Vortice lamp will look good in your entrance, bedroom, floor... Any where you like. It also has two ceiling versions, one individual for small places and one with three shades for bigger rooms (you can see images of these two version below, on the "Perks explained" section).

We´ve chosen the materials that are easier to recycle and match our needs, so we used polypropylene and acrylic.

The size of the Vortice is around 28 centimeters tall and width (11 inches). 

Colorful and customizable!

The Vortice loves light and colour! You can choose the colour of the backpiece and textile cord, make it your own to match your enviroment. Besides the colour you can also choose to have a brushed or chromed dome, whatever matches your style the best.

You can also choose the electric plug for your country.

How this idea was born? 

It was a year ago that it all began, I was fooling around with making curved origami inspired by the work of the brilliant David Huffman, after finding a shape that I found pleasing for the shade, I began to think how I would hold the light bulb in place.

This actually created a problem: how can I change the light bulb easily in a closed shade...? And then it came to me, magnets! Easy to remove the shade, easy to put back on, no need of screws, metal parts or springs to hold it in place.

So after many prototypes to polish the shape and many other prototypes to get a pleasing and colorful back piece, I was ready for this campaign.

Where will the money go?

Part of the money will be to invest in better molds for the back acrylic piece, plus make good contrats with our providers, which I already have decided where to build the production pieces, but they only believe when they see the investment.

The Vortice is completly built in Portugal, since I want to use the best of my country so I can work closely with the companies that will make some of the pieces, also make sure I can fix mistakes quickly when they happen. 

Also part of it will be to build the site and distribution. (notice that we can only build the site if we reach our goal, if so, to honor the people that contribute, their names will appear on the facebook page if the site is not built).

The perks explained:

On this section you can see images of the perks and a chart to better understand what you get in each one.

Note: the color changing light bulb seen above I do not advise to be used as a reading light or to light up a room like a regular light bulb, its perfect to make a colorful spot light in your room, creating a mood.

Who am I?

I´m a industrial Designer from Portugal with a bunch of ideas bubbling in my head, had already the chance to see some of my designs win international awards that took me for some really amazing experiences. 

When I had this idea I thougth it would be perfect for this site and so I develop some prototypes (which you can see some on the video and images) and now I would like to go for the next step, making some production runs, better molds, final pieces using good industrial machines to speed up the process.

Thank you for the support!

If you reached this part, it´s because you read the whole thing! Thank you for your attention and please, even if you can´t contribute with a pledge, please share with your friends, family or anyone you know might like it, be interested by the Vortice or can share with many other friends and investors, because every help counts! :)


Thank you all!!

story:
Now also supports Synthesia & MIDI files!

        

 

 

1. How long will it take to ship my product?

The ONE is already ramping up our existing production facilities to make sure we will ship Piano Hi-Lite in time for holidays. You can expect to receive your product in November 2017.

2. How is shipping handled? 

We are offering free shipping for our backers in United States and Canada. International shipments will be charged a flat rate at $29, while backer is responsible for any Customs duty and processing fees that may be owed on the importation.

3. Does The ONE Piano Hi-Lite perks carry an import charge?

Backer is responsible for any Customs duty and processing fees that may be owed on the importation. The Import Policy and Fees vary from country to country, please check with your country custom for the newest policy applicable.

4. How to install the Piano Hi-Lite?

The ONE Piano Hi-Lite is installation free device. What you will need to do is just simply place the Piano Hi-Lite on your keyboard (make sure to place towards the inner-edge of the keyboards and fit into the keys), and then connect to power.

5. What is "Standard 88-key" piano/keyboard?

Modern piano keyboards ordinarily have an octave span of 164–165 mm; resulting in the width of black keys averaging 13.7 mm and white keys about 23.5 mm wide at the base. The Piano Hi-Lite is designed to match that standard and fits keyboard.

6. Will I become too dependent on the LED lights?

Our system supports learners by helping individuals play through songs first to build interest, then to add on additional skills such as reading music, hand positions, and musical expression. Muscle memory is also a big part of playing piano, so we try to help individuals find their own musical expression rather than focusing on mapping notes to keys right at the start. With our system, you'll find faster progress in your initial learning even without the sight-reading skills. When you're ready to play independently, you can turn off the LED lights.

7. Can this replace a piano teacher?

There will always be value in customized education from a teacher. We do not intend to replace individualized advice by expert piano teaches. Instead, we aim to support aspiring musicians without initial sight-reading knowledge in faster learning and playing. We focus on developing basic skills and articulation through video lessons as well, which provide the same set of basic instruction as a teacher would. 

8. Do I have to buy the app to use with the piano?

The APP is FREE to download and compatible with your iOS or Android devices. Just search for “Smart Piano - By The ONE” or “One Pianist” in the app store.

9. What’s your return and exchange policy?

We want to make sure the product is to your liking. If for some reason you cannot keep the product anymore, email our customer service team (support@smartpiano.com) to let us know why and a member of our team will personally support you based on your situation.

You can return your product within the first seven days of receiving the product and we will refund the price you purchased your item at. Past 7 days, a refund for the goods will be at our discretion. Because we're manufacturing these Hi-Lite as orders come in, we don't have extra stock for you to exchange your products.

10. Where are you located?

We’ve got an office in sunny California in the best city by the Bay (San Francisco). 

11. How to request a replacement if my order arrived damaged/bowed?

First, please contact with the carrier and file a case for complain. Then the carrier will provide a case number. Second, be sure to take some pictures of the bowed part and send it to us with the case number. We will arrange a shipment for your new Piano Hi-Lite ASAP.

12. What is your official website?

Learn more about us at www.smartpiano.com

story: Heffe Open Golfers past and present: you're part of this fund-raising campaign because at least once in your life you've partaken in the world-renowned Heffe Open (aka the 5th major). This year marks the 20th instalment of this sports institution, and we're hoping to raise some $$ to buy Jeff a thank you gift for all his organizing efforts through the years. Please consider a donation in the $20 range.

story:
Hello, I am Joe Latouf and I have created CORA, a Context Ordered Replacement Algorithm.

My formal education is in Physics and Education. My employment background spans research, law enforcement, computer programming and teaching.

I believe that every individual and business has a right to have their data secured. This is particularly true in light of the escalating number of online breaches.

Encryption has historically been used to protect “communication”. We need something much better for data security – enter CORA!

CORA is the ideal companion for The Cloud – together, data security is unbreakable!

Your help will empower our small team to take the next step. We have the design and development; we have the product. We are grateful for your help with:

  • obtaining more equipment and services.
  • building a larger team.
  • funding a marketing, advertising and public relations campaign.
Imagine a global marketplace in which your data in the Cloud is secure. Even if hackers breach a server, unlike encryption, they will not have your data! The files they steal will be useless to them.
If you are excited about protecting your data half as much as I am, then please join me in making a difference for everyone.


Additional Documents and Slide Shows for your consideration:
CORA for dummies (non - techies)
Video shorts on CORA
Kriste talks about securing our global community
CORA game plan: secure data - online - offline - globally
CORA - The Market

story:
POOP HISTORY - Rock, Paper, Nareshole.

Narsehole is a water powered tiny butt shower (bidet), attachment for your existing toilet with a dual nozzle spray and pressure control for a maximum clean.  Never have an itchy or irritated butthole again from improper cleaning with toilet paper.  

Yes there’s other bidet attachements out there, but we spent hundreds of hours watering our butts to fine tune the angle, stream and pressure of the Narsehole for your tender areas.   

If Your Butt Could Talk -  ”Imagine a life where im never irritated. You rarely see me, but you can feel me when I’m upset.  Please start using water, it’ll make me happy and when I’m happy, you’re happy.” 

 How does Narsehole connect? It attaches in-between the seat and bowl and connects to the fresh water supply coming out of the wall via an included hose splitter.

 

Perfect for any occasion: You can activate the individual nozzles for the starfish or the clam, or both nozzle sprays at the same time for the dreaded diarrhea days. This will take care of your whole butt and restart you back in the game of life as if nothing was ever wrong in the first place. Side note - thought about what you wanna get your grandparents for Christmas this year? (wink)

What’s the “Clam” for? If you happen to find yourself in ownership of a vagina on your frontside…set the directional knob to the “Clam”, turn the water on low:) Water is an effective way to remove bacteria and prevent UTIs. 

What is the temperature of the water? It’s cool/room temperature water. It’s kinda like splashing your face with water in the morning...a nice little wake me up :) 

 How do I poop with the Narsehole? Poop, play on your phone for a while to make sure it’s all out, turn the direction knob to the “starfish” and the water pressure knob to desired spray, turn water off, pat dry with a few squares of toilet paper or hand towel, and you’re done. 

 What types of toilets can Narsehole attach to? Almost any toilet. If you can see your water supply then install’s super easy! Everything is included in the box to connect.

Does the Narsehole require electricity? Nope. It’s powered entirely by your fresh water supply. That means if your power goes out you can still clean your butt! 

NEW - Two Handle Options!

 

 

 Toilet paper is a 38 billion and 10 million tree a year industry in the U.S. Save money, the environment and your butt. 

We’re four dudes that used water to clean our butts for the first time in our mid 30’s. It was amazing, faster, more efficient and it left us feeling clean and fresh! We were shocked. 

Our goal -  Is to red pill everyone on water over toilet paper and to make sure their first experience is with a spray that’s gentle but firm, if they need it to be.  

 

  • Below is our estimate for standard shipping charges, with $5 – $20 decuted (Nareshole’s covering percentage of shipping to keep the cost down) Because this estimate is based on our expected volume for this campaign, it could be subject to change depending on the final result. These charges may also change if you add additional products during the survey process. We want to keep this process as simple and accurate as possible, while avoiding any false promise or unexpected charges.
  • Customs, Duty, and VAT charges: In some cases, international backers outside of the USA will be required to pay additional customs, duty, and/or VAT charges. We cannot control this additional charge, and it will be the backers responsibility to cover once they receive the selected reward. Any questions regarding this additional charge should be addressed directly with the backers customs office.

 

Q&A

1. How does Narsehole connect? It attaches in-between the seat and bowl and connects to the fresh water supply coming out of the wall via an included hose splitter.

2. What types of toilets can Narsehole attach to? Almost any toilet. Everything is included in the box to connect to the common household toilet.

3. How do I use the Narsehole? Poop, play on your phone for a while to make sure it’s all out, turn the direction knob to the “starfish” and the water pressure knob to desired spray, go back to playing on your phone while moving your butt around a little bit to be thorough, turn water off, pat dry with a few squares of toilet paper or hand towel, and you’re done.

4. Is it sanitary for multiple people to use the same Narsehole? Yes. Narsehole is designed to be clean and hygienic with a self-cleaning, auto-retracting nozzle and full-length nozzle guard. i.e. it’s a million times more sanitary then using toilet paper.

5. What’s the “Clam” for? If you happen to find yourself in ownership of a vagina on your frontside…set the directional knob to the “Clam”, turn the water on low:) Water is an effective way to remove bacteria and prevent UTIs.

6. Does the Narsehole require electricity? Nope. It’s powered entirely by your fresh water supply. This also makes it easier to install.

7. What is the temperature of the water? It’s cool/room temperature water. It’s kinda like splashing your face with water in the morning...a nice little wake me up :)

8. What’s the difference between the Narsehole and the less expensive options on Amazon?  The cheaper ones have one nozzle (not worth your time) and 90% of dual nozzles are $70-$150.  We tested all the (direct from China) Amazon models and the truth is, you get what you pay for — if you’re used to boxed wine, you’ll still think it’s good — but the Narsehole is for people who like that fine wine! We’re not judging, but ask yourself, which person are you?

Design/Prototype - Our main focus on design was finding the perfect spray for both the starfish and clam.  Testing hundreds of different angles and hole patterns, we finally found the perfect spray and are excited to bring it to a butt near you coming this July:)!!
story_txt:
POOP HISTORY - Rock, Paper, Nareshole.Narsehole is a water powered tiny butt shower (bidet), attachment for your existing toilet with a dual nozzle spray and pressure control for a maximum clean.  Never have an itchy or irritated butthole again from improper cleaning with toilet paper.  Yes there’s other bidet attachements out there, but we spent hundreds of hours watering our butts to fine tune the angle, stream and pressure of the Narsehole for your tender areas.   If Your Butt Could Talk -  ”Imagine a life where im never irritated. You rarely see me, but you can feel me when I’m upset.  Please start using water, it’ll make me happy and when I’m happy, you’re happy.” 
 
 How does Narsehole connect? It attaches in-between the seat and bowl and connects to the fresh water supply coming out of the wall via an included hose splitter.  Perfect for any occasion: You can activate the individual nozzles for the starfish or the clam, or both nozzle sprays at the same time for the dreaded diarrhea days. This will take care of your whole butt and restart you back in the game of life as if nothing was ever wrong in the first place. Side note - thought about what you wanna get your grandparents for Christmas this year? (wink)What’s the “Clam” for? If you happen to find yourself in ownership of a vagina on your frontside…set the directional knob to the “Clam”, turn the water on low:) Water is an effective way to remove bacteria and prevent UTIs. What is the temperature of the water? It’s cool/room temperature water. It’s kinda like splashing your face with water in the morning...a nice little wake me up :) 
 
 How do I poop with the Narsehole? Poop, play on your phone for a while to make sure it’s all out, turn the direction knob to the “starfish” and the water pressure knob to desired spray, turn water off, pat dry with a few squares of toilet paper or hand towel, and you’re done. 
 
 What types of toilets can Narsehole attach to? Almost any toilet. If you can see your water supply then install’s super easy! Everything is included in the box to connect.Does the Narsehole require electricity? Nope. It’s powered entirely by your fresh water supply. That means if your power goes out you can still clean your butt! NEW - Two Handle Options!
 
 
 No More Wiping Yourself Raw!No More Dingleberries!No More Aggravating Your Hemorrhoids Before the DMB Concert!
 
      Toilet paper is a 38 billion and 10 million tree a year industry in the U.S. Save money, the environment and your butt. 
 Day of the Nareshole ShootWe’re four dudes that used water to clean our butts for the first time in our mid 30’s. It was amazing, faster, more efficient and it left us feeling clean and fresh! We were shocked. Our goal -  Is to red pill everyone on water over toilet paper and to make sure their first experience is with a spray that’s gentle but firm, if they need it to be.   
Below is our estimate for standard shipping charges, with $5 – $20 decuted (Nareshole’s covering percentage of shipping to keep the cost down) Because this estimate is based on our expected volume for this campaign, it could be subject to change depending on the final result. These charges may also change if you add additional products during the survey process. We want to keep this process as simple and accurate as possible, while avoiding any false promise or unexpected charges.
Customs, Duty, and VAT charges: In some cases, international backers outside of the USA will be required to pay additional customs, duty, and/or VAT charges. We cannot control this additional charge, and it will be the backers responsibility to cover once they receive the selected reward. Any questions regarding this additional charge should be addressed directly with the backers customs office.

story:
Forget about smart locks, and get most of their features with an easy-to-install and unhackable smart key overlay.

 

Locky is the middle ground between smart locks and key trackers, combining the best features of both. You don’t need to replace your lock and virtualize the key (which makes it hack-able) to check the door status anytime and anywhere, or to get unlocked door notifications. Locky is just a minimalist key overlay, but it tracks your key usage and sends the data to a dedicated mobile app, keeping you in control 24 hours a day. This is the world’s simplest home security system. Never again will you forget to close your door, nor will you lose your keys, thanks to the key finder function.

Locky has most of the features of smart locks, but instead of focusing on the lock, we focused on how you use your key.

Be sure that your home is safe

Locky key overlay tracks the usage of your door lock and provides personalized information to the mobile app, which means you can check your door status, anytime and anywhere.

 

Forget about forgetting to close the door 

It happens to the best of us, but with Locky you won't even start wondering if you locked your door. An instant unlocked door notification will let you correct your mistake before you manage to walk away from your house.

 

Locate your keys anytime you need them 

According to statistics, keys are the third most commonly lost item, and first most difficult to find. With Locky, finding them takes only a matter of seconds, because the overlay is always on your key, working as a key tracker.

 

Never leave your keys in the lock again

It's common to leave keys hanging in the front door, especially when you're tired, in a rush, or your hands are full of groceries. But that's dangerous! Thankfully, an immediate alert from Locky will never allow that to happen again.

 

Full history of door lock status on your phone 

Do you like to have things under control? You can always check the exact time and day you locked or unlocked any door in your house, even if it was done by someone else, provided their key also has the overlay. Full door usage history is always available!

 

Get notified if and when your child gets home 

If you equip your loved ones with Locky, you can track their door-related activities in the app. You can check when they left the house, or if the kids came home safely, or if your partner didn't forget to lock the door when in a rush. Locky allows you to protect your family's security, even from far away. 

 

Upgrade your Master Key System with smart home features 

 A Master Key System allows you to open many doors with the same key. Thanks to the beacon stickers expansion Locky works great with this convenient solution. An Estimote beacon technology allows Locky to recognize every door without fail and track its status.

 

Smarten your key in a few seconds 

There's no need to change your keys or habits, just get the smart and practical overlay and upgrade the key into a home security system. Locky allows you to keep the feeling of security which is provided by keeping an actual, physical key always with you.

 

Carry your keys in style

Locky is not only extremely helpful and full of features, but also looks great! We kept the design modern and minimalist – a style that fits everybody! The stylish Locky overlay also covers the sharp edges of your key, so that it doesn't harm your phone, purse, etc.

Pairing Locky 

It takes only a few super-easy steps to pair the Locky overlay with the dedicated app. Simple and precise instructions will assist you through the whole process, which takes less than a minute. After that, Locky is immediately fully-functional and ready to work!

 

 

Call Locky 

If you can't find your keys, or when you just don't feel like thinking about where you left them, tap "call this Locky" in the app, and a easily audible signal will let you locate them within seconds.

 

Door usage history 

Review the full history of locking and unlocking your door with detailed information on your phone, anytime, anywhere.

 

Smartwatches notifications

Locky is compatible with three most popular smartwatches: Apple Watch, Fitbit and Wear OS (Android) devices, which means that you can receive all notifications directly on your smart watch.


Locky is based on the innovative idea of monitoring the movements of your key instead of tracking the lock usage to get the very same data. The electronic circuit of Locky is there to detect the turning of the key in a lock. As soon as you push the key out of the overlay, the wake-up switch turns the electronics on. Now, the IMU sensor detects and defines the movement of the key. The information obtained this way is sent to the app through a micro-controller via the built-in Bluetooth. The circuit also contains a speaker, which signals events and generates the key finder sound, and a replaceable battery. The electronics of Locky were designed with dependability and accuracy in mind, and we also wanted the device to be light and small.

 

We've been working on Locky for a year now. From the beginning, our goal was to build a device that was simple and easy to use, but also multi-functional. 

 

The result of the intense, yearly work of the whole team is a product we are very proud of. Locky complies with all our requirements and goals, it is ready for mass production, and it looks great!

 

More than 10 years of experience in business and innovation consulting. Entrepreneur with four new businesses launched. Fundraising, business development, sales, and marketing are his daily routine at Locky.

More than 10 years of experience in software development, graphic design, product market communication, and strategy development. At Locky, he's the product design expert, and software and mechanics team manager. His task is to see that Locky works flawlessly.

More than 10 years of experience in project management and business consulting. At Locky, he's the project executive and budget manager, and his job is to keep everything in place.
