story:
TiBe Connect Indiegogo campaign is Arrow Sponsored !

 

Allez plus bas pour la version française.

 

Meet TiBe Connect

 

TiBe Connect is a smart button to simplify your daily life :

Finding your lost keys, smartphones, bags, or taking a selfie, playing your favorite playlist, switching your lights on, .... and you can do so much more with TiBe Connect !

One button for everything

 

Thanks to our app you will be able to easily find your lost stuff, download the TiBe mobile App’ and make your TiBe very Smart !

 

You can customize each TiBe according to the things that you tie it to. 

To find your lost stuff, simply make it ring and light up through your smartphone. The ringing of TiBe Connect is 85db, being as loud as a vacuum cleaner, so even if it is lost under a pile of pillow you will hear it !

If you are too far from your TiBe, your smartphone will display its last known position on a map. And, if it is not enough you can ask the TiBe community some help, by declaring your object lost : it will activate a search through other TiBe app owners.

Stick TiBe on your dashboard, you will be able to find your car if you don't remember where your parked it !

TiBe is also a smart button remote... Thanks to TiBe you will be able to connect with your IoT devices and to control it ... the TiBe button is powerful !

 

and so many other possibilities ...

 

Thanks to the IFTTT platform, automate various everyday life tasks ... IFTTT enables you to create an infinity of scenarios. The TiBe app will have the luck to be the 1st app integrated by IFTTT, enabling the configuration of your TiBe to be much more easier.

 

 

More about TiBe Connect ...

 

Connexion Mode

After downloading the TiBe application on your smartphone, make sure you have a good WIFI or 3G network, hold TiBe near your phone and press the top of the TiBe for 4 seconds, the application automatically connects,

 

 

Next, follow the instructions on the screen to set up your device.

You can connect up to 5 TiBe with a single smartphone. And one TiBe can operate multiple actions whether you make a simple click, double click, long pressed ...

You can name, add comments and add picture to identify the object as you wish.

Give labels to TiBe, such as: My TiBe keys, My TiBe bag, Tom’s Blanket... etc.

 

Compatibility

TiBe Connect uses the latest Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE 4.0) Technology, we are the only one on the market to use Bluetooth iBeacon.

It runs with smartphones and Apple or Android tablets :

• Apple devices: IOS8 & iPhone 4S, 5, 5C, 5S and above.

• Android devices: Android 4.3 and 4.0 Bluetooth enabled device

 

A French Design 

TiBe Connect was designed by the French agency : Exelium.

It is only available in White with the Ticatag’s colorful target.

 

 

Specifications

 

Battery : CR2032 - which is a standard battery type, you will be able to find it everywhere to replace it.

The battery lifespan depends on the way you use TiBE :

- As a key fob - to find your objects and pilot your IoT : 10 months lifespan

- As a fixed button : 20 months lifespan

Device Ringer Volume: up to 85db and LEDs

 

Diameter = 40.25 x 32.23 x 11.51 mm (0.158 x 0,126 x 0.045 in)

Weight = 10 gr (0.35 oz)

Material: Polycarbonate

Temperature: -10 ° C to +50 ° C (14 °F to 122 °F)

Supplied with stainless steel carabiner clip.

 

 

 

Perks

Why we need you ?

 

After two successful crowdfunding campaigns in France, and after a large number of demands, Ticatag wants to export the French design in the US thanks to Indiegogo.

So, here is a new TiBe version, which takes into account our users' observations, and transforms this accessories into a much more powerful IoT device !

TiBe Connect 2in1 will find your stuff thanks to its powerful ringing and will drive your IoT devices in a click !

Timeline

 

 

Behind TiBe Connect

 

 

TICATAG was founded in 2013 to develop IoT solutions based on an internal project of Alcatel-Lucent, especially in the field of Location Based Solutions – Bluetooth Low Energy & iBeacon.

For the past 3 years TICATAG has developed several products and services for B2C and B2B :

  • TiBe, a smart Key fob to find your keys, bags, smartphone …
  • TiFiz, the 1st GPS tracker very low consumption, without SIM card, tracking valuables or people for leisure & safety
  • TiBeaconHD, triggering the right information to the smartphone, i.e. digital tour in a museum
  • iBeacons, triggering targeted information to any proximity connected display, i.e. shops or exhibition places

 

Partners

 

FAQ

  1. What happens when a friend passes next to my TiBe ? If I declared my TiBe lost, I'll receive a notification and my TiBe's position will be updated.
  2. Can everybody follow my TiBe ? No, nobody else can see your TiBe on their app.
  3. How many objects can I control from my TiBe app ? We recommend not to exceed 5 TiBe.
  4. How do I get to the TiBe localization ? You can see your TiBe localization in 2 ways : via the iOS or Android app or via our website by logging in.
  5. To what distance my TiBe can be located ? You have a 10/20 meters distance around you to detect TiBe. Beyond this distance, the app will memorize the last position of TiBe via the smartphone GPS.
  6. How long does the battery last ? TiBe uses a standard battery type CR2032. You can always refer to the battery state in your app parameters.

    The battery lifespan depends on the way you use TiBE :

    - As a key fob - to find your objects and pilot your IoT : 10 months lifespan

    - As a fixed button : 20 months lifespan

  7. How do I change the battery ? Remove the ring of tie of TiBe, Open the back lid of TiBe, be careful not to cut 2 wires, Remove the battery, Replace the battery with the side "+" visible, upward, Close the lid.

If you have paiement issues please go to :  https://www.paypal.com/fr/webapps/mpp/security/...

or contact the Indiegogo support team at : support@indiegogo.com

If you have another question, do not hesitate to contact us on : contact@ticatag.com

 

 

Voici TiBe Connect

 

 

TiBe Connect est un bouton connecté qui simplifiera votre vie de tous les jours :

Retrouver vos clés, votre smartphone, votre sac, prendre un selfie, jouer votre playlist préférée, allumer vos lumières, .... et vous pouvez faire bien plus encore avec TiBe Connect !

Un bouton, des tonnes de possibilités

Grâce à notre application vous pourrez facilement retrouver vos affaires, téléchargez l'application mobile TiBe et TiBe deviendra très intelligent !

 

Vous pouvez configurer TiBe selon l'objet auquel vous l'attachez. 

Pour retrouver vos affaires, faites le simplement sonner et s'éclairer grâce à votre smartphone. La sonnerie de TiBe Connect est de 85db, aussi fort qu'un aspirateur, donc même enfoui sous une pile d'oreillers vous l'entendrez !

Si vous êtes trop éloigné de TiBe, votre smartphone vous indiquera la dernière position connue de TiBe sur une carte. Et, si ce n'est pas suffisant pour retrouver vos affaires, vous pouvez demander de l'aide à la communauté TiBe en déclarant votre objet perdu : cela activera la recherche à travers les autres utilisateurs de l'application TiBe.

 

Vous pouvez aussi collez TiBe sur votre tableau de bord, et vous pourrez facilement retrouver votre voiture si vous ne vous souvenez pas où vous l'avez garée.

TiBe, c'est aussi un bouton connecté ... Grâce à TiBe vous pourrez vous connecter à vos appareils connectés et les contrôler... le bouton TiBe est très puissant ! 

 

et bien d'autres possibilités ...

Grâce à la plateforme IFTTT, vous pourrez automatiser différentes tâches de votre quotidien... IFTTT vous permet de créer une infinité de scénarios. L'application TiBe aura la chance d'être la 1ère directement intégré avec IFTTT, vous permettant une configuration de TiBe bien plus facile.

 

 

Plus sur TiBe Connect ...

 

Mode de connexion

Après avoir téléchargé l'application TiBe sur votre smartphone, assurez vous d'avoir une bonne connexion Wifi ou 3G, tenez TiBe près de votre smartphone et appuyez sur TiBe pendant 4 secondes, l'application se connecte automatiquement.

 

*l'application existe en français

 

Ensuite, suivez les instructions sur l'écran pour configurer votre bouton.

Vous pouvez connecter jusqu'à 5 TiBe sur un seul téléphone. Et un TiBe peut être configuré pour plusieurs actions : si vous faites un clic simple, un double clic, une longue pression ...

Vous pouvez nommer, ajouter des commentaires, et une photo pour identifier chaque objets que vous configurer avec TiBe. Donnez des étiquettes tels que : mes clés, mon sac, ma voiture ...

 

Compatibilité

TiBe Connect utilise la dernière technologie Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE 4.0), nous sommes les seuls sur le marché à utiliser le Bluetooth iBeacon.

TiBe fonctionne avec les smartphones, ainsi que les tablettes Apple ou Android :

• Apple devices: IOS8 & iPhone 4S, 5, 5C, 5S et supérieur.

• Android devices: Android 4.3 and 4.0 équipé du Bluetooth

 

Un design français

TiBe Connect a été designé par une agence française : Exelium. Il est disponible uniquement en blanc avec sa cible colorée.

 

 

Spécifications

 

Pile : CR2032 - une pile standard, que vous trouverez partout pour la remplacer.

La durée de vie de la pile dépend de la manière dont vous utilisez TiBe : 

- Pour retrouvez vos affaires et contrôler vos objets connectés : 10 mois

- Comme un bouton fixe (comme pour retrouver sa voiture par exemple) : 20 mois

Le volume de TiBe : jusqu'à 85db

 

Diamètre = 40.25 x 32.23 x 11.51 mm (0.158 x 0,126 x 0.045 in)

Poids = 10 gr (0.35 oz)

Matériaux : Polycarbonate

Température: -10 ° C to +50 ° C (14 °F to 122 °F)

Fourni avec un mousqueton en acier inoxydable.

 

 

 

Contreparties

Pourquoi nous avons besoin de vous ?

 

Après deux campagnes de crowdfunding réussies en France, et après un grand nombre de demandes, Ticatag veut exporter le design français aux États-Unis grâce à Indiegogo.

Nous vous présentons donc la nouvelle version de TiBe, qui a pris en compte toutes les remarques de nos utilisateurs, et transforme cet accessoire en un objet connecté bien plus puissant !

TiBe Connect retrouvera vos affaires et contrôlera vos objets connectés en un clic !

Planning

 

L'équipe TiBe Connect

 

TICATAG a été fondée en 2013 pour développer des solutions IoT basées sur un projet interne d'Alcatel-Lucent, en particulier dans le domaine des solutions de géolocalisation - Bluetooth bassr consommation & IBeacon. Durant les 3 dernières années TICATAG a développé plusieurs produits et services pour les particuliers et les professionnels :

  • Tibe, un porte-clés intelligent pour trouver vos clés, sacs, un smartphone ...
  • TiFiz, le 1er tracker GPS très faible consommation, sans carte SIM, le suivi des objets de valeur ou de personnes pour les loisirs et la sécurité
  • TiBeaconHD, déclenchant  l'envoi de la bonne information sur le smartphone, par exemple pour une visite dans un musée
  • iBeacons , déclenchant l'envoi d'une information ciblée vers tous les appareils mobiles et écransà proximité, pour exemple pour les boutiques ou les lieux d'exposition

 

Partenaires

 

FAQ

  1. Que se passe-t-il lorsqu'un ami passe à côté de mon TiBe ? Si j'ai déclaré mon TiBe comme perdu, je reçois une notification et la position de mon TiBe est mise à jour. Je n'ai plus qu'à aller le chercher.

  2. Est-ce que tout le monde peut suivre mon TiBe ? Non, personne d'autre que vous ne verra votre TiBe.

  3. Combien d'objets puis-je surveiller avec l'application TiBe ? Nous recommandons de ne pas dépasser les 5 TiBe.

  4. Comment accéder à la localisation du TiBe ? Vous pouvez visionner la localisation de 2 façons : Via l'application Android ou iOS, Via notre site web mytibe.com en vous connectant sur votre compte

  5. Jusqu'à quelle distance mon TiBe pourra localiser ? Vous avez une distance de 10 à 20 mètres autour de vous  environ pour détecter votre TiBe. Si vous passez au-delà, l'application mémorisera la position du TiBe via le GPS de votre smartphone.

  6. Comment changer la pile de votre TiBe ? Pour remplacer la pile, procédez comme suit : Enlever l'anneau d'attache du TiBe pour libérer le trou, Ouvrir le couvercle arrière du TiBe en prenant garde de ne pas couper les 2 fils, Enlever la pile, Remplacer la pile avec le côté "+" visible, vers le haut, Fermer le couvercle.​

Si vous avez des problèmes de paiement visiter la page :   https://www.paypal.com/fr/webapps/mpp/security/...

ou contactez le support Indiegogo : support@indiegogo.com

Si vous avez d'autres questions n'hésitez pas à nous écrire à : contact@ticatag.com
story_txt:
TiBe Connect Indiegogo campaign is Arrow Sponsored ! Allez plus bas pour la version française. Meet TiBe Connect TiBe Connect is a smart button to simplify your daily life :Finding your lost keys, smartphones, bags, or taking a selfie, playing your favorite playlist, switching your lights on, .... and you can do so much more with TiBe Connect !One button for everything Thanks to our app you will be able to easily find your lost stuff, download the TiBe mobile App’ and make your TiBe very Smart ! You can customize each TiBe according to the things that you tie it to. To find your lost stuff, simply make it ring and light up through your smartphone. The ringing of TiBe Connect is 85db, being as loud as a vacuum cleaner, so even if it is lost under a pile of pillow you will hear it !If you are too far from your TiBe, your smartphone will display its last known position on a map. And, if it is not enough you can ask the TiBe community some help, by declaring your object lost : it will activate a search through other TiBe app owners.Stick TiBe on your dashboard, you will be able to find your car if you don't remember where your parked it !TiBe is also a smart button remote... Thanks to TiBe you will be able to connect with your IoT devices and to control it ... the TiBe button is powerful ! and so many other possibilities ... Thanks to the IFTTT platform, automate various everyday life tasks ... IFTTT enables you to create an infinity of scenarios. The TiBe app will have the luck to be the 1st app integrated by IFTTT, enabling the configuration of your TiBe to be much more easier.  More about TiBe Connect ... Connexion ModeAfter downloading the TiBe application on your smartphone, make sure you have a good WIFI or 3G network, hold TiBe near your phone and press the top of the TiBe for 4 seconds, the application automatically connects,  Next, follow the instructions on the screen to set up your device.You can connect up to 5 TiBe with a single smartphone. And one TiBe can operate multiple actions whether you make a simple click, double click, long pressed ...You can name, add comments and add picture to identify the object as you wish.Give labels to TiBe, such as: My TiBe keys, My TiBe bag, Tom’s Blanket... etc. CompatibilityTiBe Connect uses the latest Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE 4.0) Technology, we are the only one on the market to use Bluetooth iBeacon.It runs with smartphones and Apple or Android tablets :• Apple devices: IOS8 & iPhone 4S, 5, 5C, 5S and above.• Android devices: Android 4.3 and 4.0 Bluetooth enabled device A French Design TiBe Connect was designed by the French agency : Exelium.It is only available in White with the Ticatag’s colorful target.  Specifications Battery : CR2032 - which is a standard battery type, you will be able to find it everywhere to replace it.The battery lifespan depends on the way you use TiBE :- As a key fob - to find your objects and pilot your IoT : 10 months lifespan- As a fixed button : 20 months lifespanDevice Ringer Volume: up to 85db and LEDs Diameter = 40.25 x 32.23 x 11.51 mm (0.158 x 0,126 x 0.045 in)Weight = 10 gr (0.35 oz)Material: PolycarbonateTemperature: -10 ° C to +50 ° C (14 °F to 122 °F)Supplied with stainless steel carabiner clip.   PerksWhy we need you ? After two successful crowdfunding campaigns in France, and after a large number of demands, Ticatag wants to export the French design in the US thanks to Indiegogo.So, here is a new TiBe version, which takes into account our users' observations, and transforms this accessories into a much more powerful IoT device !TiBe Connect 2in1 will find your stuff thanks to its powerful ringing and will drive your IoT devices in a click !Timeline  Behind TiBe Connect  TICATAG was founded in 2013 to develop IoT solutions based on an internal project of Alcatel-Lucent, especially in the field of Location Based Solutions – Bluetooth Low Energy & iBeacon.For the past 3 years TICATAG has developed several products and services for B2C and B2B :
TiBe, a smart Key fob to find your keys, bags, smartphone …
TiFiz, the 1st GPS tracker very low consumption, without SIM card, tracking valuables or people for leisure & safety
TiBeaconHD, triggering the right information to the smartphone, i.e. digital tour in a museum
iBeacons, triggering targeted information to any proximity connected display, i.e. shops or exhibition places
 Partners FAQ

What happens when a friend passes next to my TiBe ? If I declared my TiBe lost, I'll receive a notification and my TiBe's position will be updated.

Can everybody follow my TiBe ? No, nobody else can see your TiBe on their app.

How many objects can I control from my TiBe app ? We recommend not to exceed 5 TiBe.

How do I get to the TiBe localization ? You can see your TiBe localization in 2 ways : via the iOS or Android app or via our website by logging in.

To what distance my TiBe can be located ? You have a 10/20 meters distance around you to detect TiBe. Beyond this distance, the app will memorize the last position of TiBe via the smartphone GPS.

How long does the battery last ? TiBe uses a standard battery type CR2032. You can always refer to the battery state in your app parameters.The battery lifespan depends on the way you use TiBE :
- As a key fob - to find your objects and pilot your IoT : 10 months lifespan
- As a fixed button : 20 months lifespan

How do I change the battery ? Remove the ring of tie of TiBe, Open the back lid of TiBe, be careful not to cut 2 wires, Remove the battery, Replace the battery with the side "+" visible, upward, Close the lid.
If you have paiement issues please go to :  https://www.paypal.com/fr/webapps/mpp/security/...or contact the Indiegogo support team at : support@indiegogo.comIf you have another question, do not hesitate to contact us on : contact@ticatag.com  Voici TiBe Connect  TiBe Connect est un bouton connecté qui simplifiera votre vie de tous les jours :Retrouver vos clés, votre smartphone, votre sac, prendre un selfie, jouer votre playlist préférée, allumer vos lumières, .... et vous pouvez faire bien plus encore avec TiBe Connect !Un bouton, des tonnes de possibilitésGrâce à notre application vous pourrez facilement retrouver vos affaires, téléchargez l'application mobile TiBe et TiBe deviendra très intelligent ! Vous pouvez configurer TiBe selon l'objet auquel vous l'attachez. Pour retrouver vos affaires, faites le simplement sonner et s'éclairer grâce à votre smartphone. La sonnerie de TiBe Connect est de 85db, aussi fort qu'un aspirateur, donc même enfoui sous une pile d'oreillers vous l'entendrez !Si vous êtes trop éloigné de TiBe, votre smartphone vous indiquera la dernière position connue de TiBe sur une carte. Et, si ce n'est pas suffisant pour retrouver vos affaires, vous pouvez demander de l'aide à la communauté TiBe en déclarant votre objet perdu : cela activera la recherche à travers les autres utilisateurs de l'application TiBe. Vous pouvez aussi collez TiBe sur votre tableau de bord, et vous pourrez facilement retrouver votre voiture si vous ne vous souvenez pas où vous l'avez garée.TiBe, c'est aussi un bouton connecté ... Grâce à TiBe vous pourrez vous connecter à vos appareils connectés et les contrôler... le bouton TiBe est très puissant !  et bien d'autres possibilités ...Grâce à la plateforme IFTTT, vous pourrez automatiser différentes tâches de votre quotidien... IFTTT vous permet de créer une infinité de scénarios. L'application TiBe aura la chance d'être la 1ère directement intégré avec IFTTT, vous permettant une configuration de TiBe bien plus facile.  Plus sur TiBe Connect ... Mode de connexionAprès avoir téléchargé l'application TiBe sur votre smartphone, assurez vous d'avoir une bonne connexion Wifi ou 3G, tenez TiBe près de votre smartphone et appuyez sur TiBe pendant 4 secondes, l'application se connecte automatiquement. *l'application existe en français Ensuite, suivez les instructions sur l'écran pour configurer votre bouton.Vous pouvez connecter jusqu'à 5 TiBe sur un seul téléphone. Et un TiBe peut être configuré pour plusieurs actions : si vous faites un clic simple, un double clic, une longue pression ...Vous pouvez nommer, ajouter des commentaires, et une photo pour identifier chaque objets que vous configurer avec TiBe. Donnez des étiquettes tels que : mes clés, mon sac, ma voiture ... CompatibilitéTiBe Connect utilise la dernière technologie Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE 4.0), nous sommes les seuls sur le marché à utiliser le Bluetooth iBeacon.TiBe fonctionne avec les smartphones, ainsi que les tablettes Apple ou Android :• Apple devices: IOS8 & iPhone 4S, 5, 5C, 5S et supérieur.• Android devices: Android 4.3 and 4.0 équipé du Bluetooth Un design françaisTiBe Connect a été designé par une agence française : Exelium. Il est disponible uniquement en blanc avec sa cible colorée.  Spécifications Pile : CR2032 - une pile standard, que vous trouverez partout pour la remplacer.La durée de vie de la pile dépend de la manière dont vous utilisez TiBe : - Pour retrouvez vos affaires et contrôler vos objets connectés : 10 mois- Comme un bouton fixe (comme pour retrouver sa voiture par exemple) : 20 moisLe volume de TiBe : jusqu'à 85db Diamètre = 40.25 x 32.23 x 11.51 mm (0.158 x 0,126 x 0.045 in)Poids = 10 gr (0.35 oz)Matériaux : PolycarbonateTempérature: -10 ° C to +50 ° C (14 °F to 122 °F)Fourni avec un mousqueton en acier inoxydable.   ContrepartiesPourquoi nous avons besoin de vous ? Après deux campagnes de crowdfunding réussies en France, et après un grand nombre de demandes, Ticatag veut exporter le design français aux États-Unis grâce à Indiegogo.Nous vous présentons donc la nouvelle version de TiBe, qui a pris en compte toutes les remarques de nos utilisateurs, et transforme cet accessoire en un objet connecté bien plus puissant !TiBe Connect retrouvera vos affaires et contrôlera vos objets connectés en un clic !Planning L'équipe TiBe Connect TICATAG a été fondée en 2013 pour développer des solutions IoT basées sur un projet interne d'Alcatel-Lucent, en particulier dans le domaine des solutions de géolocalisation - Bluetooth bassr consommation & IBeacon. Durant les 3 dernières années TICATAG a développé plusieurs produits et services pour les particuliers et les professionnels :
Tibe, un porte-clés intelligent pour trouver vos clés, sacs, un smartphone ...
TiFiz, le 1er tracker GPS très faible consommation, sans carte SIM, le suivi des objets de valeur ou de personnes pour les loisirs et la sécurité
TiBeaconHD, déclenchant  l'envoi de la bonne information sur le smartphone, par exemple pour une visite dans un musée
iBeacons , déclenchant l'envoi d'une information ciblée vers tous les appareils mobiles et écransà proximité, pour exemple pour les boutiques ou les lieux d'exposition
 Partenaires FAQ

Que se passe-t-il lorsqu'un ami passe à côté de mon TiBe ? Si j'ai déclaré mon TiBe comme perdu, je reçois une notification et la position de mon TiBe est mise à jour. Je n'ai plus qu'à aller le chercher.
Est-ce que tout le monde peut suivre mon TiBe ? Non, personne d'autre que vous ne verra votre TiBe.
Combien d'objets puis-je surveiller avec l'application TiBe ? Nous recommandons de ne pas dépasser les 5 TiBe.
Comment accéder à la localisation du TiBe ? Vous pouvez visionner la localisation de 2 façons : Via l'application Android ou iOS, Via notre site web mytibe.com en vous connectant sur votre compte
Jusqu'à quelle distance mon TiBe pourra localiser ? Vous avez une distance de 10 à 20 mètres autour de vous  environ pour détecter votre TiBe. Si vous passez au-delà, l'application mémorisera la position du TiBe via le GPS de votre smartphone.
Comment changer la pile de votre TiBe ? Pour remplacer la pile, procédez comme suit : Enlever l'anneau d'attache du TiBe pour libérer le trou, Ouvrir le couvercle arrière du TiBe en prenant garde de ne pas couper les 2 fils, Enlever la pile, Remplacer la pile avec le côté "+" visible, vers le haut, Fermer le couvercle.​

story:
Short Summary

The idea of The Simple Lock came from my uncle and dad, who both raised all girls.  With all of us growing up and moving out into this scary world, they came up with this great idea.  The simplicity of this lock is what makes it so easy to install.  All you need is a Phillips Screwdriver, and a proper drill bit.  

What We Need

The funds raised will be going to manufacturing and marketing.  

The Impact

Every 13 seconds a break-in occurs in the United States.  I believe that this lock will save many lives, and help people sleep better at night.  It can be installed in: front doors, bedroom doors, dorm rooms, campus housing, and sliding doors.  Good for residential or commercial use. 

Facts:

- Place The Simple Lock directly under the doorknob, because the frame is the strongest part of the door

- No springs or clips

- The floor does not move, which makes the lock extremely durable

- Anyone can install it


Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge I am facing right now is getting the word out about this product.  I already plan to use social media and other free resources to advertise, but I would also like to create commercials and pamphlets to distribute.

Other Ways You Can Help

I would love for anyone who understands and likes this idea to please share this on Facebook and spread the word!  Any and all help is appreciated.

story:
Short Summary

Gardens In Friendship Together, builds community gardens and school gardens, as well as individual/family gardens throughout the San Francisco Bay Area. These projects are to support learning about the Earth, feeding those who are in need of fresh food, and to help everyone become more environmentally wise.

Natural Teaching Curriculum will educate all ages about how to grow a garden and understand the effects we have on the Earth and all living beings that are an integral part of the Earth.  This curriculum is expected to be a part of the contract when supporting Requests for Proposals (RFP) from the community garens, schools, child care centers as well as families and individuals. Teachers, adults and children will be taught all about what to expect and how to use science, math, language, and social skills, while building and growing their gardens. This education will guide the future of the gardens and the people involved for generations.

What We Need & What You Get

We need $100,000 to build community gardens, school gardens and child care center gardens and to develop the Natural Teaching Curriculum.  The funding will go toward the materials, transportation of materials, and administration of the requests for funding for each garden.  The funding will also go toward hiring the appropriate people to write the curriculum and to publish the curriculum as it is completed.

At this time, we are asking for funding to begin our outreach to communities and organizations to start gardens at schools, community gardens, childcare centers, etc.  We need your help to support many to be able to feed themselves and learn how to take good care of the Earth so the Earth will take good care of them.  Thank you for your generosity and support for such a worthy cause.

if we don't reach our goal, we will place the funds that we do receive into an account and continue to write grants, and do fundraising until we do have our goal.

The Impact

GIFT just finishing up a $6,000 Garden Grant provided by Lowe’s Stores in the South Bay. It was written for Martinson Child Development Center, a non-profit child development center, established in the mid 1960’s for children of low income. This grant built a green house, hydroponics, raised beds, planters, and provided tools, seeds, and plants along with two sheds.

The parents, teachers and children along with volunteers from Lowe’s came, and all the gardens were built and the sheds were put together. This is one of many projects we have worked on. Five years ago we joined in to build Charles Street Community Garden in Sunnyvale. As one of the Leaders in the garden we participated in the Garden Sales twice a year to raise more funds to support the garden for the last five years. We have provided outreach into the community and helped to start two school gardens in Sunnyvale.

We have taken groups of teachers to the Water Shed Project for “Kids In Gardens” workshops so that the teachers will gain information and hands-on experience to develop their “garden curriculum” with their new gardens. We brought in 15 foot-long Sunflower plants to show children from Kindergarten through 3rd grade all the different parts of a plant. They opened the plant up and saw how it works inside and they ate the seeds. They touched the roots and followed the drinking system of the plant to see how it grows it’s leaves, petals, and seeds.

Our firm belief is that if a person understands the world around them, it will instill respect and help us to find more organic ways to work with the plants we eat and adore. It will also help us to find safer ways to keep us and plants safe from insects and poisonous bacteria and viruses.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you think we have a good idea, and think there are others who might also like to help, get the word out and give a shout for GIFT! Use Facebook, Twitter, LInkedIn and any social media you use regularly and ask others to contribute to this very worthy cause to help hundreds of children and their families and friends in the community!

Thank you for your help and considering us for your charitable contribution.

Please use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
What Happend... 

I heard the phone ring at 11:17 at night and thought who's calling me this late? When I saw the phone I saw it was my mom and answered... 

She started talking quickly and mentioned a fire and everything burning up... I couldn't quite make out what she said so I said 'wait what happend?' she said it a second time.

Your brothers apartment is on fire and everything just burned up in it... He doesn't have nothing, no money, cards, ID, car keys, nothing.

My mom was visiting this side of the state to see clients, she's a holistic health specialist and was seeing clients.  She lost some of her equipment as well as all the money that she had worked for over the past several days (a few thousand dollars of equipment and money she lost) 

My brother and his roommate Jr lost everything.

Their clothes, computers, ID, money, furniture, TV and pictures that they will never get back.

For me being close to each of them this was hard to hear because my mom is a cancer survivor and now her work helps others to live healthier lives to hopefully prevent getting cancer, so for her to lose part of her equipment and the money she worked for was tough... 

To hear that my brother lost everything is tough, I have no idea what I would do if I were in that situation... having to work as well as live but having to start over again from scratch.

And his roommate Jr... a great guy who helps me out with graphic design when I need it was actually helping me out today with a new book cover... the day of the fire.

So, being that my brother and mom lost a lot and that a good friend lost a lot too I wanted to create this campaign to raise money to help them get some basic needs met like clothes, food, and the basics.

I realize that they will eventually get insurance but with the paperwork and wait I am not sure what they will do in the meantime so I figure this is the least I could do.

Give 5 or 10 bucks and it will go a long way.  It would really mean a lot to me and to them.

This year has been an especially tough year for my mom in her life personally so hearing this was tough because I know for her doing this work within the health space is one thing that she loves and this just cuts off her ability to work until she can get the equipment she lost again. 

I hope that you will find a place in your heart to give, it will come back to you 10-fold... it's the way the universe works. 

What They Need

* I am looking to raise $10,000.  I want to be able to give my brother and his roommate (my friend Jr) 4k each to get back on their feet and be able to give my mom 2k to get the equipment she lost so she can still see clients and not have to wait it out... She lost her ID and everything in the fire so it could literally be a month till she get's her id and credit cards again and then time to order the new equipment after that.

Please Donate, would really mean a lot...

If you cannot donate please share it on facebook, twitter, linkedin, google plus, pinterest, your blog etc... anywhere. 

Thanks for your time and consideration,

 

David King 

I was just texting my brother and he was telling me how he noticed the fire and started knocking on doors and got his neighbors out of the building... Could have saved someone's life too.

P.S. This fire happend because someone who was TOLD not to use their fireplace because it needed to be cleaned used it and then the fire started... Ladies and gentlemen, follow basic instructions if someone who is smarter than you about something gives them to you... a bunch of people (2 of my family members) could have burned to death today because of one individuals choice to ignore something very basic.... Be smart, stay safe and make decisions that don't put others in harms way.

UPDATE: 

I (being new to indiegogo) made this campaign only run 24 hours on accident.  I'm sure they could use more help so if you would like to help personally please don't hesitate to facebook me below personally and I will put you in touch with them.  Thank you so much for all of your support, it's been a blessing and they are very grateful.

And his roommate Jr... a great guy who helps me out with graphic design when I need it was actually helping me out today with a new book cover... the day of the fire.
So, being that my brother and mom lost a lot and that a good friend lost a lot too I wanted to create this campaign to raise money to help them get some basic needs met like clothes, food, and the basics.
I realize that they will eventually get insurance but with the paperwork and wait I am not sure what they will do in the meantime so I figure this is the least I could do.
Give 5 or 10 bucks and it will go a long way.  It would really mean a lot to me and to them.
This year has been an especially tough year for my mom in her life personally so hearing this was tough because I know for her doing this work within the health space is one thing that she loves and this just cuts off her ability to work until she can get the equipment she lost again. 
I hope that you will find a place in your heart to give, it will come back to you 10-fold... it's the way the universe works. 


What They Need
* I am looking to raise $10,000.  I want to be able to give my brother and his roommate (my friend Jr) 4k each to get back on their feet and be able to give my mom 2k to get the equipment she lost so she can still see clients and not have to wait it out... She lost her ID and everything in the fire so it could literally be a month till she get's her id and credit cards again and then time to order the new equipment after that.
Please Donate, would really mean a lot...
If you cannot donate please share it on facebook, twitter, linkedin, google plus, pinterest, your blog etc... anywhere. 
Thanks for your time and consideration,
 
David King 
I was just texting my brother and he was telling me how he noticed the fire and started knocking on doors and got his neighbors out of the building... Could have saved someone's life too.
P.S. This fire happend because someone who was TOLD not to use their fireplace because it needed to be cleaned used it and then the fire started... Ladies and gentlemen, follow basic instructions if someone who is smarter than you about something gives them to you... a bunch of people (2 of my family members) could have burned to death today because of one individuals choice to ignore something very basic.... Be smart, stay safe and make decisions that don't put others in harms way.
UPDATE: 
I (being new to indiegogo) made this campaign only run 24 hours on accident.  I'm sure they could use more help so if you would like to help personally please don't hesitate to facebook me below personally and I will put you in touch with them.  Thank you so much for all of your support, it's been a blessing and they are very grateful.

story:
Page Anchor is a premium-grade, anchor bookmark that prevents your book from closing. An elegant tool to transform the way you read.

By removing the need to push books open with your thumb, Page Anchor elevates the experience of using everything from hardcover and paperback books to journals and cookbooks.

Page Anchor works with any book size, without damaging your book's spine.

 

As technology advances, we spend more and more time feeling stressed from contant push notifications, short-form information and emails. 

This is why we believe it to be more important than ever to incorporate reading into our daily routines.

Page Anchor is our way of incentivizing the world to read more. Our mission is to make reading more relaxed and enjoyable through elegant and functional design.

 

Page Anchor has helped over 804+ book enthusiasts, modern professionals, students, and cookbook-users transform their reading experiences.

 

We spent almost two years designing Page Anchor from the bottom up, obsessed with continuously iterating to make sure that the products could uphold our strict standards.

The final version features a seamless body crafted in the finest 316L stainless steel. Each Page Anchor weighs in at a mere 23 grams to avoid being a burden to carry arround.

We finish every anchor with a layer of precious metals and a rigorous hand-polish, resulting in its timeless and elegant appearance.

 

 

We launched our first versions of Page Anchor last year and have over 804 users. See what they have to say!

 

Being able to finally release our full collection after two years of iterations feels nothing less than amazing.

Here's a quick summary of what has happened since our earliest days of development:

September 2016

We created the first 3D mockup of Page Anchor, giving a real sense of what we were aiming to create.

May 2017

We ship the first version of the Signature Gold Page Anchor to our earliest customers.

June 2017

Our second model, the Winter Platinum Page Anchor, is introduced to the world. This silvery-white Page Anchor was inspired by Sweden's cold North.

April 2018

We recently finished the final prototypes of our two brand new models—the Rose Gold and Obsidian Black. They will be available alongside the new and improved versions of the Signature Gold and Winter Platinum models. 

10 of our early supporters have already received a finished prototype of the new models. Here's what they have said about them:

 

Page Anchor has shipped more than 1000 products to over 30 countries around the world, and this is just the beginning.

You can reach our team at help@page-anchor.com - we read and reply to all your emails.

Special thanks

We would love to thank our friends and family, and of course all customers of our previous versions of Page Anchor for believing in us. This wouldn't be possible without your support!

 

Want to write about Page Anchor and how we're changing how people read? Click the button below to send us an email and request access to our press kit.

Ps. You can always reach us at help@page-anchor.com - we read and reply to all emails!

 

Feel free to share this project with your friends and family. It would mean the world to us!

Or share this link: https://igg.me/at/pageanchor

This campaign is promoted by Backercamp. Since 2012, Backercamp has helped over 5,000 creators make their projects a reality.

Risks and challenges

Getting Page Anchor up and running has been a long process. But thanks to 11 months of trial and error, we are now more ready than ever to move forward with this campaign.

Our manufacturing process is well polished and we are well aware of the setbacks that can arise. 

We have pushed hard to ship as early as possible, but it is important to know that we will always prioritize quality over schedule in order to provide the best possible experience for you as a customer.

story:
BloomingTables is an elegant functional living table that seamlessly brings the beauty of the outdoors - indoors. 

Planters haven’t changed in centuries, leaving us with a handful of typical options to house our plants.   

BloomingTables is the most beautiful and easy way to seamlessly integrate plants into our lives - all while saving space. 

How it works: 

This acrylic tub keeps everything watertight, protecting both your BloomingTable, and your floors from water. 

Fill your BloomingTable with a layer of gravel and activated charcoal to absorb water and protect against over watering. 

Then simply create your own beautiful arrangement. 

When it’s time to water, simply lift the glass off our suction cups, water, and replace. 

Place your BloomingTable under a windowsill.

Or place a lamp on or near the table with incandescent light-bulbs to supplement sunlight.

Benefits:

How its Made: 

  • 30 inches tall
  • 33 inches long
  • 10.5 inches wide 

  • 6mm Tempered Glass
  • UV resistant suction cups 
  • Waterproofing Acrylic Tub
  • Painted Maple Veneer box
  • Painted Steal Hairpin Legs 

About Us:

We are so excited to share our love of plants with others through BloomingTables. While this is our first Kickstarter campaign, we have an amazing team behind us to ensure the success of this campaign from conception to fulfillment. We are proud to have partnered with an industry leader, Aqua Design Innovations (ADI), who have launched over 8 successful Kickstarters! ADI shares our values of quality and innovation, and this collaboration has resulted in a promising campaign that seeks to bring joy and beauty to countless homes and offices. 

As plant lovers, it wasn’t long before we were running out of places to keep our plants. We wanted to find a way to bring more plants into our lives in a new and innovative way. There are an abundance of stunning species of plants, and countless ways to create arrangements. However, there are limited options for the housing of indoor plants. BloomingTables was born out of the idea that beautiful plants deserve beautiful homes. We have created a product that has brought character and joy into our home, and we want to share this experience with others. 

BloomingTables was not created overnight. We have gone through 3 rounds of prototyping, dozens of tweaks, and assured that we selected a trusted manufacturer that would bring the highest level of quality. We are excited to finally be able to bring this product to you. Thank you for your support in our mission to beautify homes and offices everywhere – one BloomingTable at a time. 

Risks and challenges:

Once our campaign is completed and funded, we are ready to go place our order with our manufacturer. We have selected a reputable manufacturer that is standing-by for our completed campaign. Although we are confident in our manufacturing partner, with any product, delays can happen. We are committed to maintaining full transparency with members of the BloomingTable community, and we will inform our backers immediately if any delays with delivery arise.

story: A Big Beautiful Family in Central Texas lost everything, when a suspected electrical fire engulfed the home in flames. The Gossetts, who have eleven amazing children between the ages of sixteen and six, were all able to escape the burning home safely. Mr Jamian and Crystal Gossett were “renting to own” the home, and sadly had no home owners insurance. They not only lost all of their possessions, the dream of one day owning a home was reduced to ash as well.. The needs for this family, for obvious reasons are tremendous! Immediate needs include food, shelter and clothing! Jamion (16), Shania (16), Wesley (15), Antwan (14), Kamron (13), Devin (8), Jordon (8), Jazzria (8), Juan (7), Christopher (7), and our sons first grade classmate Jaunita (6) all need shoes, clothing, school supplies, toys etc.! Any contribution you can afford is welcomed and greatly appreciated. If you do not have the means to make a contribution, you may still help by posting this fundraiser to your Facebook page, and by sharing it with anyone you know! Please help the Gossetts' put their lives back together, by making a contribution towards necessities for their eleven children and a new home! God Bless you and Thank You for taking the time to hear their story, and for passing it on. This is how we, as a Community, help and take care of one another. Spread the Love, and God Speed to the Gossett Family.

God Bless you and Thank You for taking the time to hear their story, and for passing it on. This is how we, as a Community, help and take care of one another. Spread the Love, and God Speed to the Gossett Family.

story:
The WiFi ResetPlug Story

We introduced the ResetPlug in Nov of 2015, and it quickly grew. It solves a very simple and common problem, to reset your WiFi if it stops working. It is not meant to keep you trapped in crappy WiFi hell; If your router or modem needs to be constantly reset, then get a new one. But this device is a great insurance policy for people that do not trust their router and modem 100%. Especially if you have devices that you depend on such as cameras, thermostats, smoke alarms, etc.

We just released our web app which is an add-on for $2 per month or $20 per year. This stores the network information and does troubleshooting to figure out why the WiFi stopped working. It will tell you if it was the router, the modem, the WiFi radio, or the Internet service provider. It can also send email alerts if things are offline and when they are fixed. And you can send a remote reset to the device from anywhere.

We are now getting ready to make our 2nd generation ResetPlug. It has a new chipset that includes 5GHz, better antenna design for better diagnostics, and it will be available in plug types for almost all of the world.

What We Need & What You Get

We are raising money with preorders to make sure we can meet the minimum order requirements of our manufacturing facility. We have already designed our custom board that will go inside the product. And the housing is a standard design already proven in several other smart plugs. We are just adding our branding and then doing all of the testing necessary for a product like this. FCC/CE, RoHS, and ETL (similar to UL).

For this we are offering the plug at a discount. As well as a 1 year subscription to our web app. Both for $50.

 

Risks & Challenges

This product will use the same firmware (software) as our existing product. So it has already been proven by over 10,000 users. It will also work with our existing web app.

Since we are making 4 different models for the international market, we want to make sure that we have orders of at least 300 units in each of the 4 model types. So if you can share with others in your area it can really help us hit the goal to produce them for your country.

Other Ways You Can Help

Please share this on social media and with anyone you think might benefit. Some people manage many Internet connections for a living in different locations, so sometimes it can be hard to get there to troubleshoot or reset equipment. If you know people that might benefit from this product then please share it with them and make their life easier.

Web App Images:

Dashboard:

 

Events page (WiFi outage):

 

Control page:

 

 

The original ResetPlug was featured by:

Resetplug.com

story:
People have been doing just fine with standard hair dryers for decades. Conventional hair dryers are heavy and hard to control.The over heated air flow could really damage your hair. Due to the size, it is a real trouble to carry a big hair dyer when traveling, 

Sylph is different. It is cellphone-size to put in your handbag, although it deliver a powerful wind to dry your hair effortlessly. With the intelligent heat control technology, Sylph can prevent extreme heat damage to protect your hair’s natural shine. Sylph belongs to the future of hair dryer.

  • SMALL BUT POWERFUL

Sylph can be easily hold in your hand  with only 150g weight, so you will not feel tired to use it for a longer time. Thanks to its compact body, you can carry it around all day in your handbag. With Sylph, You won't worry about not having a hair dryer in the hotel any more.

 

 

 

How about Sylph's  air flow in such a mini size? Sylph is equivalent to a 1400-watt professional hair dryer. Comparing to a traditional blow dryer, it saves time to dry your hair.

 

 

Sylph has 3 main working modes: Hot wind mode; Smart wind mode; Cold wind mode.

  • Prevent extreme heating damage with constant air temperature in Hot Wind Mode

Without temperature control, your hair can end up dried out, frizzy, or with split ends by the heat. Sylph has intelligent heat control technology to prevent extreme heating damage for the natural shine of your hair. Measuring the temperature 50 times per second, it precisely controls the compact heating element to reach extreme temperature. 

 

  • Naturally fast-dry your hair without hair damage by automatic temperature control in Smart Wind Mode

The smart mode of Sylph can adjust temperature according to its algorithm and sensor data. Fast dry your hair in a natural way with Sylph now.

  • Ionic Sylph

Sylph is also an Ionic blow dryer, which neutralizes the hair static, leaving hair shiny and frizz-free.

 

  • To control wind type: Replaceable magnetic nozzles are suitable for different hairstyles.

 

  • ​To control wind speed: Infinitely variable air speed control allows you free to adjust the air flow precisely.

 

  • Unique Stylish Magnetic Hanger:

Maybe you have no idea where to place your hair dryer in the bathroom. Sylph must be the only hair dryer in the world to be hanging on the wall in a magnetic way.

 

  • Self-cleaning Mode

After a long period use of hair dryer, dust and other debris can be drawn in and affect the performance of your unit. Sylph has self-cleaning mode to blow them out from air outlet automatically.

​

WizEvo is a start-up company, we are from DJI, Lenovo, Mindray, TCL and other enterprises. In order to create products which can really change your daily life, we are together in WizEvo. SYLPH is our team's first product, she is born on our meeting in 2015. Simon.Lin mentioned his wife's story that a ballet dancer got hair damage in the modeling of ballet shows. That's exactly what we want to fix for you. SYLPH, an ultra-portable hair dryer to protect your hair, we hope you love her.

story:
INDIEGOGO CAN TAKE UP TO 4 WEEKS TO PROCESS YOUR PLEDGE.  IF YOU PLEDGE TO OUR CAMPAIGN YOU WILL RECEIVE YOUR LIGHT WITHIN 4 WEEKS OF PLEDGING.

IF YOU WOULD LIKE YOUR LIGHT ASAP, PLEASE VISIT OUR WEBSITE (SOLTECHSOLUTIONSLLC.COM) AND MAKE YOUR PURCHASE THERE.

 

YOUR IMPACT - 20% OF ALL PROFITS WILL BE DONATED

20% of all profits will be donated to Solar for Academics, a non-profit who has partnered with Lion of Judah Academy in Tanzania to help implement solar panels to reduce operating expenses and provide reliable electricity to the school.  The school provides an outstanding educational opportunity to Tanzania's most disadvantaged children which includes assuring housing and financial assistance to AIDS orphans.

We have pledged to donate 20% off all profits we recieve from Indiegogo to help them complete their current project in Bulima, Tanzania.  You can find more information on Solar for Academics at solarforacademics.org

 

 

THE GROWLIGHT, REINVENTED    

Growing tired of a lifeless interior? Have you ever considered growing a lemon tree indoors? Maybe strawberries on the wall? A pineapple? I know what you’re thinking, there is NO WAY I can grow a pineapple in my house! Actually, it is quite easy with the support of the Aspect.

The Aspect is the first LED grow light developed specifically for interior design, allowing you to grow whatever plant you want wherever you want while aesthetically enhancing any space.

ENERGY EFFICIENT – Save hundreds on electricity and maintenance over other technologies.

CUSTOMIZE - With over 17 different cord choices and the addition of a lampshade, your plants will be growing in style.

FULL GROW SPECTRUM – Maximize plant growth and improve plant quality with our full spectrum LED light that is efficiently absorbed by plants.

BUILT TO LAST - Never replace our bulb! We assemble the Aspect right here in Bethlehem, PA to insure the highest quality! With the help of our US based LED manufacturer, we can achieve a lifespan of over 90,000 hours!

SMALL OR LARGE - Support most small plants with our 20 watt unit, or grow trees with our 40 watt units. We even offer a commercial high yield package of 160 watts.

SUPPORT YOUR HEALTH - Houseplants extract up to 87% of pollutants from indoor air, including volatile organic compounds, formaldehyde, pesticides and more.

WARRANTY - We pride ourselves on our dedication to each customer, because to us, customer satisfaction is everything. We offer a 3-year warranty, with a 90-day Money Back Guarantee!

SPEEDY DELIVERY Great gift idea for anyone.

 

Limited light? Whether you are growing near a window in a dark corner of your room, the Aspect is here to help. With the right light, you can easily grow any plant inside. It is time to get creative with your décor!

 

 

Depending on what you want to grow, we have an Aspect for it! We outlined applications and coverage below to help you pick the right Aspect for your home.

The SMALL 20 watt Aspect is great for partial sun plants such as houseplants plants, herb, spices, succulents, flowers, and some bonsais. It is also great for those larger plants that just need an extra boost of light to thrive indoors.

The LARGE 40 watt Aspect can support larger plants that demand full sun, such as tomatoes, cannabis, peppers and more. It is great for citrus trees and fruiting plants that grow to a large size and need more intense light coverage.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

INTERCHANGEABLE LAMP SHADE HOOK

An interchangeable lamp shade hook is included in your Aspect Kit which allows you to hang most lampshades to match the decor of any room (lamp shade not included).

 

EASY INSTALL

Just hook it, hang it, and plug it in! The Aspect is incredibly easy to set up. With 3 easy steps you will be on your way to enhancing your home with beautiful green plants.

Don't want to hang the Aspect from the ceiling? Don't worry, there are numerous alternatives such as a Shepards hook

 

Plants convert certain wavelengths of light into energy using photosynthesis. With the wrong light, plants will elongate or die. Too much blue light and your plants will never grow, too much red and they will never develop strong roots. By using LED technology, we are able to produce the exact wavelengths in the right balance of blue and red that supports beautiful, healthy plants.

We offer two spectrums for both residential and commercial growers.

Décor White (20w & 40w Aspect Kits)

  • Brilliant white for Décor Lighting
  • 3000K Color Temperature
  • Represents Colors Vibrantly (High CRI Value), no blue or red tint
  • Supports Plant Growth

High Yield Amber (Deluxe Package & upon request)

  • Amber Color
  • Designed for Large and Commercial Grows
  • 1700K Color Temperature
  • Supports Plant Growth

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Canada: The Aspect is designed to work worldwide, with operating voltages between 90 VAC to 264 VAC, 50/60 Hz. You will get a timer. Shipping rates vary from $30 for a single unit to $55 for the 420 deluxe package.

World Wide: The Aspect is designed to work worldwide, with operating voltages between 90 VAC to 264 VAC, 50/60 Hz. Unfortunately, we are not able to include timers with the international shipments. You will have to locally source an analog outlet timer.

International Shipping: International shipping is handled with either UPS Express, Fedex Express, DHL Express or Priority Mail Express World Wide. We will not ship any other method. All international shipments include tracking numbers and insurance for the cost of the entire purchase. Rates vary from $50 for a single unit to $85 for the 420 deluxe package.

CUSTOMS:  Because of strict agriculture custom policies we will not be able to ship the 'Basil Seeds' with the kit to ALL international backers.  We appoligize for any inconviences.

 

Renewable energy can significantly support education in developing countries by creating a reliable energy source while eliminating an electricity bill. Your investment in a child’s education will have immense benefits in combating future poverty in the community. Any donation made is an investment that generates revenue for over 30 years, changing the lives of hundreds of students to come, and improving the future of the community.

In buying a light and donating, you directly help advance the level of education and opportunity for hundreds of students and their communities.

 

Pictured from left to right is Chris, Mike, and Paul; we are Soltech Solutions. Our team is compiled of Penn State University and Temple University graduates with backgrounds in Environmental Science, Energy Engineering, and Political Science.    

We initially created Soltech Solutions 2 years ago to design and manufacture traditional, high powered, red and blue growlights. After some extensive research in groundbreaking LED technology and plant growth we realized there were no growlights that could efficiently grow your plants while simultaneously creating a welcoming indoor atmosphere. We set out to bring a solution to this problem and developed the first décor pendant style growlight.

In the early stages of development we ran through heaps of prototypes finally landing on a design that could work. The first model of the Aspect hit the market January of 2016 and we’ve had nothing but positive feedback.

Because of our manufacturing space (the basement of a local business incubator) and the long manufacturing process, we knew we had to come up with a better design. We took all of your feedback into consideration and developed the new Aspect model. It’s sleeker, more efficient, and includes custom options never before offered. With a colorful choice of cords and the addition of lampshades, your home décor will never look the same.

Our mission is for everyone to be able to use our product, weather you have a green thumb or are a Grass-assassin! We want to make it easy for people to bring nature indoors and with the Aspect, you can.

Check us out on:

  • http://www.thevalleyledger.com/?p=22075
  • http://areatech51.com/aspect-first-grow-light-d...
  • http://kickingitforward.org
story_txt:
INDIEGOGO CAN TAKE UP TO 4 WEEKS TO PROCESS YOUR PLEDGE.  IF YOU PLEDGE TO OUR CAMPAIGN YOU WILL RECEIVE YOUR LIGHT WITHIN 4 WEEKS OF PLEDGING.
IF YOU WOULD LIKE YOUR LIGHT ASAP, PLEASE VISIT OUR WEBSITE (SOLTECHSOLUTIONSLLC.COM) AND MAKE YOUR PURCHASE THERE.
 

YOUR IMPACT - 20% OF ALL PROFITS WILL BE DONATED
20% of all profits will be donated to Solar for Academics, a non-profit who has partnered with Lion of Judah Academy in Tanzania to help implement solar panels to reduce operating expenses and provide reliable electricity to the school.  The school provides an outstanding educational opportunity to Tanzania's most disadvantaged children which includes assuring housing and financial assistance to AIDS orphans.
We have pledged to donate 20% off all profits we recieve from Indiegogo to help them complete their current project in Bulima, Tanzania.  You can find more information on Solar for Academics at solarforacademics.org
 
 


THE GROWLIGHT, REINVENTED    
Growing tired of a lifeless interior? Have you ever considered growing a lemon tree indoors? Maybe strawberries on the wall? A pineapple? I know what you’re thinking, there is NO WAY I can grow a pineapple in my house! Actually, it is quite easy with the support of the Aspect.
The Aspect is the first LED grow light developed specifically for interior design, allowing you to grow whatever plant you want wherever you want while aesthetically enhancing any space.
ENERGY EFFICIENT – Save hundreds on electricity and maintenance over other technologies.
CUSTOMIZE - With over 17 different cord choices and the addition of a lampshade, your plants will be growing in style.
FULL GROW SPECTRUM – Maximize plant growth and improve plant quality with our full spectrum LED light that is efficiently absorbed by plants.
BUILT TO LAST - Never replace our bulb! We assemble the Aspect right here in Bethlehem, PA to insure the highest quality! With the help of our US based LED manufacturer, we can achieve a lifespan of over 90,000 hours!
SMALL OR LARGE - Support most small plants with our 20 watt unit, or grow trees with our 40 watt units. We even offer a commercial high yield package of 160 watts.
SUPPORT YOUR HEALTH - Houseplants extract up to 87% of pollutants from indoor air, including volatile organic compounds, formaldehyde, pesticides and more.
WARRANTY - We pride ourselves on our dedication to each customer, because to us, customer satisfaction is everything. We offer a 3-year warranty, with a 90-day Money Back Guarantee!
SPEEDY DELIVERY Great gift idea for anyone.

story:
Perfectly Bubbly Drinks at the Press of a Button.

Your flavors. Your style. Completely customize your beverages.

 

Sparkle Your Favorite Drinks

Made for sparkling water fans. Whatever drink you’re in the mood for, make it sparkle.

 

By Infusing Delicious, Fresh, and Healthy Ingredients...

 

... Directly in the Bottle!

Spärkel is the only machine of its kind that allows you to put real, healthy ingredients directly in the bottle.

 

Customize Every Infusion

Whether you’re using wine, fruits, water or alcoholic products, each Spärkel Carbonator perfectly customizes one bottle, ensuring a perfect (and delicious!) experience every time without dilution.

Seriously. You can infuse ANY ingredient’s flavors directly into your drinks. Need a little help? Check out some of our favorite recipes: 

No Clunky CO2 Tanks, Just Bubbles

Say goodbye to exchange programs and clunky CO2 tanks. Spärkel carbonators are a special granulation of citric acid and sodium bicarbonate. Each generates CO2 gas when placed in a sealed chamber within the appliance.

Each Carbonator is pre-made and measured for exactly one use to ensure every drink is carbonated perfectly. That's our Spärkel guarantee. 

 

Refills Are Just One Click Away

No more in-store replacements or exchange programs when your tank is empty. Carbonator refills are just on click away whenever you're ready. 

So you can stop lugging heavy water bottles home or returning empty CO2 tanks to the store.

 

Say Goodbye to Waste

Drastically reduce the number of bottles and cans you and your family are using. Help the environment and drink better while you’re doing it. 

 

Make it the Way You Want it

Spärkel engineers have been building, testing and tasting to ensure you’re getting the best drink experience possible. Traditional CO2 tanks decline in effectiveness as they empty. With Spärkel carbonators you get your bubbles the way you want, every time.

Note: Tested using cold water (3C/ 37F). Cold liquids absorb CO2 better than warmer water. Using warmer water will result in lower carbonation levels. San Benedetto is a registered trademark of Fianziaria S. Benedetto S.p.a. San Pellegrino and Perrier are registered trademarks of Nestle Waters. LaCroix is a registered trademark of Everfresh Beverages, Inc. Badoit is a registered trademark of Société Anonyme des Eaux Minérales d'Evian. * Volumes of CO2

 

Q: How Does Spärkel Make Perfectly Bubbly Drinks? A: Magic! (JK, it’s Science)

 

 

Easy to Use Again & Again

Once the cycle is done, the carbonator residue is released into the drawer for easy sink disposal when full. Add another carbonator and your Spärkel is ready to infuse a new combination of ingredients right away!

 

All you have to do, is push that one little button.... 

 

Spärkel Gets Two Thumbs Way, Way Up

 

 

Pre-Order Now For Our Best Deals

 

A Color For Every Countertop

 

Recently Featured In

 

 

 

Huge Customization. Small Package. Even Smaller Price.

Spärkel was thoughtfully designed to pack big functionality into a space saving package that will fit on any kitchen counter.

 

Note*: Includes 15% Loyalty Discount for purchasing 1 Year Supply on Sparkel.com. Sparkling water bottles and Spärkel bottles are 750ml. LaCroix is 2 x 355ml cans.

Note**: Using Sodastream Fizzi One Touch as comparable electric model. # of bottles carbonated by level is from test results using the Sodastream Source & Fizzi One Touch. Consumer return of empty tank assumed for $15 refill tank cost. Fill line of 840ml on Sodastream bottles.

 

Start Sparkling in Just Moments

 

The Team Behind the Bubbles

Spärkel was conceptualized in Toronto in 2017 by Darren Hatherell & Roy Sawyer, two former tech executives who believe that a good life starts with good food. A few years ago, Darren was excited to bring home a SodaStream for his family. He was looking forward to getting creative, coming up with new recipes and cutting back on sugar. But he discovered that the device could only carbonate water, required a CO2 tank that needed to be kept in his family’s kitchen and used synthesized chemicals for flavor.

Darren and Roy decided to make something better. Something that didn’t limit people to pre-packaged flavors or rely on a bulky tank. They spent the next two years in research and development, learning about the carbonation process, and developing prototypes of their tank-free system. This resulted in Spärkel, which launched in May 2019.

 

On Your Countertop Soon

 

All About Spärkel Shipping

We are able to ship to the United States and Canada. VAT, GST, and taxes not included.

We plan to begin shipping the product in August 2019. We will keep you up to date on our progress and the expected delivery date of your order. Actual ship dates may vary. We will keep you notified of your product ship date.

By backing now you'll get to own one of the very first products off the line plus exclusive access to provide valuable feedback that will shape future generations of the product.

 

Have Questions? Check Out Our FAQ.

What Will You Spärkel? Tell a Friend, and Help Our Campaign!

Do you like to get together with friends, drink, and have fun? Spärkel is the perfect way to make it get togethers even easier! Before Spärkel, "come and drink" might have been a call for help. Now it's a rallying cry!

 

Rainfactory is a multiple-award-winning crowdfunding marketing agency that operates as a marketing department for growing brands. Rainfactory’s experienced team & data-driven, battle-tested approach ensure long-term market dominance for eCommerce start-ups.

story:
Cast iron is one of the best materials ever used for cookware. Its legendary cooking properties, durability, and versatility make cast iron a staple in every kitchen. When Teflon took over the cookware universe in the 1960’s nearly all of the famous manufacturers stopped creating their legendary cookware and closed their factories. Non-stick coatings breakdown fairly quickly and become useless after the coatings flake off whereas cast iron cookware is routinely used for generations. 

 

With the rise of the new foodie culture, there has been a renewed interest better cooking tools and better cast iron.

We decided to develop our skillets because none of the current manufacturers have created a product that can replicate the quality of the vintage pans. Our goal was to bring back the vintage quality and add some aspects that would make our pans easier to use. The weight of cast iron is one of the biggest drawbacks to the material. This is why reducing the weight of the cookware was one of our main design goals. Lighter cookware is easier to handle and clean. In order to make cast iron cookware more convenient, we knew it needed to be sold completely seasoned and ready to use, not just lightly coated to prevent rusting like some manufacturers. This is what drove us to create an industry leading seasoning process, so each pan is ready to use right out of the box. We also designed our cooking surface to hold the seasoning better than any other skillet, so that it requires re-seasoning less often.

 

Find out how Marquette Castings makes a better skillet.

 

 

 

 

 

Modern foundries are not equipped to achieve the desired wall thickness or surface finish with typical sand casting. Casting in sand and then milling is one way to reduce weight, but it introduces an imperfect secondary process and can’t correct every surface of the pan.

We discovered that by using a process called Investment casting (lost wax) that the wall sections could be thinner and the finished product would be much smoother on ALL surfaces – just like the vintage pans. We use investment casting for our 8" and 10" skillets, but due to its size the 12" is cast in sand molds then milled.

We are completing the tooling for all of our skillets and will be able to start production immediately after the campaign is over. We are currently going through test runs of our seasoning process at our factory so that all the details will be worked out once we start production.

 

 

 

 

 

  

Keeping the pans from rusting after manufacturing is a problem that any cast iron manufacturer needs to address. One coat of vegetable oil will solve that problem, but makes for a very bad “seasoning”. Also, if not done properly, the “pre-seasoning” oil can lift during use, making for a very poor base for future seasoning. We decided to turn this technical problem into a feature by finishing each pan with 4 coats of baked on flax seed oil.

Our testing and research shows that flax has among the best properties of any seasoning oil option. Since the inside of our skillets are extremely smooth, we found it necessary to use Greg Blonder’s etching recipe to better prepare the surface so that the seasoning oil can stick. After the skillets are cast they are soaked in a recipe of hydrogen peroxide and sulfuric acid for a short period of time. This etching microscopically erodes the surface grain of the iron, creating a “micro pitting” that provides a much better surface for the oil to adhere. This process results in a pan that is ready to use right out of the box with no further seasoning necessary, it also creates a seasoned base that is more durable and less likely to break down over time. The skillets are then finished with 4 coats of baked on flax seed oil. The skillets spend about 3 hours in the oven per coat to fully cure the oil. The flax seed oil creates a hard and durable base to build further seasoning upon as your pan ages.

 

 

 

One of the biggest drawbacks of using vintage cast iron pans is the short stubby handle. It is always too hot, sits very close to the cooking surface and has a look that should have been left in the 1800’s. Our ideal design kept similar dimensions, wall thicknesses and surface finishes on the pan part, but updated the look, feel and function of the handle.

 

We considered using alternate materials and metals for the handle in hopes of creating a pan that could be largely used without the aid of a handle cover or oven mitt. All of the options were compromises that took away from the timeless durability of a cast iron pan. We needed our pans to conform to the convention that cast iron pans are nearly indestructible. No matter the heat source, recipe or food – cast iron skillets need to perform. Over the lifetime of a pan, the seasoning will most likely be compromised. Stripping and re-seasoning often subjects the pan to conditions and chemicals that would damage lesser metals or other materials. A multi-material pan also creates a weak point between the pan and the handle which could break at some point in the future. These factors drove our decision to stick with a single solid casting. We did our best to mitigate the heat transfer by creating a crescent shaped gap between the pan and the handle, slowing down the heat transfer.

With skillets, there is no such thing as one size fits all. We knew we wanted to launch with 3 sizes. We started with the 12” as the largest commonly used size. Once we finalized all the elements we scaled down the design to make 8” and 10” versions. These pans were small and light enough to remove the helper handle. We found that “weight” and “heft” were some of the biggest complaints of cast iron users. Our designs are focused on reducing the weight and improving the feel making the skillets easier to use.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

          

 

 

 

 

 

 

Working with an overseas manufacturer creates many opportunities for time delays. The partners at Marquette Castings have experience working with foreign manufacturers and importing consumer products. Once products are in transit to our warehouse there are still numerous transportation issues that can arise, and while they are rare, such issues could have significant consequences on our ability to deliver the project on time. The good news is that we already have a finalized product, tooling and supply chain to quickly put into action upon the completion of a successful campaign.

  

How do I know the metal is safe? 

We test multiple samples from each production run to ensure the metal alloy meets our exact specifications and is FDA compliant. These reports will be available on our website.

How does the Lifetime Warranty work?  

It’s a piece of iron – not much can go wrong. If it does, we are here to help. We will also provide ample support and information on how to get your pan back to new condition if the seasoning is compromised.

What order will my skillet ship?  

The skillets will ship prioritized on what production cycle you have chosen, and then by when your order came in. Some sizes may be available sooner than others – if you ordered multiple sizes, we will do our best to ship them to you as soon as we have them. Multiple skillet orders are given shipping priority to single orders.

Why do you manufacturer the pans in China?  

Initially our goal was to make the pans in Michigan (or the Midwest). After realizing that Investment casting would create a far superior product – we found that working with our partner factories in Hebei would be the only option to deliver a top-quality pan at a reasonable price without cutting corners on the design, manufacturing, finishing or seasoning of our skillets. The Hebei region has been casting metal for thousands of years and we were lucky enough to partner with a world class foundry that are experts in both casting and machining. We continue to explore options for manufacturing our products in the USA.
