00:00
 
 
 




 
 
 
 

 

 

 
Cooking with Marquette Castings
 
Left: Experiments with grinding. Right: Torrie and Jordan with their favorite pans.
 
Left: Investment cast skillets being created. Middle: Unseasoned iron in the front, seasoned skillet in the back. Right: Stack of vintage Wagners.
 
Modern foundries are not equipped to achieve the desired wall thickness or surface finish with typical sand casting. Casting in sand and then milling is one way to reduce weight, but it introduces an imperfect secondary process and can’t correct every surface of the pan.
We discovered that by using a process called Investment casting (lost wax) that the wall sections could be thinner and the finished product would be much smoother on ALL surfaces – just like the vintage pans. We use investment casting for our 8" and 10" skillets, but due to its size the 12" is cast in sand molds then milled.
We are completing the tooling for all of our skillets and will be able to start production immediately after the campaign is over. We are currently going through test runs of our seasoning process at our factory so that all the details will be worked out once we start production.
 

 

 
Ceramic shell around wax template
 
Left: Cast handle detail Middle: Injection molded wax pattern Right: Aluminium mold to make pattern
 
Ceramic shell coming off new casting
  

Keeping the pans from rusting after manufacturing is a problem that any cast iron manufacturer needs to address. One coat of vegetable oil will solve that problem, but makes for a very bad “seasoning”. Also, if not done properly, the “pre-seasoning” oil can lift during use, making for a very poor base for future seasoning. We decided to turn this technical problem into a feature by finishing each pan with 4 coats of baked on flax seed oil.

Our testing and research shows that flax has among the best properties of any seasoning oil option. Since the inside of our skillets are extremely smooth, we found it necessary to use Greg Blonder’s etching recipe to better prepare the surface so that the seasoning oil can stick. After the skillets are cast they are soaked in a recipe of hydrogen peroxide and sulfuric acid for a short period of time. This etching microscopically erodes the surface grain of the iron, creating a “micro pitting” that provides a much better surface for the oil to adhere. This process results in a pan that is ready to use right out of the box with no further seasoning necessary, it also creates a seasoned base that is more durable and less likely to break down over time. The skillets are then finished with 4 coats of baked on flax seed oil. The skillets spend about 3 hours in the oven per coat to fully cure the oil. The flax seed oil creates a hard and durable base to build further seasoning upon as your pan ages.

 Play

 
Replay with sound


 
Play withsound



00:00


00:00
 
 
 




 
 
 
 

 

 

 
12" Skillet after milling
 

 

One of the biggest drawbacks of using vintage cast iron pans is the short stubby handle. It is always too hot, sits very close to the cooking surface and has a look that should have been left in the 1800’s. Our ideal design kept similar dimensions, wall thicknesses and surface finishes on the pan part, but updated the look, feel and function of the handle.

 

We considered using alternate materials and metals for the handle in hopes of creating a pan that could be largely used without the aid of a handle cover or oven mitt. All of the options were compromises that took away from the timeless durability of a cast iron pan. We needed our pans to conform to the convention that cast iron pans are nearly indestructible. No matter the heat source, recipe or food – cast iron skillets need to perform. Over the lifetime of a pan, the seasoning will most likely be compromised. Stripping and re-seasoning often subjects the pan to conditions and chemicals that would damage lesser metals or other materials. A multi-material pan also creates a weak point between the pan and the handle which could break at some point in the future. These factors drove our decision to stick with a single solid casting. We did our best to mitigate the heat transfer by creating a crescent shaped gap between the pan and the handle, slowing down the heat transfer.
With skillets, there is no such thing as one size fits all. We knew we wanted to launch with 3 sizes. We started with the 12” as the largest commonly used size. Once we finalized all the elements we scaled down the design to make 8” and 10” versions. These pans were small and light enough to remove the helper handle. We found that “weight” and “heft” were some of the biggest complaints of cast iron users. Our designs are focused on reducing the weight and improving the feel making the skillets easier to use.
Handle covers will come in a variety of colors
 
Made in Michigan 10.5" skillet
 
Made in Michigan 10.5" skillet
 
Made in Michigan 10.5" skillet
 

 

 
 
Free shipping within the United States. $10 for Canada and $15 for the following countries: Austria, Belgium, France, Great Britian, Ireland, Italy, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Portugal, Spain, and The United Kingdom.
 
Get Cash Back on the Projects You Love!
 
 The griddle is made in enameled cast iron 
 
 Griddle size is 10x20 inches 
 
           
 

 

Get Your Project Funded Today!
   Working with an overseas manufacturer creates many opportunities for time delays. The partners at Marquette Castings have experience working with foreign manufacturers and importing consumer products. Once products are in transit to our warehouse there are still numerous transportation issues that can arise, and while they are rare, such issues could have significant consequences on our ability to deliver the project on time. The good news is that we already have a finalized product, tooling and supply chain to quickly put into action upon the completion of a successful campaign.  How do I know the metal is safe? 
We test multiple samples from each production run to ensure the metal alloy meets our exact specifications and is FDA compliant. These reports will be available on our website.
How does the Lifetime Warranty work?  
It’s a piece of iron – not much can go wrong. If it does, we are here to help. We will also provide ample support and information on how to get your pan back to new condition if the seasoning is compromised.
What order will my skillet ship?  The skillets will ship prioritized on what production cycle you have chosen, and then by when your order came in. Some sizes may be available sooner than others – if you ordered multiple sizes, we will do our best to ship them to you as soon as we have them. Multiple skillet orders are given shipping priority to single orders.
Why do you manufacturer the pans in China?   
Initially our goal was to make the pans in Michigan (or the Midwest). After realizing that Investment casting would create a far superior product – we found that working with our partner factories in Hebei would be the only option to deliver a top-quality pan at a reasonable price without cutting corners on the design, manufacturing, finishing or seasoning of our skillets. The Hebei region has been casting metal for thousands of years and we were lucky enough to partner with a world class foundry that are experts in both casting and machining. We continue to explore options for manufacturing our products in the USA.

story:
Stretch Goal

We found that when use the silicone ice cube mold, it is easier to push out the ice cube with a stick.

We designed this multi-purpose swizzle stick (cocktail stirrer). It is made by stainless steel, has a larger diameter at one end, can just go through the holes in the bottom of the ice mold, and push out the ice cubes. The other end is smaller, can be used to fork fruit or olive, to decorate your drink. There are four different laser-carving geometric patterns on the stick.

Once we reach $120,000, we will offer every set of Polar Ice Ball 2.0 with one swizzle stick. If you are the backer of the Group Buying Set, you will get four different pattern sticks at the same time.

 

Better ice, better drinks

Our family once discussed why beverages at restaurants tasted so good. My wife said "it is only a psychological effect,” but my daughter and I disagreed. We started to do a more serious comparison and came to the conclusion that ice at restaurants is simply not the same...

Ice cubes in restaurants are made in specialized ice-making machines and are more transparent.

 

What's so special about crystal clear ice?

It enhances the taste of your drink.

The ice that comes out of your freezer contains air bubbles and other impurities, which can ruin the taste of your drink. Crystal clear ice, on the other hand, is flavorless and odorless.

It looks fascinating.

Shining with clarity, or glimmering under dim light, crystal clear ice in your craft drinks will transform your beverages into exquisite works of art. Moreover, adding a flower or piece of fruit between the silicone layers can turn your clear ice into an amazing show piece! It's perfect for a romantic occasion and it's a great way to impress you friends!

Best for your whiskey

Whiskey and Scotch lovers can enjoy the taste and aromas of their favorite spirit on the rocks.
By lowering the serving temperature of your whiskey or mixed drink, clear ice enhances your beverage by adding a cold, crisp taste.

 

What people said about original Polar Ice Ball…

 

By Shortyon, January 25, 2016

Amazing.... We were skeptical; but, CLEAR ICE BALLS do take longer to melt - love it!

By Robert Reeveon, Feb 23, 2017

Perfect Ice Ball Every Time Always in search of the perfect ice ball maker, my search is over, this is as advertised the best, crystal clear 2.5" ball, very easy to use.

By Kirk Olson, July 6, 2017

I love the drinks made with the ice ball. Friends really like it and are amazed that I have ice in that shape!

By Vinco Choo, July 6, 2017

Highly recommended. I've tried many others but the Polar Ice has been the most consistent and easy to use.

 

What is Polar Ice Ball 2.0 ?

After years of research and testing, we found a special method inspired by the natural ice-formation pattern that takes place in lakes and rivers. We reached out with “Polar Ice Ball” to the crowdfunding platform in 2015, and received a lot of praise and support. After we delivered the product, we got a lot of useful feedback and requests for more varieties of “Polar Ice Ball”

“Polar Ice Ball 2.0” is our latest version of our most popular product. We improved on the design and results of the original “Polar Ice Ball”.

 

What makes the new version awesome…

 

More ideas for making your life prettier...

Put anything you can think of in the ice! Cocktail lovers can garnish their favorite drinks with beautiful ice balls. Place fresh flowers, vanilla, or any party-themed decorations inside to create something one-of-a-kind!

Summer Time

Romantic Date

Halloween Party

Holiday Time

* For drinking, please use edible flower.  * Pay attention not to swallow the small decorative objects!

 

Varieties of Polar Ice Ball 2.0

Change the silicone mold to make clear ice blocks as well as the original sphere!

 

The Creation of Polar Ice Ball 2.0

Made from food-safe materials with high-quality texture, Polar Ice Ball 2.0 maximizes the utility and characteristics of its food-grade CP composition.

Prototype 3D Printing

 

The Freezing Process

 

Structure

 

Specification

 

How to use it? - 4 Simple Steps

Step 1: Put the layers together, and pinch the rims to ensure full contact.

Step 2: Add water, and put them in the insulated base layer.

Step 3: Put the tray into the freezer, and wait for 8~12 hours.

Step 4: Enjoy your drinks with the crystal clear ice.

 

Enjoy Crystal Clear Ice

 

Perks

 

Product Timeline

 

 

Our Focus

Polar Ice was founded in 2009, and specializes in observing the details of life with a fresh eye to come up with extraordinary ideas with simple principles. We are keen to design innovative products that enhance the quality and fun of life.

We study how to make crystal clear ice, mastering the key points of research and development, and insist on the following design mandates:

  • Achieve the most simple structure and ease-of-use.
  • Use high-quality materials while maintaining affordability for consumers.
  • Reduce the product size to fit in any freezer.
  • Make it more fun!

 

Designer

Jack Chu - 20 years as a R&D engineer, likes to explore the basic principles of things, good at the simplification of complex systems, developed Polar Ice Tray for producing crystal clear ice.

 

FAQ

How does it work?

Ordinary ice trays allow ice to freeze from the outside in, trapping air and impurities to the center. Polar Ice Tray insulates all sides of the tray except the top, so only the surface of the water is exposed to the cold. As a result, the water starts to freeze from the surface. By allowing the water to freeze gradually from top to bottom, layer by layer, air and impurities are compressed to the bottom, forming a layer of opaque or "white" ice. Our dual-chambered technology allows easy separation of clear and white ice.

Can I use any kind of water to make clear ice?

Basically any kind of water can be used to make clear ice. We've even tried making clear ice with diluted ink, and it worked. But in case of undrinkable water, we recommend boiling it prior to making ice. The effect of clear ice may also be affected by water quality. For example, hard water (water with more minerals) oftentimes results in more "cloud" in the ice. Therefore we don't suggest making ice with mineral water.

Would it be possible to fail in making clear ice?

Different freezers create different effects. We suggest you to follow these rules:

  1. While adding water into the tray to make ice, do it slowly. Fast water pouring brings in lots of air bubbles. You can also tap the tray lightly to force air bubbles out. 
  2. Keep the temperature of the freezer at -18C. 
  3. During the freezing process, any shake can cause the air bubbles to float. So please open/close the freezer lightly.

​Been reading Amazon reviews saying that it doesn’t get crystal clear ice?

The previous polar ice ball sold on amazon usually yielded good results, but results tended to vary with how the user used the tray or gave us the chance to help them troubleshoot.

The most common issues were when the product was filled with water too quickly, the air would be trapped in the tray. This will cause many needle bubbles, and make the ice not clear.

For Polar Ice Ball 2.0, we have improved the design of the product to fix these issues by adding an extra tube for filling water, and holes on the top of domes to let the air to escape from. This will result clear ice being formed even more consistently than in our previous products

Can the "white ice" in the plastic layer be used?

The white ice contains more impurities and it's a kind of hard water. We don't recommend adding it to drinks. Instead, it can be used to keep things chilled. You can also consider gathering white ice, wait until it melts and make use of the hard water. For example, hard water can be used to cook pasta - it makes the taste better. (That's why it's recommended to add salt when boiling pasta.)

SHIPMENT POLICY

Shipment to worldwide location will be conducted by Airmail Parcel Service or EMS (International Express Mail Service) from Taiwan. The fee is 50% off the average international express price.

VAT AND TAXES

Please be advised that products shipped outside EU could be subject to local VAT and Taxes. You have to check up with your local regulations in order to get information.

DISTRIBUTORS AND WHOLESALERS

If you are keen to distribute or buy Polar Ice products in bulk, please get in touch with us at info @polar-ice.com.tw and we would be happy to discuss working with you.

story:
''Bir Şarkı Bir Orman / One Song One Forest'' projemizde sadece 2 dolara bir ağaç dikip yepyeni  bir şarkı kazanıyorsunuz daha fazla bağışlarınız için daha büyük hediyelerimiz aşşağıdaki linkte.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

"Insaniz Ayibi Yok" klibimizi bu linke tıklayarak yada yukarıdaki Gallery Tabına basarak izliyebilirsiniz. // You can watch our music video for "Insaniz Ayibi Yok" by clicking the link below or in the gallery tab of our project page. 

INSANIZ AYIBI YOK KLİP LİNK // INSANIZ AYIBI YOK MUSIC VIDEO LINK.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5ZJWZ7pEb9w

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Melike 18 gibi çok erken bir yaşta savaşını kaybetti. Ailesi Melike nin anısına gezegenimize hayat ve nefes vermek icin 1000 ağaçlık bir koru hazırladı. O zamandan beri bu sayıyı 2350 e çıkarabildiler.

Bizde burda devreye girdik. 

Melike nin ufak korusunu 10000 ağaçlık bir ormana dönüştürmek istiyoruz. melike yi onurlandırmak ve ailesinin başlattığı bu görevi sonuçlandırmak için öz abisi Ozan Turgut un yazdığı Caner Anar ın besteleyip seslendirdiği şarkımızla müziğin ve doğanın gücünü birleştirmek istiyoruz.

Sadece 2 dolarlık bağışınızla bir ağaç dikerek bu çabamızın bir parçası olabilirsiniz.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Melikes biggest wish was to travel around the world. Sadly at the early age of 17 doctors discovered that she had a brain tumor. During her fight with cancer her family had their friends from around the world shoot short positive energy  filled messages for Melike.(Video girls noktası) Unfortunately due to the cancer advancing through the vision center of brain, Melike wasn’t able to see the video. In 2012 at the young age of 18 she lost her battle. In an effort to give life and oxygen back to the planet in her memory, her family started the Melike Woods made up of 1000 trees. Since then  able to raise that number to 2350. . 

This is where we came in our dream and goal is to raise that number to 10,000 and turn the little Melike Woods into an official Melike Forest. With lyrics written by her own brother Ozan Turgut and a song composed and performed by Caner Anar we hope to combine the beauty of nature and music, to help honor Melike by completing the mission her family started.

With a simple donation of $2.00 you can plant your very own tree and take part in our efforts to give the world a forest back. 

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

$1 Raindrop 

Your simple $1 donation will go towards helping us raise the necessary amount to plant one tree. You will receive our song download as a thank you fro your donations.

$2 One Song One Tree 

With this small donation you get to plant your very own tree. You will receive a download of our song and give the world one more life and breath.

$20 Musical Touch 

For your $20 donation you will plant 10 trees and will be emailed via wetransfer the 12 album discography and all future works of Playjoy, the musician behind Our project song "Insaniz Ayibi Yok", along with all previous perks.

$50 Personal Thank You e-Card 

For your donation of 25 trees we will send a personalised thank you e-card with the picture of the tree you planted and a message written just for you.

$100 50 Breath Angels 

When you plant 50 trees you get to add 50 breaths to our world, and get the naming rights for a small section of the forest to be named in honour of your own loved ones. With a simple sign your loved ones name will forever be a part of this forest.

$200 Music and Nature 

For your help in planting 100 trees, we will live stream a concert with songs in English and Turkish, with several known musicians. You will be mailed the airing date and the password required through email and receive all the perks previously listed.

$1000 Picture Worth a Thousand Words 

With a donation of $1000 you will plant 500 trees and receive a personalised illustration on a 50cm x 30cm (20' x 12') canvas, by our talented artist. Infusing the picture of your loved one with the beauty of nature to create an everlasting memory. You will also receive all gifts listed in previous perks as a thank you for your vast donation and help. All shipping costs will be handled by us no matter your location.

$2000 One Forest One Concert 

For your incredible donation of $2000 we will arrange a live concert in the forest you have greatly helped create or at a venue to be selected by you and the musicians. We wanna show our appreciation by giving you and any number of your friends an unforgettable experience to thank you for your generous donation. *(Due to travel costs, only available to those residing in Turkey or those who can pay their own travel costs.) Will also include all gifts from the previous perks.


----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Melike' ye,

"Kısa sürsede misafirliğin bu illüzyonda,sonsuzluğa inanıyoruz ya biz. Güzel insanların, güzel dostları olur sonsuzluğa inanan.  Bak ne kadar kalabalığız.  Dünya'nın her yerinden binlerce güzel insan..." Ozan Turgut

Sonsuzluğa yolcu ettiğimiz bütün sevdiklerimiz anısına gezegenimize binlerce nefes kazandırmak istiyoruz.  Baska hiç bir amacımız yok.

Geleceğimiz için, Çocuklarımız için, Dünyamız için desteklerinizi bekliyoruz.

Hedeflediğimiz tutara ulaşamasak bile, yapacağınız her bağış ağaç olarak değerlendirilicektir.  Hedefimizi aşarsak 25000 ağaçlık bölgeyi ağaçlarla kaplayana kadar durmayacağız.  

Yakında klibimizi olabildiği kadar kişiye ulaştırabilmek içim, klibimizin İngilizce alt yazılısını ve Türkçe İşaret Dili ile hazırlanmış olan versiyonlarını yayına koyacağız.  

Ekstra bilgiler ve güncel haberlerler çok yakında hem Indiegogo proje sayfamızdan, Facebook sayfamız https://www.facebook.com/onesongoneforest' tan ve internet sitemiz www.onesongoneforest.com' dan yayınlanacaktır.  Vaktiniz için teşekkürler bağışlarınızı ve paylaşımlarınızı heyecan mesajımızı yayabilmek için bekliyoruz.  

Yan tarafta bulunan İngilizce hediye listemizin Türkçe çevirmesini aşağıda bulabilirsiniz.  

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

To Melike.

"Even though your visit was short lived in this illusion, we believe in the forever. Beautiful people have beautiful friends who believe in the forever. Look how many we are, thousands of kind hearted people from all over the world." Ozan Turgut

For the memory of all those we have loved and sent on their way to eternal rest.  We want the add thousands of breaths to our planet. We have no other purpose.  

For our future, for our children, for our Earth, we are waiting for your support. 

If we are unable to reach our original goal, all your donations will still be used to plant trees on the way to our final destination.  If we hopefully exceed our expectations we will continue to plant trees, till we cover the whole 25,000 tree area with new life.  

We will soon be posting our music video with English Subtitles, Turkish Sign Language to help our song be understood across the planet by all.

Stay posted for more information and new updates coming very soon. In the meantime feel free to check out our Facebook page https://www.facebook.com/onesongoneforest  and our website at www.onesongoneforest.com. Thank You for your time and we appreciate your donations and shares to help spread the word.

story_txt:
''Bir Şarkı Bir Orman / One Song One Forest'' projemizde sadece 2 dolara bir ağaç dikip yepyeni  bir şarkı kazanıyorsunuz daha fazla bağışlarınız için daha büyük hediyelerimiz aşşağıdaki linkte.----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------"Insaniz Ayibi Yok" klibimizi bu linke tıklayarak yada yukarıdaki Gallery Tabına basarak izliyebilirsiniz. // You can watch our music video for "Insaniz Ayibi Yok" by clicking the link below or in the gallery tab of our project page. INSANIZ AYIBI YOK KLİP LİNK // INSANIZ AYIBI YOK MUSIC VIDEO LINK.https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5ZJWZ7pEb9w----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Melike 18 gibi çok erken bir yaşta savaşını kaybetti. Ailesi Melike nin anısına gezegenimize hayat ve nefes vermek icin 1000 ağaçlık bir koru hazırladı. O zamandan beri bu sayıyı 2350 e çıkarabildiler.

Bizde burda devreye girdik. 
Melike nin ufak korusunu 10000 ağaçlık bir ormana dönüştürmek istiyoruz. melike yi onurlandırmak ve ailesinin başlattığı bu görevi sonuçlandırmak için öz abisi Ozan Turgut un yazdığı Caner Anar ın besteleyip seslendirdiği şarkımızla müziğin ve doğanın gücünü birleştirmek istiyoruz.

Sadece 2 dolarlık bağışınızla bir ağaç dikerek bu çabamızın bir parçası olabilirsiniz.----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Melikes biggest wish was to travel around the world. Sadly at the early age of 17 doctors discovered that she had a brain tumor. During her fight with cancer her family had their friends from around the world shoot short positive energy  filled messages for Melike.(Video girls noktası) Unfortunately due to the cancer advancing through the vision center of brain, Melike wasn’t able to see the video. In 2012 at the young age of 18 she lost her battle. In an effort to give life and oxygen back to the planet in her memory, her family started the Melike Woods made up of 1000 trees. Since then  able to raise that number to 2350. . This is where we came in our dream and goal is to raise that number to 10,000 and turn the little Melike Woods into an official Melike Forest. With lyrics written by her own brother Ozan Turgut and a song composed and performed by Caner Anar we hope to combine the beauty of nature and music, to help honor Melike by completing the mission her family started.With a simple donation of $2.00 you can plant your very own tree and take part in our efforts to give the world a forest back. ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
$1 Raindrop 
Your simple $1 donation will go towards helping us raise the necessary amount to plant one tree. You will receive our song download as a thank you fro your donations.

$2 One Song One Tree 
With this small donation you get to plant your very own tree. You will receive a download of our song and give the world one more life and breath.

$20 Musical Touch 
For your $20 donation you will plant 10 trees and will be emailed via wetransfer the 12 album discography and all future works of Playjoy, the musician behind Our project song "Insaniz Ayibi Yok", along with all previous perks.

$50 Personal Thank You e-Card 
For your donation of 25 trees we will send a personalised thank you e-card with the picture of the tree you planted and a message written just for you.

$100 50 Breath Angels 
When you plant 50 trees you get to add 50 breaths to our world, and get the naming rights for a small section of the forest to be named in honour of your own loved ones. With a simple sign your loved ones name will forever be a part of this forest.

$200 Music and Nature 
For your help in planting 100 trees, we will live stream a concert with songs in English and Turkish, with several known musicians. You will be mailed the airing date and the password required through email and receive all the perks previously listed.

$1000 Picture Worth a Thousand Words 
With a donation of $1000 you will plant 500 trees and receive a personalised illustration on a 50cm x 30cm (20' x 12') canvas, by our talented artist. Infusing the picture of your loved one with the beauty of nature to create an everlasting memory. You will also receive all gifts listed in previous perks as a thank you for your vast donation and help. All shipping costs will be handled by us no matter your location.

$2000 One Forest One Concert 
For your incredible donation of $2000 we will arrange a live concert in the forest you have greatly helped create or at a venue to be selected by you and the musicians. We wanna show our appreciation by giving you and any number of your friends an unforgettable experience to thank you for your generous donation. *(Due to travel costs, only available to those residing in Turkey or those who can pay their own travel costs.) Will also include all gifts from the previous perks.----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Melike' ye,"Kısa sürsede misafirliğin bu illüzyonda,sonsuzluğa inanıyoruz ya biz. Güzel insanların, güzel dostları olur sonsuzluğa inanan.  Bak ne kadar kalabalığız.  Dünya'nın her yerinden binlerce güzel insan..." Ozan TurgutSonsuzluğa yolcu ettiğimiz bütün sevdiklerimiz anısına gezegenimize binlerce nefes kazandırmak istiyoruz.  Baska hiç bir amacımız yok.Geleceğimiz için, Çocuklarımız için, Dünyamız için desteklerinizi bekliyoruz.Hedeflediğimiz tutara ulaşamasak bile, yapacağınız her bağış ağaç olarak değerlendirilicektir.  Hedefimizi aşarsak 25000 ağaçlık bölgeyi ağaçlarla kaplayana kadar durmayacağız.  Yakında klibimizi olabildiği kadar kişiye ulaştırabilmek içim, klibimizin İngilizce alt yazılısını ve Türkçe İşaret Dili ile hazırlanmış olan versiyonlarını yayına koyacağız.  Ekstra bilgiler ve güncel haberlerler çok yakında hem Indiegogo proje sayfamızdan, Facebook sayfamız https://www.facebook.com/onesongoneforest' tan ve internet sitemiz www.onesongoneforest.com' dan yayınlanacaktır.  Vaktiniz için teşekkürler bağışlarınızı ve paylaşımlarınızı heyecan mesajımızı yayabilmek için bekliyoruz.  Yan tarafta bulunan İngilizce hediye listemizin Türkçe çevirmesini aşağıda bulabilirsiniz.  ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------To Melike."Even though your visit was short lived in this illusion, we believe in the forever. Beautiful people have beautiful friends who believe in the forever. Look how many we are, thousands of kind hearted people from all over the world." Ozan TurgutFor the memory of all those we have loved and sent on their way to eternal rest.  We want the add thousands of breaths to our planet. We have no other purpose.  For our future, for our children, for our Earth, we are waiting for your support. If we are unable to reach our original goal, all your donations will still be used to plant trees on the way to our final destination.  If we hopefully exceed our expectations we will continue to plant trees, till we cover the whole 25,000 tree area with new life.  We will soon be posting our music video with English Subtitles, Turkish Sign Language to help our song be understood across the planet by all.Stay posted for more information and new updates coming very soon. In the meantime feel free to check out our Facebook page https://www.facebook.com/onesongoneforest  and our website at www.onesongoneforest.com. Thank You for your time and we appreciate your donations and shares to help spread the word.Fotoğraf ve video indirme linki // Photo and video download link:https://drive.google.com/folderview?id=0B_46A9W...

story:
The new Flic Hub lets anyone in your home control devices you'd normally need multiple apps or remotes to use.

 

 

 





 

 

 
 

With the add-on IR accessory you can control TVs, home entertainment systems, & air conditioners to name a few.
 

 
 
 
 
 
Combines WiFi, Bluetooth, and Infrared to control your outdoor & indoor home automation & entertainment devices.
 
 
 
 
Check out this video made by one of our top Flic Button users: 
 
 
 

 

 

 
The Flic Hub gives you a lot more control and flexibility when controlling your Flic buttons.
 
 
 

 
 
 
 
 
 

 

Watch this Flic super-user show off how they've automated their home controls with Flic. 
 


 




 
 
 


Flic buttons will work up to 100 feet from the Hub. For comparison, the typical WiFi Router will work up to 150 feet. If you own multiple WiFi routers, then you should pre-order more Flic Hubs. You can pre-order as many as you need.




The Flic app lets you easily set up Flic button control.







New compatibility, better connectivity, and more control all packaged into a beautiful design.

 

 


Flic and the Flic Hub are highly customizable for the advanced user.


Configure advanced workflows by setting up Flic with IFTTT, Zapier, Microsoft Flow or even the HTTP request function in our apps to command anything you can dream of. All of these are available in iOS, Android and Mac already, and will of course be available for the Flic Hub as well.

Did you know that Flic works perfectly with your Mac? You can also write your own plugins to the Mac app it order to extend its features.

Use Flic in your own App by implementing our Flic SDK for iOS and Android.



If you know what you’re doing, you’ll recognize the structure of the Flic Hub. It’s basically an advanced Linux computer, much like a better-looking Raspberry Pi, with a two separate Bluetooth controllers (yep, two) for increased stability, excellent connectivity features and brilliant design. And yes, you can hack it as you please.



We’re not fooling around when it comes to security. No one has managed to break the Flic protocol, and trust us, they tried. The Flic hub security level is equally high. The Hub is password protected and can only be accessed with our App and the BLE communication between the two is SPAKE2+ encrypted. On the network side no ports are open to the outside world. All communication with our backend goes over TLS. That means no one will be able to reach your network from outside via the Flic Hub. Unless, of course, you give them your Hub password. Don’t do that.




Built entirely at our community's request, the Flic Hub has gone through numerous design iterations and development tests.




Shortcut Labs was founded out of the passion to make great technology simple. We are a bunch of brilliant engineers, creatives and entrepreneurs leading a hardware revolution from Stockholm, Sweden. There is one thing we do better than everyone else: Simplicity. 

We're coming back to Indiegogo after successfully raising over 800% of the Indiegogo funding goal for the Flic Smart Button in 2014. With years of improving Flic and shipping to thousands of customers worldwide, we're finally ready to reveal our latest product. The Flic Hub is finally here on Indiegogo, back where it all began. We hope you're as excited about it as we are. 

 




 


 




We are able to ship worldwide.* 

Please see reward details for the shipping cost that applies to you.

*We can not ship to these countries: Andorra, Belarus, New Caledonia, Comoros, Congo, The Democratic Republic Of The Congo, Côte d'Ivoire, Curaçao, Egypt, Faroe Islands, Fiji, French, Polynesia, Greenland, Guernsey, Isle Of Man, Jersey, Kosovo, Lebanon, Liberia, Mozambique, Myanmar, Palestinian Territory, Occupied, Papua New Guinea, Reunion, Russia, Sao Tome And Principe, South Korea, South Sudan, Sudan, Syria , Tunisia , Turkey, Ukraine, Yemen,  Zimbabwe, Aland Islands, Bouvet Island, Burundi, Central African Republic, Cuba, Eritrea, French Guiana, French Southern Territories, Guinea, Guinea Bissau, Heard Island and Mcdonald Islands, Holy See (Vatican City State), Iran, Islamic Republic Of Iraq, Democratic People's Republic Of Korea, Libyan Arab Jamahiriya, Saint Helena, San Marino, Sierra Leone, Somalia, South Georgia And The South Sandwich Islands, Tajikistan, Western Sahara.



We plan to ship the product in October 2017*. If you supported us and contributed after the 20th of July, we plan to ship your order in December 2017* IF you supported us and contributed after the 19th of August, we plan to ship your order in April 2018.* We will keep you up to date on our progress and the expected delivery date of your order.  

 *Actual ship dates may vary. We will keep you notified of your product ship date.



By backing now you'll get to own one of the very first Flic Hubs off the line plus exclusive access to provide valuable feedback that will shape future generations of the product.

  




How can I see if my order has been confirmed? If you look under the ‘My Contributions’ tab located under your Indiegogo account then you will see if your order has been accepted and processed.
I’ve ordered the Hub + 3 Flic Buttons perk (or x2 Hubs + 6 Flic Buttons) what colour Flic buttons will I receive? You will get a Black and White combo pack. 
For the 3 Flic Button orders it includes x1 Black + x2 White Flic Buttons. 
The 6 Flic Button orders will include x2 Black + x4 White Flic Button
How much is shipping for the IR accessory? If you have purchased the $20 IR accessory perk in addition to the Hub perk then you will not be charged additional shipping. You will only pay the shipping cost associated with the Hub itself.

 

What is the Flic Hub? The Flic Hub is our latest product. It acts as a link between your Flic buttons and your connected devices and services. The beauty of the Hub is that you no longer have to rely on your phone as the gateway, giving you a much more reliable & stable connection. It also comes with an optional IR accessory that allows you to control your TV, Set Top Box, HiFi sound system and much more directly from the Hub.
What is the Flic Hub App? The Flic Hub app is built into the existing Flic app and is only needed when you want to set up the click, double click and hold functions for each of your Flic buttons. You can also use the app to manage all your connected buttons and 3rd party service providers.
Do I have to buy Flics in order for the Flic Hub to work? Yes, you will need to have a least 1 Flic in order to use the Hub. 
I have Flics already, will they work with the Hub or do I need to buy new Flics? Great! All Flics will work with the Hub!
Can all the actions in my current Flic App be used with Flic Hub? Most of the apps currently supported by Flic will be available on the Hub. Unfortunately phone specific actions such as send text message or hang up call will not work on the Hub, but if you still want these then connect the Flic to your phone :) As always we will be continually adding to the action list and partners which are supported so your Hub’s capabilities will continue to improve.
Can one Flic Hub have multiple simultaneous users? Yes. The Hub is perfect for the whole family to use and can support up to 64 simultaneous Flic connections at the same time.
What are the technical specification of the Hub? Connectivity
  • Bluetooth Classic
  • Bluetooth Low Energy
  • WiFi
  • Ethernet
  • IR (optional accessory not included)
  • 3.5mm audio out/mic in
Range
  • Bluetooth Classic & Low Energy - typically 100 feet (30m)
  • Wifi - typically 150 feet (45m)
  • IR accessory - Line of sight 
Size & Weight 
  • 85x50x15mm
  • 99g
Power 
  • Micro USB (1A recommended, 0.5A min)
  • 1.5 Watts typical
Materials
  • PC/ABS plastic 
  • Reusable double sided adhesive 
IP rating
  • IP4X (indoor use only)

 

How does the Flic Hub connect to my devices?
  • The Hub combines WiFi and Bluetooth connectivity. 
  • Connect the Hub to your local WiFi network and it will be able to communicate with any other WiFi/Internet connected devices, both on your network and remotely.
  • Connect the Hub to your Bluetooth devices, such as Bluetooth speakers, and bring the Hub to life allowing it to play sounds (perfect for use as a doorbell).
  • Connect the optional IR accessory via the 3.5mm jack and control millions of legacy devices such as TV’s, Stereo Amplifiers, & Air Conditioners.
Will all my original/current Flic configurations be linked directly to the Hub? Yes, to an extent. As long as you’re logged in via the same Flic account all of your Flic configurations should transfer over without you needing to reconfigure all your existing buttons. Unfortunately not all configurations will be available on the hub, e.g. phone specific actions such as send text message, or hang up call. Those that are compatible will be transferred once you pair the button to the Hub.
Do I need to pair my other smart devices to the Flic Hub? Yes and no. The Hub will communicate with your other smart devices over a WiFi connection. As long as your other smart devices are correctly set up and connected to a network it will work seamlessly. If you want to connect Bluetooth devices to the Hub e.g. a Bluetooth speaker, then this can be done through the Flic app.

 

What is the range of the Flic Hub? Up to 150 feet (45m) depending on the environment, indoors this is typically up to 100 feet (30m).
How do I connect my Flics to the Hub?
  1. Download the Flic app, already available on the Apple App Store & Google Play Store
  2. Once we start shipping you will then find a new tab for the Hub within our Flic App where you can pair your Flic buttons to the Hub.
  3. After this pairing the phone is no longer needed unless you need to edit the button configuration.
How many Flics can I connect to the Flic Hub? Up to 64 Flic Buttons, as of today. If you have a use case in mind that would require more reach out to us and we can see what we can do!
I have a big house, can I purchase additional Hubs to extend my range?  Yes. Each Hub has a range of around 100 feet (30m) so if you need to extend this then adding additional hubs is recommended. If you have a Flic that you keep on your keychain or wear around the house then simply pair it once with each Hub you own and it will ensure a seamless experience in any room, great for music control around the entire house.
Can I power the Hub via a laptop or PC? Yes, however we recommend that you connect it directly to a wall outlet via a USB power adapter that is able to supply a minimum of 1A output. This will ensure that you have the best possible experience.
Can I connect the Hub directly to my router/network switch? Yes, you can connect an ethernet cable directly from the Hub to your router/network switch.
Can I connect the Hub to my Bluetooth speaker? Yes! The Hub can connect to your speakers either with Bluetooth or with a standard 3.5mm Audio Jack cable.
Can I connect the Hub to my WiFi speaker? Yes, no problem. As long as your WiFi speaker, e.g. a Sonos, is already setup and connected to a network then the Hub and Flic will be able to control it. 
What is IR and how can this control my TV, set top box, etc...?  In a nutshell it means that a Flic can replace all your remote controls!
IR means infrared and it's the way that old remote controls can communicate with TV’s, sound systems, air conditioners. We have developed an IR blaster accessory that you can connect to the hub that works like these old remote controls. This means you can clear the clutter on your coffee table and put all those old remote controls in the drawer as Flic can now replace them.
Is the Hub safe? Yes, we take your privacy and security seriously so you can be sure that the Flic Hub will keep you and your smart home safe from threats.
Adding such a device to my home network is a security risk, is the Hub protected? Yes the Hub is password protected keeping you and your smart home safe. Our protocol between the hub and the app uses both encryption and cryptographic signatures. On the network side no ports are open to the outside world. All communication with our backend goes over TLS. No other interface is used.
Does the Flic Hub maintain a connection to my Flic buttons? Yes, once you pair a Flic to your Hub this will be remembered forever until you decide to disconnect it. This ensures that the Flic will work first time, every time with very low latency.
Will this constant connection drain my Flic button battery? No, Flic will go into sleep/passive mode when you are not using it and will wake up instantly when you press it. Flic and the Hub use BLE (Bluetooth Low Energy) which consumes so little power that you can rest assured that your Flic will last for up to 18 months on a single battery.
Can everyone in the house connect to the Flic Hub to control the devices? Once you connect a Flic to the Hub anyone in your house can use it! Your family, friends, even your dog! Each Hub will need to have an owner who links their partner/3rd party accounts to the Hub which can then be used by everyone else. The Hub itself is password protected so that only the owner can add new buttons and make changes unless they share the password to authorize others to do this.
I currently use Flic through my smartphone to connect with my smart devices and have noticed some lag. Will the Hub fix this? Yes, we have worked extremely hard to improve this and the Hub will ensure a much more responsive experience.
Does the Flic Hub support zigbee/z-wave? The Flic Hub is not able to directly control ZigBee or Z-Wave devices but we do support several Smartlights, Smartlocks, etc.. through the local network and cloud (IFTTT). Also we’re constantly building support for more and more devices.
Does the Hub support Apple ‘Homekit’? HomeKit will not be supported on the Hub at launch. We think it's great they have created a more open community by removing the MFI chip requirement. As such we will explore adding HomeKit in future software updates but we can't promise anything at this stage.

 

How many features and devices can I control with the Flic Hub? As many as you’d like! Each Flic supports three actions: Click, Double Click and Hold. For each action you can assign a chain of events such as: 
Single click = Turn on TV, Turn on Lights, Start Coffee Brewer etc.
What compatibility information is important to know? As long as you have WiFi or ethernet connected devices the the Hub can communicate with them. Some actions may not be directly listed in our app however through IFTTT many devices can be controlled via a Flic. 
The Hub can also communicate with Bluetooth classic devices and IR (infrared) however the connection range is limited.
To setup and manage the Hub settings a Bluetooth connection is required, so you need to turn on the bluetooth on your phone.
Can I attach the Flic Hub to a surface, or is it a standing product? Both! If you want to stick it somewhere then you can use the a double sided adhesive (optional accessory) that allows you to stick the Hub to any surface similar to Flic so you can stick it discretely behind the cabinet or under a table. The sticker is reusable and can be rinsed under water in case it gets dirty.
How is the Flic Hub powered? The Hub is powered via a Micro USB cable so you can connect it to any USB outlet. We recommended that you use a 1A output to ensure the best experience.
Can I have my Flic Hub outside to control my outdoor devices? The Hub is recommended as an indoor product only. You can still control any devices that are outside if they are connected to the same WiFi network though!
What is the size of the Hub? 85x50x15mm
What is the power consumption of the Flic Hub? 1.5 Watts (typical)
Does the Hub have a speaker built in? No. The Hub has 3.5mm Audio Jack and Bluetooth so you can connect the Hub to any speaker of your choice.

 

How do I choose what to control? In the Flic app we will have a new tab where you can see all your Hubs. Within this Hub tab you can connect and configure your Flics. It will be just as easy as it is now with the Flic app.
How will I know if the Flic is connected to my phone or my hub?

Within the Flic app we will have a new tab for the Hub.

Connect a Flic via the Hub tab and your Flics will connect to your Hub

Connect a Flic via the Flic tab and your Flics will connect to your phone

It’s as simple as that!
I’ve found a software bug (something is not working/functioning strangely), how can I report this? We really appreciate your feedback on these issues as it makes Flic and the app better for everyone. Please send us a quick email at support@shortcutlabs.com and we will take a look.
The app is only in English, do you have any language options? We only support the App in English at this time, but stay tuned for further updates.

 

I want to integrate my device with the Flic Hub, can I do that? We are working on how we can open the Hub for you to build your own plugins, stay tuned!
I want to run my own software on the hub, how can I do this? Once we’ve build support for 3rd party plugins you’ll be able to run your own software as a plugin.
I have an idea to use Flic Hub in my business, who do I contact? We love to hear you new and exciting ideas. Please send an email to support@shortcutlabs.com with your idea or use case! Our CTO will review these and get back to you with more info.
Where can I find more information for developing on Flic & the Flic Hub? Head over to this link.
Where can I find more information for developing on Flic & the Flic Hub? Head over to this link.

 

When will the Flic Hub be ready for shipping? Our current target is to start shipping the Hubs towards the end of October. If you supported us and contributed after the 20th of July we plan to ship end of November. If you supported us and contributed after the 19th of August we plan to ship in April 2018.  On the Indiegogo ‘Updates’ page we will constantly keep everyone up to date with the latest news on our production progress.
Where does it ship from? EU orders will be shipped from within the EU. Shipping location for all other orders are TBC.
Will I have to pay import taxes? EU and US customers will not be charged any import taxes. For all other countries please see the following link if there is any import taxes for your country, keep in mind that the numbers on this website are only indicative. https://www.dutycalculator.com/hs-lookup/127760... 
What if I need to change address? Send us an email at support@shortcutlabs.com and include the email address you use on Indiegogo and we will change it for you!

 

I can't find my question in the FAQ’s, what can I do? Post your question directly in the campaign page and we will get back to you with the answer. 
Otherwise you can also contact us via any of our social media pages or directly on our website www.flic.io

 

 

Rainfactory is a multiple-award-winning crowdfunding marketing agency that operates as a marketing department for growing brands. Rainfactory's experienced team & data-driven, battle-tested approach ensure long-term market dominance for eCommerce start-ups.

We hope you're as excited about it as we are. 
 

 

 
We are able to ship worldwide.* Please see reward details for the shipping cost that applies to you.*We can not ship to these countries: Andorra, Belarus, New Caledonia, Comoros, Congo, The Democratic Republic Of The Congo, Côte d'Ivoire, Curaçao, Egypt, Faroe Islands, Fiji, French, Polynesia, Greenland, Guernsey, Isle Of Man, Jersey, Kosovo, Lebanon, Liberia, Mozambique, Myanmar, Palestinian Territory, Occupied, Papua New Guinea, Reunion, Russia, Sao Tome And Principe, South Korea, South Sudan, Sudan, Syria , Tunisia , Turkey, Ukraine, Yemen,  Zimbabwe, Aland Islands, Bouvet Island, Burundi, Central African Republic, Cuba, Eritrea, French Guiana, French Southern Territories, Guinea, Guinea Bissau, Heard Island and Mcdonald Islands, Holy See (Vatican City State), Iran, Islamic Republic Of Iraq, Democratic People's Republic Of Korea, Libyan Arab Jamahiriya, Saint Helena, San Marino, Sierra Leone, Somalia, South Georgia And The South Sandwich Islands, Tajikistan, Western Sahara.We plan to ship the product in October 2017*. If you supported us and contributed after the 20th of July, we plan to ship your order in December 2017* IF you supported us and contributed after the 19th of August, we plan to ship your order in April 2018.* We will keep you up to date on our progress and the expected delivery date of your order.   *Actual ship dates may vary. We will keep you notified of your product ship date.By backing now you'll get to own one of the very first Flic Hubs off the line plus exclusive access to provide valuable feedback that will shape future generations of the product.  


How can I see if my order has been confirmed?
If you look under the ‘My Contributions’ tab located under your Indiegogo account then you will see if your order has been accepted and processed.


I’ve ordered the Hub + 3 Flic Buttons perk (or x2 Hubs + 6 Flic Buttons) what colour Flic buttons will I receive?
You will get a Black and White combo pack. For the 3 Flic Button orders it includes x1 Black + x2 White Flic Buttons. The 6 Flic Button orders will include x2 Black + x4 White Flic Button


How much is shipping for the IR accessory?
If you have purchased the $20 IR accessory perk in addition to the Hub perk then you will not be charged additional shipping. You will only pay the shipping cost associated with the Hub itself.


 


What is the Flic Hub?
The Flic Hub is our latest product. It acts as a link between your Flic buttons and your connected devices and services. The beauty of the Hub is that you no longer have to rely on your phone as the gateway, giving you a much more reliable & stable connection. It also comes with an optional IR accessory that allows you to control your TV, Set Top Box, HiFi sound system and much more directly from the Hub.


What is the Flic Hub App?
The Flic Hub app is built into the existing Flic app and is only needed when you want to set up the click, double click and hold functions for each of your Flic buttons. You can also use the app to manage all your connected buttons and 3rd party service providers.


Do I have to buy Flics in order for the Flic Hub to work?
Yes, you will need to have a least 1 Flic in order to use the Hub. 


I have Flics already, will they work with the Hub or do I need to buy new Flics?
Great! All Flics will work with the Hub!


Can all the actions in my current Flic App be used with Flic Hub?
Most of the apps currently supported by Flic will be available on the Hub. Unfortunately phone specific actions such as send text message or hang up call will not work on the Hub, but if you still want these then connect the Flic to your phone :) As always we will be continually adding to the action list and partners which are supported so your Hub’s capabilities will continue to improve.


Can one Flic Hub have multiple simultaneous users?
Yes. The Hub is perfect for the whole family to use and can support up to 64 simultaneous Flic connections at the same time.


What are the technical specification of the Hub?
Connectivity
Bluetooth Classic
Bluetooth Low Energy
WiFi
Ethernet
IR (optional accessory not included)
3.5mm audio out/mic in
Range
Bluetooth Classic & Low Energy - typically 100 feet (30m)
Wifi - typically 150 feet (45m)
IR accessory - Line of sight 
Size & Weight 
85x50x15mm
99g
Power 
Micro USB (1A recommended, 0.5A min)
1.5 Watts typical
Materials
PC/ABS plastic 
Reusable double sided adhesive 
IP ratingIP4X (indoor use only)


 

How does the Flic Hub connect to my devices?

The Hub combines WiFi and Bluetooth connectivity. 
Connect the Hub to your local WiFi network and it will be able to communicate with any other WiFi/Internet connected devices, both on your network and remotely.
Connect the Hub to your Bluetooth devices, such as Bluetooth speakers, and bring the Hub to life allowing it to play sounds (perfect for use as a doorbell).
Connect the optional IR accessory via the 3.5mm jack and control millions of legacy devices such as TV’s, Stereo Amplifiers, & Air Conditioners.



Will all my original/current Flic configurations be linked directly to the Hub?
Yes, to an extent. As long as you’re logged in via the same Flic account all of your Flic configurations should transfer over without you needing to reconfigure all your existing buttons. Unfortunately not all configurations will be available on the hub, e.g. phone specific actions such as send text message, or hang up call. Those that are compatible will be transferred once you pair the button to the Hub.


Do I need to pair my other smart devices to the Flic Hub?
Yes and no. The Hub will communicate with your other smart devices over a WiFi connection. As long as your other smart devices are correctly set up and connected to a network it will work seamlessly. If you want to connect Bluetooth devices to the Hub e.g. a Bluetooth speaker, then this can be done through the Flic app.

 

What is the range of the Flic Hub?
Up to 150 feet (45m) depending on the environment, indoors this is typically up to 100 feet (30m).


How do I connect my Flics to the Hub?

Download the Flic app, already available on the Apple App Store & Google Play Store
Once we start shipping you will then find a new tab for the Hub within our Flic App where you can pair your Flic buttons to the Hub.
After this pairing the phone is no longer needed unless you need to edit the button configuration.



How many Flics can I connect to the Flic Hub?
Up to 64 Flic Buttons, as of today. If you have a use case in mind that would require more reach out to us and we can see what we can do!


I have a big house, can I purchase additional Hubs to extend my range? 
Yes. Each Hub has a range of around 100 feet (30m) so if you need to extend this then adding additional hubs is recommended. If you have a Flic that you keep on your keychain or wear around the house then simply pair it once with each Hub you own and it will ensure a seamless experience in any room, great for music control around the entire house.


Can I power the Hub via a laptop or PC?
Yes, however we recommend that you connect it directly to a wall outlet via a USB power adapter that is able to supply a minimum of 1A output. This will ensure that you have the best possible experience.


Can I connect the Hub directly to my router/network switch?
Yes, you can connect an ethernet cable directly from the Hub to your router/network switch.


Can I connect the Hub to my Bluetooth speaker?
Yes! The Hub can connect to your speakers either with Bluetooth or with a standard 3.5mm Audio Jack cable.


Can I connect the Hub to my WiFi speaker?
Yes, no problem. As long as your WiFi speaker, e.g. a Sonos, is already setup and connected to a network then the Hub and Flic will be able to control it. 


What is IR and how can this control my TV, set top box, etc...? 
In a nutshell it means that a Flic can replace all your remote controls!IR means infrared and it's the way that old remote controls can communicate with TV’s, sound systems, air conditioners. We have developed an IR blaster accessory that you can connect to the hub that works like these old remote controls. This means you can clear the clutter on your coffee table and put all those old remote controls in the drawer as Flic can now replace them.


Is the Hub safe?
Yes, we take your privacy and security seriously so you can be sure that the Flic Hub will keep you and your smart home safe from threats.


Adding such a device to my home network is a security risk, is the Hub protected?
Yes the Hub is password protected keeping you and your smart home safe. Our protocol between the hub and the app uses both encryption and cryptographic signatures. On the network side no ports are open to the outside world. All communication with our backend goes over TLS. No other interface is used.


Does the Flic Hub maintain a connection to my Flic buttons?
Yes, once you pair a Flic to your Hub this will be remembered forever until you decide to disconnect it. This ensures that the Flic will work first time, every time with very low latency.


Will this constant connection drain my Flic button battery?
No, Flic will go into sleep/passive mode when you are not using it and will wake up instantly when you press it. Flic and the Hub use BLE (Bluetooth Low Energy) which consumes so little power that you can rest assured that your Flic will last for up to 18 months on a single battery.


Can everyone in the house connect to the Flic Hub to control the devices?
Once you connect a Flic to the Hub anyone in your house can use it! Your family, friends, even your dog! Each Hub will need to have an owner who links their partner/3rd party accounts to the Hub which can then be used by everyone else. The Hub itself is password protected so that only the owner can add new buttons and make changes unless they share the password to authorize others to do this.


I currently use Flic through my smartphone to connect with my smart devices and have noticed some lag. Will the Hub fix this?
Yes, we have worked extremely hard to improve this and the Hub will ensure a much more responsive experience.


Does the Flic Hub support zigbee/z-wave?
The Flic Hub is not able to directly control ZigBee or Z-Wave devices but we do support several Smartlights, Smartlocks, etc.. through the local network and cloud (IFTTT). Also we’re constantly building support for more and more devices.


Does the Hub support Apple ‘Homekit’?
HomeKit will not be supported on the Hub at launch. We think it's great they have created a more open community by removing the MFI chip requirement. As such we will explore adding HomeKit in future software updates but we can't promise anything at this stage.

 

How many features and devices can I control with the Flic Hub?
As many as you’d like! Each Flic supports three actions: Click, Double Click and Hold. For each action you can assign a chain of events such as: Single click = Turn on TV, Turn on Lights, Start Coffee Brewer etc.


What compatibility information is important to know?
As long as you have WiFi or ethernet connected devices the the Hub can communicate with them. Some actions may not be directly listed in our app however through IFTTT many devices can be controlled via a Flic. The Hub can also communicate with Bluetooth classic devices and IR (infrared) however the connection range is limited.To setup and manage the Hub settings a Bluetooth connection is required, so you need to turn on the bluetooth on your phone.


Can I attach the Flic Hub to a surface, or is it a standing product?
Both! If you want to stick it somewhere then you can use the a double sided adhesive (optional accessory) that allows you to stick the Hub to any surface similar to Flic so you can stick it discretely behind the cabinet or under a table. The sticker is reusable and can be rinsed under water in case it gets dirty.


How is the Flic Hub powered?
The Hub is powered via a Micro USB cable so you can connect it to any USB outlet. We recommended that you use a 1A output to ensure the best experience.


Can I have my Flic Hub outside to control my outdoor devices?
The Hub is recommended as an indoor product only. You can still control any devices that are outside if they are connected to the same WiFi network though!


What is the size of the Hub?
85x50x15mm


What is the power consumption of the Flic Hub?
1.5 Watts (typical)


Does the Hub have a speaker built in?
No. The Hub has 3.5mm Audio Jack and Bluetooth so you can connect the Hub to any speaker of your choice.

 

How do I choose what to control?
In the Flic app we will have a new tab where you can see all your Hubs. Within this Hub tab you can connect and configure your Flics. It will be just as easy as it is now with the Flic app.


How will I know if the Flic is connected to my phone or my hub?

Within the Flic app we will have a new tab for the Hub.
Connect a Flic via the Hub tab and your Flics will connect to your Hub
Connect a Flic via the Flic tab and your Flics will connect to your phone
It’s as simple as that!



I’ve found a software bug (something is not working/functioning strangely), how can I report this?
We really appreciate your feedback on these issues as it makes Flic and the app better for everyone. Please send us a quick email at support@shortcutlabs.com and we will take a look.


The app is only in English, do you have any language options?
We only support the App in English at this time, but stay tuned for further updates.

 

I want to integrate my device with the Flic Hub, can I do that?
We are working on how we can open the Hub for you to build your own plugins, stay tuned!


I want to run my own software on the hub, how can I do this?
Once we’ve build support for 3rd party plugins you’ll be able to run your own software as a plugin.


I have an idea to use Flic Hub in my business, who do I contact?
We love to hear you new and exciting ideas. Please send an email to support@shortcutlabs.com with your idea or use case! Our CTO will review these and get back to you with more info.


Where can I find more information for developing on Flic & the Flic Hub?
Head over to this link.


Where can I find more information for developing on Flic & the Flic Hub?
Head over to this link.

 

When will the Flic Hub be ready for shipping?
Our current target is to start shipping the Hubs towards the end of October. If you supported us and contributed after the 20th of July we plan to ship end of November. If you supported us and contributed after the 19th of August we plan to ship in April 2018.  On the Indiegogo ‘Updates’ page we will constantly keep everyone up to date with the latest news on our production progress.


Where does it ship from?
EU orders will be shipped from within the EU. Shipping location for all other orders are TBC.


Will I have to pay import taxes?
EU and US customers will not be charged any import taxes. For all other countries please see the following link if there is any import taxes for your country, keep in mind that the numbers on this website are only indicative. https://www.dutycalculator.com/hs-lookup/127760... 


What if I need to change address?
Send us an email at support@shortcutlabs.com and include the email address you use on Indiegogo and we will change it for you!

 
I can't find my question in the FAQ’s, what can I do?
Post your question directly in the campaign page and we will get back to you with the answer. Otherwise you can also contact us via any of our social media pages or directly on our website www.flic.io

  Rainfactory is a multiple-award-winning crowdfunding marketing agency that operates as a marketing department for growing brands. Rainfactory's experienced team & data-driven, battle-tested approach ensure long-term market dominance for eCommerce start-ups.

story:
Order now - Delivery in September (Free Shipping to USA!)

If you back today, you will receive your Sienna Edge by September.  It's time to invest in a germ free kitchen.  

KEEP KITCHEN CUTLERY SANITIZED - Traditional knife holders are a breeding ground for harmful germs and bacteria, and provide no functionality beyond storage. The Edge combines automatic, safe sanitization technology with modern design making it the perfect upgrade for your kitchen. This universal knife block fits all leading brands of knives up to 8" long blades x 2.5" wide. **CUTLERY NOT INCLUDED**

SANITIZATION WITHOUT THE CHEMICALS - The Sienna Edge UV Sanitizer and sterilizer brings powerful sanitization to your home without using harsh cleaners and chemicals. This industrial cleaning method is the same one used by labs, restaurants and medical offices. Using safe, invisible germicidal light, the Edge actively sanitizes kitchen knives while they are stored in the knife block.

KEEP YOUR FAMILY SAFE AND HEALTHY - Harmful germs, viruses, and bacteria are everywhere and we’re constantly in contact with them throughout the day. Create a clean and sanitary food prep environment for your family, ensuring that bacteria is not accumulating on your knife edges.

CONTINUOUS UV-C LIGHT TECHNOLOGY KILLS 99.9% OF BACTERIA - The UV Edge fills the knife block compartment with powerful UV-C light covering the entire surface of the blade to thoroughly sanitize. The durable ultraviolet sterilizing light has over 20,000 hours of cleaning power and takes just 30 minutes to kill 99.9% of germs, viruses and bacteria including Staph, Salmonella and E. Coli, so you can feel confident that the knife you take out is clean and sterilized.

PRESS START AND WALK AWAY - The Edge epitomizes easy to use technology. Clean and dry your knives, then place them in the fitted slot, press the start button and walk away. The knives will heat first (167 degrees)  to dry excess moisture and then the harmless light will sanitize noiselessly.  When the Edge has completed the sanitization cycle it will automatically turn off (about 30 minutes).

story:
Elemental Coasters

Are you tired of your old, boring coffee table? We have just the cure you're looking for: A set of solid metal elemental coasters.

Guaranteed to instantly turn any boring table into a work of art:

  • Solid Elemental Metals (Magnesium, Tungsten, Titanium, Copper)
  • Solid metal on top with rubberized backing to protect any surface
  • Laser etched surface

Who is Polar Metals?

Spicing up your life with interesting elements is what we do! We can help you go from boring to awesome by injecting some interesting and unusual metals into your life. More than 500 people have backed our metal projects here on Indiegogo!

"Just received it. Nice packing, thanks, nice product :)" - Cem G. 
"Love these!!" - Tracey R.

The Elements

Each coaster is solid metal with a rubberized backing to protect your table.

Tungsten is dense super metal that has the highest melting point of any metal. 

  • 70% denser than lead
  • Denser than Uranium
  • Nearly impossible to melt
  • 4x harder than Titanium
  • 19x denser than water

Magnesium is the lightest metal used in engineering.  

  • 50% lighter than Aluminum
  • Alloys can be extremely strong and are used in many aerospace applications
  • Very important in biology - present in all living cells
  • Adult humans contain about 24 grams of Magnesium

Copper is a germ-killer with a distinct color.

  • It’s Oligodynamic, which means it naturally kills germs on contact. 
  • We each have about 2mg of copper in our body, without which we could not survive.
  • It’s dense - between lead and steel in density 
  • Along with gold, the only non-greyish pure metal 
  • Takes on its own unique hue over time 

Titanium is used extensively in the aerospace industry and is very difficult to manufacture.

  • The most biocompatible and safe metal for the human body 
  • The only element that your body fully accepts - even bone will grow around it
  • Named after Titans of Greek mythology because of its immense strength 
  • The highest strength-to-density ratio of any metallic element 
  • Less than half the density of steel 
  • Excellent resistance to corrosion, nearly equivalent to platinum 

Say goodbye to your boring coffee table! Get the full set of 4 elements including a stainless steel holder. Pledge now and help us bring these elements to life!

story:
Pop-up kitchen PIA by dizzconcept

Stylish TV cabinet. Fully equipped hidden kitchen. “In the box” compact solution, easily transformable. An award winning design. Saves space or adds functionality to the modern interior. Premium quality. Easy installation and transportation.

 

Innovation for practical living

Dizzconcept has been challenging furniture industry over the years to make living better, by innovating new age furniture solutions of premium design and quality.

Our latest product is Pop-up kitchen PIA, a fully equipped kitchen and TV cabinet in one “box”.

It is an innovative solution which:

  1. saves valuable and costly space generally occupied by the standard kitchen
  2. or adds an element of surprise, functionality and stylish design to your interior. 

 

Decorative TV cabinet

With doors closed, PIA looks like a living room cabinet with integrated TV. The TV hangs on a wall mount and can be rotated to adjust for the better view. 

Watch TV with doors closed or opened, or connect your smart device to smart TV and browse our pages.

 

The swivel TV mount with extendable support arm enables TV to be pulled out of the TV niche and rotated. You can even watch TV while cooking.

 

All standard kitchen elements in place

With the doors opened you get a fully functional and equipped contemporary kitchen.

Worktop is 180 cm long with integrated sink, faucet, and cooktop. The base arrangement includes dishwasher, waste disposal cabinet, base cabinet with shelf and drawer, and integrated refrigerator. Upper cabinets include the fully integrated hood, LED lighting and electricity sockets, and an open shelf for placing a freestanding microwave oven. 15 cm default deep doors can store a lot of dishes, utensils, bottles, ingredients, and groceries.

 

Easily transformable: kitchen - TV cabinet

Surprise your guests with hidden kitchen or hide kitchen mess when your guests surprise you.

 

Improves interior design and adds an element of surprise

Stylish decorative TV cabinet is great fit for every interior. While hidden kitchen will surprise even your most demanding guests. As it requires only 1,6 m2 of the living space, it can be incorporated into any room and gives great functionality in so little space.

Therefore, PIA is an ideal solution for majority of urban, tourist and rental apartments, offices, nursing homes, holiday homes or as an additional kitchen in large dwellings.

Install it in holiday home,

Urban apartment,

Office,

Or even gym or hotel

 

Space saving

PIA unifies two elements in the interior: the kitchen and the TV cabinet. This enables a whole new approach to designing small flats, hotel rooms, holiday homes, offices… Planning of smaller living units without any loss of functionality or aesthetics saves special resources, encourages building smaller parcels that take less infrastructure support, energy and materials spent for building, heating, and cooling.

PIA requires only 1,6 m2 of the living space. Transform your current apartment and gain an additional bedroom.

 

Great functionality, ergonomics, and safety

Doors opened at an angle of 90 to 180 degrees present an optimal work environment with utensils and groceries at hand. A TV set built in the closet door is adjustable for flexible use.

PIA has a built-in sensor with a safety switch that turns the power on/off for certain appliances upon opening/closing doors; for example, it will leave the power for refrigerator always on and it will turn off power for hob and oven upon closing doors – safety switch is highly recommended for kitchen units with hobs or ovens.

Besides a built-in (filter) hood, ventilation of the kitchen even when closed is carefully thought and enabled by strategically positioned air vents.

 

Easy installation and transportation

PIA can be placed in a niche, against a wall or freestanding in the center of space. To achieve full functionality, it is necessary to provide water, electricity and network connections. These connections can be pulled from anywhere in the width of the back of the kitchen.

Delivery and installation are quick and easy. Unpacked, it consists of several modules ready for quick and easy assembly in merely 60 minutes. Each of PIA’s parts is optimized to fit in a standard size elevator.

If done according to the instruction, the kitchen can be disassembled and relocated numerous times.

 

Premium quality, ecological process and materials

PIA is designed to complement modern and contemporary interiors by the selection of decors, materials and high-tech appliances. Materials, fittings and good construction solutions guarantee PIA's longevity and sturdiness.

People require a product that can provide great durability. It is a great challenge to make such reusable product. PIA is designed for multiple installations and usage in different spaces which makes moving it from space to space possible, while most other kitchens are discarded.

We are also getting back to natural material but with different principles, sustainable growth being one of them. We take care of the environment throughout the entire process of production, packaging and waste disposal. We use strictly ecologically sustainable materials and comply with highest standards and regulations, without the use of dangerous substances.  We use wood from FSC certified forests, treated with natural oils.

 

An award-winning concept

  • Interior innovation award - Best of Best by German Design Council, Cologne
  • Green product award, winner in category Furniture by White Lobster, Germany
  • International Design Excellence Award (IDEA) - Finalist by Industrial Designers Society of America
  • Gold medal Mobil optimum by Ambienta, Zagreb
  • Smart Kitchen Summit finalist, Seattle, USA

 

Others are talking about us as well...

 

Models

During the campaign, we are offering pop-up kitchen PIA Nova in 3 decor combinations.

You will get kitchen cabinet with doors, electrical sockets, LED light, safety switch and sink.

Appliances are not included as every country has different standards, but they can be ordered separately.

For any queries of eventual modifications, please just contact us at info@dizzconcept.com.

 

Our team

We are constantly challenging furniture industry to make living better by innovating new age furniture solutions with great design and quality. Over the years we have decorated numerous interiors and designed and produced many different furniture items.

For this project we have gathered a great team of designers, architects, mechanical engineers, wood technology engineers, economists and various manufacturing experts.

 

Why crowdfunding?

We’ve spent countless hours, days and weeks designing and building PIA.

We were driven by ideas:

  1. to answer changing consumer habits and improving the quality of living in modern cities, where the urban space is getting more and more limited,
  2. to add extra comfort and stylish design to larger interiors with funcionality and "wow" effect in mind.
  3. to create unique, multiuse furniture solution while keeping our core product values: premium design and quality.

Therefore, we designed an industry-changing concept - Pop-up kitchen PIA.

But…

To start up mass production and make PIA available worldwide, we need further investments and therefore we need your help.

As an Indiegogo exclusive, we are offering special, limited PIA offers to make sure we reach our budget goal. Also, to make this crowdfunding campaign 100% transparent, we’ll do everything to keep you fully informed and deliver you the coolest furniture solution you ever had.

 

Questions?

Please check FAQs for additional details.

If you have any additional questions please just contact us at info@dizzconcept.com.

You can also follow us on social networks – Facebook or Linkedin.
story_txt:
