 Decorative TV cabinetWith doors closed, PIA looks like a living room cabinet with integrated TV. The TV hangs on a wall mount and can be rotated to adjust for the better view. Watch TV with doors closed or opened, or connect your smart device to smart TV and browse our pages.   The swivel TV mount with extendable support arm enables TV to be pulled out of the TV niche and rotated. You can even watch TV while cooking. All standard kitchen elements in placeWith the doors opened you get a fully functional and equipped contemporary kitchen.Worktop is 180 cm long with integrated sink, faucet, and cooktop. The base arrangement includes dishwasher, waste disposal cabinet, base cabinet with shelf and drawer, and integrated refrigerator. Upper cabinets include the fully integrated hood, LED lighting and electricity sockets, and an open shelf for placing a freestanding microwave oven. 15 cm default deep doors can store a lot of dishes, utensils, bottles, ingredients, and groceries. Easily transformable: kitchen - TV cabinet Surprise your guests with hidden kitchen or hide kitchen mess when your guests surprise you. Improves interior design and adds an element of surprise Stylish decorative TV cabinet is great fit for every interior. While hidden kitchen will surprise even your most demanding guests. As it requires only 1,6 m2 of the living space, it can be incorporated into any room and gives great functionality in so little space.Therefore, PIA is an ideal solution for majority of urban, tourist and rental apartments, offices, nursing homes, holiday homes or as an additional kitchen in large dwellings.Install it in holiday home,Urban apartment,Office,Or even gym or hotel Space saving PIA unifies two elements in the interior: the kitchen and the TV cabinet. This enables a whole new approach to designing small flats, hotel rooms, holiday homes, offices… Planning of smaller living units without any loss of functionality or aesthetics saves special resources, encourages building smaller parcels that take less infrastructure support, energy and materials spent for building, heating, and cooling.PIA requires only 1,6 m2 of the living space. Transform your current apartment and gain an additional bedroom.  Great functionality, ergonomics, and safety Doors opened at an angle of 90 to 180 degrees present an optimal work environment with utensils and groceries at hand. A TV set built in the closet door is adjustable for flexible use.PIA has a built-in sensor with a safety switch that turns the power on/off for certain appliances upon opening/closing doors; for example, it will leave the power for refrigerator always on and it will turn off power for hob and oven upon closing doors – safety switch is highly recommended for kitchen units with hobs or ovens.Besides a built-in (filter) hood, ventilation of the kitchen even when closed is carefully thought and enabled by strategically positioned air vents. Easy installation and transportationPIA can be placed in a niche, against a wall or freestanding in the center of space. To achieve full functionality, it is necessary to provide water, electricity and network connections. These connections can be pulled from anywhere in the width of the back of the kitchen.Delivery and installation are quick and easy. Unpacked, it consists of several modules ready for quick and easy assembly in merely 60 minutes. Each of PIA’s parts is optimized to fit in a standard size elevator.If done according to the instruction, the kitchen can be disassembled and relocated numerous times. Premium quality, ecological process and materialsPIA is designed to complement modern and contemporary interiors by the selection of decors, materials and high-tech appliances. Materials, fittings and good construction solutions guarantee PIA's longevity and sturdiness.People require a product that can provide great durability. It is a great challenge to make such reusable product. PIA is designed for multiple installations and usage in different spaces which makes moving it from space to space possible, while most other kitchens are discarded.We are also getting back to natural material but with different principles, sustainable growth being one of them. We take care of the environment throughout the entire process of production, packaging and waste disposal. We use strictly ecologically sustainable materials and comply with highest standards and regulations, without the use of dangerous substances.  We use wood from FSC certified forests, treated with natural oils. An award-winning concept

Interior innovation award - Best of Best by German Design Council, Cologne

Green product award, winner in category Furniture by White Lobster, Germany

International Design Excellence Award (IDEA) - Finalist by Industrial Designers Society of America

Gold medal Mobil optimum by Ambienta, Zagreb

Smart Kitchen Summit finalist, Seattle, USA
 Others are talking about us as well... ModelsDuring the campaign, we are offering pop-up kitchen PIA Nova in 3 decor combinations.You will get kitchen cabinet with doors, electrical sockets, LED light, safety switch and sink.Appliances are not included as every country has different standards, but they can be ordered separately.For any queries of eventual modifications, please just contact us at info@dizzconcept.com. Our teamWe are constantly challenging furniture industry to make living better by innovating new age furniture solutions with great design and quality. Over the years we have decorated numerous interiors and designed and produced many different furniture items.For this project we have gathered a great team of designers, architects, mechanical engineers, wood technology engineers, economists and various manufacturing experts. Why crowdfunding?We’ve spent countless hours, days and weeks designing and building PIA.We were driven by ideas:
to answer changing consumer habits and improving the quality of living in modern cities, where the urban space is getting more and more limited,
to add extra comfort and stylish design to larger interiors with funcionality and "wow" effect in mind.
to create unique, multiuse furniture solution while keeping our core product values: premium design and quality.
Therefore, we designed an industry-changing concept - Pop-up kitchen PIA.But…To start up mass production and make PIA available worldwide, we need further investments and therefore we need your help.As an Indiegogo exclusive, we are offering special, limited PIA offers to make sure we reach our budget goal. Also, to make this crowdfunding campaign 100% transparent, we’ll do everything to keep you fully informed and deliver you the coolest furniture solution you ever had. Questions?Please check FAQs for additional details.If you have any additional questions please just contact us at info@dizzconcept.com.You can also follow us on social networks – Facebook or Linkedin.

story:
Sheet pan cooking is the easiest and most efficient way of making a delicious homemade meal.

There are lots of ways to cook on a sheet pan, but they are often wasteful or messy and not everything takes the same amount of time to cook.

We knew there had to be a better way...

Introducing Cheat Sheets, a completely new approach to sheet pan cooking.  Oven-safe, non-stick silicone dividers that will streamline your cooking and divide your ingredients, to make one-pan meals and meal prepping a breeze.

We get it... If you're new to oven cooking, it can feel like a bit of a science experiment that involves a lot of guesswork. That's why we've tested the most popular everyday ingredients and created an easy timing guide so that you’ll get perfect results every time.

Cheat Sheets are made for meal prep. With our modular dividers, you can cook all of your ingredients with even better organization and control. 

You can fit up to 6x small portions or 3x large portions on a single sheet pan and with multiple sets, you'll have everything you need to prep for the family or a week's worth of meals.
story_txt:
Sheet pan cooking is the easiest and most efficient way of making a delicious homemade meal.There are lots of ways to cook on a sheet pan, but they are often wasteful or messy and not everything takes the same amount of time to cook.We knew there had to be a better way...Introducing Cheat Sheets, a completely new approach to sheet pan cooking.  Oven-safe, non-stick silicone dividers that will streamline your cooking and divide your ingredients, to make one-pan meals and meal prepping a breeze.
Everyone loves sheet pan cooking, but it’s not always as simple as putting everything in the oven together and coming back to find it has all cooked evenly. Reality is, not everything takes the same amount of time to cook. With Cheat Sheets, you can easily remove ingredients when they're ready and never overcook them again.We get it... If you're new to oven cooking, it can feel like a bit of a science experiment that involves a lot of guesswork. That's why we've tested the most popular everyday ingredients and created an easy timing guide so that you’ll get perfect results every time.


Cheat Sheets are made for meal prep. With our modular dividers, you can cook all of your ingredients with even better organization and control. 
You can fit up to 6x small portions or 3x large portions on a single sheet pan and with multiple sets, you'll have everything you need to prep for the family or a week's worth of meals.


With Cheat Sheets you can easily separate ingredients and flavors without having them mingle. Whether you want to use different marinades, cook savory and sweet dishes at the same time, or simply don’t want your food to touch, Cheat Sheets has you covered.
Separation also comes in handy for families with different preferences, allowing you to create different portions for those with special dietary requirements or specific tastes - because not everybody likes pineapple on their pizza.


Aluminum foil and parchment paper are hugely wasteful and non-recyclable. Sheet pans are also notoriously difficult to clean, collecting stains and grime with every meal.
With Cheat Sheets you'll never have to scrub another sheet pan again and you'll save tonnes of wasted paper and foil. Cheat Sheets are naturally non-stick so clean-up is a breeze. They're also dishwasher safe!





The Cheat Sheets dividers are made with a premium, food-grade silicone material resistant to temperatures up to 450 degrees F. The dividers will fit on a standard half sheet pan or perfectly on the Prepd Sheet Pan included with each set.
The Prepd Sheet Pan is made from Carbon Steel and coated with a non-stick PTFE and PFOA free coating.


 

Around 18 months ago we had an insight...
Out of all the Prepd Pack owners (now over 100,000 people), those who consistently meal prep all use sheet pans. But sheet pans have never changed since their inception. They are hard to clean, require you to constantly waste parchment paper and aluminum foil and are not designed to best serve how we actually cook, ie, multiple items in the oven at once.
We knew there had to be a better way. A solution that is easier to clean and gives ultimate versatility to the sheet pan. Allowing you to easily time each ingredient of the meal. A zero-waste solution removing the need to constantly create non-recyclable waste.
We were immediately drawn to silicone as it is completely food safe to high temperatures, naturally non-stick, long-lasting and resistant to bacteria. In our first phase of development, we tried dozens of different types of silicone and different colors to ensure our solution would be stain-resistant and have perfect heat transfer. Then we started our testing and prototyping phase. 
 
This is where we started cooking meals in the Cheat Sheets to ensure every dimension was perfect and more importantly, food cooked just as well as on a 'naked' sheet-pan.
We then opened our first tooling, received FDA approval and did a wider beta test. The feedback was phenomenal all round. After hitting our Kickstarter funding goal we have kicked off all of our final tooling so that production can begin shortly after the campaign end.
 


"Cooking just might be the single most important thing you can do for your dietary health . . . Cooking for yourself is the only sure way to take back control of your diet from the food scientists and food processors” Michael Pollan - Food Rules.
At Prepd we strongly believe that cooking for yourself or your family is the best and easiest way to stay healthy, especially during these challenging times. It doesn’t have to always be health food, so long as you cooked it and know the ingredients, that's enough.
Since we started Prepd in 2015 it has been our sole focus to help make preparing meals at home easier and more enjoyable. By creating tools and systems to help make healthy living easier, we hope to make healthy resolutions - lifelong habits.
Prepd was founded by two industrial designers, Chris Place & Will Matters. Together, we have designed and manufactured dozens of products and delivered product to customers all over the world. Our first product together was the Prepd Pack a reinvention of the lunchbox that was launched and successfully delivered to over 12,500 backers on Kickstarter in 2016.
Since launch, we've grown to a community of more than 100,000 avid meal preppers and talented cooks.
We can't wait to go on this next Prepd journey with you!

story:
AS SEEN ON

World Latte Championship Winner Um Paul!

We had the chance to meet Um Paul to review our product and this is how it went:

Q1. What differentiates the existing mocha pot from the Essopot?
The biggest difference is that there is an manual extraction valve. The water does not pass through the tank immediately, and when the valve is opened, it creates a dark-concentrated espresso and crema at a higher temperature and pressure. If you leave the valve open, it acts just the same as normal moka pot. However, if you close the the valve and open it once heated you can get a more rich flavored espresso just like a high-end espresso machine.




Q2. Any advisory for future Essopot users?
I think Essopot is a sensational outbreak like Dyson in the coffee world. I hope you can enjoy and use the Essopot with your various ideas. The more you use it, the more you'll like it. Whether at home or outdoors, you can enjoy this amazing espresso anytime, anywhere along with latte art.

Try adding a spoonful of sugar on your crema-filled espresso every morning.
Enjoy a cup of Americano full of crema when you are studying or working.

Q3. Lastly, please send words of support to Epoproduct and Essopot
"Thank you so much" is the first thing I want to say.
Thank you for making this wonderful work.
Because it's not just a coffee item, it's a work of art.
I have no doubt that Epoh product will be loved all over the world beyond Korea.
Essopot will bring happy lives to many coffee lovers all over the world.

 
 

 

 
 
 
Espresso Machine: At a pressure of 9 BAR the temperature is at 90 Degrees 
Essopot: At a pressure of 5 BAR the temperature is at 150 Degrees
Both have an extraction of approximately 20%
 
 
 
A delicious latte perfect with desserts.
 
 
  

 



Link to Our
 MEDIA KIT

 

Follow Us on:
Instagram
Facebook

story:
Nothing…and I mean nothing is as frustrating as watching the freshly-cleaned vegetables and fruits you just rinsed fall into the sink AFTER you’ve rinsed them. Even worse, if you don’t have a good grip on your items, they can ALL fall back into the sink – taking your sanity with them.

The Equilibric colander reduces the amount of water needed to wash your fruits and vegetables by 60% - all while removing twice as many contaminants! You will never have to worry about items in the sink again because this design saves you time and frustration.

Its ergonomic design keeps the vegetables upright and safe as the water bowl drains the dirty water away, cleaning your foods and keeping your clean items safe from spillage.


The colander also serves as a great serving dish for you.  You don’t have to worry about using more dishes than necessary just because you need something to put them in afterwards.  Drain the excess water from your vegetables - and serve your fruits or salads in the same dish.

Trying to defrost something at room temperature turns into a huge problem for most cooks.  Water often winds up all over the counter creating an even bigger mess, and more work for you.

With typical colanders, lots of dirt and other contaminates can transfer to your clean serving dishes.  But with the Equilibric colander, its washing machine motion helps remove 90% of the dirt and bacteria from your foods – giving you a healthier, more nutrient rich meal!

As you can see, the Equilibric colander saves you time and energy.  It’s also incredibly efficient, sanitary, and environmentally conscious.  Moreover it saves extra money on your water bill.

Equilibric has a very well considered hole slots pattern that allows to drain the excess water fast and simple. Equilibric Bowl is made from a high quality polypropylene which is an unharmful material to dine from. Equilibric Bowl design has a special spin system which uses the force of gravity to speed up all kitchen tasks.






Story. Team. Development. Future.

My name is Ann and I’ve been working in design for eight years. I’ve graduated twice and worked my way from the position of a common designer to art director. My husband Tim is an engineer and likes inventing. Together we’ve come up with Equilibric.

Me and Tim were born in the countryside, and despite growing up in an urban area, we always preferred home food over fast food l, which bears no benefit or proper nutrients, often being harmful. So we cook home a lot and try to ease doing so process as much as possible.

Four years ago I had the idea to improve the typical colander design, after having bought all kinds of them in stores, inspired by design of various items and inventions, from spoons to airplanes. So I took a pencil and got to draw.


Thanks to Tim, my sketches and concepts came to life as working prototypes.



The most problematic part was talking to various China-based factories. We were sending the design and info over, but struggled with communication problems. But ultimately, we found a manufacturer and a manager that helped us on this stage after it had stretched on for a while.

Two years ago, Sabina joined us as a co-founder, responsible for communications and marketing. Without her, we wouldn’t have been able to make it to Kickstarter and organize everything.

We’re really grateful to Inpixel, the company that took care of the video material for us, delivering calmly great results despite my quite extensive list of requests.

Our future plans is to introduce a brand new type of colander for enthusiasts and kitchen professionals. I promise, you haven’t seen anything like it before, and we’ll be showcasing it on Kickstarter right from the concept stage! We’re also creating a USB-powered heating food container, which might possible have its own battery.

Our global goal is to create a brand of smart kitchen gadgets and food containers (both with and without heating) for carrying your dishes.

Please help us bring our plans to life, and become part of Equilibric!


TIMELINE


April 24, Project ends

May 8, Receiving funds from Kickstarter

May 9 - July 10, Mass production

July 10-20, Quality control

July 20-25, Shipping to the fulfilment and logistics centre

July 26, Shipping out

End of August, All backers receive their Equilibric


SHIPPING INFORMATION 


+ SHIPPING ADDRESSES WILL BE COLLECTED VIA CROWDOX  

https://crowdox.com


+ LOGISTICS AND FULLFILMENT SERVICES WILL BE PROVIDED BY SFC 

https://www.sendfromchina.com

SHIPPING RATES

  • United States - $5

story:
Imezing is probably the World’s Most Compact Cordless Melt Hot Glue Pen breaking through the Conventional Look and Structure of Hot Glue Gun. It has Lithium battery inside and is charged through a USB-C port. It takes 15 Seconds to Heat up and get ready. It is probably by now the most easy-to-use, convenient, trouble-free, handy and versatile glue pen suitable for many sorts of materials.

For anyone who loves crafting or making costumes, the value of a glue gun can’t be measured in money, but for efficiency, convenience, and versatility. Being able to glue on those sequins or adding just the right number of natural twigs to that decorative bird nest can only be achieved if the glue gun works with optimal performance.

Imezing cordless glue pen is a game-changer in this respect. No longer are you confined to a table within reach of a socket. As long as it is charged you can take creative arts and DIY projects anywhere.

Imezing incredibly versatile glue pen offers cordless gluing to achieve excellent results on many creative arts and craft projects. 

The Imezing glue gun helps unleash the possibilities of endless creativity to life. It offers wireless gluing to achieve excellent results on numerous creative arts and DIY projects. 

Pursuing minimalist aesthetics and built robustness, we make the Imezing to be truly handy and by using All-aluminum Alloy Integrated Process, we manage to remove all cracks on the device surface, making it so smooth to hold and look premium.

The palm-size compactness offers unprecedented convenience either on desktop or you may drop it into pocket for school DIY tasks. What’s more, the ergonomic design makes it enjoyable to grip while working.

Glue, fasten or repair various materials quickly. Its compact and convenient design makes gluing a lot of fun.

A built-in storage bin is designed on the top of the lid, which can store 3 glue sticks at the same time.

The Imezing melt hot glue pen is the perfect tool for DIY, small arts, craft making and covers scenarios like adhesive attachment, model making, repairing, sealing and jointing. 

Unlike the conventional gun-shape design, Imezing takes the ease of use and invisibility of a tool as top priority. It is constructed to fit right in your palm and when it is taken up, it gets ready in 15 seconds.

No plug and unplug. No worries of large space occupation. Most importantly, it always keeps your desktop neat and even looks like a decor for any space.

The quick start feature provides a rapid 15-second heat-up time. A super-fast heating chamber reaches the perfect temperature for gluing rapidly, so that the project can start immediately.

Imezing glue pen is a popular tool for arts and crafts, professional home improvement, and DIY projects.

It has very thin nozzle: 2 milimeter diameter. Precision accuracy is delivered to every project. With the heat preservation sleeve at the glue gun’s nozzle, it offers better scald prevention.

Thanks to its non-stick nozzle, Imezing offers quite enjoyable experience when quickly glue, attach, or make repairs and makes you enjoy the cordless freedom while gluing.

The Imezing glue pen has lithium battery power supply. It is charged at the button through a USB-C with a 5V charger. One full charge can support up to 90 mins battery runtime. 

It is easily operated: press the power switch and wait for 15 seconds to get heated up. Push the red button, when the button goes constantly down, you may start gluing. Its straights out and you may stop any time. It dries almost right away with no strings, no drip glue. Compared to competitive products, it offers precision gluing with smaller glue strands.

The hot glue can be applied to a great diversity of materials such as fabric, plastic, leather, wood, cardboard, glass, stone, electronic components, rubber, fiber, metal, ceramics, pearl cotton, jewelry, nut shell, cloth art, plants, etc.

The Imezing comes with one set of 100 environmental-friendly glue sticks (0.28" x 0.8" inch), which is enough for a long time use.  The colorful glitter glue sticks also open the door for vibrant personal touches and bold imagination. It uses 7 milimeter glue sticks. You can bond and design with an easy-to-use trigger which is non-slip coated with silicone. 

User-Centered Design

We care much about details. Every single perspective on Imezing is carefully crafted by our designers ranging from the all-metal one-piece body for aesthetic look, ergonomic hold grip, the silicon coated anti-slip red button to fuel the creativity, the magnetic lip for pleasant human-device interaction feedback, to the LED ring light located on the top to show you the working status of the unit.

The Imezing team consists of a group of designers, engineers and seekers of  quality life. Back to simplicity and convenience are our core concept. Together, we are dedicated to upgrading tools to the next level and  creating truly practical and stylish tools and instruments.

It offers wireless gluing to achieve excellent results on numerous creative arts and DIY projects. Pursuing minimalist aesthetics and built robustness, we make the Imezing to be truly handy and by using All-aluminum Alloy Integrated Process, we manage to remove all cracks on the device surface, making it so smooth to hold and look premium.The palm-size compactness offers unprecedented convenience either on desktop or you may drop it into pocket for school DIY tasks. What’s more, the ergonomic design makes it enjoyable to grip while working.Glue, fasten or repair various materials quickly. Its compact and convenient design makes gluing a lot of fun.A built-in storage bin is designed on the top of the lid, which can store 3 glue sticks at the same time.The Imezing melt hot glue pen is the perfect tool for DIY, small arts, craft making and covers scenarios like adhesive attachment, model making, repairing, sealing and jointing. Unlike the conventional gun-shape design, Imezing takes the ease of use and invisibility of a tool as top priority. It is constructed to fit right in your palm and when it is taken up, it gets ready in 15 seconds.No plug and unplug. No worries of large space occupation. Most importantly, it always keeps your desktop neat and even looks like a decor for any space.The quick start feature provides a rapid 15-second heat-up time. A super-fast heating chamber reaches the perfect temperature for gluing rapidly, so that the project can start immediately.Imezing glue pen is a popular tool for arts and crafts, professional home improvement, and DIY projects.It has very thin nozzle: 2 milimeter diameter. Precision accuracy is delivered to every project. With the heat preservation sleeve at the glue gun’s nozzle, it offers better scald prevention.Thanks to its non-stick nozzle, Imezing offers quite enjoyable experience when quickly glue, attach, or make repairs and makes you enjoy the cordless freedom while gluing.The Imezing glue pen has lithium battery power supply. It is charged at the button through a USB-C with a 5V charger. One full charge can support up to 90 mins battery runtime. It is easily operated: press the power switch and wait for 15 seconds to get heated up. Push the red button, when the button goes constantly down, you may start gluing. Its straights out and you may stop any time. It dries almost right away with no strings, no drip glue. Compared to competitive products, it offers precision gluing with smaller glue strands.The hot glue can be applied to a great diversity of materials such as fabric, plastic, leather, wood, cardboard, glass, stone, electronic components, rubber, fiber, metal, ceramics, pearl cotton, jewelry, nut shell, cloth art, plants, etc.The Imezing comes with one set of 100 environmental-friendly glue sticks (0.28" x 0.8" inch), which is enough for a long time use.  The colorful glitter glue sticks also open the door for vibrant personal touches and bold imagination. It uses 7 milimeter glue sticks. You can bond and design with an easy-to-use trigger which is non-slip coated with silicone. User-Centered DesignWe care much about details. Every single perspective on Imezing is carefully crafted by our designers ranging from the all-metal one-piece body for aesthetic look, ergonomic hold grip, the silicon coated anti-slip red button to fuel the creativity, the magnetic lip for pleasant human-device interaction feedback, to the LED ring light located on the top to show you the working status of the unit.The Imezing team consists of a group of designers, engineers and seekers of  quality life. Back to simplicity and convenience are our core concept. Together, we are dedicated to upgrading tools to the next level and  creating truly practical and stylish tools and instruments.

story:
Sesame - Not Just a Smart Lock

Featured On

New and Improved

With a stronger motor that can handle even harder-to-turn locks, a more stable and optimizing app to operate the lock, the latest 2018 version of our Sesame Smart Lock will give you a totally different experience. If you are a technology enthusiast, you shouldn't miss the chance to have the earliest hands-on experience with our 2018 Sesame Smart Lock. 

 

Leave Your Keys Behind

Just lock and unlock your door using the Sesame app on your phone. Download the Sesame app and unlock your door via Bluetooth. Never worry about forgetting your keys again.Your keys, reinvented.

Install & Remove in Seconds

Simply tape Sesame to your door with a single strip of 3M Command tape (supplied). It fits your lock without removing or swapping anything. No tools required.

 

Wi-Fi Access Point

Remote Control

With the Wi-Fi Access Point, you no longer need to be within Bluetooth range to connect to your Sesame. Check your Sesame while away and remotely lock or unlock your door.

Integrate with Your System

With the Wi-Fi Access Point, you’ll be able to use Sesame with Google Home, Amazon Alexa, Apple HomeKit, IFTTT, or create your own custom app with Sesame’s API.

Specifications

Voltage: 4.75V~5.5V

Dimensions: 32.8mm(W) x 32.8mm(L) x 27.6mm(H)

Weight: 16.25g

Sesame App

Specifications

 

Work on existing locks

 

 

 

We are CANDY HOUSE 

The Sesame smart lock was created by two Stanford grad students who were tired of carrying (and losing) their keys.

As engineers, they were used to solving problems, so they put their knowledge to use. The mechanical engineer built a robot that could unlock the door, and the software engineer built an app to communicate with it. They were thrilled when it worked. Instead of fum- bling to find their keys, all they had to do was take out their smartphones and the smart lock would unlock the door for them. They had mastered the magic Ali Baba knew – the power to open a door with something as simple as “open sesame.”

And thus Sesame was born.

They realized that they couldn’t be the only people who would rather keep their keys in their smartphones, so they decided to share their invention with the world. In 2015, they launched a Kickstarter to see who else might be interested in having a Sesame smart lock, and the response was overwhelming – they far exceeded even their stretch goals. The answer was clear: people wanted their own Sesame smart lock.

But the story doesn’t end with the Sesame smart lock. It’s only the first of many robots CANDY HOUSE will bring to the world; and, like Sesame, every robot designed by CANDY HOUSE will inspire a minimalist yet joyful lifestyle by both improving your life and evoking a sense of magic and wonder. Our passion is creating innovative robots that capture curiosity and imagination, and our dream is for every visitor to CANDY HOUSE to be filled with the same joy as a kid in a candy store.

Timeline

story:
Autowater helps prevent the spread of germs and lowers water consumption at home. It is easy to install and looks elegant in any setting with its beautiful aluminum casing. Autowater’s motion sensor night light makes it easy to get water in the dark. Its powerful battery can be charged wirelessly and lasts 8-10 months per charge.

Autowater is a range of faucet adapters for the kitchen and bathroom, which make your regular faucet automatic.

The Autowater range of faucet adapters are the easiest way to have the convenience of automatic taps at home. There’s no need for a plumber or to replace your existing faucet. Simply click Autowater into place and starting saving water today.

Whether cooking, cleaning or brushing teeth Autowater makes using the tap effortless, clean and fast.

The adapter houses two sensors, one at the bottom for short bursts and one on the side for longer use.

 

 

Touchless tap with short and long water flow,  perfect for the modern bathroom

 

Upgrade your kitchen faucet for a cleaner and more convenient kitchen

 

 

Different designs on Autowater K & B

Depends on the varying heights of kitchen sink and counter basin. In order to increase user experience, Techo designs different models.

Germs are all around us: How can you help prevent the spread?

Kitchens and bathrooms house millions of bacteria which can cause illness. By eliminating the need to touch the faucet when washing hands, Autowater helps reduce germs around the house.

With Autowater, you can keep your faucet clean when preparing meat, making messy dishes, or cleaning around the house.

 

An infrared sensor means you no longer have to touch the faucet, which helps prevent the spread of germs and dirt. For busy households especially with children, it is important to keep surfaces germ free.

 

"Techo Autowater, Every Drop Counts"

Each Autowater is equipped with a Neoperl Aeraotor which uses water-saving technology.

Compared to flow restrictors, water-saving products with an integrated flow regulator (such as the PCA aerator of Neoperl) offer more comfort of use at low pressure and more water savings at high pressure. You will use as much water as necessary (comfort) and at the same time as little as possible (environmental protection).   — Quoted from Neoperl

Each aerator is certified with a WaterSense label, which means Autowater is around 32% more water-efficient than standard faucets, while still providing sufficient water flow.

We have tested Autowater hundreds of times and have found that it saves up to 65% household water with its infrared sensor.

With Autowater there’s no need for a plumber, anyone can install in a matter of minutes. Simply click Autowater into place on any bathroom or kitchen faucet and you’ve made your house a little more smart.

 

 

The sensor beneath the body of Autowater is for short time water flow

It senses the presence of the hands and offers water flow until the hands are moved out of the sensing range.

When triggered the side sensor begins water flow for a longer time period

It will automatically turn the water flow off after 45 seconds (Bathroom faucet adaptor) / 3 minutes (Kitchen faucet adaptor).

There’s no need to turn the main lights on when getting water in the middle of the night, the motion sensor night light means a dimmer less intrusive light can guide your way to the faucet.

 

7 Nightlight Colors to Choose From

The light sensor prevents the night light from turning on during daylight hours. And you can choose between 7 beautiful colors.

The powerful in-built Lithium Ion battery lasts for 8-12 months per charge. With magnetic charging and long battery life, it consumes minimal energy.

One charge can last for 8-12 months

 

Autowater is unique and compact but integrates more than 100 different components. And every single product needs 40+ manufacturing processes and 15 inspection procedures to finish its production.

 

After two year’s research, testing and development, we have a created a product that is beautifully designed — it’s current size is half of the first version.

 

We have been working really hard to get the Autowater faucet adapters into production as soon as possible so that you can receive your product soon after purchasing. We have done many tests and are confident this is a great product and ready to ship out soon!

 

We are a dedicated and driven team whose aim is to create the next generation of affordable yet stylish smart home products. We are dedicated to bringing the Autowater range to every household that wants to save water, time and help prevent the spread of germs at home. Our products demonstrate impeccable design, which will suit any home.

Q: How long does it take to recharge the battery?

A: Four hours.

Q: How often do I need to charge the battery?

A: Once fully charged on average the battery lasts 8-12 months.

Q: How do I charge the battery?

A: Charge the battery by attaching the magnetic USB cable to the adapter.

Q: Can it be charged without removing it from the faucet?

A: You can charge it directly without removing it from the faucet. Because the length of USB cable is limited, portable power is recommended. But it is advised to remove it from the faucet when charging.

Q: What’s the sensing distance of the night light?

A: 9.8-16.4 feet.

Q: How do I install it? Why are there so many connectors?

A: Select the appropriate adapter for your faucet using the guide provided. Remove the original aerator, then fit the auto spout into the connector.

Q: What happens if I cannot install the Autowater?

A: If you have followed the instructions provided and taken note of the video guide above and still cannot install please contact customer support at info@techohome.com.

Q: What is an aerator?

A: An aerator can be found at the tip of faucets, they can be screwed into the faucet head and provide a non-splashing stream of water and air.

Q: What is the product life?

A: Under normal conditions it lasts over 100,000 times, this means it lasts approximately 10 years.

Q: Does it leak?

A: No, the adapter is equipped with a multi-stage seal, and 100% inspection before delivery.

Q: What are the requirements for water pressure, does it leak for high water pressure? Does it work normally for low water pressure?

A: Regular water pressure is 0.05MPa-0.8MPa, it can bear up to 3.5MPa water pressure with high performance materials from well-known manufacturer Solvay.

Q: How is the sensitivity of the sensor? How long is the sensor field? How do I adjust the sensor field?

A: The sensor response time is 500ms to wave-on and wave-off. The sensing field of the sensors on the top (bathroom) or on the right side (kitchen) for long-water supplying is around 4in. To adjust the bottom sensor’s distance for short-water supply; hold down the top button for 5s until the white light flashes; then press the button until the light turns to purple, place your hand to the distance you need until the light stops flashing. The default sensor field is 6in.

Q: What happens if the sensor doesn’t work?

A: Please follow the instructions provided to resolve sensor failure; if unable to resolve, please remove the auto spout after turning off the water through the handle, and then contact customer service (info@techohome.com) for further assistance.

Q: Where is the LED light and how bright is it?

A: The LED light is placed on the bottom of the product, it will not be directly exposed to the human eye at normal use. Lighting power consumption will be slightly different according to different colors, white light consumption is around 9mW; when the ambient light is weak, the pyrolysis infrared sensor can activate the light when it detects someone is approaching.

Q: From what distance does the LED light turn on?

A: If the indoor temperature is over 26° Celsius, the farthest sensor field is about 13-16ft. The light will automatically turn off in 10s. If the ambient light suddenly is strong, the light will turn off in about 3s. The sensing field varies according to the environmental charges.

Q: How do you change the color of the light? What colors are there?

A: Just press the button on the underside of the adapter to change the color. The colors to choose from are: red, yellow, light blue, dark blue, green, white and purple.

Q: Is it waterproof?

A: Yes, it is IP67 certified, which means it can withstand water immersion between 6in and 3ft for 30 minutes, although this is not recommended.

Q: How do I keep the product working if not used for a long time? Will the battery life be affected?

A: Charge the battery regularly to ensure the battery life durability.

Q: Could there be an electric shock with the product?

A: It uses a 3.7V lithium battery, the maximum voltage is 4.2V; it does not lead any electric shock accident.

Q: What are the materials? Is it reliable?

A: It uses high-performance materials from well-known manufacturers such as Solvay, the outer casing is made from Aluminum Alloy. The maximum it can bear is 3.5MPa of water pressure. It is NSF and CUPC certified.

Q: Are there filters? How do you clean the filters? Does it come with the function of water purification?

A: The six adapters provided are equipped with a filter, which can be used. Please remove the adapter and clean the filter regularly. The product can be used with a specific filter bubbler to remove residual chlorine in the water.

Q: Will it turn on and let water through unintendedly?

A: It uses special infrared coding technology and special light transmission materials to avoid interference with the ambient light, so as to avoid water flow unintendedly.

Q: What should I pay attention to in daily maintenance and cleaning?

A: In daily maintenance do not use acid and alkali detergent to clean the product, avoid the use of metal scourers and other harsh cleaning tools, especially on the infrared sensor window.

Q: If the connector does not fit exactly?

A: Please use PTFE tape around the connector so there is no leakage after installation.(PTFE tape is not included).

Q: How do I change the sensor distance for the night light?

A: The white spherical sensor is for the night light, the sensor needs to be facing the front to ensure the sensing distance is in the appropriate field; if the sensor distance of the night light is short, or it does not work, please check the installation direction.

Q: If water flow is intermittent and I need more water what do I do?  

A: Use the sensor with the long water flow for a better experience.

Q: The night light is activated by accident, or not activated, why?

A: Please confirm the night light function is turned on; or there are heat sources near by, which leads the unintended activation, such as the oven and microwave.

story:
“I can’t believe we’ve put a man on the moon, yet we use a poo stick to clean the toilet.”

FlushBrush is a replacement for your horrible toilet brush. It’s a new take on toilet cleaning. Every other object in your bathroom has modernised, become more convenient and more hygienic, except the toilet brush! 

The design of the toilet brush has remained the same since the invention of the modern toilet, and most of us keep them within 1 meter of our toothbrushes.

This really has to change. The FlushBrush brings toilet cleaning into the 21st century.

 

 

The FlushBrush is more hygienic in three key ways. 

  • The silicone head repels water and waste, unlike bristled brushes. 
  • The head is stored inside the toilet, with water passing over it with every flush; nothing that touches the inside of the toilet ever leaves the toilet. 
  • The head can be replaced whenever you want to, making it easier to maintain your standard of cleanliness in the bathroom. 

To use the FlushBrush, just pick up the handle from the base, push to connect the head in the cradle and lift it out to start cleaning. When you’re done, position the head back into the cradle, and pull back on the handle trigger to release the head. The cradle has a magnet in it to keep the head secure. Replace the handle in the base and job done!

 

To install the FlushBrush in your bathroom, lift the toilet lid and position the cradle tightly under the rim of the toilet to ensure maximum water coverage. Once the forks of the cradle are tightly under the rim, fold back the flexible aluminium strip around your toilet bowl, moulding the FlushBrush cradle into place to perfectly fit your toilet. 

FlushBrush's silicone cleaning head repels water and dirt, and has been specifically designed to avoid having any dirt traps. Silicone is an extremely hydrophobic material, meaning water and dirty substances can hardly stick to it – it’s often used in high quality cooking and medical tools to ensure the highest standards of hygiene. 

This makes silicone the perfect material for FlushBrush's cleaning head.

 

FlushBrush saves on chemical usage. Traditional bristled brushed need to be regularly disinfected with bleach, which is flushed down drains and into the environment. FlushBrush uses the water already flowing over it to stay clean, reducing the need for disinfecting chemicals.

FlushBrush wastes less plastic. When you want to change your bristled toilet brush, you need to throw away the whole thing - at least 100g of plastic straight into the bin. With FlushBrush, only the cleaning head needs occasional replacing, and it weighs just 2g of plastic. This means you can still maintain your standards of hygiene without all the unnecessary waste. 

With FlushBrush, the only part stored outside of the toilet is the handle itself. Each reward tier comes with a free floor base stand, and we will make a wall bracket an option for all backers to add to their order once the campaign ends if we reach £100k!

 

You asked and I listened! Now we've hit £50k in funding the DARK GREY FlushBrush will be available to choose during the address survey at the end of the campaign! 

For backers ordering multiple units, you'll be able to decide on the colour for each of them between white and dark grey. 

 

I first had the idea for FlushBrush in 2017 after “inheriting” a second hand toilet brush when I moved into a new apartment. I then began discussing with my roommate why we used such a disgusting and old fashioned tool for cleaning the toilet...

A lot of thinking, testing and hard work later, we had the first prototype. I took it to a bathroom trade show Birmingham (UK) in March 2018, and spent 3 days talking to bathroom experts. At the show, I realised there were major improvements I could make to the design, and so it was back to work. 

At that show, someone suggested that I should apply for Dragons’ Den. I did, and thought nothing more of it. Development continued through our second and third prototypes, each an improvement on the last, but progress was slow as all the design work was funded just by me. Then, by February of 2019, I found myself auditioning for Dragons’ Den with my fifth prototype. I never thought it would happen, but I was selected to film with just four weeks’ notice. 

Together, with my amazing design team, we pushed through a few more versions, making final tweaks to ensure everything was ready for me to appear on TV. Dragons’ Den was a success, and I secured two offers from Sara Davies and Touker Souleyman. As many of you may know, not all projects that are funded on TV make it all the way, and ultimately launching a Kickstarter to get the FlushBrush directly into the homes of those that want it most was the best route to take. Since filming the show last year, I have made further design improvements, and am now ready to make FlushBrush a reality with your help. 

 

After almost 3 years since I first started working on the idea, I couldn't be more excited to begin the next stage with all of you aboard! 

 

 

https://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-7345037/Entrepreneur-TVs-Dragons-Den-unveil-UKs-self-cleaning-loo-device.html

https://www.dailyecho.co.uk/news/17889434.dragons-39-den-inventor-tom-keen-toilet-39-flush-brush-39/

https://www.thetimes.co.uk/article/dragons-den-review-new-dragon-sara-davies-was-feeling-flush-wr2jbpbvh

https://www.realitytitbit.com/bbc/dragons-den/how-to-buy-the-toilet-flush-brush-from-dragons-den-episode-1 

 

 ^ An early FlushBrush demo video to round off the campaign. If you have any further questions, please let us know!
story_txt:
“I can’t believe we’ve put a man on the moon, yet we use a poo stick to clean the toilet.”FlushBrush is a replacement for your horrible toilet brush. It’s a new take on toilet cleaning. Every other object in your bathroom has modernised, become more convenient and more hygienic, except the toilet brush! The design of the toilet brush has remained the same since the invention of the modern toilet, and most of us keep them within 1 meter of our toothbrushes.This really has to change. The FlushBrush brings toilet cleaning into the 21st century.   The FlushBrush is more hygienic in three key ways. 
The silicone head repels water and waste, unlike bristled brushes. 
The head is stored inside the toilet, with water passing over it with every flush; nothing that touches the inside of the toilet ever leaves the toilet. 
The head can be replaced whenever you want to, making it easier to maintain your standard of cleanliness in the bathroom. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

 To use the FlushBrush, just pick up the handle from the base, push to connect the head in the cradle and lift it out to start cleaning. When you’re done, position the head back into the cradle, and pull back on the handle trigger to release the head. The cradle has a magnet in it to keep the head secure. Replace the handle in the base and job done!  
 To install the FlushBrush in your bathroom, lift the toilet lid and position the cradle tightly under the rim of the toilet to ensure maximum water coverage. Once the forks of the cradle are tightly under the rim, fold back the flexible aluminium strip around your toilet bowl, moulding the FlushBrush cradle into place to perfectly fit your toilet. 
 
The FlushBrush cleaning head is stored discreetly underneath the flow of water, cleaning the head with each flush. As you routinely use your toilet, the water passing over it will dislodge anything that wasn’t repelled by the silicone cleaning surface, and the regular flows of water will prevent bacteria buildup by flushing the whole system each time you use the toilet.
 FlushBrush's silicone cleaning head repels water and dirt, and has been specifically designed to avoid having any dirt traps. Silicone is an extremely hydrophobic material, meaning water and dirty substances can hardly stick to it – it’s often used in high quality cooking and medical tools to ensure the highest standards of hygiene. This makes silicone the perfect material for FlushBrush's cleaning head. 
FlushBrush’s handle only ever makes indirect contact with the inside of the toilet bowl. Anything that makes direct contact with waste stays inside the bowl, and is rinsed with fresh water every time you flush. No transferring of dripping toilet juices from bowl to holder like with a traditional toilet brush. 
We’ve heard stories of children and dogs running around the house waving toilet brushes, spreading germs and bleach all over the home. With FlushBrush, you can store the handle out of reach, and even if someone does get hold of it, you can be sure it’s never made direct contact with the inside of the bowl. In addition, there’s no need to routinely sterilise the handle in bleach, so there’s no risk that anyone will spill a pot of chemicals (and poo!) over the floor of your bathroom... 
 
FlushBrush saves water. The silicone head is cleaned routinely during normal use of your toilet, so there’s no need to flush especially to clean (as you might with a bristled brush). With each toilet flush using an average of 1.6gallons/6 litres of water, saving on those unnecessary flushes will really add up.FlushBrush saves on chemical usage. Traditional bristled brushed need to be regularly disinfected with bleach, which is flushed down drains and into the environment. FlushBrush uses the water already flowing over it to stay clean, reducing the need for disinfecting chemicals.FlushBrush wastes less plastic. When you want to change your bristled toilet brush, you need to throw away the whole thing - at least 100g of plastic straight into the bin. With FlushBrush, only the cleaning head needs occasional replacing, and it weighs just 2g of plastic. This means you can still maintain your standards of hygiene without all the unnecessary waste.  
 
 With FlushBrush, the only part stored outside of the toilet is the handle itself. Each reward tier comes with a free floor base stand, and we will make a wall bracket an option for all backers to add to their order once the campaign ends if we reach £100k! You asked and I listened! Now we've hit £50k in funding the DARK GREY FlushBrush will be available to choose during the address survey at the end of the campaign! For backers ordering multiple units, you'll be able to decide on the colour for each of them between white and dark grey.  
 I first had the idea for FlushBrush in 2017 after “inheriting” a second hand toilet brush when I moved into a new apartment. I then began discussing with my roommate why we used such a disgusting and old fashioned tool for cleaning the toilet...A lot of thinking, testing and hard work later, we had the first prototype. I took it to a bathroom trade show Birmingham (UK) in March 2018, and spent 3 days talking to bathroom experts. At the show, I realised there were major improvements I could make to the design, and so it was back to work. Footage: BBC Dragons Den. Series 17 - Episode 1 (2019)
  At that show, someone suggested that I should apply for Dragons’ Den. I did, and thought nothing more of it. Development continued through our second and third prototypes, each an improvement on the last, but progress was slow as all the design work was funded just by me. Then, by February of 2019, I found myself auditioning for Dragons’ Den with my fifth prototype. I never thought it would happen, but I was selected to film with just four weeks’ notice. 
 Together, with my amazing design team, we pushed through a few more versions, making final tweaks to ensure everything was ready for me to appear on TV. Dragons’ Den was a success, and I secured two offers from Sara Davies and Touker Souleyman. As many of you may know, not all projects that are funded on TV make it all the way, and ultimately launching a Kickstarter to get the FlushBrush directly into the homes of those that want it most was the best route to take. Since filming the show last year, I have made further design improvements, and am now ready to make FlushBrush a reality with your help.  After almost 3 years since I first started working on the idea, I couldn't be more excited to begin the next stage with all of you aboard!   Click to download the FlushBrush Press Kit  https://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-7345037/Entrepreneur-TVs-Dragons-Den-unveil-UKs-self-cleaning-loo-device.htmlhttps://www.dailyecho.co.uk/news/17889434.dragons-39-den-inventor-tom-keen-toilet-39-flush-brush-39/https://www.thetimes.co.uk/article/dragons-den-review-new-dragon-sara-davies-was-feeling-flush-wr2jbpbvhhttps://www.realitytitbit.com/bbc/dragons-den/how-to-buy-the-toilet-flush-brush-from-dragons-den-episode-1   ^ An early FlushBrush demo video to round off the campaign. story:
Buy Switchmate NOW with FREE Shipping at: http://www.switchmatehome.com/

A giant thank you to all of our backers and supporters for a successful campaign!

Please note we are constantly striving to improve Switchmate, the below has since been outdated so check out our website!

September 2016: Our IGG campaign comments are no longer frequently monitored! IF YOU HAVE ANY QUESTIONS WITH YOUR ORIGINAL BACKING PLEASE EMAIL US AT support@switchmatehome.com 

We would LOVE to hear from you, we are listening! Email your feedback, feature requests, and suggestions to feedback@switchmatehome.com

 

Switchmate is a sleek solution that snaps over your standard light switch to automate it in seconds. Just snap Switchmate over your existing light switch, pair it with your smartphone, and you're ready to control anything connected to your switch!

 

 

 

 

Switchmate easily installs with magnets to your existing switch.

 

 

 

Pair it with your phone over Bluetooth and make your switch smart in seconds!

 

"I absolutely love this idea. . . the light bulb-based solutions I'd seen so far seemed like the wrong approach. This seems right." TechCrunch
"The design is simple, sleek and relentlessly practical." Huffington Post
"As a renter I don't want to buy a Nest or any other device that I would need to wire into the wall. " Gigaom

 

 

Switchmate has been in the works for well over a year. After multiple rounds of prototyping, testing, and getting feedback from homeowners, renters, and interior designers, we believe we've settled on an elegant design.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Through the Switchmate app, you can control multiple Switchmates and set timers. You can even see the status of your lights within Bluetooth range (150 ft.)                                                    

 

List of compatible Android and Apple phones

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Check to see if your switches are compatible

 

 

 

 

 

"Very easy. No problems installing or operating it." - Troy


"I have my device and I love it. Works perfectly. I installed it in seconds on my front porch lights. Then I moved it to my swamp cooler which has a heavy switch. The magnets and motor were strong enough to use it on my cooler. I want more units. Simple and easy." -Travis


"At first using it for turning lights and ceiling fans off and on. I will eventually want additional switches to automate lights turning on while not at home." -Eric


"I loved being able to turn the lights off from my bed." -Ricardo


"I no longer have to argue with my wife over who turns the lights off!" -Anonymous

 

 

In a world of unkept promises and missed deadlines, we want our backers to feel secure with the purchase they are making. This is why we have implemented our delivery and satisfaction guarantees.

Our first warranty focuses on the promised delivery date of Switchmate. While we might be new at manufacturing, we have met with enough companies and are very confident that we will be able to get your Switchmate to you by the time we stated, if not earlier. Should we not be able to meet this delivery date you have the right to a refund of your pledge amount in lieu of receiving your Switchmate order.

We stand behind the products we make and want you to be happy with the Switchmate you have purchased. This is why we have implemented a 90-day money back guarantee if you aren’t completely satisfied with your Switchmate. In addition to returning your Switchmate to us, all we ask is for you to tell us what went wrong so that we can improve our customer experience going forward. It’s as simple as that. 

 

Switchmate works on BLE technology. We are currently working to expand the range of Switchmate so that it can be used from anywhere you have an internet  connection. This will include integrations with other ecosystems and the development of our own hub.

 

 

 

We are currently only shipping to the United States and Canada but are working to make Switchmate available worldwide. If you are interested in purchasing a Switchmate and are outside the US and Canada, please email us at support@myswitchmate.com. Send us a picture of your current light switches and let us know where you live!

 

 

                     

 

 

 

For years, we've been told that home automation is supposed to make our lives easier but in reality there has been a lot of hassle involved with installing and operating home automation products. We're here to change that.

Switchmate is our flagship product, and we are developing other simple smart home innovations that are more accessible to a greater number of people. With your support, we will be able to develop Switchmate and get this product to more people in the future.

 

 

 

We're a team of engineers and technology enthusiasts doing everything we can to make sure we get Switchmate right. 

 

Our primary background is in medical devices, and we've done engineering at companies including: Apple, Intel, Johnson & Johnson and Thoratec. We know how to build high quality products.

We've been a part of Highway1, the hardware incubator of PCH International, an expert in manufacturing and supply chain management services. As part of this, we've already completed the design and manufacturing, sourcing, and traveled to Shenzhen, China in October to meet with factories in person.

story:
The Clean Swipe Razor


My Concept:

I am 34 years old and have always hated shaving due to the fact that it took so long and had to constantly scrape out hair from between the blades of the razor after every stroke of shaving. 

I started off running my thumb nail between the blades to scrape the hair because the water pressure from my faucet alone was not enough.

I did this my whole shaving life basically until about 2 years ago when I had had enough cuts on my thumb that I would use a toothbrush to brush out the hair and save myself the pain. 

This was was working so much better and faster than the old thumb nail method so I was pretty excited about my new trick. But after a few days I quickly realized that the blades of my expensive brand new razor cartridge were already worn completely down from the bristles on the toothbrush. So I knew I could not use that method any longer unfortunately.

That's when I came up with the idea to combine the razor with the toothbrush in a way that would't wear down the blades and created the Clean Swipe Razor. 

In stead of wearing down the blades it uses patent pending technology that sharpens the blades with every swipe. All while easily cleaning out the blades and making your shaving experience faster, easier, and more eco-friendly.


Ladies Clean Swipe Razor

Another color option:


Disposable Razor Head Cartridges:

The Clean Swipe Razor comes with detachable, interchangeable, disposable razor head cartridges.

When the blades get dull from prolonged use the cartridge is detached and thrown away so a new one can replace it. You will only ever have to buy one Clean Swipe Razor handle in your life but can replace the razor heads anytime you want.


My First Prototype:

I used ultra thin material for the "swiper bar" below and tested it shaving. Because the swiper bar is so thin and lays flush with razor face, my shave was no different than without it. When you push the razor against your face, your face is spongy which allwos the razor blades to each push against your face. So keeping a clean close shave was no issue.



Go Green!


The Clean Swipe Razor uses up to 95% less water when rinsing out the hair from between the blades of your razor.

Water is essential to life on earth. We need water to grow food, keep clean, provide power, control fire, and last but not least, we need it to stay alive!

If water is constantly being cleaned and recycled through the earth’s water cycle, why do we need to conserve it? The answer is that people use up our planet’s fresh water faster than it can naturally be replenished.

  • When you use water wisely, you help the environment. You save water for fish and animals. You help preserve drinking water supplies. And you ease the burden on wastewater treatment plants—the less water you send down the drain, the less work these plants have to do to make water clean again.
  • When you use water wisely, you save energy. You save the energy that your water supplier uses to treat and move water to you, and the energy your family uses to heat your water.

  • When you use water wisely, you save money. Your family pays for the water you use. If you use less water, you’ll have more money left to spend on other things



My Goal:

I am trying to raise $30 000 in funding which will go towards building a working prototype and manufacturing the first round of razors and cartridges. With your contributions you can help bring my concept to life and change the way men and women have been shaving for over 50 years!

story:
My name is Jakhaari Blackmon and I'm apart of a music group based out of Cincinnati, Ohio called M.U.D Gang. It stands for music, unity and discipleship. We often host Christian concerts in Cincinnati that are geared towards young people like many of us. Our mission in throwing these concerts is to give young people the opportunity to have fun in a clean, safe environment. These concerts are normally themed events, and because we're in the season for giving we've decided to work with Santa Maria Community Services to donate Christmas gifts to 33 of their families. 

Recently, we've been reaching out to local churches, and businesses to help us fund this goal. However, due to a high volume of charity events, many of them are already committed. Because of this, it's been very difficult to find people to sponsor these families, but it's very important to us to make sure they have a great Christmas. I've been fortunate enough to have great Christmases with family and friends, and abundance of joy and presents. These parents should be allowed the same joy of providing their children with a great Christmas.

Intially, we wanted to buy Christmas gifts for these families, however we realized that it would be better if the parents could actually buy gifts their children wanted. So our goal is to buy each family a $100 gift card to Wal-Mart, and a $100 gift card to Toys R Us. This way, we can ensure that each family can create the Christmas they want for their family.

We are very excited to bless these families in need. In a time where charity is seen as a tax write off and there is no attempt to build communities with no mutual benefit, we are proud to say that we are changing the face of charity. We look forward to building with you, and we thank you for your support!

Texas Summer woes 

Help keep local Austin businesses thriving:

  • Shirley's Temple is DIY through and through.
  • We are a space for the community. All ages, everyone is welcome at our venue.
  • With your help, we can install an AC system and continue to host shows another year.

We want to continue being a space where everyone feels welcome, accepted, and a part of the community. We're a space dedicated to giving all forms a music a platform to showcase their art.

story:
What Is AutoLight?

Auto Light is designed to be the light of your life. The light that makes places safer by brightening up areas all around the home so you can see inside closets and in places where your normal lighting can’t reach.

AutoLight is 

Easy to use

Easy to install

Easy to charge

Easy to maintain

All AutoLights use motion sensors, so they can be configured to light up when you are near and need them, and switch off again when you don’t. 

It makes them great for safety purposes, like when you need to see around the house at night but don’t want to wake everyone up, and certainly don’t want to be tripping over things you can’t see in the dark.

 Our Story 

Light is vital to our lives. But, despite the advent of electricity, there are still plenty of places around every house or workplace that remain dark. 

Yes, you could get an electrician to wire-up new lights in these dark places. But it’s an expensive process that will add more to your electricity bill.

The fact is, we only need lights when there’s someone there who needs to see. And that’s what makes Auto Light’s motion sensors and portability such a gamechanger.

If you’re worried about having to walk around the house in the dark at night and fear stumbling over things you can’t see, AutoLights are the answer. 

If you’re struggling to find what you’re looking for in a dark cupboard, corner of a room, or garage, AutoLights are the answer. 

They will help stop you having accidents, and prevent you needing to use one hand to hold a flashlight to find that something you’re looking for in the closet, garage, attic or cellar.

 

AutoLight Uses The Latest Motion Sensor Technology: 

Whenever you approach an AutoLight, it will turn on for you. And it will stay on while you’re in the area, giving you the light you need to see what you’re doing.

  • No switches to flick
  • No knobs to turn
  • No electricity to worry about

Then, when you move away, the light will automatically switch off to preserve energy. If you come back, AutoLight will sense you and switch back on again.

It’s all down to the clever PIR Infrared Technology in AutoLights. This detects your presence in the area and automatically switches on the lights.

All the time you’re in the vicinity, the light will remain on.

Then, after 20 seconds without any body heat detection, the light turns off. You don’t need to do anything to operate it.  

Each light has 3 operation modes:

  • PIR induction lighting (a.k.a. automatic)
  • On mode (flip the switch so that the light stays on)
  • Off mode (flip the switch so that the light stays off). 

The LED indicator will tell you which mode you are in at any time.

Of course, there might be times when you don’t need AutoLight to work automatically, and use it as a light you switch on and off as and when. That’s why we’ve integrated a toggle switch that lets you choose between automatic and manual function. You can go back and forth between the two as often as you like.

The AutoLight Range

There are 5 quality products in the AutoLight range: 

Door Lights

Circular Small Wall Lamp

Wardrobe Lamp

Bedside Lamp

Mirror Front Lamp

The Benefits Of AutoLight

 

This is the future of lighting. Lighting that can be flexibly located anywhere in the house that needs brightening up. Here’s more reasons why AutoLights will make a big difference: 

Using PIR infrared technology, AutoLight detects your body and immediately jumps into action. The ambient light turns on once the system picks up human body heat, and after 20 seconds without any body heat detection, it will turn off the light, meaning that you don’t need to lift a finger to work it.

Because we care about the environment just as much as you do, we have used eco-friendly ABS and a soft silicone anti-slip bottom, making this one product that you can use guilt-free. Add one more ecologically-conscientious product to your home.

There are three modes: PIR induction lighting (a.k.a. automatic), on mode (flip the switch so that the light stays on), and off mode (flip the switch so that the light stays off). The LED indicator tells you which mode you are in at any time.

Unlike other motion-sensor products, AutoLight is easy to set up and easy to install. Because AutoLight comes functional right out of the box, all you need to do it attach it to your wall and plug it in. AutoLight will take care of the rest, running completely automatically from there on out. You don’t need to run any wires to set up AutoLight. Just stick it to your wall, and it is ready to go, the perfect energy-saving, eco-friendly decorative night light you have always wanted.

 With the seamless 3M double-sided adhesive, attach the base to the wall and then magnetize the lamp on the base. all include in the package.

You can rely on AutoLight’s circular design, its long-lasting LED, and its energy efficiency to keep you smiling, all while its gentle light prevents you from damaging or straining your eyes. Turn it on while you thumb through a book – it makes the perfect reading light!

Of course, maybe you don’t /always need AutoLight to function on its own. Sometimes you want a little extra control! We have thought of this too, integrating a toggle switch so that you can choose between automatic and manual function, going back and forth between the two as often as you would like.

How many times have you seen a functional product and thought to yourself “Why can’t it look good?” We know the struggle! That is why we have made Evison AutoLight into a product that is simultaneously functional and fashionable, something attractive that also gets the job done. When you choose AutoLight, you don’t need to compromise on anything.

Most important of all, AutoLight is safe. It will make any home where you install it more navigable for those who have limited sight or limited movement, which is a major positive for you and your whole family. Don’t wait for an accident to happen. Get AutoLight now!

 2 hours charging = 6months use 

Built-in 500 mAh lithium battery, Evison has a long standby time, in the case of normal use, one-time charging with 2 hours, it can be used for 4-6 months.

In order to bring AutoLight to the consumer market, we are looking to raise $10000, which will cover all the costs that we are facing as we move forward with manufacturing, marketing, and distribution. To say thanks to all our contributors, we are offering a significant discount on Evison AutoLight exclusively through this campaign, just our way of showing how much we appreciate your invaluable support.

 

Beyond making a monetary contribution, you can show your support for what we are doing by sharing our campaign on Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, and any other social media platforms you use. Know someone else who could use AutoLight? Let them know about this campaign! We appreciate all your support, both monetary and non-monetary, and we thank you for taking the time to read about what we are doing.

If you  have any question welcome to contact us evison@hievison.com.

 

 

Risks and challenges

We have the engineer and the business know-how necessary to do this right. If any logistical challenges arise during the development or production phases, we will figure out a way forward, coming up with solutions so that we can bring AutoLight to market in a timely manner. We believe strongly in the value of this product, and nothing is going to discourage us from making it a reality
