story:
MEET evaSMART:

First intelligent portable air conditioner

Ultimate comfort is now at your fingertips. You can adjust the temperature and humidity level using the touch pad, the mobile app or your voice. evaSMART spreads coolness naturally in the same way the air is cooled in nature.

 

Everyone is unique and has their own preferred temperature. evaSMART is here to ensure a comfortable and healthy environment that allows you to be productive and take care of your loved ones.

Your evaSMART will create a personal comfort zone where you need it most. You can shape the environment around you by cooling and humidifying the air.

This makes Personal Climate Concept a reality!

The next step in developing our revolutionary personal air-conditioners was to make Evapolar devices smarter. Now you can use Evapolar mobile app to change the humidity level and adjust the fan speed any time you want. Managing colour playlists will make your experience even more exciting. evaSMART is fully compatible with the majority of Smart Home systems like Amazon Alexa, so you can integrate all your Eva devices into a single Smart Home ecosystem and manage it using your voice.

 

evaSMART works on a USB Type-C power supply. It can work on a socket, a PC, a notepad, various power banks and even a solar battery. The device consumes just 12W of electricity and is very energy efficient. It's 10 times more efficient than portable ACs and 10-20 times more effective than traditional split systems.

 

It comes in Opaque White, Coal Black and Stormy Grey.

Elegant and stylish evaSMART looks like a real design piece. Our engineers managed to fit the functionality of an air conditioner, a humidifier and an air purifier into a very compact device. evaSMART is portable and does not require any installation, which makes it an easy-to-use device.

It is a perfect solution for surviving in summer heat and addressing heating caused dryness in winter.

evaSMART is easy to install and operate: simply fill the removable water tank and connect the device to a power supply. Within 5-10 minutes the EvaBreeze cartridge absorbs a huge amount of water. We've developed a special system that helps to prevent leakage even during transportation or tilting. The water then spreads evenly on the surface of the cooling pads. When the air blows through the pads, the water evaporates, which makes the air cool down while saturating it with water. There's no heat exhaust as result of the evaporation. The built-in fan helps the cool air spread over an area of 3-4 square meters around you, and moveable grill directs the flow. The power control enables you to adjust the air flow, creating most comfortable conditions for you.

Evapolar evaporative cartridge needs to be replaced every 3-6 months. Poor air or water quality may affect the cartridge lifecycle duration. Every cartridge has an electronic microchip, so evaSMART will notify when it is time to change the cartridge in advance.

In everyday life we can divide all things into simple and high-tech. Our main goal is to combine these simple things and high-tech solutions and give people personal tools for creating an enjoyable environment. evaSMART cooling effect is based on a unique technology, but we'd rather wish you just enjoy it instead of thinking about its complexity.

 

Evapolar is based on natural water evaporation technology, which takes in hot, dry air and makes it cool and moist. Evaporative air conditioners perform best in drier environments. It is normally dryer indoors than outdoors, and the actual temperature decrease depends on the air's humidity and temperature. The tables below show you evaSMART performance for different conditions.

 

 

We returned to Indiegogo for the second time because we'd like our backers to shape the future of Evapolar with us. So we've taken into account the feedback you shared with us and created the next generation of Evapolar devices. We believe that the Indiegogo platform will serve as a launch point for the story of a community that shares our belief in climate personalization.

How does Evapolar cool the air?

Our air conditioner works on evaporative principle. Heat loss is caused by water evaporation. This process absorbs the heat. Our material has increased specific evaporation area and improved capillary effect (effect of fluid lifting through thin tubes) that allows Evapolar devices to cool the air better than competitors and be small and portable.

What is the difference between Evapolar 2 and Evapolar 1?

Lots of features of the device were significantly re-engineered:

  • EvaBreeze evaporative material. We are working hard to constantly improve our key technology of water evaporation making it even more efficient in terms of cooling and humidifying, absolutely bio stable and safe to use. We've gone through several generations of the evaporative material throughout the year and we are really proud with the results.
  • Leakage proofing. Now device can be tilted and moved around with no danger of water spilling.
  • Improved aerodynamics. Optimization of grills shape, air channels in cartridge and fans blade allowed to reduce the noise and maximize the airflow with the ability to direct it. evaSMART noise rate is 25-40 Db.
  • Bigger water tank. As a result of continuous tests in different conditions and careful reaction to customers feedback the water tank size has been increased to fit optimal 6-8 hours of usage even in the dry climate.

What does the cooling degree depend on?

The cooling degree depends on three factors: the outside air temperature, the air humidity, and the power of the device that you select yourself. The working principle of our products is based on the evaporation process. The higher the temperature and the lower the humidity, the more actively the evaporation occurs, leading to a greater cooling effect.

The last factor that influences the temperature change is the fan speed. By adjusting it, you can choose the most comfortable temperature for you.

How much does Evapolar reduce the temperature and what area can it cool down?

The information about cooling effect in different environments is listed in technical specifications (see the respective Technical Spec section). We believe that the tables will help you estimate effectiveness of evaSMART for your conditions.

The cooling zone of evaSMART is 3-4 square meters. It is a personal device developed specifically for small areas.

What do you mean by eco-friendliness of the device?

We care about your health as well as the health of our planet. The evaporative materials used in the device consist of completely inorganic fibers. This makes Evapolar products different from conventional air conditioners where filters are made out of cellulose, a nutritional environment for microorganisms. The second important thing is that we do not use any harsh chemical liquid coolants, that can damage one’s health, for cooling. Finally, evaSMART consumes only 12W of electricity, which is equal to the power of a single light bulb. Nowadays energy saving doesn't only have economic benefits, it also helps us to reduce our consumption of natural resources, as well as an emission of harmful substances into the atmosphere.

Does Evapolar work without a power supply?

When using Evapolar air coolers, please make sure you connect the device to a power supply. It can be almost any USB hub. You can plug your device into a power bank or a USB-port of your car, a laptop or a solar battery. The only condition is that the power supply must have an output of 5V and 2A.

How do I know it’s time to replace the cartridge? Do I need to buy an extra cartridge right now?

You need to replace the cartridge at least every 6 months. Every evaSMART is equipped by chip that will notify you. However, the cartridge lifespan depends on the air and water quality.

How to install Evapolar? 

evaSMART is very easy to use and is ready to operate right out of the box. All you need to do is fill the water tank and plug in the device. The water tank needs to be refilled every 6-8 hours as the water evaporates. You can find more detailed instructions on using Evapolar in the box.

Evapolar has 1 year warranty. In case of a breakdown, contact our support service at: support@evapolar.com.

If your evaSMART requires to be repaired you can ship the unit to us. We have stocks in USA, Europe and China for your convenience. Also you can send your device to us by our official distributors.

Does shipping costs include taxes?

Unfortunately, taxes vary from country to country in every and IndieGoGo platform doesn't allow to charge them. So, please take into consideration tax payment rules according to import laws of your country when making contribution.

Where do you produce the devices?

Our production facilities are currently located in China. Evapolar production management controls manufacturing in order to ensure the highest quality standards of our products.

Why do we call it an air conditioner?

Mainly because Evapolar air coolers really blow out the cooled down air. Please, check the table of outgoing air temperature on our page. Evapolar products work on power of water evaporation. Devices of this type have multiple names depending on the country - air cooler, desert cooler, evaporative air conditioner etc. Unlike other small desktop device Evapolar has an impressive efficiency for its size so we prefer to call it evaporative air conditioner.

 

Our terms of service:  https://evapolar.com/terms-of-service/

 

General Enquiry & Support Help: support@evapolar.com

Media: pr@evapolar.com

Partnership: partnersales@evapolar.com

story:
Freshy! is the technological universal vacuum lid that’s changing the way food is stored and saving consumers from throwing away their food and their money.

It’s what keeping food fresh is all about.

Equilibric in the media: 

 

Up to 30% food statistics go to trash

Americans waste a mind-blowing 150,000 tons of food each and every day! That’s 300 million pounds or about one pound of food wasted for every person in the country. Most of the food being thrown away is from spoilage. Imagine how many people could be fed and how much money and food you’d save if you could stop wasting 365 pounds of food (just for you) per year.

Freshy! is a technologically advanced universal vacuum lid with a special silicone coating to form a vacuum seal with just about any size container, dish, or pan.

Freshy! is so fast and so easy to use. Once the lid is placed on top of the container, you simply attach the hand-held turbo pump to the lid and in seconds, the air is pumped out of the container allowing you to keep food fresher, keep it tasting better, and allow it to last up to 7x longer than a regular plastic container.

Freshy!’s unique one-touch vacuum technology allows you to keep food fresher, longer.

You’ll be amazed at how fresh your food stays and with fresh food comes fresh taste. So, not only does Freshy! keep food fresh – it locks in the flavor the way Mother Nature intended it to be.

Equilibric! is here to put an end to food waste and to help stretch your food dollars by fighting off food’s number one enemy of spoilage – air (oxygen).

The air left in a container that food is stored in can cause food spoilage in several ways. It can help bacteria grow and it can cause damage to foods by oxidation (the same process that makes metal rust).

And now we’ve got the answer to food spoilage with Equilibric!

 

When it comes right down to it, Equilibric! preserves your food by preventing the growth of mold or bacteria. It’s those things that make food spoil. And by removing oxygen mold and bacteria can’t grow.

Sealing your food with Equilibric! provides food an oxygen-less environment that keeps the freshness in your food for an extended period of time, allowing you to enjoy food that tastes fresh long after you’ve stored it. It’s this vacuum process that holds in the natural moisture and flavor of the food and you’ll notice the difference in taste.

Since Freshy! removes most of the oxygen inside your container, it helps prevent the natural chemical reactions triggered by oxygen. Those chemical reactions are what cause food to spoil and it also prevents bacteria buildup that cause spoilage in foods.

For those who like to enjoy a glass of their favorite red or white wine without overindulging in just a day a or two, you need Equilibric! And here’s why.

You know how if you bite into an apple and set it aside, the apple will start to turn brown and then take on a nutty flavor? It’s because once you’ve broken the skin of the apple and exposed its flesh to oxygen, it starts to react with the oxygen in the air.

The same thing happens with wine (which, of course, is made from grapes). Wine becomes oxidized when it’s exposed to air if too much oxygen gets into the bottle because it’s not vacuum sealed.

You know what it’s like if you leave wine in your wineglass overnight and then take a sip, or reopen a bottle that’s been open for a week. The wine’s flavors and aromas will flatten and sour and oxidation will also change the wine’s color brown. Yuk! And that’s why you need the special Freshy! Wine cork for your wine bottles.

The Freshy! wine cork will extend the freshness of your wine by up to 7X what a corked bottle gives you after opening.



 

Whenever you re-open a container sealed by Equilibric!, you’ll hear a ‘popping’ like you do when you open a jar from the grocery store.

That ‘pop’ should put a smile on your face as it’s telling you that you sealed in the freshness by removing oxygen from the container.

Freshy! is best used for your fresh fruits and vegetables to keep them lasting a long time.

Besides most fresh fruits and vegetables, you can also store leftovers, coffee, wine, chips, cookies, and so much more!

Because of Freshy!’s special silicone sealant on the lids, they’ll fit almost all dishes, pots and pans, coffee containers, and even a drinking glass!

Freshy! comes with 3 different sized lids that can cover any diameter from 5 cm to 40 cm.

We made Freshy! with your space in mind. You don’t need another set of kitchen accessories taking up space in your kitchen cabinets. That’s why we made Freshy! compact and easy to store.

Yes! Freshy!’s lids love to be cleaned in the dishwasher and they’ll come out as good as new ready for their next container of food to keep fresh.

On our first project we got over 5,000 backers from all around the world. We faced a lot of challenges both with logistics and Manufacturing, but successfully accomplished everything! Now we are much more experienced and extremly confident that with the second project everything will go smooth. We will do our best and even more. 


 

We are a small group of kitchen enthusiasts, designers, and technology geeks. Together we’re a team that challenges the everyday problems and we look for and bring to market, the best solutions possible at the lowest costs

Equilibric! is the latest product we’ve launched and we’re expecting a huge success as everyone who’s used it has raved about its ease of use and ability to keep food fresh!

SHIPPING RATES

Equilibric Set

China - $10

Hong Kong - $10

story:
WORLD'S BEST DOG BED IN THE NEWS:

 

WHAT MAKES A RALPH AND CO BED SO SPECIAL? HERE ARE OUR TOP 5 REASONS!

1. COOLING MEMORY FOAM MATTRESS - There have been numerous experiments done on humans to show the benefits of a memory foam mattress over a spring mattress. Memory foam has far better weight distribution which relieves pressure and has orthopaedic benefits for your dog. 

There are other memory foam dog beds on the market but most are made with cheap and dense memory foam which actually traps heat leading to an uncomfortable nights sleep. Our cooling foam uses a brand new technology which has cooling properties, high ventilation and allows the dog to regulate its core temperature, resulting in a peaceful nights sleep.


2. NANO-COATING - We have coated all of our beds with a unique, environmentally friendly and non-toxic nano-coating which ensures our beds are stain, odor and liquid resistant. The coating extends the life of the product and protects the bed from a build up of dust mites which are a leading cause of dog allergies and health problems. It also protects the bed from mould and bacteria penetrating the fabric which makes it not only hygienic but it will also reduce the build up of dog odors.

 

3. THE COVER AND FABRIC - We have picked a material that is the perfect blend of soft and tough. Soft so it is super comfy for your dog to sleep on but also tough enough to withstand 20,000 rub cycles without alteration to the color or quality. We have applied a high quality zip at the back of the bed which means the covers are easily removable and are machine washable. Once the campaign is over you will also be able to buy covers separately so you can change the look of your bed throughout the seasons. 

 

 4. HANDMADE IN GREAT BRITAIN – Most dog beds cut corners when it comes to quality and many are made in the Far East. All of our products are handmade in Great Britain at our factory in the heart of Wales using premium hardware and skilled upholsterers who have been in the profession for generations and have a huge amount of experience to draw upon. 

To back up our promise of quality we are offering a 2 year warranty on any Ralph and Co product.

 

5. THE DESIGN - For the design of the bed we have consulted with both top product and interior designers. For the shape of the bed we decided to put in walls around the side to satisfy a dog's natural instinct to feel protected as well as being a super comfy place to rest their heads. 

 

OUR INITIAL 6 DESIGNS

For the patterns on the bed we are launching an initial 6 designs so there is hopefully something for everyone. 

1. GRANITE

2. CORAL TOP

3. JAPANESE WAVES

4. SEASIDE

5. TROPICAL PINEAPPLE

6. PALM LEAF

OUR STRETCH GOAL DESIGNS

7. PORTLAND

8. YOSEMITE

9. BALMORAL

10. MERLOT

THE WORLD'S BEST FOR A FAIR PRICE

We have trawled the internet comparing our dog bed to the competition. There is nothing that quite compares but still high-end dog beds will be close to double the price of our bed. The simple reason is they have retail margins built into the cost. Any product you see in a store will have been doubled in price so that the store can make a profit. Indiegogo allows us to sell our Ralph and Co products direct to you from our factory without having to inflate the price so that the store can make a margin on top.

Put simply - you get the WORLDS BEST DOG BED for an amazing price.

SPEEDY DELIVERY AND LOW RISK

Ralph our chief product tester has been sleeping on one of our beds for months. We are the manufacturers of our beds which means we can keep a close eye on production, timings and quality control (we are not taking any risks with a Far East factory). 

With almost every crowdfunding campaign you have to wait over 3 months for the actual product to arrive. If you pledge before the 11th of November we will make sure you have your bed in time for the holidays. No need to worry if you miss this date - you will only have to wait until January before you receive yours. 

ONE FOR ONE

We think that starting a business is about doing good not just making profit, so we decided that for every bed we sell from this campaign and into the future we will manufacture another for a dog in need.

Did you know that 3.9 million dogs enter shelters in the US every year. As you can imagine, being in a shelter can be extremely scary for pets as the unfamiliar surroundings can be very stressful.

Most animal shelters are run by charities and rely purely on public donations to fund their activities. Ralph & Co want to give something back to these excellent charities and improve the well being of dogs in their care. 

For cost reasons these will not have all the bells and whistles that your dog bed will have but we can promise they will be warm, cosy and long lasting. 

 You can donate solely to this cause by pledging just $10 or if you buy one of our beds we will use some of the profit to create another bed to gift to a shelter. We are very much looking forward to dropping off our first delivery at the Mayhew animal home in London.

 

THE TEAM

We have experience in starting businesses, creating and shipping products, manufacturing, furniture design, product design and interior design, so we know every step required to make this project happen - now all we need is you! We are an eclectic bunch brought together so that we could create THE WORLD'S BEST DOG BED and at the same time give back to some dog's in need. 

 

GET IN TOUCH

Feel free to get in touch at hello@ralphand.co and any support you can give to our project is hugely appreciated - even if it's just a share (you can use the share icons by the video at the top) - every little helps. 

With Love,

Ralph and Co.

FAQ'S

Style: We will contact you as soon as you make your pledge to ask which style of bed you would like and we will get started on it. 

Sizing: 

Why Crowdfunding? Our $10,000 USD goal will allow us to buy the minimum of material for all 6 of our styles. As the campaign continues we will be adding stretch goal designs. 

When will I receive my bed? For all of you who have backed before the 11th of November we will make sure we have your bed in time for Christmas. For all those who missed out on the early 'XMAS DELIVERY' perk don't worry we will have your beds to you in January. 

Where do you ship? Every country in the world (Excluding current war zones)

Will international orders be charged a customs fee? There will be no custom charges within the European union. If you purchase from outside these countries you may be charged custom fees. 

Tell me more about your nano-coating:

Key Benefits

• Water and oil resistant: most household liquids are repelled

• Eco-friendly, non-toxic, water based formula

• Non-flammable, fluorine free

• Super long lasting and durable: hand washable up to 25 times. If you wash your dog bed once a month it will be protected for over 2 years! 

• Maintains breath ability of the fabric

• Non-aerosol

• UV Resistant: reduces effect of fading

Our unique, highly effective proofing spray creates an easy clean protective coating that prevents damage from everyday spills, stains and weather conditions. Each individual fibre/mineral of the material is treated utilising advanced nanotechnology to create a superphobic barrier. This invisible barrier effectively repels liquid, mud, dirt and prevents water stains for years to come. Residue easily washes off with just water.

Our formula bonds SiO2 particles to the individual fibres/minerals of the surface at a nanometre level (roughly 500 times thinner than a human hair). These billions of SiO2 particles form permanently bonded layers that build up an invisible barrier that renders water and oil unable to touch the fibres/minerals. Put simply, it’s a spray that creates liquid resistant surfaces: liquids simply bead up and roll off. Its an Eco-friendly, non-toxic, water based formula.

Non-toxic and safe!

Our nano-coating is non-hazardous and non-toxic, eliminating any health or environmental risks often associated with competitive products. Our coating is made from silicon dioxide, also known as silica, a natural compound composed of silicon and oxygen. In fact, the World Health Organisation has listed the only risk associated with silica: suffering from a lack of it!

FACT: 59% of the Earth’s crust is made up of silica - Encyclopedia Britannica

Non-Aerosol: being a non-aerosol product is a BIG deal when it comes to the environment. Aerosols contain hydrocarbons and/or compressed gases (such as carbon dioxide and nitrogen) notorious for their contribution to global warming. Moreover aerosols have been associated with several health hazards such as headaches, asthma,

We will continue to fill up this section as you guys start to send in questions.

story:
Yaasa Infinity Blanket 

The first blanket that increases local blood flow, aids recovery, and enhances rest with Celliant® fiber technology.

 

The Yaasa Studios Infinity Blanket is the first to use Celliant® fibers to benefit your body. As summer comes to an end and cooler weather is around the corner, now is the perfect time to layer up!

 

 

Whether you're an athlete looking for a recovery trick, a yogi seeking wellness and comfort during resting poses, or simply someone who's looking to improve sleep, The Yaasa Studios Infinity Blanket is perfect for you. 

  • CELLIANT® TECHNOLOGY - Celliant® is blended into organic cotton to create a revolutionary fabric that increases energy levels in healthy individuals.
  • FDA DETERMINED - Celliant® fiber has been clinically tested and is now determined by the FDA for medical uses*.
  • ECO-FRIENDLY MATERIALS - The Infinity Blanket is manufactured with green practices in Europe and uses certified organic cotton. Up to 12 plastic water bottles are recycled in the production of each blanket.

We believe your blanket should do more for you, so we created one that absorbs and recycles body energy without compromising design or comfort.

 

With Celliant® fibers that improve health, organic materials that are top-tier, and design that refuses to compromise, The Yaasa Studios Infinity Blanket is different from the rest. Use the Celliant® fibers woven into the Infinity Blanket to decrease recovery time, increase local blood flow, and promote restful sleep. 

 

It's the world's most innovative blanket, backed by scientific studies. 

 

 

The Yaasa Studios Infinity Blanket increases local blood flow, energy, strength, and endurance using Celliant® technology.

 

 

IR has a vasodilator effect which expands blood vessels, increases energy levels, enhances cell vitality, and regulates body temperature. Higher energy levels equal more fuel for your body, aiding in recovery.

 

Celliant® is revolutionary, patented technology that recycles the body's natural energy (heat) into infrared (IR) light that is emitted back into the body's tissue.

 

 

Infrared is widely recognized for having positive effects on the body. The use of Celliant® fibers converts the body’s natural energy (heat) into infrared (IR) light and emits it into the body’s muscles. Over 60% of your consumed energy is lost simply through heat escaping your body.  

 

 

Rather than trap your body heat, Celliant® turns that wasted energy into infrared light. The result is a responsive textile clinically proven to benefit the human body:

  • increase energy, endurance, stamina and performance
  • recover faster from physical activity
  • promote restful sleep and increased comfort.   

The Infinity Blanket blends Celliant® material with organic cotton to create a fabric that recycles and emits infrared light. On average, your body emits 100 watts of energy in a given moment. The Infinity Blanket is a unique way of taking advantage of that energy! 

 

Celliant® fiber is a different kind of performance technology and is CE recognized and FDA determined for its medical benefits and uses.

 

The FDA has determined that Celliant® products are medical devices as defined in section 201(h) of the Federal Food, Drug and Cosmetic Act and are general wellness products.

Celliant® fiber is CE recognized in Europe for its medical purposes and aid in healing through infrared (IR) light increasing the metabolic rate to provide more energy at a cellular level. It's also used to ease symptoms of various vascular and sleep conditions because of it's ability to improve oxygenation. 

 

 

Third party clinical trials have proven the effectiveness of Celliant® technology, with studies conducted at top tier universities, including University of California Irvine, University of Calgary, UC Long Beach Veterans Affairs Medical Center, Texas A&M University, and Loyola University Chicago.

 

 

Hospitals and doctors commonly use infrared light as a therapeutic treatment for conditions ranging from high blood pressure and congestive heart failure to muscle tears and rheumatoid arthritis.

 

Increase local blood flow, suppor heat generation, and recycle your energy with high volume of Celliant®.

 

 

Celliant® technology has been used in a number of different products, like clothing and bedding, to help users reach their full wellness potential. The transformation of your body's expelled energy to infrared light boosts your local blood flow to increase energy levels and deliver nutrients through your bloodstream.

 

 

The infrared light stimulates cell growth and regeneration to help heal injuries more quickly, reduce pain, and amplify your endurance. The increased local blood flow allows your body to better manage your internal temperature and fall asleep faster-- 15 minutes faster in pilot studies!

Between our eco-friendly materials, sustainable sourcing, and neutral palettes, the Yaasa Infinity Blanket is perfectly designed for any home.

 

 

Luxury and sustainability are woven into one beautiful blanket.

 

 

With certified organic cotton and Celliant® fiber made from recycled materials, we've woven luxury and sustainability into one innovative blanket. The Celliant® yarn is sourced directly from a manufacturer in Spain.

 

 

The Infinity Blanket is manufactured in Europe with diligent efforts toward green practices and selection of eco-friendly materials.

 

It's the perfect throw, comforter, sleep enhancer, and health benefiting all-in-one blanket.

 

 

With oversized dimensions, The Infinity Blanket is truly multi-functional. It can be used as a throw for your living room or a comforter for your bed. It makes the perfect travel companion on long flights or cramped road trips.

 

Get your Yaasa Infinity Blanket in full size, or our newly introduced Travel Size, for your convenience.

 

 

Best of all? It's durable, machine washable, and the technology never fades. To clean, simply throw it in your washing machine and tumble dry. Celliant® will last for the lifetime of the blanket, never washing out or breaking down. 

 

We used simple shades of grey to create a stylish neutral palette for any interior space.

 

 

We designed the Infinity Blanket to suit any home design with a soft palette of greys. The timeless color conveys a sophisticated and conservative balance that matches any room of your home or your linens in your bedroom to blend into your life. Our team plans on announcing new colors and sizes as the company grows.

 

 

 *Yaasa Infinity Blanket promotes a temporary increase in local blood flow in healthy individuals.

 Check out the following video from real Infinity Blanket users.

Madeleine Foster, Yoga Instructor

 

Kasey Camacho, Co-Founder, SBFITT

 

Ian Alldredge, Professional Kite Surfer

 

 

 

 

Introducing the team behind The Infinity Blanket. 

 

 

 

 

 

FAQs

What is Celliant®? 

Celliant® is a revolutionary, patented technology that, through the use of fibers, converts the body’s natural energy (heat) into infrared (IR) light and emits it into the body’s tissue and muscles. The result is a responsive textile clinically proven to benefit the human body, utilizing a blend of minerals and proprietary ingredients embedded into the fiber’s core.

How does Celliant® work?

Celliant® is a revolutionary, patented technology that, through the use of fibers, converts the body’s natural energy (heat) into infrared (IR) light and emits it into the body’s tissue and muscles. The result is a responsive textile clinically proven to benefit the human body, utilizing a blend of minerals and proprietary ingredients embedded into the fiber’s core.

What is Celliant® made from?

Celliant® is a unique blend of 13 thermo-reactive minerals including titanium dioxide, silicon dioxide and aluminum oxide. Additional proprietary ingredients are blended with polyester fiber to create a variety of staple fibers, spun and filament yarns, and fabric blends .

Will I feel Celliant® working?

While you will not necessarily be able to perceive or feel an increase in circulation, oxygenation or blood flow, clinical testing has measured an increase in skin oxygen levels (TCPO2) and consistently recorded significant improvements across a wide spectrum of test subjects. Consumers who try Celliant® often experience increased comfort and an overall improved sense of health.

Does Celliant® have to touch my skin for a heightened effect?

Products enhanced with Celliant technology can be covered or layered without losing effectiveness. Clothing, sheets, and laminated or waterproof fabrics do not hinder the efficacy of Celliant® to recycle energy to the body. The body’s electromagnetic emissions travel through clothing, wood, glass and even concrete. The energy your body emits is the same that’s seen in technology used by the military to view humans inside buildings.

Will my skin temperature increase if I'm reusing my body's energy?

No, by re-emitting energy back into the body, the process acts as a thermal regulator to help balance body temperature. When circulation is increased, the body is able to either warm up or cool down, depending on the external environment, more easily through convection.

Will the Celliant® lose its effectiveness over time?

No, the Celliant® will hold its strength over time (i.e., it will not wash out).

How do I care for The Infinity Blanket?

Wash cold and tumble dry low.

What are the dimensions of the Infinity Blanket?

60 x 80 inches.

How much does the Infinity Blanket weigh?

2.25 pounds.

What is the Infinity Blanket made of?

The blanket is a blend of 28% Celliant Fiber and 72% Organic Cotton.

Where is the Infinity Blanket made?

The blanket is imported from Germany and is made from organic and recycled materials.

Where do you source your materials from?

The certified organic cotton yarn is sourced from multiple places in Europe, and the Celliant® yarn is made in Spain.

What type of stitching is along the edge?

The outer edge is lined with a whip stitch.

How is the Infinity Blanket different than others?

Other materials will try and insulate heat, while still allowing it to escape. The Celliant® fibers imbedded into The Infinity Blanket recycle your body's heat in the form of infrared light. The infrared light opens your blood vessels, creating a vasodilation effect. This process expands your blood vessels, which increases your tissue oxygen levels. Higher oxygen levels equal more fuel for your body, aiding in recovering and pain management.

When is the best time to use the Infinity Blanket?

Any time – after a workout, a yoga session, long day of skiing or snowboarding, or even on a long plane flight. You can also use it at your office desk if your colleagues like to crank up the AC. Your options are endless here. Snuggle up!

Can I use the Infinity Blanket outdoors?

It is best to use the blanket indoors, but if you would like to use it outside, be mindful of where you place it.

Is the Infinity Blanket water resistant?

The blend we chose consists of organic cotton and, as such, is not water resistant.

Does the Infinity Blanket retain heat?

Yes, in fact the blanket recycles your body’s natural energy (heat) into infrared light keeping you comfortably warm.

Will there be multiple color and size options?

Currently this is the only color and size option, however if this campaign is successful, we are planning to introduce new colors and sizes.

Yaasa Infinity Blanket The first blanket that increases local blood flow, aids recovery, and enhances rest with Celliant® fiber technology. The Yaasa Studios Infinity Blanket is the first to use Celliant® fibers to benefit your body. As summer comes to an end and cooler weather is around the corner, now is the perfect time to layer up!  Whether you're an athlete looking for a recovery trick, a yogi seeking wellness and comfort during resting poses, or simply someone who's looking to improve sleep, The Yaasa Studios Infinity Blanket is perfect for you. 

CELLIANT® TECHNOLOGY - Celliant® is blended into organic cotton to create a revolutionary fabric that increases energy levels in healthy individuals.

FDA DETERMINED - Celliant® fiber has been clinically tested and is now determined by the FDA for medical uses*.

ECO-FRIENDLY MATERIALS - The Infinity Blanket is manufactured with green practices in Europe and uses certified organic cotton. Up to 12 plastic water bottles are recycled in the production of each blanket.
We believe your blanket should do more for you, so we created one that absorbs and recycles body energy without compromising design or comfort. 
 With Celliant® fibers that improve health, organic materials that are top-tier, and design that refuses to compromise, The Yaasa Studios Infinity Blanket is different from the rest. Use the Celliant® fibers woven into the Infinity Blanket to decrease recovery time, increase local blood flow, and promote restful sleep.  
 It's the world's most innovative blanket, backed by scientific studies.    The Yaasa Studios Infinity Blanket increases local blood flow, energy, strength, and endurance using Celliant® technology.  IR has a vasodilator effect which expands blood vessels, increases energy levels, enhances cell vitality, and regulates body temperature. Higher energy levels equal more fuel for your body, aiding in recovery. Celliant® is revolutionary, patented technology that recycles the body's natural energy (heat) into infrared (IR) light that is emitted back into the body's tissue.   Infrared is widely recognized for having positive effects on the body. The use of Celliant® fibers converts the body’s natural energy (heat) into infrared (IR) light and emits it into the body’s muscles. Over 60% of your consumed energy is lost simply through heat escaping your body.    Rather than trap your body heat, Celliant® turns that wasted energy into infrared light. The result is a responsive textile clinically proven to benefit the human body:
increase energy, endurance, stamina and performance
recover faster from physical activity
promote restful sleep and increased comfort.   

The Infinity Blanket blends Celliant® material with organic cotton to create a fabric that recycles and emits infrared light. On average, your body emits 100 watts of energy in a given moment. The Infinity Blanket is a unique way of taking advantage of that energy! 
 

Celliant® fiber is a different kind of performance technology and is CE recognized and FDA determined for its medical benefits and uses. 
 
The FDA has determined that Celliant® products are medical devices as defined in section 201(h) of the Federal Food, Drug and Cosmetic Act and are general wellness products.
Celliant® fiber is CE recognized in Europe for its medical purposes and aid in healing through infrared (IR) light increasing the metabolic rate to provide more energy at a cellular level. It's also used to ease symptoms of various vascular and sleep conditions because of it's ability to improve oxygenation. 
 

 
Third party clinical trials have proven the effectiveness of Celliant® technology, with studies conducted at top tier universities, including University of California Irvine, University of Calgary, UC Long Beach Veterans Affairs Medical Center, Texas A&M University, and Loyola University Chicago.
 

 
Hospitals and doctors commonly use infrared light as a therapeutic treatment for conditions ranging from high blood pressure and congestive heart failure to muscle tears and rheumatoid arthritis.
 

Increase local blood flow, suppor heat generation, and recycle your energy with high volume of Celliant®.
 

 
Celliant® technology has been used in a number of different products, like clothing and bedding, to help users reach their full wellness potential. The transformation of your body's expelled energy to infrared light boosts your local blood flow to increase energy levels and deliver nutrients through your bloodstream.
 

 
The infrared light stimulates cell growth and regeneration to help heal injuries more quickly, reduce pain, and amplify your endurance. The increased local blood flow allows your body to better manage your internal temperature and fall asleep faster-- 15 minutes faster in pilot studies!

Between our eco-friendly materials, sustainable sourcing, and neutral palettes, the Yaasa Infinity Blanket is perfectly designed for any home.
 

 

Luxury and sustainability are woven into one beautiful blanket.
 

 
With certified organic cotton and Celliant® fiber made from recycled materials, we've woven luxury and sustainability into one innovative blanket. The Celliant® yarn is sourced directly from a manufacturer in Spain.
 

 
The Infinity Blanket is manufactured in Europe with diligent efforts toward green practices and selection of eco-friendly materials.
 

It's the perfect throw, comforter, sleep enhancer, and health benefiting all-in-one blanket.
 

 
With oversized dimensions, The Infinity Blanket is truly multi-functional. It can be used as a throw for your living room or a comforter for your bed. It makes the perfect travel companion on long flights or cramped road trips.
 

Get your Yaasa Infinity Blanket in full size, or our newly introduced Travel Size, for your convenience.
 

 
Best of all? It's durable, machine washable, and the technology never fades. To clean, simply throw it in your washing machine and tumble dry. Celliant® will last for the lifetime of the blanket, never washing out or breaking down. 
 

We used simple shades of grey to create a stylish neutral palette for any interior space.
 

 
We designed the Infinity Blanket to suit any home design with a soft palette of greys. The timeless color conveys a sophisticated and conservative balance that matches any room of your home or your linens in your bedroom to blend into your life. Our team plans on announcing new colors and sizes as the company grows.

Madeleine Foster, Yoga Instructor
 

Kasey Camacho, Co-Founder, SBFITT

story:
Durgod Fusion: we're making them like they used to

 

Do you remember what your first game console looked like? NES is the classic gaming console that bestowed on us timeless childhood memories. The classic machine had a raised top panel and an iconic grooved plastic body. Every gamer who has owned an NES will never forget the wonderful time spent in front of that console enjoying their childhood games.

Retro Design

Although is it becoming harder and harder to find any retro equipment nowadays, our team was encouraged create a product to bring back those memories, as a result DURGOD FUSION was created.A retro keyboard fused with modern technology, with all the functions you are familiar with and also a variety of connection methods. Whether it is Windows, Mac OS, mobile phones, wired, wireless or even Bluetooth, it can easily be connect. In order to for the keyboard to fit into different scenarios, we have designed it into a compact size and can be easily carried around.Retro color matching will definitely remind you of your happy childhood! FUSION will have 3 different styles: original, STEAM and NAVIGATION.

Underneath the aged-look plastics, you'll find all the connectivity you've come to expect in the modern age. Whether it is Windows, Mac OS, mobile phones, wired, wireless or even Bluetooth, Durgod Fusion connects to all your modern gadgetry.  

Check out some early reviews:

Compact and Portable

 

 At just 14 inches it's easy to take on the go, in your backpack, or if you're really going retro, in your briefcase. We didn't want any of today's modern tech to ruin the vintage feel, so we've hidden the wireless USB dongle in a magnetic compartment underneath the logo.

Typing Experience

 

Every key stroke is comfortable, consistent and responsive. We achieved this level of typing experience by using authentic CHERRY MX switches and high-quality keycaps for our Keyboard design.

Precise and Responsive Switches

 

FUSION uses CHERRY MX switches, the leader in key switch technology. Cherry MX switches offer unparalleled precision, fine-tuned tactile and audible feedback as well as linear feel. Cherry MX switches are the industry’s gold standard with great reliability and high performance for fast typing and competitive gaming. The responsive keycaps allow even novice users to feel like advanced players.

Choose Your Switches

Customize your FUSION with the perfect cherry MX switches, you can choose your perfect level of click as the FUSION keyboard will be available with 7 different switches.

The keycaps are made from PBT plastic with double-shot legends and fully enclosed letters that will last for years to come.

3 Types of Connectivity

FUSION is more than your ordinary keyboard. It allows you to use the keyboard in three different ways through its diverse connectivity options. You can connect the keyboard to your phone, tablet, desktop computer or laptop via 3 modes of connectivity:

 Two Wireless Connection

Wired USB-C/A or USB-C/C connection

 

Isn’t that convenient? No wires, no fuss. Just your device with your very own FUSION keyboard. This high-tech retro keyboard will impress those around you as an old school keyboard equipped with flashy functionality.

Compatible with Windows/iOS/Android

FUSION is a user-friendly keyboard that’s compatible with most smart devices on the market. Bluetooth connection supports Windows (8 and above), iOS and Android while 2.4GHz connection supports Windows (XP and above), iOS and Android as well. Simply choose the connection that suits you best.

Long-lasting Battery

Through multiple experiments, we’ve implemented a low-energy consumption solution in our retro Keyboard to ensure long-lasting battery life. With a full charge, the Keyboard’s battery can last between 20-40 days using the wireless connection mode (battery life will vary due to environmental and computing conditions).

Fusion Keyboard Is A Creative Tool For Those Who Type And Write

The funky retro design is an homage to an era when grey plastics were romantic, but first and foremost, DURGOD FUSION is a creative tool. By letting you customize it and giving you the best possible performance from a keyboard we want to enable you to do your best creative work. Whether its writing kick-ass code, writing lyrics or editing videos, FUSION enables your creative with every satisfying click.

Keyboard Specifications:

  • Size:  12.4 * 5.3 * 1.7INCH / 316 * 134 * 45MM
  • Weight: About 1KG
  • Keycap: DURGOD PBT CHERRY profile Double-Shot keycaps
  • CHERRY MX keyswitch type: Black / Blue / Red / Brown / Speed Silver / Silent Black / Slient Red
  • Connection method: Bluetooth 5.0/2.4GHz wireless/USB-C wired connection
  • Bluetooth supports: Win8 system and above, iOS , and android
  • 2.4GHz Wireless supports: Win XP and above, iOS, and android system
  • Mode: Multimedia function keys, key combinations
  • Driver software: Support DURGOD Zeus Engine software, macro button function
  • Onboard storage: Support
  • Return rate: 1000HZ

Color Scheme Close-up

DURGOD FUSION comes in three color schemes, inspired by different iconic industrial design styles from the '80s.

Gray/White/Orange three-color keycap is named "ORIGINAL", and the keyboard composed of Gray/Black/Red three-color keycaps named "STEAM", the keyboard in Blue/White/Yellow is named "NAVIGATOR".

Check out some early reviews: 

 
 
 
 

This isn't our first keyboard, just search for "Durgod" on Amazon to check out our previous products and the rave reviews they've gathered.

 

 

 

Design Process 

When we first set out on our design journey, our main challenge was to get the bulky angular aesthetic of retro gear into a compact form factor. We've elevated the rear side of the keyboard to give it that boxy look, without actually adding unnecessary bulk.

We looked to the Commodore 64 for inspiration, taking the elevated rear side and translating it into something that gives you that same feeling, while keeping it portable. The way we did ended up solving this engineering challenge is by elevating the rear end on collapsible legs. This way that bit of oomph at the end can be collapsed on the go, and diagonal lines on the side were added for forced perspective. 

Where the C-64 has its logo, we've added ours, but its also a hidden magnetic compartment to store the wireless dongle. Status LEDs on the right match the original location of the C-64, we designed this in a way that hopefully gives people who remember the original a sense of subtle recognition.

Creating three different styles for this keyboard has been a major manufacturing challenge because they all come with custom keycaps, but our amazing factory has managed to create a reliable product that's made to last. In fact, every keyboard gets completely tested and every key gets a gentle tap to verify that everything is in tip-top shape before it leaves the factory. 

DURGOD was established in 2016 in Asia's Greater Bay Area. We have an R&D facility in Shenzhen, the silicon valley of hardware, which is where our team of engineers and designers are always working on the next big thing.

Our vision is to build an integrated ecosystem of products and services with our experienced multi-disciplinary team. You backing our Kickstarter gets us one step closer to our goal, because you, our users are the most important part of our work.

story:
The Honeycomb Table

A design forward, high-end side table made out of sustainably grown plywood and beautiful veneers. Use it as a bedside table or the centerpiece of a living room; in any room it will demand a presence.  

THE DESIGN - The Honeycomb Table was created during a design studio at Rhode Island School of Design.  The project began with drawings and paintings from natural objects under magnification, which formed an understanding of the geometric form of honeycombs.  Inspired by Middle Eastern patterns and the materiality of the Arts and Crafts movement, I adapted this geometric form into a nine-layered side table.  It was designed to be cut out of veneered sheets of high quality, furniture grade Baltic Birch plywood, accentuating the layered design concept, adding to the sustainability of the otherwise slow growing hardwood veneers and providing a surprising amount of strength to a seemingly delicate structure. Assembled the table stands 20” H 16” W 14” D.  

THE PRODUCTION - The tables start as ten separate pieces of hardwood plywood and are vacuum veneered on the top surface with your choice of Red Oak, Curly Maple, Cherry or Black Walnut.   The intricate, interlocking layers are cut using a computer controlled routing/milling table to provide the high level of precision demanded by the design.  Once cut, each piece  is hand finished before being assembled.  The natural finishes selected  seal the wood from water and draws out the layered and figured beauty and shine. 

THE FUNDING - Your funding will allow me to put this finely produced table into production.  It will supply the funding to purchase the precision tools and materials and includes  packaging and shipping of the finished tables you, the donors.  Once the production shop is establish, I will first produce these signature tables ordered by you, the first funders, and then continue production with distribution both online and in stores.  

THE REWARDS - Some great rewards are being offered with this project. Starting at $150,  Honeycomb Tabletop inspired trays are available in your choice of two veneers. These beautiful items are great for dinner parties or a night in and are made of the same fine materials and precision as the full tables.  They are the perfect donation level for a donor who wants to support the project, but cannot afford a table or for a donor who loves the table so much they want more.  At the upper levels the table is being offered in a great line of veneers.  Each piece is given great attention and is complete with a its own Indie Gogo serial number to differentiate them as original run designs separate from the upcoming production run pieces. 

ABOUT THE DESIGNER - My name is Colin Wiencek, a Furniture Design student at Rhode Island School of Design (RISD).  My work often references architecture and traditional designs from around the world.  My design concepts utilize the precise capabilities of  modern production methods to produce crisp, fine line design without minimizing quality.   My production techniques provide the craftsmanship typical of expensive,  individually crafted, fine furniture pieces to be bought to the consumer at reasonable costs accessible by all.

Please follow the progress of this project on Twitter.

The images on this page picture the prototype table, the production pieces will vary slightly due to new production methods. The cut sides will not be black as in the prototype, but rather the fine horizontal planes and varied tones of the furniture grade ply, played against the interlocking veneered planes of the Honeycomb design.

Parcel Post Shipping is included in all levels of rewards.  International donors: please contact me before pledging for additional shipping prices.  

A big thanks to Chris Zabriskie who produced the song in the video and allowed it for commercial license through the Free Music Archive.

story: Gravity Light is a modern, portable and versatile lighting LED lamp. Each piece is magnetically connected. It's the WORLD'S FIRST lamp that is able to rotate 360 degree from top to bottom, left to right and back to front.
story_txt:
Gravity Light is a modern, portable and versatile lighting LED lamp. Each piece is magnetically connected. It's the WORLD'S FIRST lamp that is able to rotate 360 degree from top to bottom, left to right and back to front.   

 


  

 With the 360 degree free rotation ability, Gravity Light makes lighting available in all direction. Unlike other lamp where you have to manipulate the stand, the body and sometimes the bulb to change the lighting position, Gravity Light makes the adjustment so easy for you, right at your fingertips.  
 
 
 
 
 
 We also developed our own patent technology, that allows electricity current to pass through magnetic contact. Just snap it on, it will light up by itself!  
 
 
 
Enjoy the natural light with the Gravity Light on your desk. No matter where you place it, this unique lamp stands out by itself and represents the perfect match of simplicity, design and functionality.   
Gravity Light's height is also adjustable. The stand height is 27 cm, and it can be extended to 47cm if needed. 
 
 
 For the purpose of achieving  perfection, we've specifically selected the highest grade of LED light with a life span of 99,280 hours. That means if someone is going to uses it 8 hours straight a day, it can light up to 34 years.

story:
The Backstory
In the United States, only forty percent of teen mothers finish high school.  Even worse, less than two percent of girls who become pregnant before age eighteen will obtain a college degree before the age of 30.  The statistics are disheartening. 

However, there is hope in the Northern Virginia community. 

For the past 25 years, Borromeo Housing, Inc., an education-first, transitional housing community, has been working to help Arlington's teen mom's beat the odds.  Borromeo Housing provides a stable environment and a supportive community for the mothers and children while helping the resident mothers finish their education, learn life skills and reach their potential. 

When we heard about this amazing mission and work, we knew we had to get involved.

This year, Rebuilding Together Arlington/Fairfax/Falls Church has teamed up with the Arlington Teen Network Board for the "Raise the Roof" project.  The project will provide the Borromeo Housing Inc. group house with much needed repairs and modifications, in addition to providing additional resources for the mothers.

Phase 1
On Saturday, April 27th, 2013, National Rebuilding Day, a team of skilled and novice Rebuilding Together volunteers will provide critical repairs to the house including ripping up old carpet to make the home healthier for the children and moms, replacing a countertop in the kitchen and repairing a badly damaged walkway in the backyard.

Phase 2
Throughout the months of April and May, the Arlington Teen Network Board will conduct a book drive to collect young adult books and college-prep books for the mothers. 

On May 18th, 2013, the Teen Network Board, local AmeriCorps members and several other community members will give the house a "facelift" by painting the interior of the home, designing and assembling new furniture in the study room, painting a mural in the kids' playroom and cleaning the backyard for the coming spring and summer season.

Now, we need your help!

In order to complete Phase 2 on May 18th, 2013, we need to raise money for the material cost for the project! 

The Impact
Your tax-deductible donation will help pay for paint, new desks, cleaning supplies and other essential materials needed.

More importantly, your donation will be an investment in the success stories of Borromeo Housing, Inc. residents like Carla - an honor student, student class president and mother. Carla will graduate this spring and go on to community college, making her the first high school graduate in her family.  Our work done in the Borromeo Housing, Inc. study room will help her focus and succeed in a quiet environment. 

With support from friends like you, the Arlington Teen Network Board and Rebuilding Together Arlington/Fairfax/Falls Church can make this project a reality.  Whether young or old, near or far, you are all a part of our community.  And we can’t do it without you.  Help us write this great chapter together. 

Other Ways You Can Help
We welcome your contribution, no matter its form.

If you’re unable to contribute financially, you can help by spreading the word about Raise the Roof to as many friends and family as possible.

You can:

  • Copy and paste this content into an email and send it to your email list
  • Share our campaign link on Facebook, Twitter and Google+ www.igg.me/at/ARLraisetheroof
  • Donate a great book to our Raise the Roof book drive

Let's raise the roof!

Rebuilding Together Arlington/Fairfax/Falls Church (RT-AFF) is a 501(c)3 non-profit organization that provides critical home repairs to the homes of low-income homeowners and community centers. Rebuilding Together Arlington/Fairfax/Falls Church is one of over 200 affiliates of Rebuilding Together, Inc.

The Arlington Teen Network Board is a project of the Arlington Partnership for Children, Youth and Families.  Teenagers appointed by the Arlington County School Board and Arlington County Board strive to strengthen the teen voice in the community and make a positive difference in Arlington, Virginia.

For more information on this project, visit the Raise the Roof Facebook page, www.facebook.com/ARLraisetheroof or email sheilam@rebuildingtogether-aff.org.

story:
We don’t always have time for breakfast when we get up in the morning. Even cereal, the quickest of meals, can be a challenge when you’re trying to beat the clock. You might be one of the many people that skips breakfast entirely — those days are over. We couldn’t believe there wasn’t a viable option to eat your cereal on-the-go, so we made one, and it’s awesome. 

 

 

We set out to create a portable cereal cup that does not mess around. We don't play that soggy cereal nonsense. Which is why it's a two cup system; one for the cereal and the other for the milk. The cereal and milk don't meet until they hit your mouth.

 

 

For the first time, cereal is ultra-portable. You'll never have to dangerously juggle a bowl of cereal in the car or throw cheerios and milk into a dixie cup. Come'on now, we have to share the road with you!

 

 

Enjoy your cereal on your own time, prep it the night before and get those kids out the door.

 

 

VIEW OUR PRESS KIT

 

 

 

Link to the Product Watch article.

 

The CrunchCup is made out of an extremely badass, high-grade plastic called Tritan. It does not contain BPA, BPS, or any other bisphenol. Tritan is a clear and stylish material that resembles glass but will not break if you drop it. It’s dishwasher friendly, shatter resistant, and has been tested by four different third-party labs for safety.

 

 

 

 

Follow us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/thecrunchcup/

Follow us on  Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/thecrunchcup/

Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/thecrunchcup 

 

 

 

The idea of creating a cup that holds cereal and milk was conceived when Rob Lambert and his daughter were out for dinner one night. His daughter, Unique, had the idea to start a cereal bar. Rob liked the proposal, but he wondered what would make the idea extraordinary. Was there a way to transport the cereal that would separate her from the competition? 

Later that week, Rob met up with Kevin Meyer, and they started spit-balling ideas for a portable cereal cup that would keep milk and cereal separate.  

 

After multiple iterations, countless hours kit-bashing with hot glue, CAD, and 3D printing magic, they arrived at a prototype that was ready to be finished by product designer and close friend, Blake Nichols, who made the CrunchCup what it is today. 

Toolbox LA, SD3D, HexLab Makerspace, BrainTank Design, Product Watch, Blake Nichols, Rob Lambert, Kevin Meyer, Ari Hart, Tory Baxter, Bianca Perez, Daniella Azencot, BJ Rogers, Bennett Berger, Michelle Berger, Patrick Lindhorst, Denilson Freitas, Hanna Henry, Dasha Troshko, Hailey Messersmith, Chasen Banks, Zach Aronson, Raychel Espiritu, Shaun Arora, Noramay Cadena,  Unique Lambert, Dave Moon, Michael Meera, Liat Halmos, AJ Ghadimi, Justin Gottuso, Vivian Vasquez, Kong Chho, Hanna Hart, Billy Oxley, Stephen Matoesian, Alec Sant and everyone else that lent an ear when we were still in development.

story:
Short Summary

My name is Dana McKay and I am working for a respite care center located in downtown Houston, TX- Harmony House. This summer I will be using my ongoing education in the dietetic undergrad program at the University of Texas in Austin to help provide nutrition education to a portion of Houston's homeless population. 

  • Harmony House operates as a non-profit organization and can only function with the help of others- any donation will make a huge impact on this deserving cause.

Harmony House provides respite care for up to ONE YEAR for homeless persons too sick to be on the streets but not sick enough to be in the hospital or other homeless shelter. At Harmony House, the GOAL is to provide the supportive services, tools and training to those ready to make the transition from homelessness to permanent housing, self-sufficiency, and independence.

What We Need

All funding provided here will go straight to Harmony House, Inc to be allocated as needed.  All of the assistance provided listed below comes at a heavy cost:

  • Individuals in Respite Care are supported by a 50 hour/week nurse practitioner, and benefit from an on-site medical clinic and pharmacy, hospital accommodations, catered meals, transportation to medical appointments, and a staff of professionals trained to oversee physician prescribed medication and treatment.

The Impact

Your contribution makes a huge difference:

  • With only 1 year to work with, the mission of Harmony House is to get homeless men with an acute illness healthy and healed, as well as help them find work and permanent housing to re-assimilate the men back into working society. 

    Other Ways You Can Help

    Please share this link via Facebook and Twitter and help spread the word.  Anyone can help-and with only less than 2 months to work with, the faster people can find out, the better!

story:
Who We Are

Wassaic Community Farm was founded by farmer Benjamin Schwartz seven years ago after he grew frustrated about the lack of access to good quality produce in the South Bronx where he lived. Food Justice is Farmer Ben's passion and, after four years as a community garden activist in the South Bronx, he moved to Wassaic, NY, about two hours north of New York City and created Wassaic Community Farm.

Seven years later our small farm boasts a dedicated crew of six and sells produce in two markets in New York City (Bushwick, Brooklyn and the South Bronx) and one in Millerton near Wassaic. We also run a CSA (Community Supported Agriculture) program that delivers a box of fresh produce to our customers each week and supply our own farm stand in Wassaic.

We use no pesticides or other chemicals on our farm and we practice sustainable growing and harvesting methods.

We have a number of non-profit partners including Victory Bus Rides, an organization that provides transportation to families of incarcerated people who wish to visit their family members in prison. Their bus ride includes a box of fresh, local, pesticide-free produce from our farm.

We Have Lost Our Housing

A kind family near our farm offered us their house for kitchen, bathroom and shower facilities but now they need the house back! We have two RVs that we planned to renovate for housing with money we earned over the next year. However, with time being of the essence, we need money now to do the job much faster.

What We Need

We need building materials to renovate the RVs and money to pay professionals do to the work we cannot do ourselves. Our needs include:

  • Plywood
  • Roofing Material
  • Hardware
  • Non-pilot light propane stove with full oven
  • Plumbing material
  • A solar shower
  • Hot water heater
  • Solar Panel
  • Money to pay an electrician and plumber
  • RV toilet
  • RV mattresses
  • etc.

What You Get

This is a list of a few of the perks we look forward to sharing with you:

  • Herbal tea sampler: Our dried herbal teas are much sought after in the market. You get five of our teas to sample.
  • Name the RVs: Here is your chance to be immortalized on an RV!
  • Weekend at the farm: Hang out with us! We will give you the royal treatment with garden tours, a trip to our swimming hole and, of course, lots of wonderful fresh, local, pesticide free produce.
  • Three jars of Farmer Tender's Famous Pesto
  • Illustrated thank you post card
  • Weekly CSA Share delivered to you for one season (New York Metropolitan Area only)
  • Farmer Ben designs your herb garden
  • Best of all, knowing that you have helped us help others

The Impact

Without shelter and facilities our farmers will have nowhere to sleep or eat, shower or use the bathroom. Our farm will literally have to shut down. This means we can't continue to do our food justice work serving communities that don't otherwise have access to high quality produce and herbs. We really need your help to complete this season and continue the work that we are so passionate about.

    Risks & Challenges

    We already had plans to renovate the RVs. Farmer Mike, our infrastructure guru, was to complete the project with our help over the next year. We have full confidence that we have access to the people-power and knowledge necessary to complete the renovation. Our main challenge is getting enough money to complete the project much faster than we had anticipated. Being able to purchase all of our supplies at once enables us to have basic facilities up and running by the time we need to leave the house we have been using and to fully complete the renovation shortly thereafter.

      Other Ways You Can Help

      Maybe you don't have money. You can still help!

      • We will gladly accept in-kind donations. Do you have left over building material? We'll take it! Camping equipment you no longer use? We'd be glad for it!
      • Get the word out! Tell your friends and family about us. Share our on Facebook and Twitter, blog about us (we'd be happy to give interviews).
      • Indiegogo makes it easy to share our story with your friends and networks. Please use them.

  Other Ways You Can Help Maybe you don't have money. You can still help!  
We will gladly accept in-kind donations. Do you have left over building material? We'll take it! Camping equipment you no longer use? We'd be glad for it!
Get the word out! Tell your friends and family about us. Share our on Facebook and Twitter, blog about us (we'd be happy to give interviews).
Indiegogo makes it easy to share our story with your friends and networks. Please use them.

story:
The Problem

There are over half a million commercial dishwashers in the United States each pouring hundreds of gallons of hot water down the drain every single day. We have developed an energy conservation device to recycle the heat energy in waste water from commercial dishwashers. 

A usually overlooked but significant amount of energy is required everyday to simply heat the thousands of gallons of potable water for restaurant ware-washing. This process is required by the Health Codes in most areas of the United States and this water heating forms a large portion of commercial kitchens’ continuous daily energy consumption. 

In most current systems this heat energy is simply poured down the drain with the effluent water. Additionally, in many cases, potable water is required to be added to cool the hot effluent, which wastes potable drinking water in addition to the heat energy. The vast majority if this energy is being created by burning fossil fuels like coal and natural gas, and we are all well aware of the problems that arise from that.

The Solution

Energy Saver (Patent Pending) will recycle over 75% of the waste heat energy back into the incoming water. Energy Saver fixes two universal problems that have been overlooked for many years. First, the system quickly pays for itself in reduced energy consumption and second, it can eliminate the need to introduce potable water to temper the exiting hot effluent water, thereby saving both energy and drinking water. It is a smart controller-driven system so the energy savings is maximized.

We have developed a fully functioning proto-type.  We are launching this campaign to raise the funds needed for code-compliance testing and to finish the patent application process.

With your help, we will be able to bring this device to market which has the potential to dramatically reduce the water and energy consumption of commercial kitchens in the US.  This is good for the environment and good for our collective wallets, as energy is one of the main drivers of restaurant food prices.

story:
Zencube is the first and only Himalayan Salt Lamp that has combined traditional salt lamps functionality with modern, contemporary design and the latest smart technology. Change the color to reflect your room or mood.  

Melt your stresses away with Zencube's essential oil compartment. The soft ambient light, health benefits and the aroma of the oils will make you feel great.  

The beauty of nature blends seamlessly with existing furniture and accessories, adding an element of peace and harmony to your décor.



Here's why Zencube is awesome...


... and here's what it comes with. 

The salt crystal is exposed on both sides, encased in a wonderful robust shell. 

Look good. Feel great. 

Zencube keeps us protected by reducing electromagnetic waves in the air given off by our smartphones and screens.

Because nature smells good, too.




The perfect addition to the modern, contemporary home.




Our rigorous testing indicated that the average negative ions generated by Zencube are similar to being in a countryside environment.

Zencube's journey to your home.

Some early sketches of the Zencube during the concepting stage.


Bluetooth 4.0 connects the bulb to the app.

RGB Bulb testing now complete. :)





We are aware that due to certain sensitivities some people may prefer a non-smart Zencube. No problem! If you'd prefer to have a non-App version, please let us know when backing.

A Zencube as unique as you.



We are ready to go. The Zencube has been finalised and tested and is ready to go into mass production.


Check out our website for more information. 

Risks and challenges

Whilst preparing for this campaign we conducted a detailed risk assessment and have in time mitigated all of these risks, so far. The major risks were:

1. Production
2. Sustainable Sourcing
3. RGB Technology
4. Energy Consumption

We have developed many iterations of the Zencube which we have tested and improved to a high standard. We now have fully functional models which are ready for production.

We are fortunate to have years of personal experience developing high quality, life-enhancing premium products. Therefore we have a strict protocol, methodology and processes that we follow for every development that we undertake.

FAQ

How do you clean it? 

Take a slightly damp towel, and wipe the crystal gently, starting from the top to the bottom.

How heavy is it?
3.8kg - 8.3lbs
Does it make any noise? 
No.
How long does Zencube last? 
Given the Zencube doesn't melt - as long as they are not immersed in water at all (it is salt and therefore will dissolve) in theory, you should never have to replace your lamp. In reality however, we acknowledge there will always be general wear and tear etc - so a fairly good estimate would be at least 4-5 years, if not more.
How long does the bulb last? 
The RGB LED bulbs are known for low energy consumption and for being long lasting. The bulbs should last between 20,000 to 30,000 hours.
How do you store this lamp?
It's best to leave lamps on 24/7 for optimal results but to store them for long periods, wrap in plastic or use the plastic zipper bag provided.
What devices will the app work with?

Zencube can connect to iOS or Android phones and tablets that have Bluetooth v4.0 or later.

Will the plug work in my country? 

When ordering your Zencube, please specify which plug you require from US, Europe or UK.

Does Zencube work only with Zencube Essential Oils? 

No, you can put anything in it as long as it smells good!

What is Zencube's cable length?
120cm
How can I maximise the Zencube's health benefits? 

Simple - leave it on at all times and let it work its magic!

Why did we choose a cube?

As Himalayan salt lamps are mostly hand-crafted with a traditional shape, a cube is the perfect proportion and ratio to be able to extract the maximum amount of benefits, and not suffer the same issues as traditional lamps. Not to mention it looks stunning! :)

How can we choose the colour or customise the product? 
We'll be sending a survey out after the campaign where all details can be confirmed.
Is the bulb replaceable? 
YES. We have designed the LED modules to be able to be replaced.
Why is international shipping so high?
Zencube is a pure salt block - hence it is extremely heavy at nearly 4kg (8.8lbs). We have just put one shipping cost to anywhere in the world and have actually subsidised this cost for some countries.
How do I switch the lamp on and off?
The lamp has an on/off switch on there or you can use the App and do it directly from your smartphone.
I want to send some Zencube's as gifts this Christmas. Will it be ready by then? 
In a word.. Yes! We will be putting things into production in September and October and hope to deliver in November and December.
Does the lamp still work with the LED bulb turned off?
The lamp only activates when it is turned on and the effects of the salt come from the heat from the bulb.
Do the prices stated include shipping? 

No, they don't. Shipping is added at checkout.

Will the lamp do well in humid environments?
Yes, the Zencube is fine in humid environments. We've tested it both in dry and humid environments. In humid environments, it may just sweat slightly more, but that's about it.
What is the material on the casing on the salt cube?

The materials predominantly used are polycarbonate and butadiene.
