story:
Floor Cleaning 4.0 is here!

With groundbreaking self-cleaning technology, Narwal signals the start of a new era of the fully automatic robot cleaner, where you can enjoy a truly hands-free floor cleaning experience. 

 

For years of evolution, floor cleaning with the robot still remains little more than a semi-automatic routine for us. The laborious manual works have only increased the time we spend doing cleaning and made the task more stressful. 

Narwal is here to make your life easier.  

While other robot mops have a small water reservoir plus a cloth that requires frequent removal for cleaning, our unique mop system features self-cleaning technology so you never have a dirty mop. The robot will wash, rinse and dry the mops automatically.

The base station has a two-bucket system which separates wastewater from clean water and includes a built-in pump to spray the water to the mops and a washboard to clean the mop. The full tank of 5L can cover a sizable space up to 2,150 ft² in 3 hours. 

A wet mop will breed bacteria! Not going to happen to Narwal! The ventilation system helps to dry up the mop when the mopping is done to prevent the damp and bacterium.

 

Most of the robot cleaners out there clean the floor by merely pushing or dragging the cleaning fabric around, which only makes it worse. Featuring 2 rounded triangle spin mops, Narwal prevails over traditional ones and easily captures fine dust and removes stains seamlessly.  

 

Narwal can be your reliable vacuuming buddy too. For daily cleaning of surface debris, Narwal works wonders helping you maintain floors clean just like other standalone robot vacuums. 

Powered by a 1800Pa motor, its immense suction pressure effortlessly takes care of all dust, dirt, pet hair and everything else in your home. The two side brushes with intelligent speeds designed to clean every corner.   

With the technical background of DJI, Narwal boasts its smart mapping and navigation which allows the robot to adapt any environment to clean the room properly with ease. 

 

Lidar Navigation Technology

Narwal can learn the environment and figure out an optimized cleaning routine instead of aimlessly spinning around. The technologies of Lidar Navigation and the Simultaneous Localization and Mapping (SLAM) literally make Narwal smarter than ever. 

Monitor and Plan Cleaning with Narwal App

With the Narwal Robotics APP, you can adjust cleaning settings, customize the cleaning strategy, and monitor the cleaning status and more no matter where you are.

No-Go Zone

With the mapping, you can define no-go zones to build virtual barriers for mopping or vacuuming as you wish through the APP. No-go zones can be stored for all future auto-scheduled runs. 

Smart Sensors

What makes a robot cleaner robotic is the precision of the navigation sensors. With multiple smart sensors, the robot avoids obstacles with ease and tackles tough terrain effortlessly. 

When it knocks into something, its bumper retracts and the sensors tell the robot to find a clear path.

The cliff sensors help the robot sense the edges and avoid it falling from heights.

The wall sensors let the robot follow very closely along walls and around objects without touching them. Narwal recognizes the carpet with the virtual walls around, which is the no-go zone preset via the App. 

Narwal delivers effective cleaning with a low noise output. It’s ideal for late-night cleaning or anyone who likes a bit of quiet time.

After a constant effort of 3 years, we have finally brought the idea of Narwal to life. Check out the Unboxing, Operation Guide and App demo videos below to take a closer look at Narwal.

 

As the campaign goes on, we’ll be sharing more review videos from our beta testers and reviewers. Stay tuned!

Narwal Robotics is based in Shenzhen and Songshan Lake, China, invested and mentored by Mr. Li Zexiang, Mr. Gan Jie, and Mr. Ko Ping Keung.

Li Zexiang: Chairman of DJI & Googol tech and Co-founder of X-bot Park.

Gan Jie: Vice president of Cheung Kong Graduate School of Business and Co-founder of X-bot Park.

Ko Ping Keung: Founder of Celestry & Silicon Federation International and Co-founder of X-bot Park.

Cooperating with experts in physics, dynamics, algorithms and engineering, we have spent 3 years developing Narwal and built our own factory already. Narwal is an epoch-making product which is leading a revolution for floor cleaning.

Stay tuned!

Narwal is an epoch-making product which is leading a revolution for floor cleaning.

story:
Always know what's happening at home, any time, anywhere with the VAVA Home Cam — the easiest way to watch over your home and your yard. We believe everyone deserves a better home security experience that’s simple to use, durable enough to weather any situation, and reliably delivers high-performance monitoring, day and night. 

Meet the VAVA Home Cam — a wireless security camera designed to go outdoors or indoors, sets up in minutes, and has no monthly service fees, giving you more choice over how you control your footage. 

Know more of what’s happening 

A property crime happens every 3.7 seconds, and although more than 60% of us want home security, less than 20% of us actually do.  Why? Because the way home security has worked needs to change. Instead of complex systems requiring expert installation and ongoing monthly monitoring fees, we need simple, reliable home security that just works, outdoors AND indoors. VAVA Home Cam installs and sets up in minutes, and is designed to fit easily wherever you need an extra pair of eyes.

Stay Charged with the VAVA Solar Panel

Get even more energy smart by pairing the VAVA Home Cam with a VAVA Solar Panel to harness the power of the sun so you’ll never need to recharge.  Each IP66 weather-resistant VAVA Solar Panel comes with its own mounting kit and 2M (6.5 ft) charging cable and weather-proof connectors. 

*Add the VAVA Solar Panel to any pledge for just $45*

See in 1080p high-def clarity with VAVA Home Cam's 140-degree wide angle lens, day and night. VAVA Home Cam's Sony EXMOR IMX323 sensor, wide dynamic range, and advanced H.265 encoding mean clear, sharp pictures in every environment  — even in complete darkness. The VAVA Home Cam goes beyond basic monitoring with a built-in alarm that you can trigger from your Home Cam app, and two-way audio communication so you’ll always stay connected.

Details to Help You See Clearer 

Not all 1080p resolution is created equal, and the VAVA Home Cam includes several details to help you see clearer.  Each Home Cam is equipped with an industry-leading Sony EXMOR IMX323 sensor, wide dynamic range, and uses H.265 video encoding for crisper images and footage. 

Wide dynamic range is designed to balance lighting in pictures and videos, and is especially helpful for situations where there is a contrast between lighting in the shade and elsewhere (e.g., front door entryways where it may be much brighter towards the street compared with directly in front of a door). 

 

H.265 video encoding allows for higher efficiency when transmitting video footage and takes up significantly less storage space. When compared with H.264 (which most cameras today use), H.265 cameras can generally reduce bandwidth consumption and storage by 50%, meaning a more seamless and space-saving monitoring experience for you.

Alerts When You Need Them

Get automatic alerts straight to your Home Cam app when unusual activity is detected, such as motion or when someone tries to move your camera. Each VAVA Home Cam comes with three levels of motion sensitivity (low, medium, and high) and a customizable monitoring schedule, so you'll only get the alerts that matter to you, when you want them.  For added protection, you'll also receive an alert when your Home Cam is moved out of range.

See something unexpected? Trigger the VAVA Home Cam's built-in alarm directly from your app, no matter where you are in the world. 

Stay protected rain or shine, with VAVA Home Cam’s tough IP66 exterior to weather any situation. 

Each VAVA Home Cam comes with three different mount types (outdoor mount, strong magnetic mount, and desktop mount) for easy placement on any surface.  

 

Outdoors or indoors — the choice is yours. The Home Cam’s unique design gives you the flexibility of protecting your home’s exterior or keeping an eye on what’s going on indoors. 

The VAVA Home Cam is as tough and versatile on the inside as it is on the outside — unlike most home security cameras that rely solely on one storage method, the VAVA Home Cam offers multiple options for locally encrypted storage that come at no extra charge to you. This includes support for storage on a microSD card (supports up to 128GB*), in addition to RTSP support so you can save footage on your personal NAS servers. 

Plus, the Home Cam will now also include optional cloud storage to give you even more peace of mind and control over how you control/access your footage.

 

Extended Access to Your Footage. Free Forever.

Both options give you safe, simple, secure access to your footage — without any extra fees. Because all footage is encrypted and stored locally through the base station, you’ll always have access through the VAVA Home Cam mobile app. At the end of the day, we believe your footage is yours, and you should always have the option for free, secure extended video history without any compulsory monthly fees.

See how much you could potentially save with the VAVA Home Cam over just one year of ownership.

The above is based on 30 day activity access for two cameras

*128GB can store up to 240 hours worth of footage in 1080p HD quality 

We're here to make home security simpler and more accessible — without compromising performance. See how VAVA Home Cam stacks up. 

Always see what’s happening with the VAVA Home Cam mobile app, built for iOS and Android. We’ve included easy access to all the essentials you need, giving you one tap access to your live feed, alerts, snapshots, and two-way communication. 

 

Other app features include:

  • Triggering an alarm 
  • Bookmarking recordings
  • Sharing camera access with up to 20 family members and trusted contacts
  • Scheduling alert notifications

  • Setting activity detection zones

Scheduled Alerts

With scheduled alerts, choose between 24/7 continuous monitoring or setting your own schedule. Schedules are set on a per Home Cam basis through the Home Cam app so you can customize alert schedules for each Home Cam you have (for example, set my Living Room Home Cam on monitor from 9 a.m. to 5 p.m., set my Balcony Home Cam to monitor continuously, set my Back Door Home Cam to monitor between 10 p.m. and 6 a.m.).

 

Activity Detection Zones 

Have a specific area you want to cover? Define activity detection zones, so you’ll only receive the alerts and recordings you want. Resize zones depending on what you want to cover, and adjust sensitivity accordingly (low, medium, and high).

 

Each VAVA Home Cam Base Station supports up to four Home Cams, so you'll leave no corner uncovered.  Outdoors or indoors, the Home Cam's flexible mounting system and tough, weather-proof exterior, and superior HD vision provides peace of mind and an extra pair of eyes wherever you need. 

 

See Where You Can Put Your Home Cam

Save $140 off the estimated retail by backing the 4-pack of Home Cams today. 

Want to link up even more Home Cams? VAVA Home Cam makes it simple. Each Home Cam account supports up to 20 Base Stations or 80 Home Cams, so you can keep an eye out on your home, your business, your vacation home, and everything in between.

Each pledge comes with a 24 month warranty (for Kickstarter backers only — 12 month warranty offered after campaign ends), in addition to lifetime access to VAVA's friendly 24/7 e-mail and phone support, and access to backer-only groups.

See what our past backers have to say

Camera

  • Lens: 140 degree wide-angle lens, f/2.0 
  • Sensor: Sony IMX323, 1/2.9" 
  • Resolution: 1080pHD, H.265 encoding
  • Night view: 2 x 850nm infrared light
  • Microphone: Built-in
  • Speaker: 1.5W
  • Battery: 2500mAh polymer battery, 7.68V
  • Adapter power: 5V / 2.5A max
  • Internet: 2.4G WiFi, 60m/197 foot range
  • Weather-proof: IP66
  • 80.4 x 80.4 x 80.4 mm / 3.2 x 3.2 x 3.2 in
  • Operating temperature: -20C — 50C / -4F — 122F, RH<95%

Base Station

  • Speaker: 2W
  • MicroSD card memory: Up to 128GB
  • Internet connection: Ethernet
  • Effective range: 60m/197 ft
  • Cameras supported: 4
  • Adapter power: 12V/1.5A Max
  • USB Output: 5V/1A
  • Dimensions: 95 x 95 x 95 mm / 3.7 x 3.7 x 3.7 in
  • Operating temperature: -20C — 50C / -4— 122F, RH<95%

What's In The Box 

For one camera
 
  • 1 x VAVA Home Cam
  • 1 x VAVA Base Station (can support up to four VAVA Home Cams)
  • 1 x microUSB charging cable
  • 1 x power adapter for Base Station
  • 1 x Desktop Mount
  • 1 x Outdoor Mount
  • 1 x Magnetic Mount
 

Solar Panel

  • Weight: 220g / 7.76 ounces
  • Charging Output: 5.5V/0.6A
  • Dimensions: 210 x 116 x 21.8 mm / 8.26 x 4.57 x 0.86 in

VAVA Home Cam is an EU-friendly campaign and all pledges from the EU will be shipped from within the EU. All rewards are expected to ship by the end of the year (Dec. 2018)

Want a specific configuration you don't see here? Use the below to configure your own Home Cam reward (add the amount to your base pledge). Please send us a message if you have any questions. All add-ons are inclusive of shipping. 

Our goal at VAVA has never changed: we’re here to make life simple by bringing meaningful innovation to modern lifestyles. 

Last year, we came on Kickstarter to launch the VAVA Dash Cam, where crowdfunding enthusiasts and pioneers like you helped pave the way for safer driving and extra convenience on the road. Now, borne out of the need for simpler, better home security, we’re doing it again with the VAVA Home Cam. 

The VAVA Home Cam was designed to keep things simple in an industry that has traditionally been complicated and expensive. Easy to install. Easy to use. Easy to maintain. This simplicity is what helps the VAVA Home Cam stand out, because it’s not just about the features – it’s about the people who use them. We have big plans for the VAVA Home Cam and its users, and we hope you can join us in building a better home security experience. 

We're excited to announce that the first 300 units are being sent to us by sea! These units will be going to our Early Bird and Super Early Bird backers from Kickstarter who pledged for a single camera and base station. We've been testing these units inside and out to make sure that you'll be satisfied with the final product! With that being said, we're also looking for a couple of local backers to help us test out the final version of our VAVA Home Cam app! If this is something you'd be interested in, and you are located near the San Francisco Bay Area, please send us a message and we'll respond back to you with instructions on how to be a part of this!

Now that hardware testing is done, we're in full-fledged manufacturing mode! The next 700 cameras are currently being assembled right now, which will also include the 1 base station and 2 camera bundles!

Thank you so much to everybody for being so patient with us! We'll have more updates in the coming weeks about the delivery schedule for Indiegogo backers.
story_txt:
Always know what's happening at home, any time, anywhere with the VAVA Home Cam — the easiest way to watch over your home and your yard. We believe everyone deserves a better home security experience that’s simple to use, durable enough to weather any situation, and reliably delivers high-performance monitoring, day and night. Meet the VAVA Home Cam — a wireless security camera designed to go outdoors or indoors, sets up in minutes, and has no monthly service fees, giving you more choice over how you control your footage. 
 
Here’s what you get: 
Know more of what’s happening A property crime happens every 3.7 seconds, and although more than 60% of us want home security, less than 20% of us actually do.  Why? Because the way home security has worked needs to change. Instead of complex systems requiring expert installation and ongoing monthly monitoring fees, we need simple, reliable home security that just works, outdoors AND indoors. VAVA Home Cam installs and sets up in minutes, and is designed to fit easily wherever you need an extra pair of eyes. 
 Stay Charged with the VAVA Solar PanelGet even more energy smart by pairing the VAVA Home Cam with a VAVA Solar Panel to harness the power of the sun so you’ll never need to recharge.  Each IP66 weather-resistant VAVA Solar Panel comes with its own mounting kit and 2M (6.5 ft) charging cable and weather-proof connectors. *Add the VAVA Solar Panel to any pledge for just $45*
See in 1080p high-def clarity with VAVA Home Cam's 140-degree wide angle lens, day and night. VAVA Home Cam's Sony EXMOR IMX323 sensor, wide dynamic range, and advanced H.265 encoding mean clear, sharp pictures in every environment  — even in complete darkness. The VAVA Home Cam goes beyond basic monitoring with a built-in alarm that you can trigger from your Home Cam app, and two-way audio communication so you’ll always stay connected.
 Play

 
Replay with sound


 
Play withsound



00:00


00:00
 
 
 




 
 
 
 

 

Details to Help You See Clearer  
Not all 1080p resolution is created equal, and the VAVA Home Cam includes several details to help you see clearer.  Each Home Cam is equipped with an industry-leading Sony EXMOR IMX323 sensor, wide dynamic range, and uses H.265 video encoding for crisper images and footage. Wide dynamic range is designed to balance lighting in pictures and videos, and is especially helpful for situations where there is a contrast between lighting in the shade and elsewhere (e.g., front door entryways where it may be much brighter towards the street compared with directly in front of a door). Snapshot taken with no external light source H.265 video encoding allows for higher efficiency when transmitting video footage and takes up significantly less storage space. When compared with H.264 (which most cameras today use), H.265 cameras can generally reduce bandwidth consumption and storage by 50%, meaning a more seamless and space-saving monitoring experience for you.
 Play

 
Replay with sound


 
Play withsound



00:00


00:00
 
 
 




 
 
 
 

 

Alerts When You Need ThemGet automatic alerts straight to your Home Cam app when unusual activity is detected, such as motion or when someone tries to move your camera. Each VAVA Home Cam comes with three levels of motion sensitivity (low, medium, and high) and a customizable monitoring schedule, so you'll only get the alerts that matter to you, when you want them.  For added protection, you'll also receive an alert when your Home Cam is moved out of range.See something unexpected? Trigger the VAVA Home Cam's built-in alarm directly from your app, no matter where you are in the world. Stay protected rain or shine, with VAVA Home Cam’s tough IP66 exterior to weather any situation. 
 
Each VAVA Home Cam comes with three different mount types (outdoor mount, strong magnetic mount, and desktop mount) for easy placement on any surface.   

Super strong magnetic mount 

Desktop mount 

Outdoor mount Outdoors or indoors — the choice is yours. The Home Cam’s unique design gives you the flexibility of protecting your home’s exterior or keeping an eye on what’s going on indoors. 
The VAVA Home Cam is as tough and versatile on the inside as it is on the outside — unlike most home security cameras that rely solely on one storage method, the VAVA Home Cam offers multiple options for locally encrypted storage that come at no extra charge to you. This includes support for storage on a microSD card (supports up to 128GB*), in addition to RTSP support so you can save footage on your personal NAS servers. Plus, the Home Cam will now also include optional cloud storage to give you even more peace of mind and control over how you control/access your footage. Extended Access to Your Footage. Free Forever.Both options give you safe, simple, secure access to your footage — without any extra fees. Because all footage is encrypted and stored locally through the base station, you’ll always have access through the VAVA Home Cam mobile app. At the end of the day, we believe your footage is yours, and you should always have the option for free, secure extended video history without any compulsory monthly fees.See how much you could potentially save with the VAVA Home Cam over just one year of ownership.The above is based on 30 day activity access for two cameras*128GB can store up to 240 hours worth of footage in 1080p HD quality  
We're here to make home security simpler and more accessible — without compromising performance. See how VAVA Home Cam stacks up. 
Always see what’s happening with the VAVA Home Cam mobile app, built for iOS and Android. We’ve included easy access to all the essentials you need, giving you one tap access to your live feed, alerts, snapshots, and two-way communication.  Other app features include:
Triggering an alarm 
Bookmarking recordings
Sharing camera access with up to 20 family members and trusted contacts
Scheduling alert notifications
Setting activity detection zones
Scheduled AlertsWith scheduled alerts, choose between 24/7 continuous monitoring or setting your own schedule. Schedules are set on a per Home Cam basis through the Home Cam app so you can customize alert schedules for each Home Cam you have (for example, set my Living Room Home Cam on monitor from 9 a.m. to 5 p.m., set my Balcony Home Cam to monitor continuously, set my Back Door Home Cam to monitor between 10 p.m. and 6 a.m.). Activity Detection Zones Have a specific area you want to cover? Define activity detection zones, so you’ll only receive the alerts and recordings you want. Resize zones depending on what you want to cover, and adjust sensitivity accordingly (low, medium, and high). Each VAVA Home Cam Base Station supports up to four Home Cams, so you'll leave no corner uncovered.  Outdoors or indoors, the Home Cam's flexible mounting system and tough, weather-proof exterior, and superior HD vision provides peace of mind and an extra pair of eyes wherever you need.  See Where You Can Put Your Home CamSave $140 off the estimated retail by backing the 4-pack of Home Cams today. Want to link up even more Home Cams? VAVA Home Cam makes it simple. Each Home Cam account supports up to 20 Base Stations or 80 Home Cams, so you can keep an eye out on your home, your business, your vacation home, and everything in between. 
Each pledge comes with a 24 month warranty (for Kickstarter backers only — 12 month warranty offered after campaign ends), in addition to lifetime access to VAVA's friendly 24/7 e-mail and phone support, and access to backer-only groups.See what our past backers have to say 
Camera
Lens: 140 degree wide-angle lens, f/2.0 
Sensor: Sony IMX323, 1/2.9" 
Resolution: 1080pHD, H.265 encoding

Microphone: Built-in

story:
• Think about getting rid of your messy workshop and not taking take the right tool from a bunch of screwdrivers and wrenches inside of your toolbox.
  • Think about saving from a costly price to hire a worker for home appliance repair.
  • Think about during working at home. Wanting to tight & loose screws with ease. 
  • Getting tired of screws slipping away from your hands and scatter all over the room? Annoyed at stepping on these screws accidently without noticing them and do want a safe working environment? 
  • Being fed up with bringing your heavy toolbox everywhere and want a compact tool that includes most tools you would use.
  • Want to have a good helper while assembling your furniture and make sure all parts are well-fixed all the time? 
  •  If you have always brought a mini tool while cycling, think about adjusting screw on your bike under a blazing sunshine and always need a lot of turns until every screw is tighten. 

The CYCOP BiTool takes intense tool-usage joy in overcoming these frustrations and problems.

  • Save you time and money.
  • Make your life easier.
  • Keep you looking good and stylish while assembling & tightening.

To make your tool usage more efficient. To have you ready for any situation, in any environment.

In order to make BiTool more useful, we combine the characteristic of screwdriver, ratchet wrench and magnet to provide you a better tool using experience and work in a more efficient way. Let’s see more details about our BiTool!

  • All in One, One for All
  • Easy Storage and arrangement
  • Magnetic Ratchet Head
  • 180 degree of operation
  • Rapid bits replacement & Smart Screws Collection
  • Easy to carry

BiTool includes various kinds of bits that fit most of your daily usage. In short, with BiTool, You can throw a bunch of tools or toolbox away.

Are you tired of looking for a suitable tool that mention in your assembling manual? All BiTool bits are with clear marking on side of the body to help you to choose easily and promptly.

Magnet is able to help you to arrange all bits in order. Furthermore, this magnetic function will also let you take each bit that you want instantly. Choose the specific bit immediately without messing up other bits!

Which one you like mostly? The compact one or the combo one.

The magnetic force connects the ratchet and the screw bit for stability. BiTool combines with the magnet inside of ratchet to help you to replace bit effortlessly.

The ratchet head can rotate in 180 degrees and adapt to operate in any kind of working environment even inside of a tiny space. This means you can use BiTool not only like a screwdriver but also ratchet wrench.

This feature will give BiTool more flexible usage to adapt to any kind of working environment. BiTool is able to help to do operation in no dead ends.

With ratchet’s head, you can tighten and loose screws more easily than conventional screwdrivers.

Everyone should have an experience when tightening a screw and the others slipped away from your hands. When you need to fasten over one screw, you can simply attach the other screws on BiTool’s body to prevent them from scattering on the ground.

If screws do scatter on the ground accidentally, you can collect them up with magnet inside of the barrel easily.

Do you have the same problem of screws scattering from your hand or always need to grasp many tools in a clumsy way?

Due to design optimization, 5 bits BiTool & 10 bits BiTool have different magnet location & function. 5 bits BiTool is developed exclusively for attaching screws on the bottom of body. 10 bits BiTool can help attach both bits & screws on the side of the barrel. If you want to have more powerful magnetic function, we suggest you to choose 10 bits BiTool.

BiTool is with merely 100 grams in weight, you can hold it easily with its compact size. You can put it in your pocket, backpack, pencil case and make-up case without any difficulty.

These are just a few examples but there’s a lot more you can do!

 BiTool is a new generation of daily tools; it’s minimal, compact and functional and combines multiple tools into slim aluminum barrel and with a useful ratchet mechanical system – Moreover, it is tiny, lightweight and with smart way to use. You can let it be your EDC (Everyday Carry) gadget; even beautiful lady can tighten and loose screws easily effortlessly.

For people who needs to use tools everyday: You are no longer need to carry a hug set of various screwdrivers on a big case, just bring BiTool, everything will become simple, easy and neat.

With BiTool, everyone can work efficiently whenever fixing home equipment, cabinet, door lock, D.I.Y. furniture, changing electronics gears, assembling bike, and outdoors equipment, any other household essentials in anytime & anywhere!

BiTool:

- Material: Aluminum Main Body (CNC machined) / S-2 Steel Bits  / Magnet / Surface Treatment: Anodized Process

- Length: 4.3” (108 mm) / Diameter: 0.8” (21 mm) / Weight: 3.9 oz (110 grams)

- Color Version: Dark Black version

Compact Bits:  

- Material: Wear-Resistance and Ultra Hardness S-2 Steel

- Each Length: 2” (50 mm) / Diameter: 0.25” (6.3 mm)

- Spec/ 5 types: Phillips Screw Bits PH2 / Star Bits T25 / Hexagon Bits HEX3, 4, 5

Combo Bits:

- Material: Wear- Resistance and Ultra Hardness S-2 Steel

- Length: 1” (25 mm) / Diameter: 0.25” (6.3mm)

- Spec/ 10 types: Phillips Screw Bits PH1, PH2 / Star Bits T10, T25, T27 / Hexagon Bits HEX2, 2.5, 3, 4, 5, 6 / Slotted Bits SL5


5 Bits Compact BiTool (Black)?

5 Bits Compact BiTool (Red) :

10 Bits Combo BiTool (Black) :

10 Bits Combo BiTool (Red) :

10 Bits Combo BiTool (Silver-New Color) :

CYCOP is an urban lifestyle brand focusing on creating elegant city transportations, accessories & tools for urban dwellers. Our vision is to create the ultimate design, to inspire everybody in each moment and experience from our urban life, even travelling. We believe that great design will bring you a unique journey, no matter in urban life or country life, CYCOP collection will tell many unique stories for you.

Our head quarter is in San Jose, USA, but our team members are composed from USA, Asia, and even Europe. In this way, we are able to ensure what we cerate is able to cater most people’s needs and enhance daily life experience since we are all urban dwellers and would like to share a vision about urban lifestyle and how it can be applied to the modern city.

Expected of our design team in USA, we have another development & production team based in Taiwan and China, combining the precision manufacturing and with a completed industry channel. We love to insert more soul and craftsmanship to CYCOP, due to we are keen target users and we all really care about each journey everyone owns.

If you have any questions or love to know us more, please feel free to send us a message and we'll get back to you ASAP. Thanks!

story:
Viruses, bacteria, and germs are on our minds now more than ever. In a time where everything we touch poses a potential threat, Violux's mission is to give you peace of mind. We're pioneering smart UV-C light cleaning technology empowering you to trust the cleanliness of the objects you touch every day.

Because when you know the objects around you are germ-free you can be worry-free.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Together with the Violux mobile app get advanced notifications, smart reminders, and ensure that your Luma is always working optimally.

Luma’s powerful ultraviolet reactor and design is engineered to provide enhanced light focus and strength for maximum disinfection.

 

 

Ultraviolet (UV) light, which mostly comes from the sun, is invisible to the human eye. UV is divided into three bands: UV-A, UV-B and UV-C. UV-C, the light we use in Luma, is the highest energy portion of the UV spectrum and the only type that is germicidal and capable of safely disinfecting high-touch, daily used objects.

Microorganisms replicate to infect hosts and spread disease. UV-C light interrupts this process by photochemically altering and breaking apart the molecular bonds within their DNA or RNA, eliminating their ability to function or reproduce.

 

 

 

View the current list of IAC Certified Laboratory test results.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 


 

 

 


Follow us on social media for special updates and announcements

Instagram   Facebook   Twitter

story:
See puppy cube In Action

 

 
 

 

Referral Program

From now until the end of the puppy cube campaign, you can refer your friends to get discounts. Let’s begin the sharing fun!

Getting started is easy! 
1. Log into your account on Indiegogo
2. Go to the campaign page
3. Click the link button near the top of the page. That's your unique link - copy it and send it out to anyone who would love a puppy cube of their own! You can also use the Facebook and Twitter social share buttons to automatically post to your social networks.

Track your referrals by following these steps:
1. Log into your Indiegogo account and click on your username (top right).
2. Select the “My Profile” option.
3. Click on the tab that says “Referrals” for the latest totals of referrals and contributions.
4. We’ll compensate you at the end of the campaign based on total referrals earned.

For every friend you refer who contributes to the puppy cube campaign, you'll get $100 off your own puppy cube (up to 5 successful referrals).

Shipping

Where do we ship?

We offer free shipping to USA, Canada, EU, Japan, Republic of Korea, Singapore, Hong Kong, Taiwan, United Kingdom, United Arab Emirates, Kuwait, India, China, Turkey, Jordan, Saudi Arabia, Bahrain, Qatar, Nigeria and Thailand. VAT and GST not included. 

Why order now?

puppy cube will never be offered at these discounts again. By backing now you'll also be one of the very first to get and use puppy cube. By ordering now, you'll receive your product well before the rest of the world!

Why Crowdfunding?

We’ve spent countless hours designing and building the newest form of portable digital entertainment that will make any flat surface an interactive touchscreen.

To start up mass production, we need $20,000. As an Indiegogo exclusive, we’re offering up to a 40% discount to make sure we reach our goal. This is a limited offer only available on Indiegogo.

Running a crowdfunding campaign requires a 100% transparent approach to our backers. We’ll do everything we can to keep you fully informed about the campaign, production, and shipping. If you ever have any questions or comments at all, just post them in the “Comments” section of our page and we’ll be sure to get back to you.

story:
Our Story 

Some of the most memorable moments that I have with my parents and grandparents took place in the kitchen. Sharing and preparing food brings people together, and teaches children important life skills. Regardless of the demographic, people love delicious food, and creating something from scratch. Unfortunately, family time spent in the kitchen is on the decline, because they simply don’t have the time. People are spending less time in the kitchen, learning about reading labels, measurements, conversions, problem solving, and making connections.    

Two years ago I watched several viral videos demonstrating the making of rolled ice cream. Like millions of others, I was amazed by how simple and intriguing the process was. When reading the comments, I realized people from every age group, all over the world enjoyed the video. The video had so many views because people were sharing it with their family and friends. Immediately I looked up rolled ice cream stores, and found one to try it out. When I got there, there was a lineup of people. While waiting in line I watched customers before me, they all did the same thing. They ordered their ice cream, and then got their phone out to recorded it being made. They wanted to share their experience with friends and family on social media. When it was my turn to order, I did the same thing, placed my order, recorded the process, and then posted it on my social media.   

On my way home I ate the ice cream, it was absolutely delicious. When I got home, I checked my phone, and my friends and family loved the video. I realized that the sharing of the video was as satisfying as the ice cream itself, people were creating digital memories. I then thought, what if you could make it at home? A product like this could really get people back in the kitchen, and it would be a hit for dinner parties with friends and family. In a few minutes several people can make ice cream, share the video of it with the world, and create memories. And thus, the Ice Plate was born! The Ice Plate is a canvas for culinary creation, create recipes, create online content, share with the word. The prep time is short, but the memories last a lifetime.

Check out our website for some recipe inspiration! http://www.RollingDesserts.com

 

                      For more information visit http://www.RollingDesserts.com

story:
CAPSULIER: It produces fresh coffee capsule outcome in a minute. The complex process from bean grinding to capsule packaging is optimized. It always delivers homemade capsules consistently with your coffee blend selection. It is a true automatic capsule making machine.  From a range of beans, choose your favorite one, and you’ll have a fresh cup of coffee. – Choose from any brand, then set up your preference on the mobile app, press a button. Capsulier will grind the beans and fill up the capsule. You’ll get to take the capsule anywhere and share it with your family and friends. No mess no fuss. Our expertly designed capsule, CAPSI, is reusable, and well at preserving any aromas – yet a fraction of the cost of a disposable capsule. Did we mention that we are not adding any further burden to the environment? Enjoy your fresh cup of coffee, guilt-free, and save some money. CAPSULIER - your new way to enjoy a single capsule coffee.

CAPSULIER IN THE MEDIA

What is CAPSULIER?

 

FRESHNESS

Capsulier freshly makes the CAPSI. The capsules in the market are usually packed within at least half the year.

NEATNESS

Capsulier always begins making the capsule with neatness. Capsulier takes care of everything starting from the automatic grinder. After setting up the personal preference, CAPSI is ready to be served. There won’t be any powder all over the place. No more endless cleaning off the table. Leave no trace behind with CAPSI. Enjoy a homemade CAPSI at home or even in the workplace.

Making capsule in a minute by pressing one button.

ENVIRONMENTAL PROTECTION

REAL AND MORE CHOICE

We don’t need to tell you which beans you like. You pick the flavor from your favorite source. Place the beans into the capsule – and with the push of one button, you’ll have fresh grinder beans. How about being adventurous and creating your own mix? It’s completely your choice. But remember they will be 100% FRESH!

SAVE MONEY PER CAPSULE

It only costs a dime (10 cents) to make your own capsule. You get 7x the savings compared to a Nespresso capsule.

The process of making a capsule - time-consuming, messy (compare making CAPSI in a minute, hand-made capsule in 3 minutes without including the time for cleaning)

Simplicity, intuitive, and sophisticated design can be found in CAPSULIER and CAPSI. Our one-stop design can help users to make their favorite flavors easily. A reusable capsule design which will be easy to clean and reduces waste to help protect the environment.

Voice control  Capsulier supports Amazon Echo, Dot, Tap, and more voice control function kinds of devices. It can be easy to send out a voice command to make a certain amount of CAPSI capsules.

App control  Capsulier app gives you the status of what CAPSULIER is doing, settings in the machine, and the ability to control the machine. It can also provide you with a platform to share your recipes with friends and purchase online any materials from the CAPSULIER website.

Compact design  Capsulier integrates the flow of capsule assembly from grinding to capsule made in one home appliance.

Comprehensive  Capsulier provides an innovative solution for you to make your flavor capsules by yourself. All parts in Capsulier machine are under your control so that all capsules can be output under the same conditions or specifications. You can share your own flavor with your friends anytime, anywhere.

Steps to make capsule

1. Put coffee beans into Capsulier
2. Put CAPSI cover and cup
3. Select grind size
4. Choose the number of CAPSI made
5. Press “START” button

 TECHNICAL SPECIFICATION

 

Capsulier Limited
Product creator and brand Owner.  Experienced in product development in consumer electronics, household appliances, and wireless devices.

Innoplay Limited
Mechanical design house (moving parts design)

Factory
CAPSULIER manufacturer (under factory selection)

 

Team for CAPSULIER product development:

 

 

SUPPORT CAPSULIER

Any questions?  Email us at cs@capsulier.com

Ways to contact us

Back our campaign and leave a comment on Kickstarter page

Directly send message to us on Kickstarter

Further inquiries, contact cs@capsulier.com

send a message to us on Facebook fans page

ABOUT CAPSULIER

 

Risks and challenges

Technical challenges 
The operation flow of capsule making has never been done before. CAPSULIER’s design requires simple and intuitive designs because the size of the machine has never appeared before. All the functional modules require a high cost to build up a tool to reduce the size of each module. Moreover, CAPSULIER is a companion of Nespresso machine or K-cup (future development), it must be tested to other brand products which can be compatible to use. The cost of CAPSULIER is also a big concern for us which we are working on. 
Product evolution, a new era of capsule maker 
Innovative design of CAPSULIER, both in the design of capsule maker machine and capsule structure design, we have a lot of testing in all functions to ensure the design and the quality can be confirmed. We would like to collect more comments and feedbacks via different channels, e.g. Kickstarter, social media, so that we can implement to our innovative CAPSULIER machine. 
Have any queries? Drop us by email at cs@capsulier.com

story:
Hello! Meet Lumière

An Affordable, Modern, Wireless Smart Lamp you can take anywhere! It is versatile, elegantly designed from the finest material, has 3 User settings, 18 brightness levels and can be shaped to fit your use, purpose and environment.

You are looking at Generation II Lumiére.

While it looks similar to Generation I, a lot has gone into this generation of Lumiére since we first introduced it in 2015 to make it a better performing, more versatile and durable light. We know you will love Lumiére and our backers will be the first to receive Lumiére shipping to all backers on or before April 8, 2016.

Exterior Refinements:

Lumiére Gen II will now come in 3 beautiful satin brushed aluminium finishes that so closely resemble the iPhone colours. Lumiére Gen II will be available in Silver, Gold and Space Grey for the light portion of Lumiére and a soft-touch silicone base available in black or white that is now more flexible and durable so you can shape Lumiére to suit your every need and environment.

You will receive a survey shortly after the campaign is over to select the aluminium and the base colours you want for your Lumiére.

Internal Refinements:

So much has changed on the inside. The PCB and firmware are the latest and include a 7-step dimmer that remembers what settings you left your light on. The firmware that controls the On/Off button and step-dimmer has been refined so the light does not come on or off with an accidental touch and the dimmer operates with a single touch or the slide of a finger. The PCB has also been equipped with a quick-charge chip to charge the new 2100 mAh 1000-cycle battery. Lumiére Gen II now has 28 of the best LED lights money can buy and are guaranteed for 50,000 hours. See the gallery for some before and after images. You're going to love Lumiére and we cannot wait to get Lumiére into your hand and on to your desk and wherever else you want to take it.

A wireless lamp for just about everywhere

Our hope is that our design and the technology behind Lumière will make even the most mundane tasks a bit more fun. Lumiére embodies technological and safety features that protects your eyes and we think its modern clean-line design will look great in your space.

"A Portable Lamp like no other, with one charge you can take Lumiére anywhere. To your garden, to the park or even to the beach and set the mood with 40 Hours of continuous lighting."

Just How Flexible? You Decide!

Light up or down, flat or not. Even as a Lightsaber!

Mood light

Lumière brightness can be changed from 10% to 100% in three different temperatures suitable for studying, reading and relaxation.

Lighting has a dramatic affect on the mood and atmosphere of an interior space. Good lighting sets the tone and creates the atmosphere in a room and effects how we feel. The two biggest contributors to functionality from a lighting perspective are quantity and quality.

Too little and it becomes difficult to perform necessary tasks. Too much and it causes glare. Both scenarios can cause eye discomfort which lead to health issues, both physical and emotional. The Centre for Occupational Health and Safety describes good lighting as “providing enough illumination so that people can see printed, handwritten or displayed documents clearly but are not blinded by excessively high light levels, which causes glare”.

Torch Mode

Access the full power of Lumière with just a touch by extending the 56CM body and take it with you to light any dark places.


Lumière creates a wonderfully unique light that prevents glare and creates an even light pattern. Using light guide technology, it eliminates shadows or dark zones, which ordinary LED table stands create.

Smart and flawless design

The beauty and quality of Lumière does not only come from the inside. We equally spent thought and care on the outside. We wanted to design a lamp with a flush design, without external buttons. The touch and multi-level dimming sensors work easily and literally to give Lumiére the finishing touch and because it is smart, it remembers your selected light mode, brightness and settings!


The Perfect Accent Light to Set the Right Mood!

Lumiére also has adjustable settings for brightness, but whether it's turned on or off, Lumière makes a great visual impact perfect for your home, office, study or even your garden!


Different scenarios require different types of lighting. With Lumiére, you have complete flexibility to adjust your lighting to any variation of both Cool White, Neutral White and Warm White lights, at any brightness, any time and shape Lumière to suite your specific use and function for that added personal control.
A simple, modern, no-frills design, Lumière is available in 3 colours with multi-touch controls that let you turn on/off/dim by touching after you've finished your New York Times bestseller.

Other Ways You Can Help

You can also help by sharing this campaign with everyone you know. We'll even reward the person that shares the most with a free Lumiére of their choice.


Thank you.

Different scenarios require different types of lighting. With Lumiére, you have complete flexibility to adjust your lighting to any variation of both Cool White, Neutral White and Warm White lights, at any brightness, any time and shape Lumière to suite your specific use and function for that added personal control.A simple, modern, no-frills design, Lumière is available in 3 colours with multi-touch controls that let you turn on/off/dim by touching after you've finished your New York Times bestseller.




Silver, Space Grey and Gold with White or Black Base
The price tag is as easy on the wallet as the lamp is on the eyes, and can be shaped into whatever need you might have while enjoying your read.
With the wireless and 28 high quality powered daylight LEDs, you can take Lumière anywhere. Indoors or outdoors; you determine the atmosphere.

Lumiére is a task and accent lamp that can give you as much light as a 60-Watt incandescent light bulb. That lets you illuminate your desk or nightstand for about 1/7th the energy you're probably using now. And the LEDs last more than 50,000 hours; it's likely you won't ever need to change them. 


Lumière is a high-quality, versatile product at a fair price that includes innovative features not seen anywhere else.

Of the 3 operating modes, Study Mode is the brightest, using mostly white LEDs for a colour temperature of between 5,000K and 6,000K. Reading Mode 4,000K to 5,000K mixes in more of the yellow spectrum, Relaxation, Computer, Tablet, Smartphone, Bedtime; Nightlight Mode brings the colour temperature down to 3000K to 4000K. All Modes have a 6-step dimmer to suit every possible task.
The Colour Rendering Index of the LEDs is rated at 90+. With up to 40 hours of lighting time you can take the lamp to your garden, to the park or even to the beach.


Access the full power of Lumière with just a touch by extending the 56CM body and take it with you to light any dark places.Never be concerned about disturbing your sleeping partner ever again.Mood light Lumière brightness can be changed from 10% to 100% in three different temperatures suitable for studying, reading and relaxation.It's flexible, and versatile so it fits your exact needs.










The Bright Road Ahead


We've put a lot of blood, sweat, and tears into Lumière... well figuratively, and we are so close to turning our dream into a bright reality. It takes a lot to manufacture a quality product, and while we are close, we need your help to get us over the last hump. 
The tooling is already done and this leaves the cost of components, and manufacturing costs ahead, but also we need your help to build a community around Lumiére and spread the word before and after you experience Lumiére.
We manufactured several thousand units last year as part of the Hong Kong Show then assigned a distributor in the UK, China and Germany markets. Since then, we have refined and improved Lumière on 8 critical features and produced some samples. The improvements include refinement to the firmware to allow for a quick charge, PCB, 28 of the best LEDs, Battery cycle life, enhanced base, a New Space Grey colour for the aluminium, a new black base, a better battery with 800 cycle and a slide/or touch dimmer. The Aluminium colours of the new production match the iPhone. What we have today is an amazing task lamp that looks and performs flawlessly, that you can truely take anywhere!
We are so far ahead in this process and with your help and support we will Ship Lumière to all our backers in March 2016.

Risks and challenges
We are ex Apple and Microsoft Engineers and we’ve worked hard over the last year to get Lumière to this point and we successfully completed critical milestones and confidently consider the risks very minimal.
Thank you for reading this far - let's make this happen and hope to have you as a Proud Backer and please Share this campaign with everyone you know for Lumière and for a Better, Greener, Cleaner World and all the precious eyes everywhere!
We are almost ready to push the green button and start production with our manufacturer. We have done our testing and know what needs to happen to get Lumière into your hands.
  Other Ways You Can Help You can also help by sharing this campaign with everyone you know. We'll even reward the person that shares the most with a free Lumiére of their choice.

Thank you.

story:
Our photos live short lives - we only see them on a computer screen or phone, and then they're gone. We believe your photos should live gorgeously forever, not just for a moment on Facebook or Instagram! 

We began with a vision – provide a unique way to illuminate an image and a space, at the same time design a highly functional, elegant light.  

Inspired by gorgeous mineral formations, Ghost Nest is bringing you Geode, a glowing gem designed to illuminate your space and make your most inspiring printed pictures radiate with light.   

It’s not a simple picture frame, or a simple LED accent light – it’s a dynamic way to light your space while showcasing and illuminating your own image. 

 

Interchangeable imagery!   Each picture frame holds a printed picture of your choice.  Just print out a new image, and put it into Geode to make it glow.  Picture frames can snap on and off Geode, so the picture can be changed whenever.  

Cordless capability!   Geode is outfitted with an internal rechargeable battery.  Unplug Geode from its cord, and Geode continues glowing for 6 hours. 

High and low brightness settings! A simple switch on Geode's body lets you adjust the LED brightness, and turn it on or off - no matter if it's plugged in or cordless. 

7 unique resting positions!   Due to its angular shaped body, Geode can be situated in seven different ways, so no matter where it's placed, Geode always displays its good side.  You can also reposition the picture's orientation.

Basic Specs: 5" tall by 5" wide by 4.5" deep.  15 LED lights - 3500 on the front and 5500 on the backside.  2W Power consumption.  Made of plastic and aluminum. 

Geode has a special internal light diffusing plastic shield that enables ordinary printed images to glow.  

Step One: Back our project to earn a Geode 

Step Two: Once your Geode has arrived, print out an image that's 5"x5".  If you don't know how to do that, we'll provide templates and directions on our website when Geode becomes available.  

Step Three: Pull the frame off of the top of Geode, Insert your printed picture into Geode on top of the light diffusing plastic shield, snap the frame back onto Geode, plug-in and enjoy!

p.s. We're always here to help too, should any issues arise during this process. 

 

Ghost Nest, founded by Reid Evans, is dedicated to making decorating more fun, and empowering everyone’s creative and do-it-yourself mentality. For those reasons, we give people the ability to customize home furnishings using their imagery.

To date, we have successfully introduced seven home furnishings products – customizable cabinet knobs. We’re excited to expand our offering and bring Geode to life!  In conjunction with award winning industrial designer Derrick Hurst, we have been thinking about, planning and prototyping Geode feverishly! 

Our engineered drawings are complete.  We now have talented plastics and electrical engineers and injection molding vendors ready to make Geode. We’re innovating at every step to make production as straightforward and efficient as possible. This means that if you support our project, you can be confident that we’re working hard to stretch every bit of value out of your dollars.  Your money goes directly to making this amazing product - tooling, assembly, etc.  

We’re small, we’re scrappy, but above all, we’re looking forward to giving people the chance to personalize their spaces in a totally unique way. 

 

 

Besides being a sophisticated, customized accent light in your home or office, Geode can serve a multitude of uses, especially with its ability to glow independently of a power source. 

Weddings - the bride and groom can share moments of joy that they want their family and friends to see.

Night Lights - don’t let your kids be afraid of the dark any longer. Geode will provide their room with a soft glow to keep those monsters away.

Special Events - capture the attention of passersby with one or many Geodes displaying pictures, graphics or a message. You can even use several Geodes to tell a story.

Birthdays and Anniversaries - what better way to make them appreciate your thoughtfulness by providing them with a customized Geode that uses an image the receiver holds dear to their heart.

Art Projects - Geodes would be perfect for art projects of all sorts.

Thanks for your help IndieGoGo!  Feel free to like Ghost Nest on Facebook and share this IndieGoGo project with your friends! 

More photos of Geode can be seen here.

Press release available here: http://geode-light.com/gallery.html

 



Is it bright?
Hell yes!   Geode is bright enough to fill a room, read a book next to, or use as a night-light.  Our current prototypes show 210 lux at 12”.  You won’t be able to project a bat symbol into the sky, but rest assured, all monsters in the closets, alligators under the bed and boogeymen won’t be bothering you anytime soon.

We use 15 5500 LEDs.  It’s bright, but not blinding.  Best yet, it only uses 2W of power yet it has the light output of a 15-watt conventional light bulb.

What is included with every Geode?
Every Geode comes with power cord, Geode body (contains LED lights and rechargeable battery) and white picture holder frame (what you need to put your photos into Geode).  Everything will be pre-assembled for your convenience.  

Is shipping included?
No shipping is not included in these pledge levels.  We are going to be using USPS flat rate for delivery, so costs will be low, around $15 in the US.  The shipping for Geode to Canada/US is going to be $32.95 and all other countries it'll be $47.95.  However for all larger orders, we will use other methods.   

Can I get colored frames and cords for Geode?
The good news is that all frames and cords for Geode will be interchangeable.  Bad news is that the first run of Geode will be done in all white.  You'll just have to hold tight for now.
story_txt:
Our photos live short lives - we only see them on a computer screen or phone, and then they're gone. We believe your photos should live gorgeously forever, not just for a moment on Facebook or Instagram! 
We began with a vision – provide a unique way to illuminate an image and a space, at the same time design a highly functional, elegant light.  
Inspired by gorgeous mineral formations, Ghost Nest is bringing you Geode, a glowing gem designed to illuminate your space and make your most inspiring printed pictures radiate with light.   


It’s not a simple picture frame, or a simple LED accent light – it’s a dynamic way to light your space while showcasing and illuminating your own image. 
 
Interchangeable imagery!   Each picture frame holds a printed picture of your choice.  Just print out a new image, and put it into Geode to make it glow.  Picture frames can snap on and off Geode, so the picture can be changed whenever.  
Cordless capability!   Geode is outfitted with an internal rechargeable battery.  Unplug Geode from its cord, and Geode continues glowing for 6 hours. 
High and low brightness settings! A simple switch on Geode's body lets you adjust the LED brightness, and turn it on or off - no matter if it's plugged in or cordless. 
7 unique resting positions!   Due to its angular shaped body, Geode can be situated in seven different ways, so no matter where it's placed, Geode always displays its good side.  You can also reposition the picture's orientation.
Basic Specs: 5" tall by 5" wide by 4.5" deep.  15 LED lights - 3500 on the front and 5500 on the backside.  2W Power consumption.  Made of plastic and aluminum. 



Geode has a special internal light diffusing plastic shield that enables ordinary printed images to glow.  
Step One: Back our project to earn a Geode 
Step Two: Once your Geode has arrived, print out an image that's 5"x5".  If you don't know how to do that, we'll provide templates and directions on our website when Geode becomes available.  
Step Three: Pull the frame off of the top of Geode, Insert your printed picture into Geode on top of the light diffusing plastic shield, snap the frame back onto Geode, plug-in and enjoy!
p.s. We're always here to help too, should any issues arise during this process.

story:
My name is Piotr Radon and I was born with Total Amelia. It is a birth defect associated with the complete absence of all limbs.

I am 20 years old. For me it has been 20 years of fighting against weaknesses, numerous moments, when there was no answer to the question: Why did it happen to me? It caused lack of will to live, moments of breakdown. I envied others their ability to perform very simple actions, such as getting up, going for a walk... And me? I was born without hands and legs. The disability deprived me of all those things my peers did. All my life I have fought with my physicality – here my parents have always been my support, my hands and legs.

When I understood that rebelling or wallowing in self-pity would change nothing in my life, I decided to fight for my life, for my future. Learning was my resort and liberation: I passed my A-levels with honours. I decided to go to university and study IT. I think I can be really good at it and after finishing the university I can find employment in the chosen profession and pay, if only symbolically, my debt of gratitude to those who helped me, show them that I also want and am able to give something to the world.
My dream is to become financially independent Take the burden off my parents shoulders. I believe that IT can give me a huge opportunity with my future career and I could be able to become an independent man, with the need for constant medical care.

Despite my disability I try to live the life of a healthy person. I develop my passions (civil aviation, passenger airplane piloting) and interests (music, IT, programming, history, politics and law). I am determined to achieve my goals (getting a job, becoming independent). But at this stage of my life I need your help. I cannot make it without yours.

I will always rely on other people in my life. The decision to go to university is a major life change for my whole family. Polish-Japanese Institute of Information Technology was the only institution which offered me appropriate learning conditions, a room, and a course tailored to my individual needs. The institute is helping me by relieving me of the tuition fee ($3,500), but I still have to pay for other things. Renting a flat and the necessity to move in with my parents put me in need of large amounts of money ($3,000 monthly) for maintaining the flat, commuting to the university, and for treatment. Lack of limbs is not the only problem and barrier in my life that affects normal functioning. For a few years now my scoliosis has been getting worse. It puts pressure on my internal organs, e.g. lungs, which causes dyspnoea and respiratory tract infections. I also suffer from asthma. These conditions require constant treatment and the cost of medicine, physiotherapy and rehabilitation stays is far beyond the financial capabilities of my and my family. I suffer from asthma and advanced scoliosis, which presses my lungs causing additional dyspnoea. The pharmaceuticals I need are expensive ($12,000 yearly), and I take a part of them on a regular basis.

There is hope to improve the condition of my spine, but it requires me to go to Spain for a few weeks – the treatment which I can receive there gives me a chance to live since the developing scoliosis is simply a death sentence. The only obstacle here is the money ($15,000).

Many good things has happened in my life thanks to people’s kindness, due to the fact that somebody donated even a small amount for my treatment, rehabilitation, and the necessary equipment – at present I am trying to raise money for an electric wheelchair ($25,000), which would give me some self-reliance. However, the ever-present cost of treatment makes such a wheelchair an unrealistic dream.

Every help is a wonderful gift, thanks to which I can live and study. Perhaps my life will become an inspiration for other disabled people, showing them that it is no good isolating themselves where they live, that they should fight for their lives. I started fighting but without your help I cannot win...

If you could consider some contribution it would mean a world to Piotr. You can do it via his official website:

He would also appreciate if you could pass the word about him to any other Nonprofits organizations or possible donors. Thank you very much.

I will be extremely grateful for you help. Additional information:
Piotr Radon / private website
Piotr Radon / Facebook profile

story:
100% Delivery Guaranteed Or Your Money Back!


We are preselling a large quantity of the very first product by our new company, Useful Essentials.  Our goal is to make this collapsing laundry hamper the first in a long line of fantastically useful home décor products for making domestic life easier and more stylish.  By supporting this campaign, you can receive not just the hamper itself, but valuable information and advertising opportunities as we grow to meet an enormous market demand. 

About the Foldable Laundry Hamper:

  • Dimensions: 27" x 16" x 16"
  • Sturdy structural design for long lasting laundry room storage
  • Smooth lightweight aluminum handles for easy carrying
  • Easy to carry with load, and folds flat for easy storage
  • Perfect for your bathroom, closet, laundry room, and bedroom

Although it is designed for the home, the unique features of this hamper also make it perfect for when you are on the go, or even away from home in small spaces such as college dorms.  Think of all the ways you can use it.



Our Amazon store/page for the Foldable Laundry Hamper

About Useful Essentials and its Founder

Useful Essentials is an online retailer of beneficial products for homes, started by a dedicated founder with 17 years of business and entrepreneurship experience. The goal of the company is to bring new, innovative products into the home to make the simple tasks in life easier and more enjoyable.  Our products focus equally on both form and function. In other words: it will look good while it works.

We’re extremely excited about the other products we have planned for future release, but we can’t move on to those until we get enough sales from our very first product, the foldable laundry hamper.

What Is Needed & What You Get

Useful Essentials needs $12,000 to fund inventory and shipping costs of the hamper.  Some of the funds will also be used to ship perks to contributors like you, which are listed to the side.

For your generous contribution, we are prepared to offer access to our special report eBook about removing clutter from your home, our company newsletter full of valuable tips, discounts on the product, and even advertising on our site in front of a highly targeted audience.

100% Delivery Guaranteed Or Your Money Back!

Risks & Challenges

Although the hamper is designed and ready for distribution, we still need funds to put into product, promotion, and marketing so we can build an audience. The funds gathered from this campaign will fund the creation of inventory and shipping costs, and go towards letting the world know that this solution exists. 

The more we can produce in a single run, the cheaper the price per unit will be! Take advantage of the special low prices we are offering during this campaign, because you won’t always be able to get it this cheap again. We have the systems, tools, and team to make this a wild success.

Other Ways You Can Help

You should already see the enormous value of product name.  We’d like to serve as an inspiration for other entrepreneurs and startup enterprises to get out there and release their innovations/ideas to the world through the crowdfunding model.  

We know a lot of people who need a solution like this, so tell your friends to contribute so we can promote it to the world.  Sharing this campaign on your social media profile is just as valuable to us as an actual financial pledge.

Thanks For Your Help!!!

story:
Our Story

In search of a high quality, affordable and beautifully crafted knife, it seemed as if the hunt was endless. At Kitsune Cutlery, we wanted to make a knife to solve this problem. Our mission was to source the best steel, have the best craftsmanship all while being extremely affordable.

We wanted to make a knife that any master chef or home cook alike would be proud to use, so we created Kitsune Cutlery.

 

About the Knife

 

Steel: In our pursuit for the best quality material, we stumbled upon Japanese VG-10 Damascus steel. This steel, notorious for its hardness and ability to retain its edge is world renowned among knife makers. The steel is so prized in fact that it is made only by a single forge in the Fukui prefecture in Japan, the legendary Takefu Steel Company.

 

 

                                                           Takefu Steel Company, Japan

 

                                                                                                                            Kitsune Chef Knife at Work

 

Due to the exclusivity and quality of VG-10 Steel, there has inevitably been knock off and reproductions of real Japanese Takefu VG-10 Steel. Thousands of knives endorsing fake VG-10 Steel circulate the market to this day.

 

Here at Kitsune Cutlery, we have taken the utmost precaution and care to ensure that this does not happen to our consumers. We have partnered with a manufacturer known to carry real Takefu VG-10 Steel imported from Japan with the credentials to prove it. At Kitsune Cutlery, the standard is paramount, and we have gone to great lengths to ensure it is met with every knife.

 

                                                        Certification of Japanese VG-10 Steel

 

The beauty and storied forging process of the Kitsune Chef Knife is reflected in the unique and breathtaking wavy Damascus pattern that comes about naturally during the forging process.

                                                                     Our Kitsune Chef Knife slicing through tomato - paper thin

                                            Perfectly balanced weight made for easy chopping

 

Handle: Paying our respects to Japanese tradition, we have designed the handle in the traditional Japanese octagonal style, comprised of Black and Rose wood to compliment the beauty of the wavy Damascus pattern of the Kitsune Chef Knife.

                                                  Black and Rose wood Octagonal Handle

 

Lacquer wood Box and Furoshiki wrap: In our inaugural year, we have launched a beautifully designed premium high gloss Lacquer wood box with a scenic view of Mount Fuji and Kitsune foxes overlooking the landscape. 

                                    Our Beautifully crafted Premium Lacquer wood Gift Box

 

As a nod to Japanese tradition, with every knife comes a traditional Japanese Furoshiki wrap in one of six designs, each meticulously gift wrapped over our beautifully crafted boxes.

                                                                                Furoshiki Wrap

 

                                                                         Furoshiki Wraps Cont.

 

Specifications:

 

How we do it: By selling direct to consumer without the needless marketing and advertising, need for brick and mortar locations, and commission rates to salesmen, we are able to decrease costs significantly from competitors using the same material.

 

Timeline:

 

 Kitsune Cutlery: Our Promise

 

To every backer, consumer and follower of Kitsune Cutlery; It is our promise and principle to maintain our high standard with every knife that leaves our production facilities. We would like to take the time to say thank you for helping us realize the goal. On behalf of everyone here at Kitsune Cutlery, we'd like to wish you a big thank you!

 

Risks and challenges

 

Here at Kitsune Cutlery, we are confident in our ability to maintain and stay true to our set timeline and goals. However, there are scenarios where there can be unforeseen problems. Delays in Materials - As VG-10 Damascus Steel is only forged by a single factory in Japan, there can be some challenges in procuring the material in our factories. However, as we have partnered with reliable manufacturers and factories who have the steel in hand in case of high demand, this problem can be circumvented. Delays in Production- We have partnered with a manufacturer with over 20 years experience in forging knives and cutlery. However, this is not to say that delays in production can not occur. In the event that this happens, our backers and supporters will be the first to know. At every stage of the process, we will keep a close eye on the production process to ensure that everything meets our high standard. This is our promise to every backer.

 

Environmental commitments

Long-lasting design

Our knives have the potential to last a lifetime if taken proper care of, as Damascus VG-10 and its stainless steel qualities allow for long lasting usage.

Reusability and recyclability

Instead of using paper and plastic to wrap our packages, we use the traditional Japanese Furoshiki wrap. This saves both plastic and paper, with the added bonus that the Furoshiki wrap is reusable.

Sustainable materials

Our Rose and Black wood that comprise our handle are sustainably sourced from reputable companies.

Thousands of knives endorsing fake VG-10 Steel circulate the market to this day. Here at Kitsune Cutlery, we have taken the utmost precaution and care to ensure that this does not happen to our consumers. We have partnered with a manufacturer known to carry real Takefu VG-10 Steel imported from Japan with the credentials to prove it. At Kitsune Cutlery, the standard is paramount, and we have gone to great lengths to ensure it is met with every knife.                                                         Certification of Japanese VG-10 Steel The beauty and storied forging process of the Kitsune Chef Knife is reflected in the unique and breathtaking wavy Damascus pattern that comes about naturally during the forging process.                                                                     Our Kitsune Chef Knife slicing through tomato - paper thin                                            Perfectly balanced weight made for easy chopping Handle: Paying our respects to Japanese tradition, we have designed the handle in the traditional Japanese octagonal style, comprised of Black and Rose wood to compliment the beauty of the wavy Damascus pattern of the Kitsune Chef Knife.                                                  Black and Rose wood Octagonal Handle Lacquer wood Box and Furoshiki wrap: In our inaugural year, we have launched a beautifully designed premium high gloss Lacquer wood box with a scenic view of Mount Fuji and Kitsune foxes overlooking the landscape.                                     Our Beautifully crafted Premium Lacquer wood Gift Box As a nod to Japanese tradition, with every knife comes a traditional Japanese Furoshiki wrap in one of six designs, each meticulously gift wrapped over our beautifully crafted boxes.                                                                                Furoshiki Wrap                                                                          Furoshiki Wraps Cont. Specifications: How we do it: By selling direct to consumer without the needless marketing and advertising, need for brick and mortar locations, and commission rates to salesmen, we are able to decrease costs significantly from competitors using the same material. Timeline:  Kitsune Cutlery: Our Promise To every backer, consumer and follower of Kitsune Cutlery; It is our promise and principle to maintain our high standard with every knife that leaves our production facilities. We would like to take the time to say thank you for helping us realize the goal. On behalf of everyone here at Kitsune Cutlery, we'd like to wish you a big thank you! Risks and challenges Here at Kitsune Cutlery, we are confident in our ability to maintain and stay true to our set timeline and goals. However, there are scenarios where there can be unforeseen problems. Delays in Materials - As VG-10 Damascus Steel is only forged by a single factory in Japan, there can be some challenges in procuring the material in our factories. However, as we have partnered with reliable manufacturers and factories who have the steel in hand in case of high demand, this problem can be circumvented. Delays in Production- We have partnered with a manufacturer with over 20 years experience in forging knives and cutlery. However, this is not to say that delays in production can not occur. In the event that this happens, our backers and supporters will be the first to know. At every stage of the process, we will keep a close eye on the production process to ensure that everything meets our high standard. This is our promise to every backer. Environmental commitmentsLong-lasting designOur knives have the potential to last a lifetime if taken proper care of, as Damascus VG-10 and its stainless steel qualities allow for long lasting usage.Reusability and recyclabilityInstead of using paper and plastic to wrap our packages, we use the traditional Japanese Furoshiki wrap. This saves both plastic and paper, with the added bonus that the Furoshiki wrap is reusable.Sustainable materialsOur Rose and Black wood that comprise our handle are sustainably sourced from reputable companies.

story:
The Story    

     The Fixit team consists of two driven college students with an idea to revolutionize the home renovation industry. Andrew K. and Vaibhav G. the founders of Fixit met at college while they were thrown together in an introductory python coding course. Grabbing lunch after class one day the pair hatched up and idea and began the steps to reaching where they are today. Five months ago Fixit was pitching an idea on a powerpoint presentation and after two months of hard work that idea turned into a rough working model of the app that could change the industry. After countless hours of research Fixit found their right fit with developers and were able to scrape together their own personal funds to get the ball rolling. That brings us to where we are today. Currently our app is in the development stage and as with most startups we've hit a slight bump in the road. We need to secure more funding just to get our application completed so we can share our idea with the world. Furthermore we would love to reach our goal of $200k which will be invested strictly into augmented reality research and development once our initial excess development costs of $10k are taken care of.  Together we can save time and money all while bettering our homes and each community Fixit becomes a part of. The Fixit team greatly appreciates your generosity and we are looking forward to seeing everyone on the App & Google play store.
