After countless hours of research Fixit found their right fit with developers and were able to scrape together their own personal funds to get the ball rolling. That brings us to where we are today. Currently our app is in the development stage and as with most startups we've hit a slight bump in the road. We need to secure more funding just to get our application completed so we can share our idea with the world. Furthermore we would love to reach our goal of $200k which will be invested strictly into augmented reality research and development once our initial excess development costs of $10k are taken care of.  Together we can save time and money all while bettering our homes and each community Fixit becomes a part of. The Fixit team greatly appreciates your generosity and we are looking forward to seeing everyone on the App & Google play store.

story:
Lauren and Mike were recently married on May 17th at their wonderful cabin in Glacier, WA in the foothills of Mt. Baker. Their cabin desperately needs a great dining room table for all their family and friends to gather around. 

They have commissioned a local artist in Seattle to make a table and 4 benches out of reclaimed beetle kill pine.  The table will seat up to 14 people and will be a great place for the board games, awesome meals and general gatherings of tom foolery that tend to occur at the Baker cabin. For whomever donates, their name and well wishes will be printed on a scroll and kept with the table as a means for the happy couple to remember their loved ones over the years to come. We recently ran one crowdfunding campgain to fund the table, now we need places to sit at it. 

Why contribute?

  • Lauren and Mike love to entertain guests and guests need a place to sit (and eat and drink!)
  • This way you don't have to go shopping, fight crowds at the mall, or spend hours going through online registries
  • It's the perfect solution for someone that doesn't want the trouble of traveling across the country, or crossing borders with a gift
  • They are currently using two old Ikea tables pushed together to accommodate guests- it's kind of sad. They aren't even the same height (or width, length or colour!).
  • You get to support local artists and that's always good!

This site accepts Credit Cards, if you would rather contribute by check (or even a cheque) please contact Lauren or Mike for a mailing address.

Pictures of the progress of the table crafting will be updated on this website so keep checking in to get updates!

This table will be a special and unique gift and they are really looking forward to having a great place for family and friends to gather.

Thanks for contributing!

story:
Renaisscent is a waterless, heatless diffuser that lets you
customize and control your home’s ambiance right from your phone.
 


    


 

           



        

Fragrance capsules are not only more cost effective than essential oils,
but also more healthy and environmentally friendly.

Renaisscent can hold two fragrance capsules at a time, each with three different fragrances,
for a total of six scents to choose from at any given time.
You can mix and match any of the six scents -- choose just one, three, six, whatever you wish!


            




With Renaisscent, you can create new, exciting fragrances
or calming, rejuvenating scents all from the convenience of our free app.
From diffusing one to six scents at a time,
Renaisscent gives you hundreds of possible fragrance combinations for your space.

We’ve also created songs to accompany each of the different scents you choose to diffuse,
and you can play them directly from the Renaisscent app.
It’s time to sit back, relax and enjoy the space you’ve created for yourself!






Want your house to smell like a rejuvenating oasis to welcome you home? Or maybe a relaxing and luxurious day spa? You can now control your ambiance, or whichever scent you choose, from our free app.
 


 



Renaisscent offers four fragrance capsules to choose from,
each containing three different scents that were created to enhance your different moods.
Use these pre-selected combinations -- with their accompanying songs in the app -- when you want to relax, go to sleep, refresh yourself, or fall in love.






Portable, wireless and lightweight, you can easily move Renaisscent from your desk at work
to your kitchen counter top, living room, or any place you can imagine!




Using Renaisscent’s app for Android and iOS devices,
you can set custom fragrance alarms that allow you to
wake up to an energizing fragrance,
or even remember to start getting ready for bed with a calming scent.






Renaisscent doesn’t use water,
so the wax capsules stay safely and securely in the diffuser
even as you travel or move it from room to room.
No spills. No hassles. No clean up.
 


 


 



Using fan power, you can control the intensity of the scent you desire
and the duration of diffusion time to your liking.
Renaisscent can operate for up to 6 hours of continuous diffusion on a single charge.
Each capsule can last up to 150 hours of continued diffusion,
which will last you about 1-2 months,
and the ideal space for Renaisscent is up to 300 square feet.
 




Renaisscent delivers soothing and refreshing fragrances
without using heat,
making it safe for everyone,
including children and pets.
 



 

Renaisscent doesn’t require a power outlet to better your mood.
The rechargeable battery uses a Micro USB cable to charge.
 


 



Renaisscent’s sleek and elegant design perfectly blends into
your home, your office, or even your car
in three fashionable colors: white, black and gold.
 


 

 


 


 

Once you’ve added your scent capsule to the diffuser, it only takes three seconds for the diffuser to recognize your choice and display it within the app. You’re ready to start diffusing!
 

 

Below the capsules is an app-controlled fan that can be adjusted to different levels of intensity for your fragrance. We utilize the combination of our quality-crafted wax fragrances with a steady and ventilated airflow to diffuse throughout your home, without creating more humidity or heat in the process.
 

 

 

 

 

                               

                                                   

 

We can’t thank you enough for checking out our project and helping us make Renaisscent a success.

We know not everyone will be able to support us with a pledge, so even if you can’t give a dollar or purchase a Renaisscent Smart Diffuser, if you’re a supporter of Renaisscent, you can help us spread the word on Twitter, Facebook, Instagram and anywhere else you can think of!
 


 


 

 


 

Is there a way to smell the scents before I get them?
Unfortunately no, but you receive four capsules (with three scents included in each capsule) for a total of 12 options with the purchase of a Renaisscent.
 

What if I don’t like any of the scents provided?
If you don't like the pre-set scents included, you can mix and match scents to your liking via the app. You can design your own scent with virtually hundreds of options to choose from.
 

Do I need a Wi-Fi signal to have the Renaisscent work in my car?
No, all you need to do is press the button on the Renaisscent twice, and it will start diffusing your favorite scents. You can also use a mobile Hotspot to control the Renaisscent from the app.
 

Does the Renaisscent app work with Android and iOS phones?
Yes, it works across both operating systems.
 

Can several people be in control of it if they’re all on the app at once in a household?
No, only one person may control the Renaisscent at a time. However if someone else with the app would like to control it, the first person would have to disconnect to allow another person to control it.

story:
The embodiment of design, performance, and attention to detail

Spending so much time at home is great, right? Okay, maybe not for everyone. Look on the bright side. You can work on improving your morning routine, perhaps?

You know, wake up, workout, eat breakfast, and...your toast is dry, isn't it?

Or, you don't eat toast anymore because it's always dry or burned.
We used our time to come up with, what we consider, the perfect solution.

 

 

Qrispr toasts every kind of bread in the most effective way to bring out the perfect flavor, aroma, and texture. It can do the same for other foods too, warming up yesterday`s pizza without drying it out for example.

 

A device that is not just evolutionary but revolutionary for toast seems like a solid cornerstone for the new foundation as we build this brave new world. Discover how the use of steam can imbue any starchy product with an almost impossible balance of crispiness and warm fluff.

With adjustable heat and an accurate timer, you are guaranteed a good result every time.

 

 

Brings out the best in every kind of food.

You need less time because steam is heating more rapidly than air. You need less electricity because steam heats more rapidly than air.

 

Food is rare and needs to be treated with more respect. With Qrispr you can reheat yesterday`s food without losing its taste. This allows us to prevent food waste.

Hi, I'm Mo,  I am the creator of Qrispr! And no, I am not a cat wearing a toast as a hat, but he looks like he's missing crispy toast, doesn't he? Well, then...

Qrispr toasts every kind of bread in the most effective way to bring out the perfect flavor, aroma, and texture. It can do the same for other foods too, reheating yesterday`s pizza without drying it out for example and doubles as an oven.

At Qrispr, we are aware that everyone's spending a lot more time at home these days, and no one knows when we’ll be able to go back out again. Life has changed, and we have to reevaluate, reorder, and reassemble. 

So, with the help of a stellar team, we bring you a device that’s not just evolutionary but revolutionary for toast seems like a solid cornerstone for the new foundation as we build this brave new world.

Certificates

story:
Sofia Family
Digital Activity Manager

The most effective way to limit the time your kids spend in gaming, entertainment, and social media. Works across all devices. Online and offline.
Inside and outside the home.

 

A revolutionary approach to screen time management, featuring the Sofia Family hub, and apps for iOS, Android, Fire OS, Windows and Mac.

 

 

What is Sofia Family? 


Imagine if there was technology available that let parents set simple family rules for time spent in gaming, entertainment and social media, and those activities were monitored and limited across every device the kids use. 
 
A parent could agree with their child...
- To limit video games to 10 hours a week
- To limit video entertainment to 8 hours a week
- To limit social media to an hour a day
 
… and these simple rules would be managed across phones, computers, tablets, game consoles, media streamers, smart TV’s, cable/sat TV boxes, even disc players. 
 
That is exactly the technology that we have developed over the past year. It works. It’s awesome. It’s going to help a lot of people. We are near commercialization, and with your help we can finish the job as fast as possible. 

 

 

Simplicity for Parents, Flexibility for Kids
The Sofia Family App

With just a few clicks, the Sofia Family mobile app enables you to set simple, flexible limits for each family member.

Kids have the flexibility to choose which games to play, which apps to enjoy, and which devices to use. This helps kids learn how to make good choices that prioritize the digital experiences they value most.

When a child reaches a limit for an activity on any device, Sofia Family blocks that activity on all devices – but still lets your kids use their computers and mobile devices for writing papers, reading books, or expressing creativity; any app you choose to allow all the time.


As kids mature, you can choose to have Sofia Family just remind them
when it’s time to turn off.

 
 

A Complete Solution

Sofia Family manages screen time across all device types through one simple app.

Sofia Family control apps work quietly in the background to manage digital activity on your computers and mobile devices. Your smart TV and other devices in your media center are managed with the Sofia Family hub.

 
 
 

New Technology!
The Innovative Sofia Family Hub.

The Sofia Family hub manages all the devices in your media center - your smart TV, and other devices connected to your TV with HDMI cables. That includes game consoles, media streamers, cable/satellite TV boxes, disc players and home theater PC's. Anything with an HDMI cable. 

You simply plug your TV and other devices into the hub, as shown. The hub works whether visible or hidden.

 

Sofia Family takes a new approach to screen time management and differs greatly from router-based systems.

Router-based screen time management products only manage online activity. They cannot monitor offline gaming, downloaded videos or cable TV.

Router-based solutions cannot tell which family member is using a shared device - such as a media streamer, smart TV, or game console.

These solutions are also easily circumvented by connecting to a different network.

The Sofia Family hub is smarter. Since the hub is directly connected to the devices in your media center, it can manage both online and offline activity. And the hub knows which family member is using a device by granting access through the simple Sofia Family app.

 

 

"Won't my kids just unplug the HDMI cables?"

We thought of that too!

That's why the Sofia Family hub includes several anti-circumvention technologies (patent pending). It electronically detects when HDMI cables are disconnected from the hub, or, from the devices it manages (Xbox, TV etc.).

If your kids get creative and try unplugging an HDMI cable from the hub, you'll receive a push notification through the Sofia Family app.

 

 

100% Kidproof!

We know kids today are crazy smart and will never stop searching for inventive workarounds!

The innovations built into the Sofia Family digital activity manager close loopholes found in other systems. But if you discover your child does find a way to bypass our system, please let us know – we may have a job waiting for them!

 

Watch, as Kristen describes popular ways kids can easily bypass
popular screen time controls -  but not with Sofia Family.

 
 

Additional Cool Features

 

 
 
 

What comes in the package?

The Sofia Family digital activity manager package includes: one Sofia Family hub (manages up to 5 devices in a media center), USB power adapter and cable, and instructions to install the Sofia Family app on all of your mobile devices and computers.

 

 

 

Better Digital Parenting

Healthy parent-child relationships are based on trust and collaboration - not power and control.

With Sofia Family, parents can confidently collaborate with kids to develop healthy digital habits for a lifetime, and hopefully eliminate the daily conflicts that are often a part of digital parenting.

 
 

 

Why back us?
Help make a positive impact on the well-being of kids and families. 
 

We all love technology. But too much time spent in digital activity has unhealthy consequences on the mental, emotional, physical, relational and academic well-being of children and teenagers.  Recent quarantines, lock-downs and the shift to remote learning have only heightened the problem  of excessive screen-time.

Sofia Family helps kids (and parents) enjoy the benefits of technology while avoiding the pitfalls of life in a digital world. 

Our innovative approach helps families restore balance and helps kids develop healthy digital habits for a lifetime.

Sound like something worth contributing to? We hope so. We’d love to have you as a backer!

 

 

Sofia Family Timeline

 

 

 

Early days! Product innovators Bill Connors (President) and Ryan Gallagher (CTO) develop the product concepts and how to bring them to life, October 2019.

 
Ryan Gallagher demonstrates our Proof-of-Concept Prototype in advance of an investor conference, January, 2020.
 

First Production Printed Circuit Board Assembly and Enclosures for Beta Units, August, 2020

 

 

 

 

Our Team

We have a unique founding team with decades of combined experience in software development, new business leadership, child development, consumer marketing, and integrated circuit design. And yes, we are parents too.

 

 

Our Development and Manufacturing Partners
 

A special thanks to our amazing engineering, design and manufacturing partners, who embraced our rapid development and commercialization timeline, while navigating the unique obstacles of working through the pandemic.

 

 

A Father's Search

The idea for Sofia Family originated with Bill, a father of four.

He tried every type of product to help limit screen time. None could help him manage this simple rule:

8 hours a week for gaming.

Whether Xbox, computer, smartphone or tablet. At home or away.

So he invented one!

 

 

FAQs

Q: Don’t most devices come with parental controls already installed?
A: Many do. But managing time your kids spend in gaming, entertainment, and social media one device at a time is not merely inconvenient. It’s impossible. If a child runs out of time on one device, they can just hop onto a different device - often continuing the same activity, like watching YouTube videos. 
With Sofia Family, when a child reaches a time limit for an activity on any device, that activity is blocked on all devices. 

Q: Is there a limit to the number of devices I can manage with Sofia Family?
A: Your monthly subscription includes as many hubs, computers, and mobile devices as you care to manage. There is no limit on the number of family members, either. Each hub manages up to 5 devices in one media center: the TV, along with up to four devices connected to the TV (such as game consoles, media streamers, disc players, Cable / Sat TV boxes). 

Q: The Sofia Family hub manages up to 5 devices in one media center. What do you mean by a ‘media center’? 
A: By ‘media center’, we don’t mean a piece of furniture. We mean a TV in your home, together with all of the video and gaming devices connected to the TV with HDMI cables. These can include game consoles (PlayStation, Xbox, Nintendo), media streamers (Apple TV, Roku, Fire TV, Nvidia Shield TV, etc…), Cable / Sat TV boxes, disc players, and Home Theater PC). 

Q: I have two media centers in my house. Do I need to buy a second hub?
A: You will need one Sofia Family hub for each media center in your home that you want to manage. If the devices you want to manage are all in one media center, you could just use one hub, and leave the devices in your other media center unmanaged. An additional hub costs $59.99 (MSRP), and is easy to add at any time. 

Q: Can’t my kid just unplug the HDMI cables from the Sofia Family hub to circumvent the system?
A: The Sofia Family hub electronically detects when HDMI cables are disconnected from the hub or from the devices it manages (Xbox, TV, etc…). When an HDMI cable is disconnected, Sofia Family sends a push notification to the parent(s). The hub also detects when an HDMI cable is reconnected, so the parent(s) can see in the device log how long the cable was disconnected. 

Q: My router comes with parental controls included. How is Sofia Family different?
A: The nice thing about router-based parental controls is that they are compatible with all device types, and can provide helpful content filtering. However, router-based systems cannot monitor or limit the amount of time a child games or watches videos or television offline. They cannot tell which family member is using a shared device (like Apple TV, a game console, or family computer). And children can easily bypass router-based systems by connecting to another available wireless network. 
 
Q: Why is it important to manage offline activity? 
A: Some parental control solutions focus on managing ‘online time’. But even with restricted ‘online time’, your child can still game an unlimited number of hours per week offline. Your child can still watch an unlimited amount of cable TV. Your child can still use their ‘online time’ to download dozens of hours of Netflix videos to watch at a later time offline. Because kids extensively game and watch videos both online and offline, an effective time management solution has to be able to monitor and limit activity both online and offline as well.

Q: Is Sofia Family difficult to install and set up?
A: No. It takes less than 5 minutes to install the Sofia Family app on each of your mobile devices and computers. The Sofia Family hub is installed by connecting the HDMI cables of the devices in your media center to the hub. It takes about 15 minutes to set up. Setup wizards guide you every step of the way, and we provide easy-to-follow installation videos and live support.

Q: Does my child need their own smartphone to access a device managed by the Sofia Family hub?
A: No. A parent can grant access to any family member through the app on the parent’s mobile device. 

Q: Will my subscription price be higher if we have a big family?  
A: No, the price to subscribe to Sofia Family is the same regardless of the number of family members, or the number of devices you choose to manage.

Q: Does the Sofia Family hub need to be in view to work?
A: No, you can install the hub in a location where it cannot be seen. However, there is an LED on the front of the hub that indicates when the hub is operating normally, when a port is active, and when an HDMI cable has been disconnected. All of this information is available in the Sofia Family app, but you may find the LED helpful. 

Q: Does the Sofia Family hub generate heat.
A: No, the Sofia Family hub generates very little heat. However, you should not locate the hub directly on top of other devices in your media center that do generate heat.

 

Have friends or relatives in your social networks that would be interested in managing screen time in their homes? 
Please share the good news!

 

       Click to share with your Facebook network

 

Click to share with your Twitter network

 

Thank You Very Much!
story_txt:
Sofia FamilyDigital Activity Manager
The most effective way to limit the time your kids spend in gaming, entertainment, and social media. Works across all devices. Online and offline.Inside and outside the home.
 


A revolutionary approach to screen time management, featuring the Sofia Family hub, and apps for iOS, Android, Fire OS, Windows and Mac.
 
 
What is Sofia Family? 
Imagine if there was technology available that let parents set simple family rules for time spent in gaming, entertainment and social media, and those activities were monitored and limited across every device the kids use.  A parent could agree with their child...- To limit video games to 10 hours a week- To limit video entertainment to 8 hours a week- To limit social media to an hour a day … and these simple rules would be managed across phones, computers, tablets, game consoles, media streamers, smart TV’s, cable/sat TV boxes, even disc players.  That is exactly the technology that we have developed over the past year. It works. It’s awesome. It’s going to help a lot of people. We are near commercialization, and with your help we can finish the job as fast as possible. 



 
 
Simplicity for Parents, Flexibility for KidsThe Sofia Family App

With just a few clicks, the Sofia Family mobile app enables you to set simple, flexible limits for each family member.

Kids have the flexibility to choose which games to play, which apps to enjoy, and which devices to use. This helps kids learn how to make good choices that prioritize the digital experiences they value most.
When a child reaches a limit for an activity on any device, Sofia Family blocks that activity on all devices – but still lets your kids use their computers and mobile devices for writing papers, reading books, or expressing creativity; any app you choose to allow all the time.
As kids mature, you can choose to have Sofia Family just remind themwhen it’s time to turn off.

 
 
A Complete Solution

Sofia Family manages screen time across all device types through one simple app.
Sofia Family control apps work quietly in the background to manage digital activity on your computers and mobile devices. Your smart TV and other devices in your media center are managed with the Sofia Family hub.

 
 
 
New Technology!The Innovative Sofia Family Hub.
The Sofia Family hub manages all the devices in your media center - your smart TV, and other devices connected to your TV with HDMI cables. That includes game consoles, media streamers, cable/satellite TV boxes, disc players and home theater PC's. Anything with an HDMI cable. You simply plug your TV and other devices into the hub, as shown. The hub works whether visible or hidden.
 



Sofia Family takes a new approach to screen time management and differs greatly from router-based systems.
Router-based screen time management products only manage online activity. They cannot monitor offline gaming, downloaded videos or cable TV.
Router-based solutions cannot tell which family member is using a shared device - such as a media streamer, smart TV, or game console.
These solutions are also easily circumvented by connecting to a different network.
The Sofia Family hub is smarter. Since the hub is directly connected to the devices in your media center, it can manage both online and offline activity. And the hub knows which family member is using a device by granting access through the simple Sofia Family app.
 

 
"Won't my kids just unplug the HDMI cables?"We thought of that too!That's why the Sofia Family hub includes several anti-circumvention technologies (patent pending). It electronically detects when HDMI cables are disconnected from the hub, or, from the devices it manages (Xbox, TV etc.).If your kids get creative and try unplugging an HDMI cable from the hub, you'll receive a push notification through the Sofia Family app.

 
 
100% Kidproof!


We know kids today are crazy smart and will never stop searching for inventive workarounds!
The innovations built into the Sofia Family digital activity manager close loopholes found in other systems. But if you discover your child does find a way to bypass our system, please let us know – we may have a job waiting for them!

 

Watch, as Kristen describes popular ways kids can easily bypasspopular screen time controls -  but not with Sofia Family.
 
 
Additional Cool Features
 

 
 
 
What comes in the package?
The Sofia Family digital activity manager package includes: one Sofia Family hub (manages up to 5 devices in a media center), USB power adapter and cable, and instructions to install the Sofia Family app on all of your mobile devices and computers.

 
 
 
Better Digital Parenting

Healthy parent-child relationships are based on trust and collaboration - not power and control.
With Sofia Family, parents can confidently collaborate with kids to develop healthy digital habits for a lifetime, and hopefully eliminate the daily conflicts that are often a part of digital parenting.


 
 
 

Why back us?Help make a positive impact on the well-being of kids and families.  
We all love technology. But too much time spent in digital activity has unhealthy consequences on the mental, emotional, physical, relational and academic well-being of children and teenagers.  Recent quarantines, lock-downs and the shift to remote learning have only heightened the problem  of excessive screen-time.
Sofia Family helps kids (and parents) enjoy the benefits of technology while avoiding the pitfalls of life in a digital world. 
Our innovative approach helps families restore balance and helps kids develop healthy digital habits for a lifetime.
Sound like something worth contributing to? We hope so. We’d love to have you as a backer!

 
 
Sofia Family Timeline
 

 
 

Early days! Product innovators Bill Connors (President) and Ryan Gallagher (CTO) develop the product concepts and how to bring them to life, October 2019.
 



Ryan Gallagher demonstrates our Proof-of-Concept Prototype in advance of an investor conference, January, 2020.
 



First Production Printed Circuit Board Assembly and Enclosures for Beta Units, August, 2020
 
 

 
 
Our Team
We have a unique founding team with decades of combined experience in software development, new business leadership, child development, consumer marketing, and integrated circuit design. And yes, we are parents too.

 
 

Our Development and Manufacturing Partners 

A special thanks to our amazing engineering, design and manufacturing partners, who embraced our rapid development and commercialization timeline, while navigating the unique obstacles of working through the pandemic.
 
 
A Father's SearchThe idea for Sofia Family originated with Bill, a father of four.He tried every type of product to help limit screen time. None could help him manage this simple rule:8 hours a week for gaming.Whether Xbox, computer, smartphone or tablet. At home or away.So he invented one!  FAQsQ: Don’t most devices come with parental controls already installed?A: Many do. But managing time your kids spend in gaming, entertainment, and social media one device at a time is not merely inconvenient. It’s impossible. If a child runs out of time on one device, they can just hop onto a different device - often continuing the same activity, like watching YouTube videos. With Sofia Family, when a child reaches a time limit for an activity on any device, that activity is blocked on all devices. Q: Is there a limit to the number of devices I can manage with Sofia Family?A: Your monthly subscription includes as many hubs, computers, and mobile devices as you care to manage. There is no limit on the number of family members, either. Each hub manages up to 5 devices in one media center: the TV, along with up to four devices connected to the TV (such as game consoles, media streamers, disc players, Cable / Sat TV boxes). Q: The Sofia Family hub manages up to 5 devices in one media center. What do you mean by a ‘media center’? A: By ‘media center’, we don’t mean a piece of furniture. We mean a TV in your home, together with all of the video and gaming devices connected to the TV with HDMI cables. These can include game consoles (PlayStation, Xbox, Nintendo), media streamers (Apple TV, Roku, Fire TV, Nvidia Shield TV, etc…), Cable / Sat TV boxes, disc players, and Home Theater PC). Q: I have two media centers in my house. Do I need to buy a second hub?A: You will need one Sofia Family hub for each media center in your home that you want to manage. If the devices you want to manage are all in one media center, you could just use one hub, and leave the devices in your other media center unmanaged. An additional hub costs $59.99 (MSRP), and is easy to add at any time. Q: Can’t my kid just unplug the HDMI cables from the Sofia Family hub to circumvent the system?A: The Sofia Family hub electronically detects when HDMI cables are disconnected from the hub or from the devices it manages (Xbox, TV, etc…). When an HDMI cable is disconnected, Sofia Family sends a push notification to the parent(s). The hub also detects when an HDMI cable is reconnected, so the parent(s) can see in the device log how long the cable was disconnected. Q: My router comes with parental controls included. How is Sofia Family different?A: The nice thing about router-based parental controls is that they are compatible with all device types, and can provide helpful content filtering. However, router-based systems cannot monitor or limit the amount of time a child games or watches videos or television offline. They cannot tell which family member is using a shared device (like Apple TV, a game console, or family computer). And children can easily bypass router-based systems by connecting to another available wireless network.  Q: Why is it important to manage offline activity? A: Some parental control solutions focus on managing ‘online time’. But even with restricted ‘online time’, your child can still game an unlimited number of hours per week offline. Your child can still watch an unlimited amount of cable TV. Your child can still use their ‘online time’ to download dozens of hours of Netflix videos to watch at a later time offline. Because kids extensively game and watch videos both online and offline, an effective time management solution has to be able to monitor and limit activity both online and offline as well.Q: Is Sofia Family difficult to install and set up?A: No. It takes less than 5 minutes to install the Sofia Family app on each of your mobile devices and computers. The Sofia Family hub is installed by connecting the HDMI cables of the devices in your media center to the hub. It takes about 15 minutes to set up. Setup wizards guide you every step of the way, and we provide easy-to-follow installation videos and live support.Q: Does my child need their own smartphone to access a device managed by the Sofia Family hub?A: No. A parent can grant access to any family member through the app on the parent’s mobile device. Q: Will my subscription price be higher if we have a big family?  A: No, the price to subscribe to Sofia Family is the same regardless of the number of family members, or the number of devices you choose to manage.Q: Does the Sofia Family hub need to be in view to work?A: No, you can install the hub in a location where it cannot be seen. However, there is an LED on the front of the hub that indicates when the hub is operating normally, when a port is active, and when an HDMI cable has been disconnected. All of this information is available in the Sofia Family app, but you may find the LED helpful. Q: Does the Sofia Family hub generate heat.A: No, the Sofia Family hub generates very little heat. However, you should not locate the hub directly on top of other devices in your media center that do generate heat. Have friends or relatives in your social networks that would be interested in managing screen time in their homes? Please share the good news!        Click to share with your Facebook network Click to share with your Twitter network Thank You Very Much!

story:
My Story and how the "Smart Bowl" got here

Thank you for checking out my campaign. My name is Kong Namvong and I am a proud and long time dog owner. Being a dog owner has brought a lot of joy to my family’s life.  My dog's name is Spikey and he is a part of my family.  He is like one of my children and like my children, I want Spikey to have anything and everything in his life that will make him happy.  And when it comes to Spikey's happiness, his food is very important to his survival.

For many years of having Spikey, one of the main frustrations when it comes to feeding him, is the constant battle against house ants invading his food.  This is a major nuisance, especially during the warm summer months when ants are most active looking for food. Every time I would leave Spikey’s food out,the food bowl would be covered with ants in no time! Even when the bowl is left inside the house, these ants are so determined that eventually they would find their way inside our home and invade our dog’s food. Those were the most frustrating times for myself, my family and Spikey because Spikey would not touch his food when he found ants all over it.  He would even go the entire day without a nibble.  At the end of the day I would have to discard all of his food and give him a fresh bowl.  This became too exhausting and wasteful over the years.

After years of putting up with these ants, I began to do some research on ants and how to keep them from my dog's food. Interestingly, I found that ants play an important role in our ecosystem and do a lot of good things for us human. They control the populations of pests like fleas, spiders, bed bugs, flies, silverfish and clothes moths.Eradicating ants from my property is not what I want to do. I just don’t want them to invade my house and my dog’s food.

One of the non-toxic and eco-friendly ideas that I stumbled upon to keep ants out of my dog’s food was to surround the food bowl with water. By placing the food bowl in a larger bowl or a pan filled with water, the water barrier acts as a moat and keeps the ants out. We all know ants are not good swimmers and will not cross this water barrier. I liked this idea because no toxic chemicals were used to keep ants away and most importantly did not contaminate Spikey's food in the process. For days I started feeding my dog using this technique and saw that it kept the ants away. However, this technique was not as effective as it could be. It was easy for the food bowl to be shifted to one side of the water bowl; or if I added less water, the water bowl would dry out in no time and give ants access to crawl right over both walls of the bowls.  It was an improvement but was not user friendly nor convenient enough for me to feed Spikey on a daily basis.

Keeping this “water barrier” idea in mind, I started to do some designing. After numerous pages of pencil sketches and about a year later, I finally came up with a one piece ant-proof pet food and water dish combo and calledit "Smart Bowl".  Smart Bowl's prototype was made in December of 2011 and I started to feed my dog using this bowl. An improvement to use an added insert bowl came to my mind recently after thinking about a dog and cat or small dogs living in same house but having to eat two different types of food. Because this insert bowl can be divided into two food compartments, it makes it ideal to hold two different types of food for your small pet(s).

So far only a prototype was made and is field tested every day by my dog Spikey and as expected, it does keep ants out of the food compartment!  I just have to make sure to replace the water compartment with fresh drinking water daily and Spikey’s food bowl would stay ant free. I no longer have to worry about my dog being fed when I’m not home. This product works and I want to share it with each and every pet owner who are experiencing the same ant problem and frustrations.

 

Introducing.... The Smart Bowl 

*** The following images are just a prototype. Prototype's overall dimensions: 13" L x 7" W x 3" H.

 

 

 

 

 Here are what the Smart Bowl can do: 

Option One: main bowl, hold up to 3.5 cups of food and 6 cups of water.

 

 

Option 2: main bowl with insert bowl can hold up to 2 3/4 cups of food, more convenient to fill food and clean.

 

 

Option 3: main bowl with insert bowl and food bowl divider can hold up to 1 1/4 cups of food each. Perfect to feed your cat and or small dog two different type of food.

 

An insert bowl is removable from the main bowl and a center divider is also removable from an insert bowl.

How will The Smart Bowl be made:

I have been working very closely with a plastic molding company located in Riverside, California (US) to develop this product. Drawings have been made along with the costs and timeframe associated with manufacturing. The product will be made in Polypropylene, blue in color. It will hold up to 3.5 cups of food (just main bowl, without using an insert bowl) and 6 cups of water. 

 

Drawings and dimensions:

The FINAL product dimensions: 15 1/4" L x 8" W x 3 1/4" H.

 

 

 

 




What We Need & What You Get

To fulfill the first production of The Smart Bowl, $60,000 needs to be raised. The most expensive and time consuming part of this production is the cost of the cavity molds, which will cost a total of $33,500 and take up to 14 weeks to make. The main bowl’s cavity mold cost $25,000,  an insert bowl’s cavity mold will cost $7,000 and an insert bowl divider’s cavity will cost $1,500. The remaining funds will go toward the Polypropylene material, shipping and handling costs for my contributors, transaction and indiegogo’s fees.  

 

The Rewards:

$10+ Perk = Thank You for Supporting my Campaign! You will receive a handwritten thank you postcard.

 

$25+ Perk =        X    1  

 

 

$100+ Perk =     X   6  

 

 

$1000+ Perk =     X   100  

 

 Any Potential Setback

At this point, everything looks straightforward in producing the Smart Bowl. However, if an unexpected setback do occur at anytime during the production of the Smart Bowl, I will do everything I can to solve it and will fully inform all my contributors here in Indiegogo.com through out the process.


What happens if this campaign doesn't reach its goal?

Unfortunately, if the funding is short of my campaign’s goal, the rewards for all my contributors will be delayed.  However, I will seek other ways to raise more money and will also consider seeking loans from friends and family to make this a reality.  If a total of $60,000 is reached from other funding and/or loans, I will start on the first production and will reward all my supporters here in indiegogo. I will keep all my supporters posted from here on and throughout the process of production.


 The Impact

Your contribution is utmost important to make it happen. Not only this bowl will keep your pet’s food ant free but this bowl will also benefit millions of pets and their owners all over the world that are experiencing ant problems in their pet food when this product makes it to the market.  Even if you are not experiencing ant problems in your pet's food on a regular basis, you will have a peace of mind when using this bowl knowing that the food is well protected from the annoying army of ants when you are not around.

Every pet owner will most likely experience ants in their pet food bowl at some point during their companionship and it could be very stressful and frustrating in fighting these little creatures.  No longer will you have to put up with ants! Feed your pet(s) with the Smart Bowl! This bowl is the solution!  In addition, this bowl will give you options to feed your pet(s) which will be even more convenient for you.  Also, there are millions of pets and their owners all over the world that will benefit from this bowl.


Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot contribute to my campaign, please pass on the words to your friends, family and people around you.  Chances are, they own a dog, a cat or other pets and maybe in need of this product.
